original: [atyantāsa]to 'pi ca lākṣaṇiko virodhaḥ pratīyate yathā kṣaṇikatvenākṣaṇikatvasya tasya vastuni kvacidapyasambhavāt,

original: trividhaśca kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhirūpaḥ pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpta eveti na tasyāhetutvamityuktaṃ bhavati /

original: tatraitat syāt- hetvābhāsānamapi [lakṣaṇam]bhidhānīyaṃ tatra śiṣyāṇāṃ hetuvyavahāranivṛttaya ityāha “hetvābhāsāstato 'pare” iti /

original: “tataḥ” pakṣadharmastadaṃśena vyāpta iti hetulakṣaṇād “apare” a[nye ta]lakṣaṇavikalā hetvābhāsā gamyanta eveti na tallakṣaṇamucyate /

original: tathā hi- “pakṣadharmaḥ” ityukte yatra pakṣadharmatā nāsti na sa hetuḥ /

original: “tadaṃśena vyāptaḥ” iti vacane yatra tadaṃśavyāptiviraho viparyayavyāptervyāpakasya vā tatrāvaśyambhāvābhāvāt,
analyzed: tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ iti vacane yatra tad aṃśa vyāpti virahaḥ viparyaya vyāpteḥ vyāpakasya vā tatra avaśyambhāva abhāvāt
te hetu rūpa vikala tayā hetvābhāsāḥ asiddha viruddha anaikāntikāḥ gamyante eva

original: kadācid vyāptidarśanapūrvake prayoge dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇyapi prathamaṃ hetusadbhāvopadarśanāt /
analyzed: kadācid vyāpti darśana pūrvake prayoge dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇī api prathamam hetu sadbhāva upadarśanāt

original: yadi na pratyāsatteḥ sādhyadharmisiddhiḥ pāriśeṣyāt tarhi bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: yadi na pratyāsatteḥ sādhya dharmi siddhiḥ pāriśeṣyāt tarhi bhaviṣyati
yatas tad aṃśa vyāptyā hetu bhūtayā dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi dharmasya satvat tva siddheḥ

original: nahi dṛṣṭāntamantareṇa hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pradarśayituṃ śakyata iti manyate /
analyzed: nahi dṛṣṭāntam antareṇa hetoḥ sādhyena vyāptiḥ pradarśayitum śakyate iti manyate
tatas dharmi grahaṇāt vayatiricyamānāt sādhya dharmiṇaḥ eva parigrahaḥ

original: “tadaṃśena” iti ca tacchabdena dharmavacanākṣipto dharmī sambhantsyata iti tatsambandhanārthamapi dharmigrahaṇaṃ nāśaṅkanīyam /
analyzed: tad aṃśena iti ca tad śabdena dharma vacana ākṣiptaḥ dharmī sambhantsyate iti tad sambandhana artham api dharmi grahaṇam na āśaṅkanīyam

original: yatra prayojanāntaraṃ na sambhavati sa pāriśeṣyaviṣayaḥ,
analyzed: yatra prayojana antaram na sambhavati sa pāriśeṣya viṣayaḥ
dharmi vacanasya tu anyat api prayojanam sambhāvyate
tat kutas pāriśeṣyāt dharmi vacanāt sādhya dharmi parigrahaḥ

original: iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādyāha- “siddhe tadaṃśavyāptyā dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi satva(ttve)
analyzed: iti manyamānaḥ siddhāntavādī āha siddhe tad aṃśa vyāptyā dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi satvat tve

original: punarddharmiṇo vacanaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇa eva yo dharmaḥ sa heturiti niyamārthamāśaṅkayeta /
analyzed: punar ddharmiṇaḥ vacanam dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇaḥ eva yaḥ dharmaḥ sa hetuḥ iti niyama artham āśaṅkayeta
tatas ca cākṣuṣa tva ādayaḥ eva hetavaḥ syuḥ

original: na kṛtakatvādaya iti aniṣṭameva syāt tasmādupacāraḥ kartavyaḥ” iti /
analyzed: na kṛtaka tva ādayaḥ iti aniṣṭam eva syāt tasmāt upacāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti

original: kiṃ punastarkaśāstra dṛṣṭaṃ kvacit niyamārthavacanamitya āha- “dṛṣṭaṃ sajātīya eva” ityādi /
analyzed: kim punar tarka śāstra dṛṣṭam kvacid niyama artha vacanam iti a āha dṛṣṭam sajātīye eva ityādi
tatra yaḥ san sajātīye nyāya mukhe iti atra ācāryīye hetu lakṣaṇe
sajātīyaḥ eva
m iti avadhāraṇena siddhe pi hetoḥ vyatireke
kutra
sādhya abhāve
yat etat asan tat atyaye nyāya mukhe iti

original: vacanaṃ tanniyamārthamācāryeṇa vyākhyāta[m a]satyeva nāstitā yathā syāt nānyatra na viruddha iti /
analyzed: vacanam tad niyama artham ācāryeṇa vyākhyātam asatī eva nāstitā yathā syāt na anyatra na viruddhaḥ iti
tathā iha api dharmi vacanam tatra eva bhāva niyama artham āśaṅkayeta
kadā siddhe dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi sattva ittve
kutas tad aṃśa vyāpti vacanāt
kva bhāva niyama artham
tatra eva dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi
sati ca āśaṅkā asambhave
kutas
pāriśeṣyāt sādhya dharmi parigrahaḥ
nanu apakṣa dharmasya ahetu tvāt na niyama artha tā āśaṅkā

original: tathā hi- sādhyadharmeṇa vyāpto 'pi dharmo yadi kvacid dharmiṇyupalabhyeta tadā tatraiva svavyāpakapratītiṃ janayet nānyatra [pratyā]sattiviprakarṣābhyāṃ  #
analyzed: tathā hi sādhya dharmeṇa vyāptaḥ api dharmaḥ yadi kvacid dharmiṇi upalabhyeta tadā tatra eva sva vyāpaka pratītim janayet na anyatra pratyāsatti viprakarṣābhyām
yathākramam
anupalabdhaḥ tu kvacid dharmiṇi katham gamakaḥ

original: tathābhāve vā sarvatra svavyāpakaṃ gamayet pratyāsattiviprakarṣābhāvāde[vetyata] āha- “tasmāt sāmarthyāt” ityādi /
analyzed: tathā abhāve vā sarvatra sva vyāpakam gamayet pratyāsatti viprakarṣa abhāvāt eva iti atas āha tasmāt sāmarthyāt ityādi

original: yadidamanantaraṃ sāmarthyaṃ samupavarṇitam āsmāt sāmarthyādarthasya sādhyadharmiparigrahalakṣaṇasya bhavati pratīti[rpa]ṭudhiyāṃ śrotṛṇām,
analyzed: yat idam anantaram sāmarthyam samupavarṇitam ā asmāt sāmarthyāt arthasya sādhya dharmi parigraha lakṣaṇasya bhavati pratītiḥ paṭu dhiyām śrotṛṇām
kintu aśabdakam artham svayam anusaratām pratipatti gauravam syāt

original: tadupacāramātrāt svayamaśabdakārthābhyūharahitād dharmidharma ityane [na pa]kṣadharma iti “samānanirddeśāt [pratipattigauravaṃ ca] parihṛtaṃ  #
analyzed: tad upacāra mātrāt svayam aśabdaka artha abhyūha rahitāt dharmi dharmaḥ iti ane na pakṣa dharmaḥ iti samāna nirddeśāt pratipatti gauravam ca parihṛtam
bhavati
pratipatti gauravam ca iti

original: ca'śabdenaitadāha- ye paropadeśamākāṅkṣanti tairayamartho lakṣaṇa[vaca]nād boddhavya iti /
analyzed: caśabdena etat āha ye para upadeśam ākāṅkṣanti taiḥ ayam arthaḥ lakṣaṇa vacanāt boddhavyaḥ iti
yathālakṣaṇam pratīteḥ apakṣa dharmaḥ na hetuḥ iti kutas
iyam āśaṅkā
tatas teṣām lakṣaṇa anusāriṇām niyama āśaṅkā parihāra artham ca upacāra karaṇam iti
iha vyavaccheda phala tvāt śabda prayogasya avaśyam eva avadhārayitavyam

original: ṣaṣṭhīsamāsācca pakṣadharma ityatra nānyaḥ samāsaḥ sambhavati /
analyzed: ṣaṣṭhī samāsāt ca pakṣa dharmaḥ iti atra na anyaḥ samāsaḥ sambhavati

original: tathā ca pakṣasyaiva dharma [i]tyevamavadhāraṇāt tadaṃśavyāptirvirudhyata iti viruddhalakṣaṇatāmudbhāvayannāha “pakṣasya dharmatve tvaṃ(taṃ)
analyzed: tathā ca pakṣasya eva dharmaḥ iti evam avadhāraṇāt tad aṃśa vyāptiḥ virudhyate iti viruddha lakṣaṇa tām udbhāvayan āha pakṣasya dharma tve tu aṃtam

original: pakṣaṃ viśeṣaṇamanyato vyavacchedakamapekṣata” iti “tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya” dharmasya “anyatra” pakṣīkṛtādanyasmin sapakṣe “ananuvṛttiḥ” /
analyzed: pakṣam viśeṣaṇam anyatas vyavacchedakam apekṣate iti tad viśeṣaṇa apekṣasya dharmasya anyatra pakṣīkṛtāt anyasmin sapakṣe ananuvṛttiḥ

original: tathā hi- yaḥ pakṣeṇa viśeṣyate sa pakṣasyaiva bhavati nānya[sya] /
analyzed: tathā hi yaḥ pakṣeṇa viśeṣyate sa pakṣasya eva bhavati na anyasya

original: yathā- yo devadattasya putraḥ sa tasyaiva putro na yajñadattasyāpi /
analyzed: yathā yaḥ devadattasya putraḥ sa tasya eva putraḥ na yajñadattasya api
tatas nyatra ananuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇa tā sādhāraṇa tā na syāt
sādhāraṇa tāyāḥ tvayāḥ ca

original: tato yadi pakṣadharmo na ta[daṃśe]na vyāptiḥ,
analyzed: tatas yadi pakṣa dharmaḥ na tad aṃśena vyāptiḥ

original: atha tadaṃśavyāptirna pakṣadharma iti vyāhataṃ lakṣaṇamiti /
analyzed: atha tad aṃśa vyāptiḥ na pakṣa dharmaḥ iti vyāhatam lakṣaṇam iti

original: nanu ca tadaṃśavyāptirnāma sādhyadharmasya vyāpakasya tatra hetau sati tadādhāradharmiṇi bhāva, eva,
analyzed: nanu ca tad aṃśa vyāptiḥ nāma sādhya dharmasya vyāpakasya tatra hetau sati tad ādhāra dharmiṇi bhāvaḥ eva

original: vyāpyasya vā hetostatraiva vyāpake sādhyadharme satyeva bhāva iti svasādhyāvinābhāvalakṣaṇā vakṣyate /
analyzed: vyāpyasya vā hetoḥ tatra eva vyāpake sādhya dharme sati eva bhāvaḥ iti sva sādhya avinābhāva lakṣaṇā vakṣyate
na ca anayā avaśyam pakṣīkṛtāt anyatra vṛttiḥ ākṣipyate
yatas lakṣaṇa vyāghātaḥ āśaṅkyeta

original: tathā hi- tatraiva pakṣīkṛte satyeva sādhyadharme heturvartamānastadaṃśavyāptiṃ pratipadyata eva /
analyzed: tathā hi tatra eva pakṣīkṛte sati eva sādhya dharme hetuḥ vartamānaḥ tad aṃśa vyāptim pratipadyate eva

original: yaiva cāsya sādhyadharmiṇi svasādhyāvinābhāvitā saiva gamakatve nibandhanaṃ nānyadharmiṇi /
analyzed: yā eva ca asya sādhya dharmiṇi sva sādhya avinābhāvi tā sā eva gamaka tve nibandhanam na anya dharmiṇi
sa ca sva sādhya avinābhāvaḥ pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa nibandhanaḥ

original: na sapakṣe kvacid bahulaṃ vā sahabhāvamātradarśananibandhanaḥ /
analyzed: na sapakṣe kvacid bahulam vā sahabhāva mātra darśana nibandhanaḥ

original: na hi lohalekhyaṃ vajram pārthivatvāt kāṣṭhādivat iti tadanyatra pārthivatvasya lohalekhyatāvinābhāvo 'pi tathābhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: na hi loha lekhyam vajram pārthiva tvāt kāṣṭha ādi vat iti tad anyatra pārthiva tvasya tathābhāvaḥ bhavati

original: yadi ca pakṣīkṛtādanyatraiva vyāptirādarśayitavyeti niyamastadā satvaṃ(ttvaṃ)
analyzed: yadi ca pakṣīkṛtāt anyatra eva vyāptiḥ ādarśayitavyā iti niyamaḥ tadā
katham kṣaṇika tām bhāveṣu pratipādayet
yaḥ hi sakala padārtha vyāpinīm ākṣanīm kṣa
ṇīka tām icchati tam prati kasyacid sapakṣasya eva abhāvāt

original: yadapi kaiścit jvālādeḥ kṣaṇikatvamabhyupagamyate tadapi na pratyakṣataḥ,
analyzed: yat api kaiścid jvālā ādeḥ kṣaṇika tvam abhyupagamyate tat api na pratyakṣataḥ
kṣaṇa vivekasya ati sūkṣma tayā an upalakṣaṇāt

original: anyatraiva ca vyāptirādarśanīyā na sādhyadharmiṇyapīti ko 'yaṃ nyāyaḥ? /
analyzed: anyatra eva ca vyāptiḥ ādarśanīyā na sādhya dharmiṇī api iti kaḥ yam nyāyaḥ

original: evaṃ hi kālpanikatvaṃ hetulakṣaṇasya pratipannaṃ syāt,
analyzed: evam hi kālpanika tvam hetu lakṣaṇasya pratipannam syāt
na vastu bala pravṛtta tvam
tasmāt sva sādhya pratibandhāt hetuḥ tena vyāptaḥ sidhyati

original: sa ca viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā sādhyadharmiṇyapi sidhyatīti na kiñcidanyatrānuvṛttyapekṣayā /
analyzed: sa ca viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā sādhya dharmiṇī api sidhyati iti na kiñcid anyatra anuvṛtti apekṣayā

original: (Hbṭ 16) ata evānyatroktam- “yat kvacid dṛṣṭaṃ tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tadvidaḥ tasya tad gamakaṃ tatreti vastugatiḥ” iti /
analyzed: atas eva anyatra uktam yat kvacid dṛṣṭam tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tad vidaḥ tasya tat gamakam tatra iti vastu gatiḥ iti

original: yadapi “anumeye 'tha tattalye sadbhāvaḥ-” ityādi lakṣaṇaṃ tatrāpi sādhyadharmavāneva sapakṣa ucyate /
analyzed: yat api anumeye sadbhāvaḥ ityādi lakṣaṇam tatra api sādhya dharmavān eva sapakṣaḥ ucyate
tatas sati eva sādhya dharme vā asti iti evaṃparam etat

original: tataśca taddharmaṇaḥ sādhyadharmiṇo 'pi vāstavaṃ sapakṣatvaṃ na vyāvartate /
analyzed: tatas ca tad dharmaṇaḥ sādhya dharmiṇaḥ vāstavam sapakṣa tvam na vyāvartate
sādhya tvena iṣṭatayā icchā vyavasthita lakṣaṇena pakṣa tvena tasya nirākartum aśakya tvāt

original: tasmāt tadaṃśavyāptivacanena svasādhyāvinābhāvitvasya pratibandhanibandhanasyānyathā tadayogādabhidhānānnāvaśya manyatra vṛttirākṣipteti,
analyzed: tasmāt tad aṃśa vyāpti vacanena sva sādhya avinābhāvi tvasya pratibandha nibandhanasya anyathā tad ayogāt abhidhānāt na avaśyam manyatra vṛttiḥ ākṣiptā iti
katham idam āśaṅkitam
satyam na eva idam āśaṅkanīyam

original: yadi sarvasya hetoḥ pakṣīkṛte eva dharmiṇi svasādhyapratibandhaḥ pramāṇato niścetuṃ śakyeta /
analyzed: yadi sarvasya hetoḥ pakṣīkṛte eva dharmiṇi sva sādhya pratibandhaḥ pramāṇataḥ niścetum śakyeta

original: yathā sattvalakṣaṇasya svabhāvahetoḥ kṣaṇikatāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ tādātmyaṃ viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā /
analyzed: yathā sattva lakṣaṇasya svabhāva hetoḥ kṣaṇikatāyām sādhyāyām tādātmyam viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā
kārya hetoḥ tu pakṣīkṛta dharmiṇā

original: kasyacit svabhāvahetoḥ] pratyakṣānupalambhasādhanaḥ pratibandhaḥ kathaṃ parokṣe sādhyadharme gṛhyeta? /
analyzed: kasyacid svabhāva hetoḥ pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ pratibandhaḥ katham parokṣe sādhya dharme gṛhyeta

original: tasmāt tasyānyatraiva [prasiddhiriti tadviśeṣaṇāpekṣasya tatra apekṣaṇāt anya]trānanuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇatā sambhavamātreṇāśaṅkitā /
analyzed: tasmāt tasya anyatra eva prasiddhiḥ iti tad viśeṣaṇa apekṣasya tatra apekṣaṇāt anyatra ananuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇa tā sambhava mātreṇa āśaṅkitā
tadā hi anyatra āvartamānaḥ sādhya viparīta vyatireka tad ubhaya bahirbhāva ayogāt
tad dharmiṇaḥ sādhya vṛtti vyavacchedābhyām sarva saṃgrahāt tatra saṃśaya hetuḥ bhavati
syāt matam kvacid āśraye sattāyāḥ prāk pravṛtta pūrva gṛhīta vismṛta pratibandha sādhaka pramāṇa smṛtaye nyatra vṛttiḥ apekṣaṇīyā
etat pariharati
naḥ ityādi
na anyatra an anubhavattiḥ
kutas sambandhaḥ viśeṣaṇāt pakṣasya
na hi anya yoga vyavacchedena eva viśeṣaṇam bhavati
kintu ayoga vyavacchedena api

original: yatra dharmiṇi dha]rmasya sadbhāvaḥ saṃdihyate tatrāyogavyavacchedasya nyāyaprāptatvāt /
analyzed: yatra dharmiṇi dharmasya sadbhāvaḥ saṃdihyate tatra ayoga vyavacchedasya nyāya prāpta tvāt

original: atra ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ[“yathā caitro dharnurdhara iti” /
analyzed: atra ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā caitraḥ dharnuḥ dharaḥ iti

original: caitre hi dhanurdhara]tvaṃ saṃdihyate kimasti nāsti iti /
analyzed: caitre hi dhanurdhara tvam saṃdihyate kim asti na asti iti

original: tataścaitro dhanurddhara iti tatsadbhāvapratipādikā śrutīḥ [pakṣāntaramadhanurdharatvaṃ śroturāśaṅkopasthāpitaṃ] nirākarotītyayogavyavacchedo  #
analyzed: tatas caitraḥ dhanurddharaḥ iti tad sadbhāva pratipādikā śrutīḥ pakṣa antaram adhanurdhara tvam śrotuḥ āśaṅkā upasthāpitam nirākaroti iti ayoga vyavacchedaḥ
tra nyāya prāptaḥ
para abhimata vyavaccheda nirācikīrṣayā āha na
anya yoga vyavacchedena viśeṣaṇāt anyatra ananuvṛtteḥ asādhāraṇa tā iti sambandhaḥ
atra api dṛṣṭāntaḥ yathā pārthaḥ dhanurddharaḥ iti
sāmānya śabdaḥ u pi ayam dhanurdhara śabdaḥ prakaraṇa sāmarthya ādinā prakṛṣṭa guṇa vṛttiḥ

original: iha pārthe] hi dhanurddharatvaṃ siddhameveti nāyogāśaṅkā /
analyzed: iha pārthe hi dhanurddhara tvam siddham evā iti na ayoga āśaṅkā

original: [tādṛ]śaṃ tu sātiśayaṃ kimanyatrāsti nāstītyanyayoga [śaṅkāyāṃ śrotuḥ yadā pārtho dhanurdhara iti ucya]te tadānyayogavyavacchedo nyāyaprāptaḥ,
analyzed: tādṛśam tu sa atiśayam kim anyatra asti na asti iti anya yoga śaṅkāyām śrotuḥ yadā pārthaḥ dhanurdharaḥ iti ucyate tadā anya yoga vyavacchedaḥ nyāya prāptaḥ

original: pratipādyāśaṅkopasthāpitayoreva pakṣayoḥ para[sparaṃ virodhāt ekanirdeśena anyayogavyavacchedasya] nyāyabalāyātatvāt /
analyzed: pratipādya āśaṅkā upasthāpitayoḥ eva pakṣayoḥ parasparam virodhāt eka nirdeśena anya yoga vyavacchedasya nyāya bala āyāta tvāt

original: tadiha pakṣe 'styayaṃ dharmo na veti saṃśītau [pakṣadharma ityukte pakṣasya dharma eva nādharmaḥ /
analyzed: tat iha pakṣe sti ayam dharmaḥ na vā iti saṃśītau pakṣa dharmaḥ iti ukte pakṣasya dharmaḥ eva na adharmaḥ

original: dharmaśca āśritatvādviśeṣaṇaṃ tenāyogo vya]vacchidyate nānyayogastadaṃśavyāptyā tasya pratipādita[tvena dṛṣṭānte saṃdehābhāvāt /
analyzed: dharmaḥ ca āśrita tvāt viśeṣaṇam tena ayogaḥ vyavacchidyate na anya yogaḥ tad aṃśa vyāptyā tasya pratipādita tvena dṛṣṭānte saṃdeha abhāvāt
tad aṃśaḥ tad dharmaḥ iti
tad śabdena pakṣaḥ parāmṛśyate na dharmaḥ
dharmasya dharma asambhavāt
aṃśaḥ ca dharmaḥ na eka deśaḥ
pakṣa śabdena dharmi mātra vacanāt
na tad aṃśaḥ tasya eka deśa abhāvāt iti
vyāpteḥ vyāpya vyāpaka ubhaya dharma tvam

original: tasya pakṣadharmasya sato vyāptiḥ- yo vyāpnoti yaśca vyāpyate [tadubhayadharmatayā pratīteḥ /
analyzed: tasya pakṣa dharmasya sataḥ vyāptiḥ yaḥ vyāpnoti yaḥ ca vyāpyate tad ubhaya dharma tayā pratīteḥ

original: yadā vyāpakadharmatayā vivakṣyate ta]dā vyāpakasya gamyasya /
analyzed: yadā vyāpaka dharma tayā vivakṣyate tadā vyāpakasya gamyasya
tatra atas sat saptabhi artha pradhānam etat na ādhāra pradhānam
dharmāṇām dharma āntara tva abhāvāt
tena ayam arthaḥ hbṭ

original: yatra dharmiṇi vyāpyamasti tatra sarvatra bhāva eva vyāpakasya svagato dharmo vyāptiḥ /
analyzed: yatra dharmiṇi vyāpyam asti tatra sarvatra bhāvaḥ eva vyāpakasya svagataḥ dharmaḥ vyāptiḥ
tatas ca vyāpya bhāva apekṣayā vyāpyasya eva vyāpta tā pratītiḥ
na tu evam avadhāryate
vyāpakasya eva tatra bhāvaḥ iti

yat tu uktam sāmānya lakṣaṇa viṣam anumānam

original: pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasyāpi tadviṣayatvāt tadanyasya ca vikalpasya /
analyzed: pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ vikalpasya api tad viṣaya tvāt tad anyasya ca vikalpasya
kintu sāmānya lakṣaṇa viṣayam eva anumānam iti avadhāryate sva lakṣaṇa viṣaya tva niṣedha artham iti
tatra saha dhūmena vartate iti sa dhūmaḥ
pakṣa dharmatā pratipadana artham evam uktam
vidhi vikalpasya ca etat eva bījam
tam sa dhūmam pradeśam dṛṣṭavataḥ pratyakṣeṇa iti sambandhaḥ
kīdṛśam artha antara vivikta rūpam artha antaraiḥ sajātīya vijātīyaiḥ viviktam asaṅkīrṇam rūpam asya iti vigrahaḥ
sarva bhāvānām sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ svabhāva sāṅkarya abhāvāt
anyathā sarvasya sarvatra upayogāt atiprasaṅgaḥ
anena pratiṣedha vikalpasya nimittam ākhyātam
sāmānya utprekṣāyāḥ ca bījam tat uktam
itaretara bhedaḥ ntyasya
bījam saṃjñā yad arthikāḥ iti

original: tathā hi- arthāntaravyāvṛttiṃ parasparavyāvṛttānāmapi samānāmutpaśyato bhinnameṣāṃ rūpaṃ tirodhāyābhinnaṃ svabhāvamāropayantī kalpanotpadyate
analyzed: tathā hi artha antara vyāvṛttim paraspara vyāvṛttānām api samānām utpaśyataḥ bhinnam eṣām rūpam tirodhāya abhinnam svabhāvam āropayantī kalpanā utpadyate
asādhāraṇa ātmanā iti artha antara vyāvṛttena svabhāvena
na tu yathā kumārilaḥ manyate
artha antara vivekaḥ bhāva pramāṇa grāhyaḥ na pratyakṣa avaseyaḥ iti
nahi vastu bala bhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa anyathā darśana sambhavaḥ bhrānta tā prasaṅgāt
tena ātmanā hbṛ

original: dṛṣṭavataḥ sataḥ puṃso 'nantaraṃ “smārtaṃ liṅgajñānamutpadyate” iti sambandhaḥ /

asti hi ālocanā jñānam prathamam iti

original: ādau vikalpapravṛtterbhavamiti “ādyam” ākhyātam “asādhāraṇaviṣayam” svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ darśanaṃ tad “eva” pramāṇaṃ na vidhipratiṣedhavikalpāvapi
analyzed: ādau vikalpa pravṛtteḥ bhavam iti ādyam ākhyātam asādhāraṇa viṣayam sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam darśanam tat eva pramāṇam na vidhi pratiṣedha vikalpau api
tasya eva pramāṇa lakṣaṇa yogāt itarayoḥ ca tad asambhavāt

original: yadi nīlasvalakṣaṇameva sāmānyasādhyārthakriyākāri tadeva tarhyadhigacchan vikalpaḥ pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatītyāha- “tacca” nīlakhalakṣaṇam /

original: tato niṣpāditakriye karmaṇyaviṣeṣādhāyi vikalpajñānaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt? /
analyzed: tatas niṣpādita kriye karmaṇi a viṣeṣa ādhāyi vikalpa jñānam katham pramāṇam syāt

original: atha matam- sāmānyameva tarhyadhigacchan nīlavikalpaḥ pramāṇamastu /

tat ca sāmānyam arthakriyā kāri

original: yato nīlasādhyāmevārthakriyāṃ nīlena saha sambhūya kariṣyati /

original: vyaktisvabhāvānyeva hi sāmānyānītyāha- “na ca” naiva “tat svalakṣaṇagrahaṇottarakālabhāvino” nīlavyaktidarśanottarakālaṃ bhavanaśīlasya /
analyzed: vyakti svabhāvāni eva hi sāmānyāni iti āha na ca nā eva tat sva lakṣaṇa grahaṇa uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ nīla vyakti darśana uttara kālam bhavana śīlasya

original: liṅgagrahaṇottarakālabhāvinastu pūrvoktena prakāreṇa vyaktisādhyārthakriyā sāmānyasya kalpitasya (Hbṭ 33)
analyzed: liṅga grahaṇa uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ tu pūrva uktena prakāreṇa vyakti sādhya artha kriyā sāmānyasya kalpitasya
vyavasthāpayitum śakyate iti bhāvaḥ
nīla vikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīla sāmānyena nīla sādhya artha kriyā rañjana ādikā kriyate
tasya vyakti svābhāvya ayoge sati kalpita rūpasya tad asambhavāt

original: na ca nityasvabhāvatāmābibhrāṇena nīlavikalpasya viṣayeṇa nīlasādhyānyā vārthakriyā kriyate /

krama yaugapadya virodhāt iti manyate
mīmāṃsaka saṃmata pramāṇa lakṣaṇe doṣa darśanam
tat evam nīlam dṛṣṭvā nīlam

original: iti jñāne pratibhasamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ na kāñcidarthakriyāmupakalpayatīti prasādhya anarthakriyākāriviṣayasyāpi
analyzed: iti jñāne pratibhasamānam sāmānyam na kāñcid arthakriyām upakalpayati iti prasādhya anartha kriyā kāri viṣayasya api
vikalpasya pratyakṣa pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ prāmāṇya prasaṅgāt ativyāptiḥ iti tatra apūrva artha vijñānam

original: iti pramāṇalakṣaṇe mīmāṃsakairviśeṣaṇamupādeyamiti darśayannāha- “tasmād” yata evamanarthakriyāsādhanaviṣayatayā
analyzed: iti pramāṇa lakṣaṇe mīmāṃsakaiḥ viśeṣaṇam upādeyam iti darśayan āha tasmāt yatas evam anartha kriyā sādhana viṣaya tayā
darśana pṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ vikalpasya prāmāṇyam ayuktam tasmāt asmad abhimatam pramāṇam avisaṃvādi
jñānam iti pramāṇa lakṣaṇam vyudasya anadhigata artha viṣayam pramāṇam
tatra apūrva artha vijñānam pramāṇam iti api etasmin api āhopuruṣikayā anyasmin smin
pramāṇa lakṣaṇe kriyamāṇe ativyāpti parihārāya viśeṣaṇīyam viśeṣaṇam upādeyam
katham viśeṣaṇīyam anadhigate sva lakṣaṇe iti

original: anena hi viśeṣaṇenānumānavikalpasya ca prāmāṇyaṃ sidhyati,
analyzed: anena hi viśeṣaṇena anumāna vikalpasya ca prāmāṇyam sidhyati

original: ālocanājñānapṛṣṭhabhāvinaśca vikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ vyudasyata iti sarvaṃ sustham /
analyzed: ālocanā ajñāna pṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ ca vikalpasya prāmāṇyam vyudasyate iti sarvam sustham
tat evam vidhi vikalpasya anartha kriyā sādhana viṣaya tayā anadhigata sāmāni adhigame pi prāmāṇyam
nirākṛtya caśabda samuccitam smṛti tvam pratiṣedha vikalpena sādhāraṇam aprāmāṇya kāraṇam
darśayan āha adhigate tu sva lakṣaṇe ālocanā jñānena tad sāmarthya janmā sva lakṣaṇa adhigama bala bhāvī
vikalpaḥ tad anukārī sākṣāt anutpatteḥ ddarśana saṃskāra ādheya vaśat ca aspat ca spa
ṣṭa nīla sva lakṣaṇa ākāra anukārī dṛśya vikalpyayoḥ ca ekīkaraṇāt evam ucyate
vastutas tu hbṭ
na kiñcid asau anukaroti
sa smṛtiḥ eva
kutas kāryataḥ tad viṣaya tvāt na paramārthataḥ
kāryam atra sva lakṣaṇe puruṣasya pravartanam
tad adhyavasāyaḥ ca

original: yataśca kāryataḥ tadviṣayatvāt smṛtirevāto “na pramāṇam” darśanabalotpanno vikalpaḥ /
analyzed: yatas ca kāryataḥ tad viṣaya tvāt smṛtiḥ eva atas na pramāṇam darśana bala utpannaḥ vikalpaḥ
tathā hi smṛteḥ api anubhūta sva lakṣaṇa aṃśa viṣayāyāḥ na paramārthataḥ tad viṣaya tvam
sva lakṣaṇasya indriya buddhau iva sphuṭa rūpa tayā smṛtau apratibhāsanāt
kintu yathā uktāt kāryataḥ eva

original: tacca vidhivikalpe 'pi samānamiti kathamasau smṛtirna syāditi /
analyzed: tat ca vidhi vikalpe samānam iti katham asau smṛtiḥ na syāt iti
tatra etat syāt nanu anumāna vikalpaḥ pramāṇam iṣyate

original: tathā hi- yadevānagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ mahānasādāvanubhūtamāsīt tadeva pradeśaviśeṣe dhūmadarśanāt smaryate /
analyzed: tathā hi yat eva anagni vyāvṛttam vastu mātram mahānasa ādau anubhūtam āsīt tat eva pradeśa viśeṣe dhūma darśanāt smaryate
tadvat pramāṇam bhaviṣyati iti atas āha anadhigatasya vastunaḥ rūpasya anadhigateḥ iti

original: evammanyate- yat mahānasādāvanagnivyāvṛttaṃ vastumātraṃ prāganubhūtaṃ na tat taddeśādisambandhitayaivānumānavikalpena
analyzed: evam manyate yat mahānasa ādau anagni vyāvṛttam vastu mātram prāk anubhūtam na tat tad deśa ādi sambandhi tayā eva anumāna vikalpena

original: smaryate kintu yatra pradeśe prāgananubhūtaṃ tatsambandhitayā /
analyzed: smaryate kintu yatra pradeśe prāk ananubhūtam tad sambandhi tayā
tatas sādhya dharmi dṛṣṭānta dharmi grāhi darśana dvaya anadhigatasya anagni vyāvṛttasya vastu rūpasya ayoga vyavacchedena adhigamāt yuktam asya prāmāṇyam
na tu darśana pṛṣṭhabhāvinaḥ vikalpasya
tad viparīta tvāt iti
sva lakṣaṇasya eva ca vastu tvam
yadi nāma anadhigatam vastu rūpam na adhigacchati

original: pramāṇaṃ tu kasmānna bhavatīti ced āha- “vastvadhiṣṭhānatvāt” ityādi /
analyzed: pramāṇam tu kasmāt na bhavati iti ced āha vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvāt ityādi
vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvam ca pramāṇa vyavasthāyāḥ pramāṇa vyāpāra viṣayam abhipretya ucyate na ālambana lakṣaṇam
anyathā anumānasya parikalpita sāmānya ālambana tayā vastu adhiṣṭhāna tva abhāvāt avyāpinī pramāṇa vyavasthā syāt
yadi vastu adhiṣṭhānā pramāṇa vyavasthā katham viprakṛṣṭa viṣayāyāḥ
anupalabdheḥ prāmāṇyam iti ced

original: tatrāpi pradhānādivikalpasyaiva bhāvānupādānatayā sādhyatvāt tasyā api vastvadhiṣṭhānatāstyevetyadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: tatra api pradhāna ādi vikalpasya eva bhāva anupādānatayā sādhya tvāt tasyāḥ api vastu adhiṣṭhāna tā asti eva iti adoṣaḥ
atha vastu adhiṣṭhānā eva pramāṇa vyavasthā iti kutas etat

original: ityāha- “arthakriyāyāṃ” sukhaduḥkhalakṣaṇāyāṃ yad “yogyaṃ” śaktaṃ “tadviṣayatvāt tadarthinām” arthakriyārthināṃ “pravṛtteḥ” prāptityāgalakṣaṇāyāḥ
analyzed: iti āha arthakriyāyām sukha duḥkha lakṣaṇāyām yat yogyam śaktam tad viṣaya tvāt tad arthinām arthakriyā arthinām pravṛtteḥ prāpti tyāga lakṣaṇāyāḥ

original: yadi nāmarthakriyāyogye tadarthināṃ pravṛttistathāpi kathaṃ vastvadhiṣṭhānā pramāṇavyavasthā?
analyzed: yadi nāma artha kriyā yogye tad arthinām pravṛttiḥ tathā api katham vastu adhiṣṭhānā pramāṇa vyavasthā

original: , arthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānā hi tathā sati syāt iti cet;
analyzed: arthakriyā yogya adhiṣṭhānā hi tathā sati syāt iti ced
āha arthakriyāyām yat yogyam tad lakṣaṇam eva hi vastu

original: tato 'rthakriyāyogyādhiṣṭhānatvena vastvadhiṣṭhānatvaṃ kathaṃ na syāt iti bhāvaḥ /
analyzed: tatas rthakriyā yogya adhiṣṭhāna tvena vastu adhiṣṭhāna tvam katham na syāt iti bhāvaḥ

original: idaṃ ca vastvāśrayeṇa pramāṇavyavasthāpratipādanamanadhigate svalakṣaṇa ityukte kadācit paro brūyāt- vastumātranibandhanā hi pramāṇavyavasthā  #
analyzed: idam ca vastu āśrayeṇa pramāṇa vyavasthā pratipādanam anadhigate sva lakṣaṇe iti ukte kadācid paraḥ brūyāt vastu mātra nibandhanā hi pramāṇa vyavasthā
na sva lakṣaṇa āśrayā eva
tatas yadi api anadhigatam sva lakṣaṇam na adhigacchati tathā api anadhigata vastu rūpam adhigacchataḥ
vikalpasya prāmāṇyam bhaviṣyati iti tad asiddha tā udbhāvana artham uktam anadhigata vastu rūpa ityādi
tad asiddha tā udbhāvane ca anadhigata vastu rūpa adhigantuḥ eva prāmānyam na itarasya iti kutas
iti paryanuyoge artha kriyā yogya ityādi uktam

original: tathā ca vastuviṣayamapi prāmāṇyaṃ bruvatā svalakṣaṇaviṣayamevoktaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: tathā ca vastu viṣayam api prāmāṇyam bruvatā sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam evā uktam bhavati
tasya eva artha kriyā sāmarthya lakṣaṇa tvāt
sāmānyasya ca tad viparīta tvāt iti manyate
punar api anubhava uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ nīla vikalpasya prāmāṇyam apanetum upacaya hetum āha

original: “tato 'pi” yathoktād vikalpād na kevalaṃ nīlasvalakṣaṇānubhavād “vastunyeva” svalakṣaṇa
analyzed: yathā uktāt vikalpāt na kevalam nīla sva lakṣaṇa anubhavāt vastuni eva sva lakṣaṇa
eva tad adhyavasāyena sva lakṣaṇa adhyavasāyena anyathā tatra pravṛtti ayogāt puruṣasya

original: pravṛtte” adhigate svalakṣaṇe tatsāmarthyajanmā vikalpo na pramāṇamiti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: pravṛtte adhigate sva lakṣaṇe tad sāmarthya janmā vikalpaḥ na pramāṇam iti sambandhaḥ
pūrvam anadhigata vastu rūpa anadhigateḥ aprāmāṇyam uktam
adhunā tu adhigatasya eva adhigamāt iti vidhi pratiṣedha rūpa tayā upapattyoḥ bhedaḥ
yat vā kāryataḥ tad viṣaya tvāt iti yat uktam tat eva upacaya hetu vyājena

original: yadi nāma tadadhyavasāyena vastunyeva puruṣasya pravṛttistathāpyanadhigatasāmānyagrāhiṇo 'sya darśanāt pṛthak prāmāṇyaṃ kimiti neṣyate?
analyzed: yadi nāma tad adhyavasāyena vastuni eva puruṣasya pravṛttiḥ tathā api anadhigata sāmānya grāhiṇaḥ darśanāt pṛthak prāmāṇyam kim iti nā iṣyate

original: iti cet; āha- “pravṛttau” svalakṣaṇa eva satyāṃ “pratyakṣeṇa” ālocanājñānākhyena “abhinnayogakṣematvāt” /
analyzed: iti ced āha pravṛttau sva lakṣaṇe eva satyām pratyakṣeṇa ālocanā jñāna ākhyena abhinna yogakṣema tvāt
yogaḥ aprāptasya viṣayasya pariccheda lakṣaṇā prāptiḥ
abhinnau yogakṣemau asya iti sa tathā uktaḥ
tatra vikalpasya nirvikalpa pratyakṣeṇa abhinnaḥ yogaḥ sva lakṣaṇa adhyavasāyataḥ

original: abhinnaḥ kṣema ālocanāvijñānādiva vikalpādapi svalakṣaṇa eva pravṛtteḥ /
analyzed: abhinnaḥ kṣemaḥ ālocanā vijñānāt iva vikalpāt api sva lakṣaṇe eva pravṛtteḥ

original: ayamasyābhiprāyaḥ- yadi vikalpo nirvikalpacetasaḥ prameyāntaraviṣayastadā tatraiva puruṣaṃ pravartayatu tatsādhyāmarthakriyāmadhigantum /

original: tadviṣayatvābhimatasya sāmānyasyābhinnajñānalakṣaṇāyā evārthakriyāyā upagamād vikalpodayādeva ca tatsiddheḥ /

original: nahi nīlānubhavāt prameyāntaraviṣayāḥ pītādipratyayāḥ puruṣaṃ nīlavastuni pravartayanti,

original: sarvabhāvān pratikṣaṇaṃ vīkṣamāṇānāmadhyakṣacetasāṃ tadviṣayakṣaṇānāṃ bhinnārthakriyāsūpayogato nānāyogakṣematvāt /

original: atha sarvapadārtheṣvekatvādhyavasāyinaḥ sāṃvyavahārikān puruṣānabhipretyocyate tadā sakalameva (Hbṭ 38)

original: nīlasantānamekamarthaṃ sthirarūpaṃ tatsādhyāṃ cārthakriyāmekātmikāmadhyavasyantīti prāmāṇyamapyuttareṣāmaniṣṭameveti kuto 'nekāntaḥ?
analyzed: nīla santānam ekam artham sthira rūpam tad sādhyām ca arthakriyām eka ātmikām adhyavasyanti iti prāmāṇyam api uttareṣām aniṣṭam eva iti kutas nekāntaḥ
iti darśayan āha sādhāraṇe hi iti
tad santāna vartinām sarva kṣaṇānām eka tvena adhyavasitānām vyavahartṛbhiḥ yat sādhāraṇam
pratikṣaṇam anya anya kāraṇatayā vibhinnam api paramārthataḥ viparyāsāt ekatāya abhiniviṣṭam

original: rañjanādikaṃ nīlādikakārtyaṃ tatra “na teṣām” uktareṣāṃ jñānakṣaṇānāṃ “sāmarthya”
analyzed: rañjana ādikam nīla ādika kārtyam tatra na teṣām uktareṣām jñāna kṣaṇānām sāmarthya

original: pūrvapratyakṣakṣaṇaviṣaya eva tebhyo 'pi pravṛtterādyasyaiva tatra prāmāṇyam /

original: tathā hi- arthakriyārthināṃ tatsādhanaprāpaṇasamarthe jñāne pramāṇavyavahāraṃ kurvatāmaviklavadhiyāmarthakriyāsādhanabhedādeva
analyzed: tathā hi arthakriyā arthinām tad sādhana prāpaṇa samarthe jñāne pramāṇa vyavahāram kurvatām aviklava dhiyām arthakriyā sādhana bhedāt eva

original: prāmāṇyabhedavyavahāro jñāneṣu yuktaḥ anyathā smṛtyāderapi prāmāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ kathamapākriyeta?

original: , ādriyeta vā niṣphalā pramāṇavyavasthā prekṣāvatā iti? /
analyzed: ādriyeta vā niṣphalā pramāṇa vyavasthā prekṣāvatā iti
keṣām iva sādhāraṇe kārye na sāmarthya bhedaḥ

original: ityāha- “aparāpare” ca te “dhūmā“śca taiḥ “pramitā“śca te “sannikṛṣṭāgraya“śca teṣviva
analyzed: iti āha apara apare ca te dhūmāḥ ca taiḥ pramitāḥ ca te sannikṛṣṭa agrayaḥ ca teṣu iva
tad viṣayāṇam iva anumāna jñānām agni mātra sādhye rthe sandhukṣaṇa ādike vāñchite tad artha kriyā sādhana prāpaṇa vyakti bheda abhāvāt

original: yathā prāmāṇyabhedo na yukto viduṣāṃ tathātrāpi /

original: yadā tu pañcatapastaptukāmo bhavati tadāparāparadhūmapramitasannikṛṣṭāgniviṣayāṇāmapyanumānānāṃ sāmarthyabhedāt prāmāṇyamanivāritameva /

original: '; ityudāharaṇe nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyaṃ nirākṛtya prakṛte yojayannāha- “etena” nīlasvalakṣaṇadarśanottarakālabhāvino nīlavikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇena
analyzed: iti udāharaṇe nīla vikalpasya prāmāṇyam nirākṛtya prakṛte yojayan āha etena nīla sva lakṣaṇa darśana uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ nīla vikalpasya prāmāṇya nirākaraṇena
tat na iṣṭa tvāt vikalpasya artha rūpa upakāriṇaḥ
iti brūvatā kumārilena pradeśa ādi darśana uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ
dharmi vikalpasya
tatā sambandha pratipatti kāle gni sva lakṣaṇa darśana sāmarthya bhāvinaḥ gni sāmānya viṣayasya sādhya dharma vikalpasya
dhūma ālocanā ajñāna pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ dhūma sāmānya avabhāsinaḥ liṅga vikalpasya
ādi grahaṇāt
dharma dharmi sambandha vikalpasya ca pramāṇa pṛṣṭha bhāvinaḥ dharmi ādi svarūpa mātra viṣaya ālocanā ākhya pratyakṣa pūrvakasya
na ca avikalpya liṅgasya dharmi sambandhayoḥ tathā
gṛhītiḥ

analyzed: pūrvakam eva sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam darśanam yat pareṇa ālocanā jñānam iti tat pramāṇam

analyzed: na tu tad vala bhāvī vikalpaḥ yathā uktena nyāyena iti sthitam etat pakṣa dharmasya sādhya dharmiṇi

original: tadevaṃ pratyakṣataḥ pakṣadharmaniścayaṃ bruvatā prasaṅgena darśanapṛṣṭhabhāvino vikalpasya prāmāṇyanirākaraṇāt

original: nānya ityabhidhānāt parokṣārthaviṣayaṃ sarvaṃ pramāṇamanumāne 'ntarbhāvitamiti saṅkṣepataḥ saṅkhayāvipratipattiḥ samyagjñānaviṣayā nirastā

original: tathā, vyāpakāṃśasya gamyatvapratīteḥ tadaṃśavyāptivacanena sāmānyaviṣayamanumānaṃ na svalakṣaṇaviṣayamityākhyātam tasyāsādhāraṇatvāt,

asādhāraṇasya ca vyāpaka tva ayogāt
vikalpa aviṣaya tvāt ca
tatra tad ādyam asādhāraṇa viṣayam iti ācakṣāṇena sva lakṣaṇa viṣayam eva pratyakṣam uktam
darśanam eva pramāṇam iti ākhyānāt pramāṇam eva phalam iti sūcitam

original: tathā, tasya dvidhā prayoga iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt parārthānumānaṃ kathayiṣyate,
analyzed: tathā tasya dvidhā prayogaḥ iti vakṣyamāṇa tvāt parārtha anumānam kathayiṣyate

saṅkṣepataḥ ca anumāna vyutpādanam api abhimatam

satyam prādhānyāt tu tad grahaṇam

original: tatā hi- pradhānapuruṣārthopayoginastattvasya caturāryasatyalakṣaṇasyānumānata eva niścayāt tasya prādhānyam /

tathā pratyakṣe viṣaye vivāda sambhave
na anumānāt anyat nirṇaya nibandhanam iti atas pi asya prādhānyam

original: anubhūyamānaphalaṃ vā dṛśyamānaṃ tatpravṛttiviṣayo nispannatvāt phalasya /

original: na hi tasyānāgate sukhaduḥkhe prati yogyatāṃ pratyakṣaṃ nirddhārayati,

phalasya parokṣa tvāt

original: taduktam- ” na hyapratyakṣe kārye kāraṇabhāvagatiḥ” iti /

original: tasmāt pūrvānubhūtasukhaduḥkhasādhanasādharmyāt pratyakṣaviṣayasyāpi vastuno 'nāgataphalayogyatāniścayaḥ na pratyakṣataḥ /

tathā ca āha tat yathā dṛṣṭa sādharmyāt tathā prasādhitam na anumeya tām atipatati iti
katham tarhi dvayoḥ api pravartaka tvam
na hi ābhyām artham paricchidya pravartamānaḥ rthakriyāyām visaṃvādyate iti uktam

original: phalamanāgataṃ prati yogyatāyā anumānata ityubhayorapi pravartakatvam /

original: samyagjñānapūrvakatvaṃ ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārayoraktam na tvanāgataphalaṃ prati yogyatāyāḥ pratyakṣato 'niścayāt /
analyzed: samyak jñāna pūrvaka tvam ca hita ahita prāpti parihārayoḥ aktam na tu anāgata phalam prati yogyatāyāḥ pratyakṣataḥ niścayāt
na hi arvāk darśinām bhāvi phala yogya tāyāḥ tatas niścayaḥ
tatas prādhānyāt anumāna grahaṇam iti alam ati vistareṇa iti

tatra svabhāva kārya anupalambhānām pakṣa dharma niścayaḥ tulya upāya sādhya tayā abhedena eva uktaḥ

original: anvayavyatirekaniścayasya tu bhinnopāyasādhyatayā bhedenaiva nirddeśaḥ kārya iti
analyzed: anvaya vyatireka niścayasya tu bhinna upāya sādhya tayā bhedena eva nirddeśaḥ kāryaḥ iti

original: 'pi” na kevalaṃ pakṣadharmaniścaya uktaḥ kintvanvayaniścayo 'pi “svabhāvahetau” ucyata iti śeṣaḥ /

original: “sādhanadharma” sya yad “bhāvamātraṃ” sattāmātraṃ mugdarādinimittantarānapekṣaṃ tasya “anubandho” anugamanaṃ vyāptiḥ tasya “siddhiḥ” yā sa

kasya sādhana dharma bhāva mātra anubandha siddhiḥ
sādhya dharmasya sādhyaḥ ca asau asiddha tvāt dharma dharmi samudaya eka deśa tvāt dharmaḥ ca iti tathā uktaḥ

original: yatra yatra sādhanadharmasya bhāvaḥ tatra tatra sādhyadharmasyāpi nimittāntarānapekṣo bhava ityetasyārthasya siddhiḥ svabhāvahetāvanvayaniścayaḥ

katham punar sādhya dharmaḥ sādhana dharma bhāva mātram anubadhnāti

original: ? “tadbhāvatayā” sa sādhanadharmo bhāvaḥ- svabhāvo yasya tasya bhāvatayā tadbhāvatayā /

original: yo hi sādhanadharmaḥ sādhyadharmasya svabhāvaḥ sa kathaṃ taṃ nānubadhnīyāt,
analyzed: yaḥ hi sādhana dharmaḥ sādhya dharmasya svabhāvaḥ sa katham tam na anubadhnīyāt

iti āha vastutas paramārthataḥ

original: sādhyasādhanasaṃkalpakāle tu paramparayā tattadvayāvṛttapadārthanibandhanāyāṃ kalpanābuddhau bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhyasādhanabhāvo na vihanyate
analyzed: sādhya sādhana saṃkalpa kāle tu paramparayā tad tad vayā vṛtta padārtha nibandhanāyām kalpanā buddhau bhedena pratibhāsanāt sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ na vihanyate

atha dvitīyaḥ pakṣaḥ

original: tadā svabhāvata eva tayoḥ kāryakāraṇarūpatvādanyastadbhāvaḥ kathaṃ na vaiyarthyamanubhavet? /
analyzed: tadā svabhāvataḥ eva tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa rūpa tvāt anyaḥ tad bhāvaḥ katham na vaiyarthyam anubhavet
kārya kāraṇa vuddhī api tad bhāva bhāvi tva mātra nibandhane na artha antara nimitte
tasya upapalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya kārya kāraṇa rūpa vivekinā rūpa antareṇa a pratibhāsanāt
tathāvidhasya api grahaṇa kalpanāyām atiprasaṅgaḥ
anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tāyām katham kārya kāraṇa bhāva buddhī tad nibandhane

original: nahi tad arthāntaraṃ svasattāmātreṇa tabduddhī pravartayati /
analyzed: nahi tat artha antaram sva sattā mātreṇa tad duddhī pravartayati
sadā sannihita tvena asya tayoḥ sarvadā udaya prasaṅgāt
na ca viśeṣaṇam agṛhītam viśeṣye sva viśiṣṭa pratyaya nibandhanam iti ayuktā asya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tā
na ca dṛṣṭasya api anupalakṣaṇam yuktam
kārya kāraṇa buddhyoḥ tad nibandhana tā upagamāt

original: na hi yannimito yo 'nyatrātabduddhibhāji tabdyavasāyaḥ sa tadanupalakṣaṇe yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na hi yad nimitaḥ yaḥ nyatra a tap duddhi bhāji tap dyavasāyaḥ sa tad anupalakṣaṇe yuktaḥ
devadatte daṇḍi vyavasāya vat daṇḍa anupalakṣaṇe
na ca artha antarasya kārya kāraṇābhyām sambandhaḥ ghaṭate
sambandha antara kalpanāyām anavasthā prasakteḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāva abhyupagame kārya kāraṇābhyām asahabhāvi tā sadbhāvasya
tatas ca kārya kāraṇa kāle tasya asannidhānāt katham kārya kāraṇa buddhi hetu tā

original: (Hbṭ 48) niruddhayoradhyāhṛtya tatpratyayakalpanāyāṃ ca kalpitaviṣaya eva kāryakāraṇatādhyavasāyaḥ syāt na vastuviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: niruddhayoḥ adhyāhṛtya tad pratyaya kalpanāyām ca kalpita viṣayaḥ eva kārya kāraṇatā adhyavasāyaḥ syāt na vastu viṣayaḥ
sa ca viśiṣṭa bhāva abhāva nibandhanaḥ bhyupagataḥ evā iti kim artha antara kalpanayā
kalpita viṣaya tve tad dhyavasāyasya
tasyāḥ vaiyarthyāt kārya kāraṇayoḥ ca ayaugapadyāt
hani tābhyām asau janyate
pratyeka janyaḥ ca katham kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: yadā ca kāraṇena janyate tadā kiṃ svakāryasahito janyate,
analyzed: yadā ca kāraṇena janyate tadā kim sva kārya sahitaḥ janyate
atha kevalaḥ
kevalaḥ pi kim sva kāryāt prāk
atha paścāt

original: yadi svakāryasahitastudubhayoranyata eva bhāvāt parasparamasambandha iti kāryasambandhitāsya hīyeta /
analyzed: yadi sva kārya sahitaḥ tud ubhayoḥ anyatas eva bhāvāt parasparam asambandhaḥ iti kārya sambandhi tā asya hīyeta
atha kevalaḥ sva kāryāt prāk

original: tadā kṣaṇikatayā kāraṇasya tameva janayitvā dhvaṃsāt kathaṃ svakāryakrīyā? /
analyzed: tadā kṣaṇika tayā kāraṇasya tam eva janayitvā dhvaṃsāt katham sva kārya krīyā
tasyām ca asatyām katham tad apekṣam asya kāraṇa tvam
tasmin ca asati katham akāraṇena kārya kāraṇa sambandhaḥ janyate

original: atha svakāryaṃ kṛtvā paścājjanyeta tadāpi svakāryakāle eva vinaṣṭatvād asatastaduttarakālabhāvikāryakāraṇabhāvajananaṃ kutaḥ? /
analyzed: atha sva kāryam kṛtvā paścāt janyeta tadā api sva kārya kāle eva vinaṣṭa tvāt asataḥ tad uttara kāla bhāvi kārya kāraṇa bhāva jananam kutas
tad bhāvaḥ ca sambandhaḥ ucyate

original: janyatāyāṃ vā yadi samagrāḥ svarūpata eva tāṃ janayanti kārye ka eṣāṃ śaktivyāghātaḥ?
analyzed: janya tāyām vā yadi samagrāḥ svarūpataḥ eva tām janayanti kārye kaḥ eṣām śakti vyāghātaḥ
yatas nyatra kalpyate
tatra api apara sāmagrī yoga apekṣāyām ca anavasthā prasaṅgaḥ
tatas samagrāḥ eva janakāḥ

original: teṣāṃ ca kāraṇatvamekaikāpāye kāryavyatirekataḥ samunnīyata ityāha- “satsvapyanyeṣu” tatsāmagryantargateṣu “hetuṣu” janakeṣu (Hbṭ 49)
analyzed: teṣām ca kāraṇa tvam ekaika apāye kārya vyatirekataḥ samunnīyate iti āha satsu api anyeṣu tad sāmagrī antargateṣu hetuṣu janakeṣu

original: pratyekaṃ teṣāṃ vyañjanakatvād “asyābhāve” janakatvena nirddhāryamāṇatayā vivakṣitasyābhāve “na bhavati” ityanenānupalambhasya viṣaya uktaḥ
analyzed: pratyekam teṣām vyañjanaka tvāt asya abhāve janaka tvena nirddhāryamāṇa tayā vivakṣitasya abhāve na bhavati iti anena anupalambhasya viṣayaḥ uktaḥ
pratyakṣa vṛttiḥ tu pūrva uktā eva anupalambha rahitā tad bhāve bhāva grāhiṇī saṃbandhyate

original: tathā cāyamapi tadbhāve bhāvaḥ tadabhāve 'bhāvaśca kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ kiṃsādhanaḥ?
analyzed: tathā ca ayam api tad bhāve bhāvaḥ tad abhāve bhāvaḥ ca kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ kiṃsādhanaḥ
iti āha pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ pratyakṣa pūrvakaḥ nupalambhaḥ sādhanam asya iti pratyakṣa anupalambha sādhanaḥ
kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ

original: yastvanupalambhasāpekṣeṇa pratyakṣeṇa sādhyata iti prāguktaḥ so 'nupalambhapūrvakaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sādhanamasyeti anupalambhapratyakṣasādhana iti  #
analyzed: yaḥ tu anupalambha sāpekṣeṇa pratyakṣeṇa sādhyate iti prāguktaḥ saḥ nupalambha pūrvakam pratyakṣam sādhanam asya iti anupalambha pratyakṣa sādhanaḥ iti
vaktavyaḥ

original: “tasya” kāryakāraṇabhāvasyānvayavyatirekātmanaḥ “siddhiḥ” niścayo “yathoktābhyāṃ” pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryahetāvanvayaniścaya iti sambandhate
analyzed: tasya kārya kāraṇa bhāvasya anvaya vyatireka ātmanaḥ siddhiḥ niścayaḥ yathā uktābhyām pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām kārya hetau anvaya niścayaḥ iti sambandhate

original: nanu cānvayaniścayo nāma kāryahetoḥ sarvatra kāryasya bhavataḥ svakāraṇasattayānugamanamityevamavasāyaḥ tat kathaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhirevāsāvucyate?
analyzed: nanu ca anvaya niścayaḥ nāma kārya hetoḥ sarvatra kāryasya bhavataḥ sva kāraṇa sattayā anugamanam iti evam avasāyaḥ tat katham kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhiḥ eva asau ucyate
iti āśaṅkya kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhi nibandhana tvāt anvaya niścayasya kāraṇe kārya upacārāt ananya upāya sādhya tām darśayitum

original: darśanamātranibandhanaṃ ye tamicchanti tanmataniṣedhārthamasāvevamukta iti darśayannāha- “kāryakāraṇabhāva eva hi” kāryakāraṇabhāve satyeva
analyzed: darśana mātra nibandhanam ye tam icchanti tad mata niṣedha artham asau evam uktaḥ iti darśayan āha kārya kāraṇa bhāve eva hi kārya kāraṇa bhāve sati eva
hiḥ
yasmāt artha antarasya sādhyāt vyatiriktasya

original: yastvavyatiriktaḥ tasya viparyaye bādhakapramāṇavṛttyā tādātmyaniścayādevānvayaniścaya iti pūrvamuktamevetyarthāntaragrahaṇam /
analyzed: yaḥ tu avyatiriktaḥ tasya viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā tādātmya niścayāt eva anvaya niścayaḥ iti pūrvam uktam eva iti artha antara grahaṇam
tasya artha antarasya evam syāt
katham
yatra nāma kvacid dhūmaḥ tatra avaśyam agniḥ
iti niyamena
agneḥ tatra bhāvaḥ
iti evaṃrūpaḥ nvaya niścayaḥ

original: yastvakāryakāraṇabhāve 'pi rasasyārthāntarasya rūpeṇānvayaniścayaḥ sa ekasāmagryadhīnatayā tasya svakāraṇāvyabhicāradvāraka evetyadoṣaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu akārya kāraṇa bhāve pi rasasya artha antarasya rūpeṇa anvaya niścayaḥ saḥ eka sāmagrī adhīna tayā tasya sva kāraṇa avyabhicāra dvārakaḥ eva iti adoṣaḥ

original: atha yadi nāma kāryamagnerdhūmastathāpi kimiti yatrāsau tatrāvaśyamagnirbhavati yataḥ
analyzed: atha yadi nāma kāryam agneḥ dhūmaḥ tathā api kim iti yatra asau tatra avaśyam agniḥ bhavati yatas

original: kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhinibandhano 'nvayaniścaya ucyata ityāha- “agneḥ bhāve eva” sattāyāmeva '
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhi nibandhanaḥ nvaya niścayaḥ ucyate iti āha agneḥ bhāve eva sattāyām eva
hiḥ

original: yadi hi yatra dhūmastatrāvaśyamagnirna syāt tadāgnimantareṇāpyasya bhāvād agnibhāva eva bhāvalakṣaṇaṃ kāryatvaṃ hīyeta /
analyzed: yadi hi yatra dhūmaḥ tatra avaśyam agniḥ na syāt tadā agnim antareṇa api asya bhāvāt agni bhāvaḥ eva bhāva lakṣaṇam kārya tvam hīyeta

iti āha asat vyavahārasya sādhya dharmasya yogyatāyāḥ ca sādhya tvāt tad yogyatā sat yavahāraḥ bhipretaḥ
tasya
upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya yā anupalabdhiḥ tad anya upalabdhi rūpā tanmātre nimitta antara anapekṣaṇī
yā vṛttiḥ pravṛttiḥ asat vdyavahārasya tasyāḥ sādhanam siddhiḥ
kutas punar asat vdyavahārasya tanmātre vṛttiḥ bhavati
iti āha nimitta antara abhāva upadarśanāt iti

original: yadā hyasavdyavahārasya yathoktānupaladbhivyatiriktaṃ buddhivyapadeśārthakriyāvirahādikaṃ nimittaṃ na bhavatīti sādhyate tadā yathoktānupalabdhimātre  #
analyzed: yadā hi asat dyavahārasya yathā ukta anupaladbhi vyatiriktam buddhi vyapadeśa artha kriyā viraha ādikam nimittam na bhavati iti sādhyate tadā yathā ukta anupalabdhi mātre
sya vṛttiḥ siddhā bhavati
tathā tayā ca anupalabdhau anvaya niścayaḥ

original: anyathā hi nimittāntarāpekṣāśaṅkāyāṃ satyāmapi yathoktānupalabdhau nāvaśyamasavdyavahārasya bhāva iti kuto 'nvayaniścayaḥ syāt? /
analyzed: anyathā hi nimitta antara apekṣā śaṅkāyām satyām api yathā ukta anupalabdhau na avaśyam asat dyavahārasya bhāvaḥ iti kutas nvaya niścayaḥ syāt

original: nimittāntarābhāvastu vistarato vādanyāya ukta iti tata evāvadhāryaḥ /
analyzed: nimitta antara abhāvaḥ tu vistarataḥ vāda nyāyaḥ uktaḥ iti tatas eva avadhāryaḥ

original: athavā savdyavahārasya yannimittamupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya sattvam tad asavdyavahāranimittādanyatvāt nimittāntaraṃ tatrānupalabdherabhāva  #
analyzed: athavā sattvam tat asat dyavahāra nimittāt anya tvāt nimitta antaram tatra anupalabdheḥ abhāva
upadarśyate yena pramāṇena tat evam uktam
tena
sati vastuni tasyāḥ asambhava niścayāt anupalabdhau anvaya niścayaḥ
tat ca tad vyatireka cintāyām darśayiṣyāmaḥ
hbṭ

original: tadevaṃ trayāṇāmapi hetūnāṃ yathāsvaṃ pramāṇenānvayaniścaya uktaḥ /
analyzed: tat evam trayāṇām api hetūnām yathāsvam pramāṇena anvaya niścayaḥ uktaḥ
svabhāva hetau viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā tādātmya siddhi nibandhana tvāt

anupalabdhau nimitta antara abhāva prasādhaka pramāṇaḥ tad abhava siddhi hetu tvāt ca iti

original: samprati trayāṇāmapi hetūnāṃ svasvapramānanibandhanaṃ vyatirekaniścayaṃ pratipādayitukāma
analyzed: samprati trayāṇām api hetūnām sva sva pramāna nibandhanam vyatireka niścayam pratipādayitu kāma

original: api tu “vyatirekaniścayo 'pi kāryasvabhāvahetvo” ryathāsvaṃ pramāṇanimitta ucyate /

original: kadā punaste anupalabdhī sādhike tasya bhavataḥ? /
analyzed: kadā punar te anupalabdhī sādhike tasya bhavataḥ

original: “kāryakāraṇavyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau” pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ kāraṇānupalabdhiḥ kāryahetau sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva siddhau pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhau satyām kāraṇa anupalabdhiḥ kārya hetau sādhya abhāve bhāvasya
viparyaye ca bādhaka pramāṇa vṛttyā tad bhāva tā siddhitaḥ

original: vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ svabhāvahetau sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya sādhiketi /
analyzed: vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva siddhau satyām vyāpakā anupalabdhiḥ svabhāva hetau sādhya abhāve bhāvasya sādhikā iti

original: tadevaṃ bruvatā ubhayatra tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇapratibandhaniścayādeva dvayorapyanvayavyatirekayoḥ niścaya iti uktaṃ bhavati /

atas eva anyatra kārya kāraṇa bhāvāt vā ityādi uktam

dṛśya viṣayābhyām dṛśyaḥ viṣayaḥ yayoḥ te tathā ukte

original: yadi kāraṇavyāpakāvupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptau bhavatastadā tadanupalabdhī sādhyābhāve 'bhāvaṃ sādhayata iti yāvat /
analyzed: yadi kāraṇa vyāpakau upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptau bhavataḥ tadā tad anupalabdhī sādhya abhāve bhāvam sādhayataḥ iti yāvat
kadā punar tayoḥ dṛśya viṣaya tā viśeṣaṇam apekṣyate

original: ityāha- “uddiṣṭaviṣayasya” uddiṣṭaḥ- kathito viṣayaḥ- ādhāro vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇo yasya sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasya tasyopadarśane kriyamāṇe
analyzed: iti āha uddiṣṭa viṣayasya uddiṣṭaḥ kathitaḥ viṣayaḥ ādhāraḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta lakṣaṇaḥ yasya sādhya abhāve bhāvasya tasya upadarśane kriyamāṇe
tatra api kasmāt dṛśya viṣaya tā apekṣyate
iti ced āha anupalabdhi ityādi
anyathā yadi dṛśya viṣaya tā viśeṣaṇam anupalabdhyoḥ na apekṣyate
yadā anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptam viṣayam vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta rūpam upādatte tadā anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptau

original: tatra kāraṇavyāpakāvapi bhavata iti “anupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyaḥ” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya
analyzed: tatra kāraṇa vyāpakau api bhavataḥ iti anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasyaḥ kāraṇasya vyāpakasya

original: vā “kvacid” viprakṛṣṭe viṣaye sumervādau “abhāvāsiddheḥ” kathamābhyāṃ sādhyābhāve 'bhāvasiddhiḥ syāt,
analyzed: vā kvacid viprakṛṣṭe viṣaye sumeru ādau abhāva asiddheḥ katham ābhyām sādhya abhāve bhāva siddhiḥ syāt
kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhyoḥ eva asiddha tvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ
atha anuddiṣṭa viṣayasya api abhāvasya upadarśane na upalabdhyoḥ ddaśya viṣaya tā viśeṣaṇam kimitti na apekṣyate

original: ityāha- “anuddiṣṭaviṣayam” anuddiṣṭo viṣayaḥ- vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntarūpo yasmin sādhyābhāve
analyzed: iti āha anuddiṣṭa viṣayam anuddiṣṭaḥ viṣayaḥ vaidharmya dṛṣṭānta rūpaḥ yasmin sādhya abhāve
hetu abhāva khyāpane tat pratibandha mātra siddhau satyām dṛśya viṣaya tā viśeṣaṇam antareṇa api

original: yasmāt “sidhyati iti” tasmāt “na tatra” anuddiṣṭaviṣaye “vyatirekasādhane” anupalabdhyo
analyzed: yasmāt sidhyati iti tasmāt na tatra anuddiṣṭa viṣaye vyatireka sādhane anupalabdhyāḥ
r dṛśya viṣaya tā viśeṣaṇam apekṣyate aṅgīkriyate

original: tathā hi- aśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa sāmānyenāpi bruvato yo yatra pratibaddhasvabhāvaḥ
analyzed: tathā hi aśeṣa padārtha parigraheṇa sāmānyena api bruvataḥ yaḥ yatra pratibaddha svabhāvaḥ

original: tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ sa tadabhāve 'vaśyameva na bhavatīti niḥsvabhāvatvāhetukatvaprasaṅgāt / taduktam-
analyzed: tādātmya tad utpattibhyām sa tad abhāve vaśyam eva na bhavati iti niḥsvabhāva tva ahetuka tva prasaṅgāt tat uktam
svabhāve pi avinābhāvaḥ bhāva mātra anurodhinī
tad abhāve svayam bhāvasya abhāvaḥ syāt abhedataḥ
tathā kāryam dhūmaḥ hutabhujaḥ kārya dharma anuvṛttitaḥ
sa bhavan tad abhāve pi hetumat tām vilaṅghyet iti

original: tatastatra dṛśyaviṣayatāpekṣyamāṇānupakārikaiveti na tayā kiñciditi bhāvaḥ /

original: nanu ca kṛtakatvasvabhāvatā anityatāyā bhedopagamāt neṣṭaiva paraistat kimucyate- “atadbhāvamātrānvayinamapi svabhāvamicchanti” iti? /

evam manyate vyatiriktau api kṛtaka tva anitya tva ākhyau dharmau abhyupagacchadbhiḥ avaśyam
a bhūtvā bhavanam bhūtvā ca abhavanam anavasthāyi svabhāva tvam
abhyupagantavyam
anyathā ātma ādiṣu api kṛtaka tva anitya tve viśeṣa abhāvāt bhavetām
tatas yat eva
a bhūtvā bhavanam bhūtvā bhavanam ca anavasthāyi tvam
upādīyate bhāvasya tayoḥ eva tad darśana bala utpanna kṛtaka tva aniya tva bheda avabhāsi kalpanā dvāreṇa sādhya sādhana bhāvaḥ stu
kim vyatirikta dharma kalpanayā

original: kalpayitvāpi vastvātmana evārthakriyānibandhanatayā tadarthibhiḥ cintyatvāt / taduktam-
analyzed: kalpayitvā api vastu ātmanaḥ eva arthakriyā nibandhana tayā tad arthibhiḥ cintya tvāt tat uktam
hbṭ
sat asat pakṣa bhedena śabda artha anapavādibhiḥ
vastu eva cintyate hi atra pratibaddhaḥ phala udayaḥ
artha a kriyā samarthasya vikācā
raiḥ kim tad arthinām
ṣaṇḍhasya rūpa vairūpye kāminyāḥ kim parīkṣayā

original: iti / tasmād dṛṣṭā api bhāvāḥ kenacidātmanā tadanyavyāvṛttena kathañcinniścitāḥ tadanyenāpyatadrūpavyāvṛttenātmanā bhrāntikāraṇasadbhāvādaniścīyamānāḥ,
analyzed: iti tasmāt dṛṣṭāḥ api bhāvāḥ kenacid ātmanā tad anya vyāvṛttena kathañcid niścitāḥ tad anyena api a tad rūpa vyāvṛttena ātmanā bhrānti kāraṇa sadbhāvāt a niścīyamānāḥ

original: niścitāniścitayo rūpayoḥ pramāṇāntarataḥ pratibandhāvasāyāpurovartino 'numānato niścīyate iti anityatāsvabhāvabhūtasyaiva kṛtakatvasya vināśaṃ  #
analyzed: niścita aniścitayoḥ rūpayoḥ pramāṇa antarataḥ pratibandha avasāya a purovartinaḥ numānataḥ niścīyate iti anitya tā svabhāva bhūtasya eva kṛtaka tvasya vināśam
prati liṅga tā yuktā

original: tathā ca vināśasvabhāva eva kṛtakatvākhyo hetuḥ tairyathoktanyāyādiṣṭo bhavati /
analyzed: tathā ca vināśa svabhāvaḥ eva kṛtaka tva ākhyaḥ hetuḥ taiḥ yathā ukta nyāya ādiṣṭaḥ bhavati
tasya a tanmātra anvayi tve rtha antara nimitta tayā viśeṣaṇena a tad svabhāva tā kathyate

original: syānmatam- kṛtakatvena sākṣad hetumān vināśo 'numīyate tataḥ prākpradhvaṃsābhavaviśeṣaṇā sattā tatsamavāyo vānityatā vyavasthāpyate /
analyzed: syāt matam kṛtaka tvena sākṣat hetumān vināśaḥ numīyate tatas prāk pradhvaṃsa abhava viśeṣaṇā sattā tad samavāyaḥ vā anitya tā vyavasthāpyate
atas eva ātma ādiṣu anitya tā prasaṅga abhāvaḥ

original: vināśa iti ca na bhāvābhāvaṃ pradhvaṃsalakṣaṇaṃ manyāmahe /
analyzed: vināśaḥ iti ca na bhāva abhāvam pradhvaṃsa lakṣaṇam manyāmahe
kṛtaka tvam tu sva kāraṇa sattā samavāyam
tasya viśeṣaṇena
bhāvatā ākhyāpane na kiñcid aniṣṭam iti
tat ayuktam
tathāvidhasya vināśasya hetumat tā avirodhāt
svayam eva ca etat ācāryaḥ vakṣyati
na ca tena anumitena kiñcid
tasya artha kriyā sāmarthya vikala tvāt

original: sukhaduḥsvasādhane jñātvā yathārhaṃ pratipitsavo hi kiñcit parīkṣante na vyasanitayā /
analyzed: sukha duḥsva sādhane jñātvā yathārham pratipitsavaḥ hi kiñcid parīkṣante na vyasani tayā
tasmāt anena asthira svabhāva tā eva bhāvasya anumātavyā
sā eva ca hetumatī kalpanīyā

original: anyathā bhāvāvilakṣaṇasya pradhvaṃsābhāvasya mugdarāderudaye 'pi tasya bhāve 'nupayogāt sa bhāvastadavastha eveti kathaṃ tadviśeṣaṇā sattā  #
analyzed: anyathā bhāva a vilakṣaṇasya pradhvaṃsa abhāvasya mugdara ādeḥ udaye tasya bhāve n upayogāt sa bhāvaḥ tad avasthaḥ evā iti katham tad viśeṣaṇā sattā
tad samavāyaḥ vai anitya tā syāt

original: avicalitarūpasya ca bhāvasya mugdarādikṛtapradhvaṃsābhāvaviśeṣaṇau sattāsamavāyau yadyanityatā,
analyzed: avicalita rūpasya ca bhāvasya mugdara ādi kṛta pradhvaṃsa abhāva viśeṣaṇau sattā samavāyau yadi anitya tā
kim na ātma ādeḥ api
iti prasaṅga tad avasthaḥ eva
sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ ca a bhūtvā bhavanam an icchataḥ na sidhyati

original: abhūtvā bhavata eva ca yā sattā saiva kṛtakatvaṃ varṇyate /
analyzed: a bhūtvā bhavataḥ eva ca yā sattā sā eva kṛtaka tvam varṇyate
na ca sattā samavāyayoḥ nitya tayā upagatayoḥ niratiśaya tvāt prāk pradhvaṃsa abhāvau viśeṣaṇam yujyete

original: abhūtvā bhavanopagame ca tadeva kṛtakatvamasthirasvabhāvatā ca vināśo 'stu /
analyzed: a bhūtvā bhavana upagame ca tat eva kṛtaka tvam asthira svabhāva tā ca vināśaḥ u stu
kim niṣphalayā apramāṇikayā pramāṇa badhitayā artha antara kalpanayā
evam kṛtaka tva vināśayoḥ tādātmya upagamaḥ vaśyambhāvī pareṣām api
tatas vināśasya asthāyi tva lakṣaṇasya artha antara nimitta tā upagame kṛtaka tvasya atatsvabhāva tā viśeṣaṇena khyāpyate
tad niṣpattau aniṣpannasya bhinna hetukasya ca tad svabhāva tva ayogāt
tathā tasmin sādhye kṛtaka tvasya vyabhicāraḥ

original: tathā hi- ye yatra hetvantarāpekṣiṇo na te tatrāvaśyambhāvinaḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi ye yatra hetu antara apekṣiṇaḥ na te tatra avaśyambhāvinaḥ
yathā vāsasi rāgaḥ

original: hetvantarāpekṣī ca kṛtakeṣvapi bhāveṣu pradhvaṃsābhāva iti viruddhavyāptopalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: hetu antara apekṣī ca kṛtakeṣu api bhāveṣu pradhvaṃsa abhāvaḥ iti viruddha vyāpta upalabdhiḥ

original: nanu vāsasi rāgasya parimitahetutvāt tasya ca svakāraṇāyattasannidhānatvāt tadāśrayasya ca vidhurapratyayopanipātenāsthiratayā nāvaśyambhavitā  #
analyzed: nanu vāsasi rāgasya parimita hetu tvāt tasya ca sva kāraṇa āyatta sannidhāna tvāt tad āśrayasya ca vidhura pratyaya upanipātena asthira tayā na avaśyambhavitā
yuktā eva
na punar vināśasya
tad hetūnām ānantyāt avaśyam kasyacid ghaṭa ādiṣu sannidheḥ

original: na ca vināśasyāśrayaṃ prāk taddhetusannidheḥ kecidupaghnānti,
analyzed: na ca vināśasya āśrayam prāk tad hetu sannidheḥ kecid upaghnānti
yatas tad abhāvāt vināśaḥ na ārabhyeta iti
tat ayuktam

original: yato yadyapi bahulaṃ vināśakāraṇāni santi tathāpi teṣāṃ svakaraṇāyattasannidhitvāt
analyzed: yatas yadi api bahulam vināśa kāraṇāni santi tathā api teṣām svakaraṇa āyatta sannidhi tvāt

original: tathā tatkāraṇānāṃ ca sa nnihitānāmapi virodhināmapyānatyāt tadbhāve tacchaktipratibandhānnāvaśyaṃ
analyzed: tathā tad kāraṇānām ca sa nnihitānām api virodhinām api ānatyāt tad bhāve tad śakti pratibandhāt na avaśyam

original: hetavaḥ phalavanta iti kaścinna vinaśyedapīti vyabhicāro (Hbṭ 61)
analyzed: hetavaḥ phalavantaḥ iti kaścid na vinaśyet api iti vyabhicāraḥ
na nivartate

original: nanvayaṃ vāsasi rāgaḥ sāpekṣo 'pi yadi sarvatropalabhyeta tataḥ kimavaśyambhāvī na syāt? /
analyzed: nanu ayam vāsasi rāgaḥ sāpekṣaḥ yadi sarvatra upalabhyeta tatas kim avaśyambhāvī na syāt
syāt yadi tathā upalabhyeta
sa tu anyathā api gṛhyate

original: yadyevaṃ na tarhi sarvatropalabdhasya vināśasyānyathābhāvaśaṅkayā manasi kheda ādhātavyaḥ /
analyzed: yadi evam na tarhi sarvatra upalabdhasya vināśasya anyathābhāva śaṅkayā manasi khedaḥ ādhātavyaḥ
kim vā punar bhavān samasta vastu vistara vyāpi jñāna ālokaḥ
yena evam vadati
tathā abhāve vā katham anumāna vṛttiḥ dṛṣṭe na vaiphalyam aśnuvīta

original: kasyacit tu hetukṛtavināśadarśane 'pi hetvāyattajanmanamanyathāpi darśanād upajātāśaṅko deśakālasvabhāvaviprakṛṣṭeṣu kathaṃ tathābhāvaṃ niścinvīta?
analyzed: kasyacid tu hetu kṛta vināśa darśane hetu āyatta janmanam anyathā api darśanāt upajāta āśaṅkaḥ deśa kāla svabhāva viprakṛṣṭeṣu katham tathābhāvam niścinvīta
kṛtakam api ca ayam bhava bhāva lakṣaṇam vināśam nityam upaiti
tad vināśa upagame bhāvasya unmajjana prasaṅgāt

original: na cāsya ghaṭāderiva vināśaheturupalabhyate kaściditi / taduktam-
analyzed: na ca asya ghaṭa ādeḥ iva vināśa hetuḥ upalabhyate kaścid iti tat uktam
ghaṭa ādiṣu yathā dṛṣṭāḥ hetavaḥ dhvaṃsa kāriṇaḥ
nā evam nāśasya saḥ hetuḥ tasya saṃjāyate katham

original: iti / tataḥ kṛtakatva vināśe sādhye tenaiva vyabhicāraḥ kiṃ neṣyate? /
analyzed: iti tatas kṛtaka tva vināśe sādhye tena eva vyabhicāraḥ kim na iṣyate
bhāvānām ayam aikāntikaḥ eva dharmaḥ iti ced
kutas punar etat avasitam
teṣām anyathābhāvasya anupalambhāt iti ced
nanu ayam anupalambhaḥ bhavan api ātma ādeḥ anivartakaḥ sattāyāḥ
katham anyatra anyathābhāvam nivartayati

original: tasyānumānenopalambhāditi yadyucyeta tadā tatrāpyanumāne vipakṣe vṛttimanupalambha eva hetoḥ kathaṃ nivartayati?
analyzed: tasya anumānena upalambhāt iti yadi ucyeta tadā tatra api anumāne vipakṣe vṛttim anupalambhaḥ eva hetoḥ katham nivartayati
iti yat kiñcid etat
tasmāt sādhu uktam
hetumati vināśe kṛtaka tvasya asvabhāva tām vyabhicāram ca āha
iti alam ati jalpitena iti

original: idānīṃ yadyapi svārthānumānaṃ prakṛtaṃ tathāpi kaścit prayogadarśanābhyāsāt prayogabhaṅgayaiva pratipadyata iti svārthānumāne 'pi (Hbṭ 62)
analyzed: idānīm yadi api svārtha anumānam prakṛtam tathā api kaścid prayoga darśana abhyāsāt prayoga bhaṅgayā eva pratipadyate iti svārtha anumāne pi

original: tatsvambhavāt prasaṅgena parārthānumānaṃ ca vyutpādayitumāha- “tasya” svabhāvahetoḥ “dvidhā” trailakṣaṇyapratipādako vacanodāhāraḥ “prayogaḥ”
analyzed: tad svambhavāt prasaṅgena parārtha anumānam ca vyutpādayitum āha tasya svabhāva hetoḥ dvidhā trailakṣaṇya pratipādakaḥ vacana udāhāraḥ prayogaḥ

original: tameva darśayati- samāno dharmo yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tena “sādhya(dha)
analyzed: tam eva darśayati samānaḥ dharmaḥ yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tena
rmyeṇa ekaḥ prayogaḥ

original: “aparo” visadṛśo dharmo yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tena “vaidharmyeṇa” /
analyzed: aparaḥ visadṛśaḥ dharmaḥ yasya tasya bhāvaḥ tena vaidharmyeṇa
yathākramam anayoḥ udāharaṇam āha yathā yat sat
yat yat sat iti vīpsā pradhānaḥ yad śabdaḥ
tat sarvam iti vīpsā pradhānaḥ eva
atra sarva grahaṇena ca aśeṣa parigrahāt bahis vyāpteḥ nirāsaḥ
yathā ghaṭa ādayaḥ iti

original: yasya sattvakṣaṇikatvayoḥ pratibandhaprasādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ ghaṭādau pravṛttaṃ taṃ prati tatra smṛtisamādhānārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntavacanaṃ na sādhyasiddhyartham
analyzed: yasya sattva kṣaṇikatvayoḥ pratibandha prasādhakam pramāṇam ghaṭa ādau pravṛttam tam prati tatra smṛti samādhāna artham dṛṣṭānta vacanam na sādhya siddhi artham
dṛṣṭānta mātrataḥ sādhyasiddheḥ abhāvāt

original: na hyekasya tathā bhāve sarvastathā bhavati,
analyzed: na hi ekasya tathā bhāve sarvaḥ tathā bhavati
atiprasaṅgāt
san ca śabdaḥ iti pakṣa dharma upasaṃhāraḥ
vaidharmya prayogasya udāharaṇam tathā ityādi
tathāśabdaḥ samuccaye
vaidharmyeṇa ca prayogaḥ udāhriyate

original: atrāpi sarvagrahaṇaṃ vibhaktivipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam “kṣaṇikatvābhāve” sarvasmin “sattvā(ttvā)bhāvaḥ” iti /
analyzed: atra api sarva grahaṇam vibhakti vipariṇāmena sambandhanīyam kṣaṇika tva abhāve sarvasmin sattva āttva abhāvaḥ iti
prayoga dvaye sarva grahaṇasya phalam darśayan āha sarvasmin sādhana dharmavati
dharmiṇi na dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi eva sādhya dharmasya upasaṃharaṇam upasaṃhāraḥ ḍhaukanam
tena yā vyāptiḥ
vyāpakasya tatra bhāvaḥ eva

original: ityādirūpā tasyāḥ pradarśanaṃ pratipādanaṃ tadeva “lakṣaṇaṃ” yayoḥ tau tathoktau /
analyzed: ityādi rūpā tasyāḥ pradarśanam pratipādanam tat eva lakṣaṇam yayoḥ tau tathā uktau

original: tataśca ye sādhyadharmiṇaṃ parihṛtya bahirvyāptiṃ pradarśayanti te- yadyapi dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi
analyzed: tatas ca ye sādhya dharmiṇam parihṛtya bahis vyāptim pradarśayanti te yadi api dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi

original: sādhyadharmeṇa sādhanadharmo vyāptaḥ tāvatāsya sarvatra tathābhāvābhāvāt sādhyasiddhirayukteti- nirastā bhavanti /
analyzed: sādhya dharmeṇa sādhana dharmaḥ vyāptaḥ tāvatā asya sarvatra tathā bhāva abhāvāt sādhya siddhiḥ ayuktā iti nirastāḥ bhavanti

original: sarvatra vā sādhyadharmeṇa sādhanadharmasya vyāptiḥ tadbhāve,
analyzed: sarvatra vā sādhya dharmeṇa sādhana dharmasya vyāptiḥ tad bhāve

original: sā tathāvidhaiva kinna pradarśyate yenāsamarthā bahirvyāptirākhyāyate? /
analyzed: sā tathāvidhā eva kin na pradarśyate yena asamarthā bahis vyāptiḥ ākhyāyate
na hi sa śyāmaḥ
tad putra tvāt
paridṛśyamāna putra vat
iti tad putra tvasya hbṭ

original: śyāmatvena sādhyād bahiḥ paridṛśyamānaputre vyāptipradarśane 'pi sādhyasiddhirbhavati /
analyzed: śyāma tvena sādhyāt bahis vyāpti pradarśane sādhya siddhiḥ bhavati

original: tasmād yaiva sarvopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptiḥ pramāṇasiddhapratibandhanibandhanā sādhyasiddhau samarthā saiva tatsmṛtaye pradarśanīyā /
analyzed: tasmāt yā eva sarva upasaṃhāreṇa vyāptiḥ pramāṇa siddha pratibandha nibandhanā sādhya siddhau samarthā sā eva tad smṛtaye pradarśanīyā

original: na ca sarvopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptipradarśane 'pi dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmyapi tadaiva pratīyate,
analyzed: na ca sarva upasaṃhāreṇa vyāpti pradarśane dharma viśiṣṭaḥ dharmī api tadā eva pratīyate
yatas pakṣa dharma upadarśana uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ numānasya smṛti tvam syāt
tasyāḥ sādhya dharmiṇi sādhya dharma avinābhūta sādhana dharma pratīti nibandhana tvena tad upadarśanāt prāk asambhavāt

original: tatpūrvikāyāṃ ca vyāptau anantaraṃ viśeṣaviṣayamanumānaṃ kathaṃ smṛtiḥ syāt? iti /
analyzed: tad pūrvikāyām ca vyāptau anantaram viśeṣa viṣayam anumānam katham smṛtiḥ syāt iti
vaidharmya prayoge pi vyāpti pradarśanam saṃgatam
nanu ca sādharmya prayogasya vyāpti pradarśana lakṣaṇa tvam yuktam
sādhana dharme sati
vaidharmya prayogasya tu katham

original: tatra hi kevalaṃ sādhyābhāve hetvabhāvaḥ kathyate,
analyzed: tatra hi kevalam sādhya abhāve hetvabhāvaḥ kathyate

original: na tu hetau sati sādhyasya bhāva eveti /
analyzed: na tu hetau sati sādhyasya bhāvaḥ eva iti
na eṣa doṣaḥ
na hi atra sādhya abhāve hetvabhāvaḥ tuccha rūpaḥ darśyate
tasya hetu rūpa tā avirodhāt
vastu dharmaḥ hi sattva ādikaḥ hetuḥ
tasya ātmanaḥ eva abhāvaḥ katham hetu svarūpam bhaviṣyati
yatas tri rūpaḥ hetuḥ bhavet

original: kintu nivṛttau nivṛttidharmakatvaṃ svagato dharma upadarśyate vaidharmyaprayogeṇa,
analyzed: kintu nivṛttau nivṛtti dharmaka tvam svagataḥ dharmaḥ upadarśyate vaidharmya prayogeṇa

original: tathāvidhe ca sādhanadharme 'vaśyaṃtayā sādhyadharmasya bhāvaḥ pratīyata eva,
analyzed: tathāvidhe ca sādhana dharme vaśyaṃtayā sādhya dharmasya bhāvaḥ pratīyate eva

original: anyathā tannivṛttau nivṛttidharmakatvasyaivāyogāditi na vyāptipradarśanalakṣaṇatvaṃ vaidharmyaprayogasya na yujyate /
analyzed: anyathā tad nivṛttau nivṛtti dharmaka tvasya eva ayogāt iti na vyāpti pradarśana lakṣaṇa tvam vaidharmya prayogasya na yujyate
pratijñā prayogasya nairarthakyam

original: nanu dvividhe 'pi prayoge pratijñāprayogo nopadarśitaḥ tat kathaṃ tadarthāvagatiḥ?
analyzed: nanu dvividhe pi prayoge pratijñā prayogaḥ na upadarśitaḥ tat katham tad artha avagatiḥ

original: , tadarthapratyāyanāya ca sādhanaprayogo 'bhimataḥ ityata āha- “atra” anayoḥ prayogayoḥ “pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātrasāmarthyādeva” (Hbṭ
analyzed: tad artha pratyāyanāya ca sādhana prayogaḥ bhimataḥ iti atas āha atra anayoḥ prayogayoḥ pakṣa dharma sambandha vacana mātra sāmarthyāt eva

original: vakṣyamāṇakāt “pratijñārthasya” dharmadharmisamudāyalakṣaṇasya sādhyasya “pratīteḥ” hetoḥ “na” “pratījñāyāḥ prayoga upadarśitaḥ” /
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇakāt pratijñā arthasya dharma dharmi samudāya lakṣaṇasya sādhyasya pratīteḥ hetoḥ na pratījñāyāḥ prayogaḥ upadarśitaḥ
paraḥ sāmarthyam anavavudhyamānaḥ āha apradarśite vacanena prameye sādhye katham

original: na kathañcit “tatpratītiḥ” pratijñārthapratītiḥ “iti” evaṃ “ced” yadi manyase tadā
analyzed: na kathañcid tad pratītiḥ pratijñā artha pratītiḥ iti evam ced yadi manyase tadā
svārtha anumāna kāle svayam param pratipādakam antareṇa pratipattau prameyasya kaḥ upadarśayitā
na eva kaścid

original: svayameva tu sādhyavinābhūtasādhanadharmadarśanāt prameyaṃ pratipadyate tatha parārthānumāne 'pi tata eva tatpratītirastu kiṃ pratijñāvacanena?
analyzed: svayam eva tu sādhya vinābhūta sādhana dharma darśanāt prameyam pratipadyate parārtha anumāne tatas eva tad pratītiḥ astu kim pratijñā vacanena

original: yadi svayaṃpratipattikāle na kaścit prameyasyopadarśayitā kathaṃ tarhi tatpratipattiḥ?
analyzed: yadi svayam pratipatti kāle na kaścid prameyasya upadarśayitā katham tarhi tad pratipattiḥ
iti atas āha pradeśa stham sādhya dharmiṇi sthitam dhūmam sādhana dharmam upalabdhavataḥ

original: pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭavataḥ sataḥ “tasya” dhūmasya “agninā” sādhyadharmeṇa pramāṇataḥ
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa dṛṣṭavataḥ sataḥ tasya dhūmasya agninā sādhya dharmeṇa pramāṇataḥ
pratibandha niścaya balāt prāc pratipannāyāḥ vyāpteḥ avinābhāvasya smaraṇe sati
tad sāmarthyāt eva pakṣa dharma grahaṇa vyāpti grahaṇa sāmarthyāt eva pratijñā prayoga rahitāt
agniḥ atra iti evaṃrūpā pratijñā artha pratītiḥ bhavati

original: syānmatam- tatrāpyasya karṇapiśācikādiḥ prameyaṃ kathayatyevetyata āha- “na ca” naiva “tatra” svārthanumānakāle “kaścit” karṇapiśācikadiradṛśyo
analyzed: syāt matam tatra api asya karṇa piśācika ādiḥ prameyam kathayati eva iti atas āha na ca nā eva tatra svārtha anumāna kāle kaścid
agniḥ atra iti evam asmai pratipatretre
prameyam nivedayati kathayati
yadi bhavān satya vādī na evam vaktum arhati

original: tathā hi- vayamapi pradeśasthadhūmadarśanāt tasyāgninā vyāptismaraṇasāpekṣādagniṃ pratipadyāmahe /
analyzed: tathā hi vayam api pradeśa stha dhūma darśanāt tasya agninā vyāpti smaraṇa sāpekṣāt agnim pratipadyāmahe
na ca asmabhyam kaścid nivedayati
agniḥ atra iti
bhavati ca tad pratipattiḥ
tathā tad anyasya api sā yukta rūpā evā iti

original: yadyapi na kaścit nivedayati tathāpi svayameva prameyaṃ vyavasthāpya tatpratipattaye liṅgamanusariṣyatīti cet,
analyzed: yadi api na kaścid nivedayati tathā api svayam eva prameyam vyavasthāpya tad pratipattaye liṅgam anusariṣyati iti ced

original: āha- “nāpi” na kevalaṃ na kaścit nivedayati “svayamapi prāgeva” liṅgavyāpārāt na pratipadyate “kiñcid” agnyādikam /
analyzed: āha nā api na kevalam na kaścid nivedayati svayam api prāk eva liṅga vyāpārāt na pratipadyate kiñcid agni ādikam
kasmāt hbṭ iti ced
pramāṇam hetum antareṇa vinā
agniḥ atra iti evam pratīteḥ nimitta abhāvāt
trirūpaḥ hi hetuḥ parokṣa artha pratīteḥ nimittam
tad abhāve sā katham bhavet

original: atha liṅgamantareṇāpyevaṃ pratītirbhavatiti brūyāt tadā pratītāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ liṅgasya vaiyarthyam,
analyzed: atha liṅgam antareṇa api evam pratītiḥ bhavati iti brūyāt tadā pratītau iṣyamāṇāyām liṅgasya vaiyarthyam
tasya anumeya pratipatti artha tvāt

original: tena vinā tatpratipattau kathamasya niṣprayojanatā na syāt? /
analyzed: tena vinā tad pratipattau katham asya niṣprayojana tā na syāt

original: atyantamūḍhatāṃ ca parasya darśayannāha- “svayameva” svatantra eva '
analyzed: atyanta mūḍha tām ca parasya darśayan āha svayam eva svatantraḥ eva
agniḥ atra iti vyavasthāpya
katham svatantraḥ vyavasthāpayati
akasmāt pramāṇam antareṇa vyavasthāpanāt tad pratipattaye nirnimitta vyavasthāpita prameya pratipatti artham
paścāt liṅgam tad nimittam anusarati iti kaḥ yam pratipatteḥ kramaḥ paripāṭiḥ
tathā hi prathamam liṅga anusaraṇam
tatas sādhya pratipattiḥ iti vipaścitām kramaḥ
ayam tu apūrvaḥ nu mātā yaḥ tad viparyayam āśrayate iti upahasati

original: yattalloke gīyate- śīro muṇḍayitvā nakṣatraṃ pṛcchatīti tattulyatvādasya kramasya /
analyzed: yat tat loke gīyate śīraḥ muṇḍayitvā nakṣatram pṛcchati iti tat tulya tvāt asya kramasya
tasmāt pakṣa dharma grahaṇa vyāpti smaraṇa sāmarthyāt eva svayam pratipadyate

original: tacca pratipādakaṃ kathitemaveti na kiñcit prameyanirddeśena /
analyzed: tat ca pratipādakam na kiñcid prameya nirddeśena

original: yadi nāma svārthānumānakāle svayameva sādhyaṃ pratipadyate tad yuktameva,
analyzed: yadi nāma sva artha anumāna kāle svayam eva sādhyam pratipadyate tat yuktam eva
liṅgasya api tatra svayam eva pratipatteḥ

original: parārthānumāne tu parato yathā liṅgaṃ pratyeti tathā prameyamapi parata eva pratyetavyam /
analyzed: parārtha anumāne tu paratas yathā liṅgam pratyeti tathā prameyam api paratas eva pratyetavyam

original: ato yukta eva pratijñāprayoga ityata āha- “pareṇāpi” na kevalaṃ svayameva prāg vyavasthāpyamānaṃ
analyzed: atas yuktaḥ eva pratijñā prayogaḥ iti atas āha pareṇa api na kevalam svayam eva prāk vyavasthāpyamānam

original: plavate pareṇāpi vādinā “tat” prameyam “ucyamānaṃ plavat eva” tadvacanasya sandigdhārthabhidhāyakatayā
analyzed: plavate pareṇa api vādinā tat prameyam ucyamānam plavat eva tad vacanasya sandigdha artha abhidhāyaka tayā
sādhya niścaya anaṅga tvāt prameya gāmbhīrya anava āgāhinaḥ paramparayā api a tad sambaddhasya
vivakṣā mātra nibandhana tayā upari eva avasthāpanāt
kasmāt plavate

original: iti cet, “upayogābhāvāt” nāsya sādhyapratītiṃ prati kaścidupayogaḥ,
analyzed: iti ced upayoga abhāvāt na asya sādhya pratītim prati kaścid upayogaḥ
tad pratyāyana samartha asya anabhidhānāt iti yāvat
hbṭ

original: parastūpayogamātraṃ kadācid brūyād ityāśaṅkayāha- “viṣayopadarśanaṃ” hetoryo viṣayaḥ sādhyaṃ tadupadarśanaṃ pratijñāvacanasyopayogaḥ “cet matam”
analyzed: paraḥ tu upayoga mātram kadācid brūyāt iti āśaṅkayā āha viṣaya upadarśanam hetoḥ yaḥ viṣayaḥ sādhyam tad upadarśanam pratijñā vacanasya upayogaḥ ced matam
atra āha tena eva viṣayeṇa
tāvat śabdaḥ krame
viṣayasya upadarśyamānasya arthavat tāyām tad upadarśanam pratijñā vacanasya prayojanam bhavet
viṣayeṇa eva tu darśyamānena kaḥ rthaḥ kim prayojanam
nanu sādhya pratītiḥ sādhyarmya vat prayoga ādi pratītiḥ ca viṣaya upadarśanasya arthaḥ
tatas tud upadarśanam pratijñā vacanasya prayojanam
tathā hi asati sādhya nirdeśe
yat kṛtakam tat anityam
iti ukte
kim ayam sādharmyavān prayogaḥ
uta vaidharmyavān
iti na jñāyeta
ubhayam hi atra āśaṅkyate kṛtaka tvena anitya tve sādhye sādharmyavān
nitya tvena akṛtaka tve vā vaidharmyavān iti
anityaḥ śabdaḥ

original: akṛtako vā iti tu pratijñāvacane satyubhayamasandigdhamavagamyate /
analyzed: akṛtakaḥ vā iti tu pratijñā vacane sati ubhayam asandigdham avagamyate
hetu viruddha anaikāntika pratītiḥ ca na syāt
pratijñā pūrvake tu prayoge
anityaḥ śabdaḥ

kṛtaka tvāt

iti anaikāntika tvam
hetoḥ ca trairūpyam na gamyeta
tasya sādhya apekṣayā vyavasthānāt

original: sati pratijñāvacane avayave samudāyopacārāt sādhyadharmī pakṣa iti tatra vṛttasya kṛtakatvasya pakṣadharmatvaṃ;
analyzed: sati pratijñā vacane avayave samudāya upacārāt sādhya dharmī pakṣaḥ iti tatra vṛttasya kṛtaka tvasya pakṣa dharma tvam

original: sādhyadharmasāmānyena ca samāno 'rthaḥ sapakṣa iti tatra vartamānasya sapakṣe sattvam;
analyzed: sādhya dharma sāmānyena ca samānaḥ rthaḥ sapakṣaḥ iti tatra vartamānasya sapakṣe sattvam
na sapakṣaḥ sapakṣaḥ iti sādhya dharma virahiṇī avṛttasya a sapakṣe pi asattvam pratīyeta

original: ityāśaṅkayāha- “yadi pratīti” sādhyasya niścayalakṣaṇā sādharmyavatprayogādeśca svarūpāvadhāraṇātmikā /
analyzed: iti āśaṅkayā āha yadi prati iti sādhyasya niścaya lakṣaṇā sādharmyavat prayoga ādeḥ ca svarūpa avadhāraṇa ātmikā

original: “anyathā” pratijñāvacanamantareṇa “na syāt tadā” yaduktaṃ sādhyasidhyarthaṃ sādharmyavatprayogādijñānārthaṃ
analyzed: anyathā pratijñā vacanam antareṇa na syāt tadā yat uktam sādhya sidhi artham sādharmyavat prayoga ādi jñāna artham

original: ca viṣayopadarśanam iti tat “sarvaṃ śobheta” yāvatā svarthānumānakāle pratijñāvacanamantareṇāpi
analyzed: ca viṣaya upadarśanam iti tat sarvam śobheta yāvatā su artha anumāna kāle pratijñā vacanam antareṇa api

original: pakṣadharmagrahaṇa sambandhasmaraṇataḥ sādhyasiddhilakṣaṇā bhavatyeva pratītiḥ ityākhyātameva /
analyzed: pakṣa dharma grahaṇa sambandha smaraṇataḥ sādhya siddhi lakṣaṇā bhavati eva pratītiḥ iti ākhyātam eva
tadvat para arthe pi anumāne bhaviṣyati

original: (Hbṭ 67) yata evaṃ “tasmāt” “eṣa” pratijñāprayogavādī yadā svayaṃ sādhyaṃ pratyeti
analyzed: yatas evam tasmāt eṣa pratijñā prayoga vādī yadā svayam sādhyam pratyeti

original: tadā svayaṃ sādhyasya “pratītau” viṣaya upasthāpyate yena pratijñāvacanadvāreṇa puṃsā
analyzed: tadā svayam sādhyasya pratītau viṣayaḥ upasthāpyate yena pratijñā vacana dvāreṇa puṃsā
kenacid tena vinā api pratiyan sādhyam niścinvan liṅga sāmarthya deva

original: yadāsmābhiḥ pratipādyate tadā “asmān kāryiṇo dṛṣṭvā vyaktaṃ” pratijñāprayogalakṣaṇaṃ “mūlyaṃ mṛgayate” /
analyzed: yadā asmābhiḥ pratipādyate tadā asmān kāryiṇaḥ dṛṣṭvā vyaktam pratijñā prayoga lakṣaṇam mūlyam mṛgayate
kaḥ iva parvabrāhmaṇaḥ iva

original: yathā dakṣiṇāmantareṇāpyanyadā aurdhvarathiko brāhmaṇo bhuñjāno 'nyadā śrāddhādiparvaṇyarthinaṃ
analyzed: yathā dakṣiṇām antareṇa api anyadā aurdhvarathikaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ bhuñjānaḥ nyadā śrāddha ādi parvaṇi arthinam

original: śraddhāluṃ bravīti- yadi me ghṛtapūraṃ ghṛtapūraṃ prati rūpakaṃ dadāsi tato 'haṃ bhuñje nānyatheti /
analyzed: śraddhālum bravīti yadi me ghṛta pūram ghṛta pūram prati rūpakam dadāsi tatas ham bhuñje na anyathā iti
tena tulyaḥ bhavān api iti

original: kiñca, yadapi bravīṣi- parārthānumānakāle yathā liṅgaṃ pareṇānabhidhīyamānaṃ na pratyeti pratipādyastathā sādhyamapīti /
analyzed: kiñca yat api bravīṣi parārtha anumāna kāle yathā liṅgam pareṇa anabhidhīyamānam na pratyeti pratipādyaḥ tathā sādhyam api iti

original: tadaitad yujyate yadyasau vādivacanamātreṇa liṅgamapi niścitya tadanusāreṇa sādhyamavagacchet,
analyzed: tadā etat yujyate yadi asau vādi vacana mātreṇa liṅgam api niścitya tad anusāreṇa sādhyam avagacchet

original: parapratītyarthinaśca tadā vayamapi pratijñāṃ kinna prayuñjmahe liṅgavacanarahitām? /
analyzed: para pratīti arthinaḥ ca tadā vayam api pratijñām kin na prayuñjmahe liṅga vacana rahitām
asmad vacanasya eva tam prati pramāṇa tayā
tatas eva anumeya pratīteḥ
tad vacanasya caritārtha tvāt
na ca etat asti

original: yataḥ “asmadvacanādapi” na kevalaṃ svārthānumānakāle asmadvacanamantareṇa ityapiśabdaḥ /
analyzed: yatas asmad vacanāt api na kevalam svārtha anumāna kāle asmad vacanam antareṇa iti api śabdaḥ

original: kintu yadāpyasmadvacanaṃ pravṛttaṃ tadāpi “naiva” asmadvacanāt “liṅgamapi pratyeti” kuta eva sādhyasiddhye 'nusariṣyati? /
analyzed: kintu yadā api asmad vacanam pravṛttam tadā api nā eva asmad vacanāt liṅgam api pratyeti kutas eva sādhya siddhye nusariṣyati

original: api tu svayamasya yadi talliṅgaṃ kutaścit pramāṇataḥ siddhaṃ bhavati “asmadvacanena tu” kevalaṃ tatra “smṛtisamādhānamātraṃ kriyate” /
analyzed: api tu svayam asya yadi tat liṅgam kutaścid pramāṇataḥ siddham bhavati asmad vacanena tu kevalam tatra smṛti samādhāna mātram kriyate

original: tadā svayaṃ siddhameva liṅgamanusṛtya sādhyaṃ pratyeti /
analyzed: tadā svayam siddham eva liṅgam anusṛtya sādhyam pratyeti
na asmad vacanāt pānīyam api pibati iti
tasmāt kaḥ nayoḥ pratijñā vacana avacana ātmikayoḥ avasthayoḥ viśeṣaḥ
ubhayatra svayam siddha liṅga sāmarthyāt eva sādhya pratīteḥ na kaścid
tatas sva para artha anumānayoḥ svayam siddha liṅga anusaraṇam

original: tataḥ sādhyapratītiṃ ca prati viśeṣābhāvāt pratijñopanyāsaḥ parārthānumāne 'pi vyartha eva /
analyzed: tatas sādhya pratītim ca prati viśeṣa abhāvāt pratijñā upanyāsaḥ parārtha anumāne vyarthaḥ eva

original: liṅgamapi hi tāvadatra nābhidhīyate yadi tat (Hbṭ 68)
analyzed: liṅgam api hi tāvat atra na abhidhīyate yadi tat

original: pūrvaprasiddhaṃ svayamanusmaret kimaṅga punaḥ sandigdhārthābhidhāyakaṃ pratijñāvacanamupādīyate? /
analyzed: pūrva prasiddham svayam anusmaret kim aṅga punar sandigdha artha abhidhāyakam pratijñā vacanam upādīyate

original: syānmatam- yadi nāma sādhyasiddhau pratijñāvacanasya nopayogastadartho 'sya prayogo mā bhūta,
analyzed: syāt matam yadi nāma sādhya siddhau pratijñā vacanasya na upayogaḥ sya prayogaḥ mā
sādharmya tvad prayoga ādi jñāna artham tu tat upadānam avasthitam eva

original: tasyānyathā pratītyabhāvāt ityata āha- “dṛṣṭā ca sādharmyavatprayogādeḥ pratijñāvacanamantarenāpi pratītiḥ,
analyzed: tasya anyathā pratīti abhāvāt iti atas āha dṛṣṭā ca sādharmyavat prayoga ādeḥ pratijñā vacanam antarena api pratītiḥ
pratijñā upanyāsaḥ na śobhate
kutas punar sādharmyavat prayoga ādeḥ asati sādhya nirddeśe pratītiḥ
iti āha pakṣa dharma sambandha vacana mātrāt iti
evam manyate na eva hi kaścid

tatra yadi kṛtakaḥ ca śabdaḥ
iti brūyāt tadā
rmya vat prayoga pratītiḥ
atha nityaḥ ca

original: ityabhidadhyāt tadā vaidharmyavata iti sambandhavacanapūrvakāt pakṣadharmavacanāt prayogadvayāvagatiḥ /
analyzed: iti abhidadhyāt tadā vaidharmyavataḥ iti sambandha vacana pūrvakāt pakṣa dharma vacanāt prayoga dvaya avagatiḥ
hetu viruddha anaikāntikāḥ api pakṣa dharma vacana mātreṇa na pratīyante

original: yadā tu sambandhavacanamapi kriyate tadā kathamapratītiḥ? /
analyzed: yadā tu sambandha vacanam api kriyate tadā katham apratītiḥ
tathā hi yat kṛtakam tat anityam
iti pakṣa dharma vacane sati ukte hetuḥ avagamyate
vidhiyamānena anūdyamānasya vyāpteḥ

iti abhidhāne viruddhaḥ
viparyaya vyāpteḥ
yat kṛtakam tat prayatna ānantarīyakam
iti pradarśane vyabhicārāt anaikāntika adhyavasāyaḥ

yatas vyāpti pradarśana kāle vyāpakaḥ dharmaḥ sādhya tayā avagamyate

original: yatra ca vyāpyo dharmo dharmiṇyupasaṃhriyate sa vyāpakādharmaviśiṣṭatayāvagamyamānaḥ sādhyasamudāyaikadeśatayā pakṣa ityupasaṃhṛtasya vyāpyadharmasya
analyzed: yatra ca vyāpyaḥ dharmaḥ dharmiṇi upasaṃhriyate sa vyāpaka adharma viśiṣṭa tayā avagamyamānaḥ sādhya samudāya eka deśa tayā pakṣaḥ iti upasaṃhṛtasya vyāpya dharmasya

original: sā ca vyāptiryatra dharmiṇyupadarśyate sa sādhyadharmasāmānyena samāno 'rthaḥ sapakṣaḥ pratīyata iti sapakṣe (Hbṭ 69)
analyzed: sā ca vyāptiḥ yatra dharmiṇī upadarśyate sa sādhya dharma sāmānyena samānaḥ rthaḥ sapakṣaḥ pratīyate iti sapakṣe
sattvam avagamyate
sāmarthyāt ca vyāpaka nivṛttau vyāpya nivṛttiḥ yatra avasīyate saḥ sapakṣaḥ iti a sapakṣe
m api niścīyate iti
yadi pakṣa ādibhiḥ api jñātaiḥ kiñcid prayojanam
na tu vyavahartaṇām pakṣa ādi saṅketa apekṣā parokṣa artha gatiḥ bhavati

original: tathā hi- yat kvacid dṛṣṭaṃ tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tadvidastasya tad gamakaṃ tatra iti hi loke vastugatirbhavati,
analyzed: tathā hi yat kvacid dṛṣṭam tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tad vidaḥ tasya tat gamakam tatra iti hi loke vastu gatiḥ bhavati
na pakṣa di saṅketa grahaṇa apekṣā

original: tatra yatheṣṭaṃ śāstrakārā gamakarūpapratipattaye svasaṅketenānyathā vā lakṣaṇaṃ praṇayantu /
analyzed: tatra yathā iṣṭam śāstra kārāḥ gamaka rūpa pratipattaye sva saṅketena anyathā vā lakṣaṇam praṇayantu
na tu vyavahāra kāle tad anusaraṇam kvacid upayujyate

original: tatsaṅketapratipāditameva tu yathoktaṃ gamakaṃ rūpamupayogi vyavahartṝṇām /
analyzed: tad saṅketa pratipāditam eva tu yathā uktam gamakam rūpam upayogi vyavahartṝṇām

original: taccet pratipannaṃ tāvataiva sādhyasiddhiḥ sañjātā iti pakṣasapakṣādisaṅketāparijñāne 'pi na kiñcit plūyate /
analyzed: tat ced pratipannam tāvatā eva sādhya siddhiḥ sañjātā iti pakṣa sapakṣa ādi saṅketa aparijñāne na kiñcid plūyate
atas eva ācārya pādaiḥ
tad vidaḥ

original: eva yathoktena prakāreṇa pratīterayuktamiti “kastasya” pratijñāvacanasya “upayogaḥ” naivaṃ kaścit /

original: svayaṃ cāyaṃ vādī yena krameṇānumeyaṃ pratipannavāṃstamullaṅghya parapratipattaye kramāntaramāśrayan pravañcakatayā dhūrta eva pratīyate,

ca para hita nirataiḥ sādhanam ucyate

original: nyāye sati svayamayaṃ vādī “prameyasyopadarśanena” upadarśakena vacanena “vināpi”
analyzed: nyāye sati svayam ayam vādī prameyasya upadarśanena upadarśakena vacanena vinā api
sva artha anumāna kāle pratipadya prameyam param saṃśayita ādikam pratipādayan sva pratipannam
prameyam avabodhayan apūrvam sva pratipatti kāle pūrvam yaḥ prameya pratipattau kramaḥ
upāyaḥ nu bhūtaḥ tasmāt anyam āśrayate iti kim atra krama antara āśrayaṇe kāraṇam

original: yata evaṃ “tasmānna prameyasya” sādhyasya “vacanena” pratijñākhyena “kiñcit prayojanam” /

anyathā api vinā api tena pratipatteḥ sādhya pratīteḥ utpatteḥ iti upasaṃhāraḥ
upanaya nigamana ādeḥ api sādhana vākya anaṅga tvam
evam pratijñām sādhana vākyāt apanīya aparam api upanaya nigamana ādikam para parikalpitam sādhana vākyāt apanetum uktam eva nyāyam atidiśan āha etena

original: etenetyetadeva darśayati- “etāvataiva” pakṣadharmasambandhavacanamātreṇaiva upanayādirahitena “sādhyapratīteḥ bhāvāt” utpatteriti /

original: ityetadāśaṅkayāha- “ḍiṇḍikarāgaṃ parityajya” ḍiṇḍikāḥ- nagnācāryāḥ te niṣphalamuparyupari nāmalekhane prasaktāḥ tatasteṣāmiva '
