original: yadā tu vidhurapratyayopanipātād visadṛśāparabhāvaprasavaḥ tadāsya tattvādhyavasāyī pratyabhijñāpratyayo na bhūtimavalambate /
analyzed: yadā tu vidhura pratyaya upanipātāt visadṛśa apara bhāva prasavaḥ tadā asya tattva adhyavasāyī pratyabhijñā pratyayaḥ na bhūtim avalambate
na ca tad eka ākāra parāmarśa pratyaya janaka tvāt aparam sādṛśyam
bheda aviśeṣe ca sva hetu bala āyāta prakṛti vaśāt kecid eva eka ākāra parāmarśa pratyaya lakṣaṇām artha jñāna ādi lakṣaṇām

original: vārthakriyāṃ kurvanti nāpara iti vipañcitaṃ pramāṇavārtika eva śāstrakṛteti neha prapañcyate /
analyzed: vā arthakriyām kurvanti na apare iti vipañcitam pramāṇavārtikaḥ eva śāstra kṛtā iti na iha prapañcyate

original: [17. anumānenāpi pratyabhijñāyā bādhāt na tataḥ sthirabhāvasiddhiḥ /]
analyzed: anumānena api pratyabhijñāyāḥ bādhāt na tatas sthira bhāva siddhiḥ

original: avaśyaṃ ca bījāderjanakājanakāvasthayorvastubhedo yathokto 'vagantavya iti darśayitumanamānamabhedasya
analyzed: avaśyam ca bīja ādeḥ janaka ajanaka avasthayoḥ vastu bhedaḥ yathā uktaḥ vagantavyaḥ iti darśayitum anamānam abhedasya

original: bādhakamāha- “bhāvānāṃ” bījādīnāṃ svakāryajanako yaḥ “svabhāvaḥ” tasya teṣu satsu
analyzed: bādhakam āha bhāvānām bīja ādīnām sva kārya janakaḥ yaḥ svabhāvaḥ tasya teṣu satsu
anyathātva abhāvāt kadācid ajanaka tva asambhavāt tad svabhāvasya aṅkura ādi janaka svabhāvasya
paścāt iva salila ādi kāraṇa sannidhāne iva prāk api kuśūla ādi avasthiti kāle sva kārya janana prasaṅgāt

original: tathā hi- salilādisannidhāne 'pi bījādiḥ svarūpeṇaiva kāryaṃ karoti,
analyzed: tathā hi salila ādi sannidhāne bīja ādiḥ sva rūpeṇa eva kāryam karoti
na para rūpeṇa
yaḥ ca asya tad ākārya janakaḥ svabhāvaḥ
sa ced prāk api asti

original: 'sa evāyam'; iti pratyabhijñāyāṃ puro 'vasthāyino janakasvabhāvasya prācyarūpābhedādhyavasāyāt,
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam iti pratyabhijñāyām puras janaka svabhāvasya prācya rūpa abheda adhyavasāyāt

original: tataḥ kimiti prāgapi tatkāryaṃ na kuryāditi? /
analyzed: tatas kim iti prāk api tat kāryam na kuryāt iti

original: prayogaḥ- yad yadā yajjananasvabhāvaṃ tat tadā tajjanayatyeva /
analyzed: prayogaḥ yat yadā yad janana svabhāvam tat tadā tat janayati eva
ajanakasya janaka tva svabhāva virodhāt
anyasya api vā tad svabhāva tā āpatteḥ
yathā tat eva bīja ādikam salila ādi sannidhi kāle
kuśūla ādi avasthāsu api ca idam bīja ādikam sva kārya janana svabhāvam eva hbṭ
pratyabhijñayā vyavasthāpyate iti svabhāva hetu prasaṅgaḥ
na ca janayati
tasmāt na tat janana svabhāvam iti

original: viparyayaprayogaḥ- yad yadā yajjananasvabhāvaṃ nirvartyaṃ kāryaṃ na janayati na tat tadā tajjananasvabhāvam,
analyzed: viparyaya prayogaḥ yat yadā yad janana svabhāvam nirvartyam kāryam na janayati na tat tadā tad janana svabhāvam
tat yathā śāli aṅkura janana svabhāva nirvartyam kāryam ajanayat kodrava bījam

original: na janayati ca salilādikāraṇasannidheḥ prāk tatkāryajananasvabhāvanirvartyaṃ svakāryaṃ bījādikamiti vyāpakānupalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: na janayati ca salila ādi kāraṇa sannidheḥ prāk tad kārya janana svabhāva nirvartyam sva kāryam bīja ādikam iti vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ

original: tato 'numānato 'pi bādhāmanubhavat pratyabhijñānaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt? /
analyzed: tatas bādhām anubhavat pratyabhijñānam katham pramāṇam syāt
nanu ca anena bādhyamānasya anumānasya aprāmāṇyāt katham bādhaka tvam
aniścita pramāṇa bhāvena kutas bādhā
na api itaretara āśraya tvam
nahi pratyabhijñānasya aprāmāṇyāt etat anumānam pramāṇam
kintu sva sādhya pratibandhāt
sa ca viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa balāt niścitaḥ iti

original: na pratyakṣādanyad gariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇamiti cet / na /
analyzed: na pratyakṣāt anyat gariṣṭham pramāṇam iti ced na
pratyabhijñāyāḥ pratyakṣa tva asiddheḥ

original: na hīyamanumānena pratyakṣātmikā satī bādhyata iti brūmahe /
analyzed: na hi iyam anumānena pratyakṣa ātmikā satī bādhyate iti brūmahe
kim kṛtam ca pratyakṣasya garīyaḥ tvam
tat vayarthasya asambhave bhāvāt pramāṇam ucyate tat ca anumānasya api artha pratibaddha liṅga janya tayā samānam iti na asya kaścid viśeṣaḥ

original: yadi cānumānavirodhamaśnuvānāpi pratyabhijñā pramāṇaṃ tadākārasya sāmyāt tadekatāṃ pratiyatī nīletarakusumādeḥ [pratītiḥ] kiṃ na pramāṇam?
analyzed: yadi ca anumāna virodham aśnuvānā api pratyabhijñā pramāṇam tad ākārasya sāmyāt tad ekatām pratiyatī nīla itara kusuma ādeḥ pratītiḥ kim na pramāṇam
nahi kusuma phala ādi kārya darśana unnīyamānaḥ bhedaḥ pratyakṣataḥ tathābhāvam anubhavati

original: vistarataśca pratyabhijñāprāmāṇyanirāsaḥ kṣaṇabhaṅgasiddhāveva vihita ityāstāṃ tāvadiha /
analyzed: vistarataḥ ca pratyabhijñā prāmāṇya nirāsaḥ kṣaṇa bhaṅga siddhau eva vihitaḥ iti āstām tāvat iha

original: “yataḥ evam” uktena prakāreṇa janakājanakāvasthayoḥ bījādervastubhedaḥ “tasmād yo 'ntyo 'vasthāviśeṣo” yadanantaraṃ aṅkurādikāryaprasavaḥ (Hbṭ
analyzed: yatas evam uktena prakāreṇa janaka ajanaka avasthayoḥ bīja ādeḥ vastu bhedaḥ tasmāt yaḥ ntyaḥ vasthā viśeṣaḥ yat anantaram aṅkura ādi kārya prasavaḥ
saḥ eva aṅkura janana svabhāvaḥ
kārya darśana unnīyamāna rūpa tvāt tad janana svabhāva tāyāḥ
yadi tarhi saḥ eva aṅkura janana svabhāvaḥ
pūrva bhāvinām avasthā bhedānām a tad janana svabhāva tvāt katham teṣu tad kāraṇa vyapadeśaḥ
aṅkura arthibhiḥ vā tad upādānam
iti atas āha pūrva bhāvinaḥ tu
kuśūla ādi avasthiti kāla bhāvinaḥ tu avasthā viśeṣāḥ aṅku kāraṇasya antyasya avasthā viśeṣasya kāraṇāni pratyaya antara upadhīyamāna viśeṣebhyaḥ paramparayā
tebhyaḥ tad utpatteḥ
atas teṣu upacārataḥ kāraṇa vyapadeśaḥ ṅkura arthibhiḥ ca upādānam
yatas tad svabhāvasya bīja ādeḥ jananam na hetu antara apekṣam
yat jānakam apekṣate na tasya tad jana svabhāva tvam iti
tasmāt na anekāntaḥ bīja ādi vat
tad svabhāva tvāt
iti asya hetoḥ iti upasaṃhāraḥ

original: tadevaṃ yadā tāvat pratyabhijñānaṃ pratyakṣapramāṇatayā sthairyasiddhaye parairūcyate bījādivadanekāntaṃ pratipādayitum,
analyzed: tat evam yadā tāvat pratyabhijñānam pratyakṣa pramāṇa tayā sthairya siddhaye paraiḥ ūcyate bīja ādi vat anekāntam pratipādayitum

original: tadā tasyoktena prakāreṇa pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ bādhyamānatvāt tadātmatā nāstīti kutastata ekatā bhāvānām?
analyzed: tadā tasya uktena prakāreṇa pratyakṣa anumānābhyām bādhyamāna tvāt tad ātmatā nā asti iti kutas tatas ekatā bhāvānām
yatas na ikāntaḥ syāt iti pratipāditam

original: yadā tu pratyabhijñāyamānatvāt pūrvāparakālayorekasvabhāvā bījādaya iti hetutayocyate paraiḥ,
analyzed: yadā tu pratyabhijñāyamāna tvāt pūrva apara kālayoḥ eka svabhāvāḥ bīja ādayaḥ iti hetutayā ucyate paraiḥ
tadā ayam asiddhaḥ hetuḥ

original: na ca sa pakṣe kvacid vartata ityāha- “kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu” asmābhiriṣyamāṇeṣu “aikyābhāvā“diti sambandhaḥ /
analyzed: na ca sa pakṣe kvacid vartate iti āha kṣaṇikeṣu bhāveṣu asmābhiḥ iṣyamāṇeṣu aikya abhāvāt iti sambandhaḥ
tad svabhāva tvāt iti atra punar api anekānta doṣa udvāraḥ

original: atha yasyāpi kṣaṇikā bhāvāstasyāpi bījādīnāṃ pratikṣaṇamaikyābhāve 'pi viśeṣānupalakṣaṇādantyakṣaṇavat
analyzed: atha yasya api kṣaṇikāḥ bhāvāḥ tasya api bīja ādīnām pratikṣaṇam aikya abhāve viśeṣa anupalakṣaṇāt antya kṣaṇa vat

original: sarveṣāṃ janakasvabhāvānāmapi tadbhāvaṃ prati salilādyapekṣatvāt tadavasthamanaikāntikatvam
analyzed: sarveṣām janaka svabhāvānām api tad bhāvam prati salila ādi apekṣa tvāt tad avastham anaikāntika tvam
iti āśaṅkayā āha apara apara utpatteḥ kṣaṇikaiḥ api nā anekāntaḥ
aparebhyaḥ parebhyaḥ ca pratyayebhyaḥ pratikṣaṇam utpatteḥ kṣaṇikānām bhinna śakti tvāt antya kṣaṇa vat janaka svabhāva tā virahāt kutas taiḥ api anekāntaḥ
syāt

original: na hi kāraṇabhedopadhīyamānajanmanāṃ viśeṣānupalakṣaṇe 'pyabhinnasvabhāvatā yuktā, hetu (Hbṭ 89)
analyzed: na hi kāraṇa bheda upadhīyamāna janmanām viśeṣa anupalakṣaṇe pi abhinna svabhāva tā yuktā
bheda an anuvidhāne hetuka tā prasaṅgāt
tathā ca vakṣyati

original: aparāparapratyayayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ santanvantaḥ saṃskārā yadyapi kutaścit sāmyāt samānarūpāḥ pratīyante tathāpi bhinna eva
analyzed: apara apara pratyaya yogena pratikṣaṇam bhinna śaktayaḥ santanvantaḥ saṃskārāḥ yadi api kutaścid sāmyāt samāna rūpāḥ pratīyante tathā api bhinnaḥ eva
tena kiñcid eva kasyacid kāraṇam iti
yat uktam tat svabhāvasya jananāt

original: ityasyānekāntamudbhāvayannāha paraḥ- “te” bījakṣityādayaḥ “antyāḥ” ante bhavāḥ pratyekamaṅkurajanane '
analyzed: iti asya anekāntam udbhāvayan āha paraḥ te bīja kṣiti ādayaḥ antyāḥ ante bhavāḥ pratyekam aṅkura janane
samarthāḥ

original: khaṇḍaśaḥ kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryotpādābhāvād bhavadbhiriṣyanta iti “kinna janayanti pratyekam”? /
analyzed: khaṇḍaśas kāraṇebhyaḥ kārya utpāda abhāvāt bhavadbhiḥ iṣyante iti kim na janayanti pratyekam
tatas ca eṣām ekaḥ eva kaścid aṅkuram janayati

original: tadanye tu tatsvabhāvā api na janayantīti '
analyzed: tad anye tu tad svabhāvāḥ api na janayanti iti
tad svabhāvasya jananāt
iti anekāntaḥ

original: tadvat kuśūlādyavasthā api bījādayo 'ṅkurādijananasvabhāvā api na jānayiṣyantīti tairanekāntaḥ tadavastha eveti manyate paraḥ /
analyzed: tadvat kuśūla ādi avasthāḥ api bīja ādayaḥ ṅkura ādi janana svabhāvāḥ api na jānayiṣyanti iti taiḥ anekāntaḥ tad avasthaḥ eva iti manyate paraḥ
atra āha iti yat evam tvam manyase
pareṇa sāmānyena abhidhānāt sāmānyena eva uttaram āha janayanti eva na atra sva kārya janane anyathābhāvaḥ ajanaka tvam āśaṅkanīyam
kutas svabhāvasya a vaiparītyāt

original: yai hi na janayeyurjananasvabhāvā eva na syuḥ /
analyzed: yaiḥ hi na janayeyuḥ janana svabhāvāḥ eva na syuḥ
tad svabhāvāḥ ca iṣyante iti avaśyam janayanti
tathā ca kutas na ekāntaḥ iti bhāvaḥ
eka ekā eva samarthena kārya janane pareṣām anupayogam āśaṅkaya tad uddhāraḥ
pratyekam antyānām janaka tve kāryasya ekena jananāt apareṣām upayogasya nirviṣaya tvāt ajananam eva iti

original: manyamāna āha paraḥ- “teṣu” antyeṣu “sahakāriṣu” saha- yugapat karaṇaśīleṣu “samarthasvabhāveṣu”
analyzed: manyamānaḥ āha paraḥ teṣu antyeṣu sahakāriṣu saha yugapad karaṇa śīleṣu samartha svabhāveṣu
tad kārya kriyā yogyeṣu abhyupagamyamāneṣu satsu kāryasya ekena eva janita tvāt kaḥ parasya upayogaḥ
na eva kaścid
tat kim ucyate
janayanti eva iti
etat pariharati
na vai
na eva bhāvānām bīja ādīnām kācid prekṣā pūrva kāri tā buddhi pūrva kāri tā
yatas prekṣā pūrva kāri tvāt
ayam asmāsu anyatamaḥ ekaḥ pi samarthaḥ kārya janane
kim atra asmābhiḥ kartavyam
iti ālocya apare nivarteran audāsīnyam
bhajamānāḥ tad kārya janane na vyāpriyeran

original: yasmāt “te” bījādayo bhāvāḥ “nirabhiprāyavyāpārāḥ” paryālocanāśūnyavyāpārā ekata utpadyamāne “kārye sarva eva vyāpriyante” /
analyzed: yasmāt te bīja ādayaḥ bhāvāḥ nirabhiprāya vyāpārāḥ paryālocanā śūnya vyāpārāḥ ekatas utpadyamāne kārye sarve eva vyāpriyante

original: bhavanadharmaṇi ca kārye teṣāṃ prāgbhāva eva vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: bhavana dharmaṇi ca kārye teṣām prāc bhāvaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ
tad anyasya ayogāt

original: yadi hi vyāpṛtādanya eva vyāpāraḥ tadā tata eva kāryotpādād vyāpāravataḥ kārakatvameva hīyate /
analyzed: yadi hi vyāpṛtāt anyaḥ eva vyāpāraḥ tadā tatas eva kārya utpādāt vyāpāravataḥ kāraka tvam eva hīyate

original: tasyāsau vyāpāraḥ tatastasya kārakatvam iti cet /
analyzed: tasya asau vyāpāraḥ tatas tasya kāraka tvam iti ced

original: nanvevaṃ vyāpāropayogasya kāryānupayogini tatropacārāt pāramārthikamasya kārakatvaṃ hīyeta /
analyzed: nanu evam vyāpāra upayogasya kārya anupayogini tatra upacārāt pāramārthikam asya kāraka tvam hīyeta
kaḥ ca asya vyāpāreṇa sambandhaḥ
samavāyaḥ ced na
tasya prāk eva nirasta tvāt
samavāyāt ca vyāpāravat tve anyasya api tad kārya anupayoginaḥ tad bhāva prasaṅgaḥ
samavāyasya iha iti buddhi hetoḥ eka tvena sarvatra samāna tvāt

original: abhimatenaiva vyāpṛtena tabdyāpārotpādanāt nātiprasaṅgaḥ iti cet /
analyzed: abhimatena eva vyāpṛtena tad dyāpāra utpādanāt na atiprasaṅgaḥ iti ced
nanu tena tat utpādanam tatra
sa ca sarvatra samānaḥ

original: yena ca pariśrameṇa vyāpāraṃ janayati tena kāryameva kinnotpādayati?
analyzed: yena ca pariśrameṇa vyāpāram janayati tena kāryam eva kin na utpādayati
yena vyavadhānam āśrīyate

original: yathā ca svasannidhimātrenaivāyaṃ vyāpāraṃ janayati na vyāpārāntareṇa,
analyzed: yathā ca sva sannidhi mātrena eva ayam vyāpāram janayati na vyāpāra antareṇa
anavasthā prasaṅgāt
tathā tatas eva kāryam api iti ukta prāyam

original: tasmād bhāvini kārye prāgbhāva eva kāraṇasya vyāpāraḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt bhāvini kārye prāgbhāvaḥ eva kāraṇasya vyāpāraḥ

original: sa ca sarveṣāmastīti sarva eva kāryotpattau vyāpriyanta iti vyapadiśyante /
analyzed: sa ca sarveṣām asti iti sarve eva kārya utpattau vyāpriyante iti vyapadiśyante

original: “tadapi kāryaṃ sarvebhya eva jāyate” sarveṣāṃ bhāva eva tadbhāvāt /
analyzed: tat api kāryam sarvebhyaḥ eva jāyate sarveṣām bhāvaḥ eva tad bhāvāt

original: na hi kāryasya kāraṇābhimatabhāva eva bhāvamantareṇāparaṃ janma /
analyzed: na hi kāryasya kāraṇa abhimata bhāvaḥ eva bhāvam antareṇa aparam janma

original: tathābhāve hi tatraiva kāraṇavyāpārāt kāryakriyaivaiṣāṃ na sambhavet /
analyzed: tathā abhāve hi tatra eva kāraṇa vyāpārāt kārya kriyā eva eṣām na sambhavet

original: tataśca satsvapi kāraṇeṣu kathamasya bhāva upalabdhirvā syāt? /
analyzed: tatas ca satsu api kāraṇeṣu katham asya bhāvaḥ upalabdhiḥ vā syāt

original: tatsambandhino janmanaḥ karaṇāt iti cet / na /
analyzed: tad sambandhinaḥ janmanaḥ karaṇāt iti ced na
asatā hbṭ tena sambandha ayogāt
svatas eva sattve vā janma artha anupapatteḥ
janma kāle ca upalabhyasya ātmanaḥ prāk api bhāvāt tathā upalabdhi prasaṅgaḥ
rūpa antareṇa bhāve na tasya bhāvaḥ syāt
rūpa bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt bhāva bhedasya
tasmāt upalabhya ātmanaḥ janmanaḥ prāk anupalambhāt asattvam
janma sambandhi tā kutas

original: tasmāt kāryamevābhūtvā hetubhāve bhavatīti bhāva evāsya tato janmeti sarvebhyastat jāyate /
analyzed: tasmāt kāryam eva a bhūtvā hetu bhāve bhavati iti bhāvaḥ eva asya tatas janma iti sarvebhyaḥ tat jāyate

original: nanvekasyāpi tajjanane sāmarthyāt apareṣāṃ tatra sannidhilakṣaṇo vyāpāro vyartha
analyzed: nanu ekasya api tad janane sāmarthyāt apareṣām tatra sannidhi lakṣaṇaḥ vyāpāraḥ vyartha

original: eveti na tatrapareṣāṃ bhāvaḥ saṅgacchata iti cedāha- “svahetoḥ” kṣitibījasalilādisāmagrīlakṣaṇasya
analyzed: eva iti na tatra pareṣām bhāvaḥ saṅgacchate iti ced āha sva hetoḥ kṣiti bīja salila ādi sāmagrī lakṣaṇasya
pariṇāmaḥ kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣavataḥ pratikṣaṇam upadhīyamāna atiśayasya kṣaṇa antarasya prasavaḥ

original: tataḥ “upanidhiḥ” kāryadeśe sannidhānaṃ “dharmo” yeṣāṃ te “tathābhavantaḥ” kāryadeśe sannidhīyamānāḥ “nopālambhamarhanti“- '
analyzed: tatas upanidhiḥ kārya deśe sannidhānam dharmaḥ yeṣām te tathābhavantaḥ kārya deśe sannidhīyamānāḥ na upālambham arhanti

original: evaṃ kulālādikamapi tadanyopādānasahitaṃ sahakāribhāvena yatkāryaṃ karoti tadvilakṣaṇameva mṛtpiṇḍasahitaṃ tatkāraṇāhitaviśeṣaṃ ghaṭātmakaṃ  #

original: tatra mṛtpiṇḍād bhinnaḥ svabhāvo ghaṭasya ye tadanyopadānakāraṇatayā mṛtsvabhāvā na bhavanti vṛkṣādayastebhyo bhavati /
analyzed: tatra mṛd piṇḍāt bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ ghaṭasya ye tad anya upadāna kāraṇatayā mṛd svabhāvāḥ na bhavanti vṛkṣa ādayaḥ tebhyaḥ bhavati
kulālāt mṛd piṇḍa upādāna āhita atiśayāt sahākāri bhāvena upayujyamānāt tasya eva ghaṭasya
mṛd piṇḍa upādāna tayā mṛd ātmanaḥ sataḥ saṃsthāna viśeṣaḥ pṛthu budhna udara ādi ākāraḥ tad ātma tayā

original: tadanyebhyo yeṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍastadanyanimittasahita upādānamiṣṭakādīnāṃ tebhyo bhinnaḥ svabhāvo bhavati /
analyzed: tad anyebhyaḥ yeṣām mṛd piṇḍaḥ tad anya nimitta sahitaḥ upādānam iṣṭakā ādīnām tebhyaḥ bhinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhavati
sūtrāt mṛd piṇḍa kulāla kāraṇa āhita viśeṣāt tasya eva ghaṭasya mṛd saṃsthāna viśeṣa ātmanaḥ
mṛd piṇḍa kulālayoḥ tad janana svabhāva tvāt ghaṭasya tad rūpa yogāt tayoḥ ca sūtra kāraṇa upahita viśeṣayoḥ tad nirapekṣa avasthātaḥ
bhinna ātmaka tayā cakra ādeḥ vibhaktaḥ vichinnaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhavati tasmāt anukrānta kāraṇa traya janyaḥ

original: ghaṭaḥ tadanyasmādekaikakāryād dvidvikāryācca bhinnasvabhāva eva jāyata iti sāmagrībhedād
analyzed: ghaṭaḥ tad anyasmāt ekaika kāryāt dvi dvi kāryāt ca bhinna svabhāvaḥ eva jāyate iti sāmagrī bhedāt

original: bhinnānyeva kāryāṇi parasparamasaṅkīrṇasvabhāvāni bhavantīti tadupayogakāryaviśeṣāsaṅkaraḥ siddhaḥ /
analyzed: bhinnāni eva kāryāṇi parasparam asaṅkīrṇa svabhāvāni bhavanti iti tad upayoga kārya viśeṣa asaṅkaraḥ siddhaḥ
tasya ca ekaika tad vasthā bhāvi kāraṇa bheda anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyi tayā khaṇḍaśas nutpādāt ca
te ekaika janya tve pi vastutas tad ekaika sajātīya kāraṇa antara sannidhau adṛṣṭasya

iti tattva cintakaiḥ vivecyate

na anumānataḥ

original: ekasyānekakriyānabhyupagame ca yo 'yaṃ rūparasagandhasparśaviśeṣāṇāṃ kvacit sahabhāvaniyamaḥ pramāṇaparidṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt /
analyzed: ekasya aneka kriyā anabhyupagame ca yaḥ yam rūpa rasa gandha sparśa viśeṣāṇām kvacid sahabhāva niyamaḥ pramāṇa paridṛṣṭaḥ sa na syāt
bhinna nimittānām sahabhāva niyama ayogāt
tad nimittānām api tad eka kāraṇa anāyatta janmanām niyata sāhitya asambhavāt
tad eka dharmi svabhāva tayā ekatra sahabhāva niyamaḥ iti ced na
ekasya aneka svabhāva tāyāḥ eva cintya tvāt

original: anekenaikasvabhāvatāṃ cānubhavataḥ tadvadanekatāyā durnivāratvāt anyathā dharmadharmiṇāṃ kathaṃ (Hbṭ 102)
analyzed: anekena eka svabhāva tām ca anubhavataḥ tadvat anekatāyāḥ durnivāra tvāt anyathā dharma dharmiṇām katham
na aikāntikaḥ bhedaḥ

original: tathā hi- yamātmānaṃ purodhāyāyaṃ dharmī paryāyāścaite iti vyavasthāpyate,
analyzed: tathā hi yam ātmānam purodhāya ayam dharmī paryāyāḥ ca ete iti vyavasthāpyate
yadi tasya bhedaḥ tadā bhedaḥ eva iti
anekasya api eka kārya tā na syāt

original: na hi parasparopādānakṛtopakārānapekṣā viṣayendriyamanaskārāḥ sahaikakāryārambhiṇo yuktāḥ /
analyzed: na hi paraspara upādāna kṛta upakāra anapekṣāḥ viṣaya indriya manaskārāḥ saha eka kārya ārambhiṇaḥ yuktāḥ
na ca ekam eva kiñcid kvacid janayati
tatas ca sarvatra kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ eva u tsīdet
anekasya ekasya ca eka aneka kriyā virahāt prakāra antara abhāvāt ca
na api e hetukam eva viśvam
deśa kāla prakṛti niyamāt
tasmāt eka sāmagrī adhīna janmanām eva sahabhāva niyamaḥ bhāvānām eka kārya kriyā niyamaḥ vā

original: tataśca svasantānakṣaṇamitaropādānaṃ ca yugapadupakurvataḥ kathamekasyānekakāryatā na syāt? /
analyzed: tatas ca sva santāna kṣaṇam itara upādānam ca yugapad upakurvataḥ katham ekasya aneka kārya tā na syāt
tatas kātham kārya bhedāt bhedaḥ kalpyeta

original: dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ caikasvabhāvatāmācakṣāṇa ekasyānekakāryatāṃ pratikṣipatīti kathaṃ nonmattaḥ?
analyzed: dravya paryāyāṇām ca eka svabhāva tām ācakṣāṇaḥ ekasya aneka kārya tām pratikṣipati iti katham na unmattaḥ
svabhāvasya eva vastu tvāt
anyathā tasya niḥsvabhāva tā prasaṅgāt

original: ekasvabhāvatve ca dravyaparyāyāṇāṃ tatkāryabheda ekavastunibandhana eveti kāryabhedād bhedamabhidadhānaḥ sphuṭamahrīka evāyamityupekṣāmarhati
analyzed: eka svabhāva tve ca dravya paryāyāṇām tad kārya bhedaḥ eka vastu nibandhanaḥ eva iti kārya bhedāt bhedam abhidadhānaḥ sphuṭam ahrīkaḥ eva ayam iti upekṣām arhati
vaiśeṣika kṛtaḥ u pi ekasya aneka kārya kāri tva ākṣepaḥ na yuktaḥ

original: vaiśeṣiko 'pi dravyasyaikasya dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaścaikasya
analyzed: vaiśeṣikaḥ pi dravyasya ekasya dravya guṇa karmaṇām samavāyi kāraṇa tām bruvāṇaḥ karmaṇaḥ ca ekasya
saṃyoga vibhāga saṃskāra nimitta tām ekasya aneka kārya kriyām pratikṣipan sva kṛtānta kopena eva pratihataḥ
na ca atra śakti bhedaḥ nibandhanam
yatas tad eka upakāra nirapekṣāḥ katham etāḥ śaktayaḥ niyata artha ādhārāḥ
na punar an avayavena vyaktīḥ vā aśnuvīran
tatas yatas eva asya ātma atiśayāt aneka śakti upakāra
tatas eva aneka kārya kriyā api
iti alam ati vistāriṇyā kathaya iti
deśa kāla svabhāva abhedāt abhedaḥ tu yaḥ bhyupagamyate saḥ pi anupapannaḥ eva

original: tathā hi- deśakālayorabhede 'pi rūparasagandhasparśāḥ paryāyarūpeṇa bhidyante tataḥ kathamabhedasiddhiḥ? /
analyzed: tathā hi deśa kālayoḥ abhede pi rūpa rasa gandha sparśāḥ paryāya rūpeṇa bhidyante tatas katham abheda siddhiḥ
yadi dravya paryāyayoḥ dvayoḥ api pratyekam anuvṛtti vyāvṛtti rūpa tā
tadā padārtha dvayam syāt ghaṭa paṭa vat
na tu ekam dvi rūpam iti katham tasmāt abheda siddhiḥ
na ca anuvṛtti vyāvṛttī svabhāvaḥ yuktaḥ
tayoḥ anuvartamāna vyāvartamāna adhīna tvāt
tatas ca anuvartamāna vyāvartamānayoḥ svabhāvaḥ nyaḥ vaktavyaḥ
na tu tayoḥ anuvṛtti vyāvṛttī eva svabhāvaḥ
bhāva tvena bhavitṛ adhīna tvāt
nahi smṛtiḥ smartuḥ svabhāvaḥ bhavati

original: anuvṛttivyāvṛttyośca svabhāvatve lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedo vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: anuvṛtti vyāvṛttyoḥ ca svabhāva tve lakṣaṇāt svabhāvasya bhedaḥ vaktavyaḥ
mṛd ādi rūpa tā svabhāvaḥ iti ced
atra api abhedaḥ iti yadi sādṛśyam ucyate
tat bhedaḥ eva sambhavati
sādṛśyasya sadṛśa adhikaraṇa tvāt

original: tataśca padārthadvayameva syāt na tvekaṃ dvirūpamiti /
analyzed: tatas ca padārtha dvayam eva syāt na tu ekam dvi rūpam iti
atha aikyam dvitīya rūpa rahita tā bhedaḥ ṅgīkriyate katham tarhi dvi rūpa tā
rūpa śabdena hi atra svabhāvaḥ abhidhīyate
tasya ca aikye katham dvīrūpa tā
vipratiṣiddham hi etat eka svabhāva tā dvi rūpa tā ca iti
atha punar svabhāvataḥ aikyam na upeyate

original: kathaṃ tarhi sa eka ityucyate anekaḥ san? /
analyzed: katham tarhi saḥ ekaḥ iti ucyate anekaḥ san

eka abhidhāna abhidheya tvāt api na eka tvam

original: yogyatvācca viśvasya kṛtākṛtānāmekābhidhānābhidheyatvasya kvacidasambhavāt śaktibhedācca viṣayabhedaṃ brūvāṇaṃ prati abhihitam /
analyzed: yogya tvāt ca viśvasya kṛta akṛtānām eka abhidhāna abhidheya tvasya kvacid asambhavāt śakti bhedāt ca viṣaya bhedam brūvāṇam prati abhihitam

analyzed: tathā hi śaśāṅka udayam bahavaḥ nirīkṣante tasya katham ekatvam abhyupagatam

tatas mṛd piṇḍa upādāna āhita atiśayena tad kārya kṣaṇa sahakāriṇā kulālena tad upādāna upakṛta ātmanā

original: tatkāryakṣaṇasahakāriṇā mṛtpiṇḍena ca pratyekaṃ sakalameva mṛtsaṃsthānātmakaṃ kāryaṃ
analyzed: tad kārya kṣaṇa sahakāriṇā mṛd piṇḍena ca pratyekam sakalam eva mṛd saṃsthāna ātmakam kāryam
kriyate iti na kāraṇa aneka tve pi aneka tvam asya
atra eva upacaya hetum āha api ca ityādi

original: yat tad ghaṭagataṃ saṃsthānaṃ “yadi tata” mṛdo “bhinnaṃ syāt” tadā kulālaḥ pṛthageva kimiti na karoti? /
analyzed: yat tat ghaṭa gatam saṃsthānam yadi tata mṛdaḥ bhinnam syāt tadā kulālaḥ pṛthak eva kim iti na karoti
nahi bhinnānām āvaśyakam apṛthakkaraṇam

original: kulālaścānvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya saṃsthānasya guṇātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyata iti “sa pṛthagapi” tat “kuryāt” /
analyzed: kulālaḥ ca anvaya vyatirekābhyām tasya saṃsthānasya guṇa ātmanaḥ kāraṇatayā gamyate iti sa pṛthak api tat kuryāt
paraḥ āha gunasya ityādi

original: “dravyāśrayya'guṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣvakāraṇamanapekṣa” iti guṇalakṣaṇāt sarvadā guṇo dravyaparatantraḥ,
analyzed: dravya āśrayya guṇavān saṃyoga vibhāgeṣu akāraṇam anapekṣaḥ iti guṇa lakṣaṇāt sarvadā guṇaḥ dravya paratantraḥ
sa katham kadācid pṛthak kriyeta
vaiśeṣike eva bauddhīyam codyam āśaṅkayā āha tad saṃsthāne ityādi

original: yadi svabhāvenaiva tasya guṇātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya “kriyāvad guṇavad” ityādivacanādādhārasvabhāvaṃ tat mṛddravyaṃ,
analyzed: yadi svabhāvena eva tasya guṇa ātmanaḥ saṃsthānasya kriyāvat guṇavat iti ādi vacanāt ādhāra svabhāvam tat mṛd dravyam

original: saṃsthānaṃ vā tathāvidhaṃ kapālādheyātmakaṃ tadā kimiti kulālavyāpāramapekṣate? /
analyzed: saṃsthānam vā tathāvidham kapāla ādheya ātmakam tadā kim iti kulāla vyāpāram apekṣate

iti codaka abhiprāyaḥ
evam codyam āśaṅkaya vaiśeṣikaḥ parihāram āha na
tatas ityādi

original: yat tat mṛddravyaṃ pṛthubudhnodarādyākāraṃ ca saṃsthānaṃ tayoryaḥ sambandha ādhārādheyalakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yat tat mṛd dravyam pṛthu budhna udara ādi ākāram ca saṃsthānam tayoḥ yaḥ sambandhaḥ ādhāra ādheya lakṣaṇaḥ

original: tatra yā “yogyatā” tāṃ “dvayamapyetat kulālād” yataḥ pratilabhate tasmāt “kulālamapekṣate”
analyzed: tatra yā yogyatā tām dvayam api etat kulālāt yatas pratilabhate tasmāt kulālam apekṣate

original: kulālānapekṣāyāṃ doṣamāha- “anyathā” yadi tayoḥ parasparasambandhayogyatāyāṃ kulālāpekṣā
analyzed: kulāla anapekṣāyām doṣam āha anyathā yadi tayoḥ paraspara sambandha yogya tāyām kulāla apekṣā

original: na syāt tadā svabhāvata eva mṛtpiṇḍasya tathavidhasaṃsthānasambandhayogyatvaṃ bhavet /

original: tasmiṃśca sati vastuna eva tatsaṃsthānasambandhayogyatālakṣaṇā dharmatāstīti kulālasannidheḥ prāgapi saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāditi vaiśeṣikīyaścodyaparihāraḥ
analyzed: tasmin ca sati vastunaḥ eva tad saṃsthāna sambandha yogyatā lakṣaṇā dharmatā asti iti kulāla sannidheḥ prāk api saṃsthāna viśeṣeṇa sambandhaḥ syāt iti vaiśeṣikīyaḥ codya parihāraḥ

original: atha yogyatāyā api yogyapāratantryādapṛthaksiddhiṃ brūyāt tadā tasyā api vastudharmatayaiva

original: mṛtpiṇḍakulālabhyāṃ kapāladravyasya saṃyogaviśeṣasambandhayogyasyārambhāt yadaikasvabhāvatve 'pyekasyānekapratyayopādheyaviśeṣatā tadā siddhaḥ  #

original: yuktyantarāṇāṃ sambhave 'pi tadabhidhānalakṣaṇo nirbbandho na kriyate,

original: tadevaṃ sāmagrībhedāt sāmagryantarajanyebhyo bhedaḥ sahakāriṇāmanekatve 'pi ca kāryasyaikatvamaviruddhamiti pratipādya (Hbṭ 110)

analyzed: yat api bhūtānām upādāya rūpam pratyāśraya tvam ucyate tat api sva deśasya asya janaka tvam eva iti na kiñcid prāc janakam bhūtvā paścāt sthāpaka tām upaiti
yatas na ikāntaḥ syāt iti
atiśaya utpādanam na sahakāri tvam kintu ekārtha kāri tvam

original: punaranyathā tatsvabhāvasya jananādityanekāntodbhāvanaṃ parasyāśaṅkyāha- “apratirodhaśaktikeṣu” avidyamānaḥ pratirodhaḥpratibandho yasyāḥ śakteḥ  #
analyzed: punar anyathā tad svabhāvasya jananāt iti anekānta udbhāvanam parasya āśaṅkya āha a pratirodha śaktikeṣu avidyamānaḥ pratirodhaḥ pratibandhaḥ yasyāḥ śakteḥ
sā yeṣām
a pratirodha śaktika tvam ca anantara kārya tvāt

original: ye hyutpannāḥ kālakṣepeṇa kāryaṃ kurvanti teṣāṃ syādapi śaktipratibandho,
analyzed: ye hi utpannāḥ kāla kṣepeṇa kāryam kurvanti teṣām syāt api śakti pratibandho

original: na tu ya udayānantarameva kāryaṃ kurvanti /
analyzed: na tu ye udaya anantaram eva kāryam kurvanti
anena kṣaṇa kṣayiṇām upaghātaka abhāvam āha
anugrāhaka viraham api āha anādheya viśeṣeṣu
tat ca anādheya viśeṣa tvam kṣaṇikeṣu iti anena āha
nahi kṣanikānām viśeṣaḥ ādhātum śakyate
viśeṣa ādhāyakena tad sahabhāvinā tad anantaram tad utpādanāt
tadā ca tasya nirodhāt

original: teṣvevaṃvidheṣu “pratyayeṣu parasparaṃ kaḥ sahakārārthaḥ” yena sahakāriṇa ucyante? /
analyzed: teṣu evaṃvidheṣu pratyayeṣu parasparam kaḥ sahakāra arthaḥ yena sahakāriṇaḥ ucyante
nanu anādheya viśeṣa tvena eva sahakāri tva abhāvaḥ pratipāditaḥ iti kimartham idam apratirodha śaktikeṣu iti
nahi śakti pratirodhakaḥ sahakāri bhaṇyate
satyam
sarvathā tu tatra akiñcitkaratva jñāpana artham etat uktam
śakti pratibandhaka apanayanena ca upakāri tva kalpanām sahakāriṇām nirasyati
tasmāt atiśaya ādhāyinaḥ sambhavāt kṣaṇikānām sva hetu mātra pratibaddham eva janaka tvam
tat ca evaṃvidham sarvadā asti

original: na ca kevalā janayantīti tatsvabhāvasya jananādityanekānta eveti manyate /
analyzed: na ca kevalāḥ janayanti iti tad svabhāvasya jananāt iti anekāntaḥ eva iti manyate

original: etat pariharati- “na vai” naiva atiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā yatastadabhāvāt sahakāriṇo na syuḥ /
analyzed: etat pariharati na vai nā eva atiśaya utpādanam sahakriyā yatas tad abhāvāt sahakāriṇaḥ na syuḥ

original: kva punaratiśayotpādanaṃ sahakriyā pratyayānāṃ na bhavati? /
analyzed: kva punar atiśaya utpādanam sahakriyā pratyayānām na bhavati
sarvatra
nahi kvacid api sahabhāvinām atiśyā utpādana lakṣaṇā sahakriyā sambhavati
kā tarhi sahakriyā
iti āha eka artha karaṇam eka kārya niṣpādanam yat bahūnām
apiḥ sambhāvanāyām
nyāya balāt evaṃvidhām eva sarvatra sahakriyām sambhāvayāmaḥ na anyam iti
atra udāharaṇam yathā antyasya anantara aṅkura ādi kāryasya kāraṇa kalāpasya pratyaya sāmagryāḥ iti
eka kārya kāri tvam eva mukhyam sahakāri tvam itarat tu gauṇam
syāt etat aupacārikam etat sahakāri tvam

original: atiśayotpādanameva tu mukhyam ityat āha- “tadeva” ekakāryakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ “mukhyaṃ sahakāritvam” nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam,
analyzed: atiśaya utpādanam eva tu mukhyam ityat āha tat eva eka kārya karaṇa lakṣaṇam mukhyam sahakāri tvam na atiśaya utpādana lakṣaṇam
tasya eva gauṇa tvāt
etat ca uttaratra vakṣyate

original: kuta etat? ityāha- “tasyaiva antyasya” vivakṣitakāryaṃ prati “kāraṇatvāt” /
analyzed: kutas etat iti āha tasya eva antyasya vivakṣita kāryam prati kāraṇa tvāt
kāraṇasya ca sahakāri vyapadeśaḥ na akāraṇasya

original: yataḥ saha- yugapat kurvantaḥ sahakāriṇa ucyante,
analyzed: yatas saha yugapad kurvantaḥ sahakāriṇaḥ ucyante

original: yathā cāntyasyaikārthakaraṇaṃ sahakāritvam evaṃ pūrvasyāpi kāraṇakalāpasyottarottaraviśiṣṭakṣaṇāntarārambhiṇa ityavaseyam,
analyzed: yathā ca antyasya eka artha karaṇam sahakāri tvam evam pūrvasya api kāraṇa kalāpasya uttara uttara viśiṣṭa kṣaṇa antara ārambhiṇaḥ iti avaseyam
antyasya udāharaṇa tayā nirddeśāt
tasmāt sarvam kāryam aṅkura ādikam viśeṣa lakṣaṇam vā aneka pratyaya janyam iti
sarvatra eka artha kriyā eva ca upacīyamāna apacīyamāna kārya kāriṇaḥ kāraṇa kalāpasya sahakāri tvam
na viśeṣa utpādanam iti

original: syādetat- ekārthakaraṇamapi tatra sahakāritvamastu atiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamapītyata āha- “tatra ca” kṣaṇe 'ntye “viśeṣasya kartumaśakyatvāt”  #
analyzed: syāt etat ekārtha karaṇam api tatra sahakāri tvam astu atiśaya utpādana lakṣaṇam api iti atas āha tatra ca kṣaṇe ntye viśeṣasya kartum aśakya tvāt
na atiśaya utpādanam api sahakāri tvam
kutas viśeṣasya kartum aśakya tvam
iti atas āha ekasya an aṃśasya svabhāvasya avivekāt

original: na hi tatra 'ayamanāhitātiśayo bhāgaḥ svahetubhyo jātaḥ,
analyzed: na hi tatra ayam anāhita atiśayaḥ bhāgaḥ sva hetubhyaḥ jātaḥ
ayam tu sahakāribhiḥ āhita atiśayaḥ
iti vivekaḥ sti

original: syānmatam- bhinnasvabhāva evāntyasya viśeṣo 'stu ityata āha- “bhavāntara“- ityādi /

hīyenām hīyatām

original: yata evaṃ “tasmānna kāraṇasya” mukhyasya “sahakāribhyaḥ” sakāśād “viśeṣasyotpattiḥ” ityekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvamiti /
analyzed: yatas evam tasmāt na kāraṇasya mukhyasya sahakāribhyaḥ sakāśāt viśeṣasya utpattiḥ iti eka artha kriyā eva sahakāri tvam iti

original: nanvasatyāṃ sahakāribhyo viśeṣotpattau kāryajanane sāmarthyameṣāṃ na yujyata ityata āha- “te samarthāḥ” ityādi /

original: yadi hi te svabhāvenāsamarthā utpadyeran tadaiṣāṃ sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyotpattirabhyupagamyeta /
analyzed: yadi hi te svabhāvena asamarthāḥ utpadyeran tadā eṣām sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthya utpattiḥ abhyupagamyeta

original: yāvatā “te 'ntyāḥ svabhāvenaiva samarthāḥ pratyayāḥ sahitā jāyante” kṣaṇamātravilambino /

yeṣām eka kṣaṇa niyata tvāt tatas prāk paścāt pṛthaktva bhāvaḥ na asti

original: yebhyaścānantarameva kāryamutpadyate” na kālāntareṇa “tatra” teṣvevaṃvidheṣu “ekārthakriyaiva sahakāritvam” nātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇam /

svabhāvataḥ sāmarthyasya bhāva virodhāt

original: parasparataścānabhyupagamāt samarthasya janmaivāyuktamiti manvānaḥ paraḥ āha- “samarthaḥ kutaḥ” ityādi /

siddhāntavādī āha sva kāraṇebhyaḥ iti
paramata apekṣayā tu svabhāvataḥ iti uktam

original: kāraṇasya sahakāribhyaḥ sāmarthyamicchatīti tanniṣedhaparaṃ svabhāvata iti vacanam /

kevalānām api antya kṣaṇa sarūpāṇām darśanāt

iti darśana a darśanābhyām vibhajyate

original: tatra yādṛśaḥ kṣityādayastadanyapratyayasannidhāvupalabhyante tādṛśā eva kevalā api /

original: tatastadanyasahitā iva kevalā api samarthamaṅkurajanane svaṃ svaṃ kṣaṇāntaramārabheran /

tatas kevalasya api aṅkura ādi janana svābhāvyāt ajananāt ca
tad svabhāvasya janana atityanekāntaḥ eva iti manyamānaḥ

original: āha- “tāni” svakāraṇāni kṣitibījādīni “enaṃ” samartham “aparasya” anyasya pratyayasya “sannidhāna eva kiṃ” kasmāt “janayanti”?

na kevalāni

original: , sahitānāmeva sarvadā sambhavāt iti cet āha- “kadācit” kasmiṃścit kāle “anyathāpi” kevalā api “syuḥ” bhaveyuḥ /

original: tathā hi- dṛśyanta evādhyātmikabāhyāḥ kvacit kārye yādṛśā yatsahitāḥ tādṛśā eva tadrahitā apīti /

original: janayantu kevalā api sambhavantaḥ samartham, ko doṣaḥ?
analyzed: janayantu kevalāḥ api sambhavantaḥ samartham kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: iti cedāha- “tataśca” kevalānāmapi samarthajanakānāṃ sambhavāt “eko 'pi” na kevalamanekaḥ
analyzed: iti ced āha tatas ca kevalānām api samartha janakānām sambhavāt ekaḥ na kevalam anekaḥ

original: “kvaci” ddeśādau samarthaḥ utpannaḥ kṣitibījādoiraṅkurādikāryaṃ “janayet” yadi tatsvabhāvasyāvaśyaṃ janakatvam /

original: na ca kevalo janayati tatsvabhāvasambhave 'pi tato 'nekāntaḥ iti paraḥ /
analyzed: na ca kevalaḥ janayati tad svabhāva sambhave tatas na ekāntaḥ iti paraḥ
etat pariharan āha apara aparaḥ ityādi
aparaiḥ ca aparaiḥ ca kuśūla tad apanetṛ puruṣa prayatna piṭaka ādi prakṣepa kṣetra nayana prakiraṇa ādibhiḥ

original: “pratyayai“ryo “yogaḥ” tena kāraṇena “pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayo” na kadācit pūrvāparakālabhāvina
analyzed: pratyayaiḥ yaḥ yogaḥ tena kāraṇena pratikṣaṇam bhinna śaktayaḥ na kadācid pūrva apara kāla bhāvinaḥ
eka śaktayaḥ apara apara pratyaya yoga lakṣaṇa hetu bhede pi abhinna śaktitāyām ahetuka tva prasaṅgāt
anyatra api ca śāli yava bīja ādau śakti bhedasya hetu bheda nibandhana tvāt

original: “saṃskārāḥ” sametya sambhūya ca pratyayaiḥ kriyamāṇāḥ “santanvantaḥ” santānena bhavanto
analyzed: saṃskārāḥ sametya sambhūya ca pratyayaiḥ kriyamāṇāḥ santanvantaḥ santānena bhavantaḥ

original: “yadyapi kutaścit sāmyād” varṇena saṃsthānena anyena vā kenacitprakāreṇa sādṛśyādekākaraparāmarśapratyayajananalakṣaṇāt
analyzed: yadi api kutaścid sāmyāt varṇena saṃsthānena anyena vā kenacid prakāreṇa sādṛśyāt eka ākara parāmarśa pratyaya janana lakṣaṇāt
samānam rūpam eṣām iti sarūpāḥ sadṛśāḥ pratīyante pratyabhijñāyante tathā api kṛtrima akṛtrimāṇām iva
maṇi muktā ādīnām apara apara pratyayoga lakṣaṇa sāmagrī bhedāt bhinnaḥ eva visadṛśaḥ eva na
pratyabhijñāna vaśāt abhinnaḥ tulya rūpaḥ eṣām bīja ādīnām svabhāvaḥ yatas evam tena
bhinna svabhāva tvena bhinna śaktitayā vā apara apara sāmagrī janya tvena kṣaṇānām siddhyā
kiñcid eva kṣiti bīja ādikam kasyacid eva kāryasya aṅkura ādeḥ tad janana samarthasya vā kāraṇam
na sarvam sarvasya
tathā ca vyagrāṇām kṣiti bīja ādīnām aṅkura janana svabhāva tā samartha kṣaṇaja ānana svabhāva tā

original: vā nāstyeveti tatsvabhāvasya jananādajanakasya cātatsvabhāvatvādityatra nānekāntaḥ
analyzed: vā na asti eva iti tad svabhāvasya jananāt ajanakasya ca a tad svabhāva tvāt iti atra na anekāntaḥ

original: yato yo yatsvabhāvaḥ sa svahetorevotpadyamānaḥ tādṛśo bhavati na punastadbhāve hetvantaramapekṣata
analyzed: yatas yaḥ yad svabhāvaḥ sa sva hetoḥ eva utpadyamānaḥ tādṛśaḥ bhavati na punar tad bhāve hetu antaram apekṣata
iti atra anekāntaḥ syāt iti

original: pratyabhijñānasya ca sarūpatāviṣayasya sāmagrībhedādanumitabhinnaśaktisvabhāvatvena bādhyamānatayā prāmāṇyābhāvāt na tataḥ sarūpatāsiddhiḥ
analyzed: pratyabhijñānasya ca sarūpa tā viṣayasya sāmagrī bhedāt anumita bhinna śakti svabhāva tvena bādhyamāna tayā prāmāṇya abhāvāt na tatas sarūpa tā siddhiḥ

original: yoravasthayorvastubhedo niśceyaḥ ityādinā ekatvaviṣayaṃ pratyabhijñānaṃ nirastam /

etat api tatra

original: kiñcideva kasyacit kāraṇam ityuktam tatra kiṃ kasya kāraṇamiti śakyaparicchedamapyādhyātmikeṣu tāvad darśayannāha- “tatra” ityādi /

original: tadādiryeṣāṃ atidūrātyāsannatvādīnāṃ te 'vidyamānā yasmin deśe so 'vyavadhānādiḥ deśo yasya so 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ,
analyzed: tad ādiḥ yeṣām atidūra ati āsanna tva ādīnām te vidyamānāḥ yasmin deśe saḥ vyavadhāna ādiḥ deśaḥ yasya saḥ vyavadhāna ādi deśaḥ

original: rūpamindriyaṃ cādī yasya manaskārādeḥ sa rūpendriyādiḥ sa cāsau karaṇakalāpaśca sāmagrīlakṣaṇastathoktaḥ,
analyzed: rūpam indriyam ca ādī yasya manaskāra ādeḥ sa rūpa indriya ādiḥ sa ca asau karaṇa kalāpaḥ ca sāmagrī lakṣaṇaḥ tathā uktaḥ

original: avyavadhānādideśaścāsau rūpendriyadikāraṇakalāpaśca sa“vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ” nānyaḥ,
analyzed: avyavadhāna ādi deśaḥ ca asau rūpa indriya di kāraṇa kalāpaḥ ca sa vijñāna janane samarthaḥ hetuḥ na anyaḥ

anya bhāve pi ca abhāvāt

yaḥ teṣām indriya ādīnām paraspara upasarpaṇasya anyonya ḍhaukanasya
ādi grahaṇāt vyavadhāna apanayanā
sāmagrī adhīna tvena asaṃvāt iti

original: imamevaṃvidhaṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyamaṃ niravadyamādhyātmikeṣu darśitam anyatrāpyatidiśannāha- “anena nyāyena” ityādi /
analyzed: imam evaṃvidham hetu phala bhāva pratiniyamam niravadyam ādhyātmikeṣu darśitam anyatra api atidiśan āha anena nyāyena ityādi

original: yo 'yamanantaraṃ hetuphalabhāvapratiniyame nyāya uktaḥ so 'nyatrāpi “sarvatra” draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ yam anantaram hetu phala bhāva pratiniyame nyāyaḥ uktaḥ saḥ nyatra api sarvatra draṣṭavyaḥ

original: sarvatreti vacanāt akṣaṇikeṣvapi pratītirmā bhūt ityāha- “pratikṣaṇam” ityādi /
analyzed: sarvatra iti vacanāt akṣaṇikeṣu api pratītiḥ mā bhūt iti āha pratikṣaṇam ityādi

original: yāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe 'nyāścānyāśca svabhāvabhedānvayinyaḥ śaktayo bhavanti tatrāyamekārthakriyāpratiniyamaḥ sahakāriṇāṃ draṣṭavyaḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe nyāḥ ca anyāḥ ca svabhāva bheda anvayinyaḥ śaktayaḥ bhavanti tatra ayam eka artha kriyā pratiniyamaḥ sahakāriṇām draṣṭavyaḥ

original: na tu ye sthiraikasvabhāvā bhāvāḥ paraiḥ kalpyante teṣvapi /

original: tadaitaduttaraṃ bhāvatkaṃ sambadhyeta yadi bhāvo yo 'sau paraḥ sahakāritvābhimataḥ sannidhīyate tadrūpeṇa kartā syāt na svarūpeṇa /

original: tatra tu kartṛtvavyapadeśaḥ kalpanānirmita eva bhavet /

original: tasmāt svarūpeṇaiva bhāvaḥ svakāryasya kartā na pararūpeṇeti nāsyottarasyāvakāśaḥ /

original: atha yena svarūpeṇāyaṃ janakastadasya sahitāsahitāvasthayoḥ sarvadāsti tadā svarūpaṃ
analyzed: atha yena sva rūpeṇa ayam janakaḥ tat asya sahita asahita avasthayoḥ sarvadā asti tadā sva rūpam

analyzed: ca sva kārya janakam asya sthira svabhāvasya prāk api sahita avasthāyāḥ tat eva yat sahita avasthāyām akṣepa kriyā svabhāvam iti

original: athavā kadācit paro brūyāt svahetubhirevāyaṃ pratyayāntarāpekṣaḥ svakāryajananasvabhāvo janita iti kevalo na karoti /

original: pratyayāntarāpekṣasvakāryajananasvabhāvatāyāḥ sarvadā bhāvāt ityata āha- “nahi sa sāhitye 'pi” ityādi /

analyzed: sva rūpeṇa eva asya kartṛ tvāt tasya ca prāk api bhāvāt pratyaya antara apekṣāyāḥ ca tatas labhyasya ātma atiśayasya abhāvena ayogāt upakāra lakṣaṇa tvāt asya

original: tya purvottarakṣaṇayorekatvādhyavasāyena tasyaivāyamatiśaya iti na dravyāśrayeṇa /
analyzed: purva uttara kṣaṇayoḥ eka tva adhyavasāyena tasya eva ayam atiśayaḥ iti na dravya āśrayeṇa

pūrva pūrva kṣaṇebhyaḥ tu sva hetu pariṇāma upanidhi dharmabhyaḥ uttara uttara viśeṣa utpattau

original: pūrvakāraṇakalāpasyaikārthakriyālakṣaṇameva tatra paramārthataḥ sahakāritvamiti na kācit kṣatiriti /
analyzed: pūrva kāraṇa kalāpasya eka artha kriyā lakṣaṇam eva tatra paramārthataḥ sahakāri tvam iti na kācid kṣatiḥ iti
kasmāt dravya āśreyeṇa atiśaya utpādanam na iṣyate

original: yadi tarhi kṣanike taṇḍulādidravye viśeṣo notpadyate,
analyzed: yadi tarhi kṣanike taṇḍula ādi dravye viśeṣaḥ na utpadyate

analyzed: tatas yathā parasparataḥ viśeṣam an āsādayantaḥ pi kṣaṇikāḥ sahitāḥ eva kurvanti na kevalāḥ

original: tathā hi- prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasyendriyamarthapratipattimakurvadapi paścāt kurvāṇamupalabhyate / taduktam-

original: tathā prabhāsvarādapavarakaṃ praviṣṭasya yadīndriyaṃ svopakāribhyo 'tiśayaṃ krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāgiva paścādapyarthapratipattiṃ  #
analyzed: tathā prabhāsvarāt apavarakam praviṣṭasya yadi indriyam sva upakāribhyaḥ tiśayam krameṇa na pratipadyate tadā prāk iva paścāt api artha pratipattim

original: evaṃ tāvad yatra sahakāribhyaḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ bhavati tatrātiśayotpādanalakṣaṇamaupacārikaṃ sahakāritvamekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva tu mukhyaṃ  #

original: yatra tvakṣepeṇaivārthasannidhimātreṇa sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvanti kiṃ tatrāpi santānāśrayamatiśayotpādanamasti?

iti atas āha akṣepa kāriṣu ityādi

original: 'ye hyavyavadhānādideśā indriyādayaḥ svahetubhyo jātāsteṣvavilambitakāriṣu na viśeṣotpattiḥ parasparataḥ sambhavati,

kṣaṇika tvāt
iti uktam prāk

original: yadi na viśeṣotpattiḥ tadā kathaṃ nirviśeṣā jñānasya kāraṇībhavanti?
analyzed: yadi na viśeṣa utpattiḥ tadā katham nirviśeṣāḥ jñānasya kāraṇībhavanti

original: ityata āha- “tatra yathāsvaṃ” yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ,
analyzed: iti atas āha tatra yathāsvam yasya ye ātmīyāḥ pratyayāḥ taiḥ
paraspara upasarpaṇa vyavadhāna ādi viraha ādeḥ āśraya bhūtaiḥ ye jātāḥ yogyaḥ ca asau ati āsanna tva ati viprakarṣa virahāt

original: deśaśca sa ādiryasyāvyavahitadeśādeḥ tatrāvasthānamavasthā yeṣāṃ “te saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā”

analyzed: svabhāva niṣpattiḥ vidyate iti eva kṛtvā jñāna hetu tām pratipadyante tatra kim

original: yadi hi svahetubhya eva parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayebhyaḥ svakāryajananakṣamā yogyadeśādyavasthānalakṣaṇaviśeṣayogino notpadyeran,

na tu sva hetubhyaḥ eva tathāvidhānām utpattau

original: yata evaṃ “iti” tasmāt “tatra“teṣu akṣepakāriṣvindriyādiṣu “ekārthakriyaiva” mukhyaṃ “sahakāritvaṃ” na santānāśrayeṇa vyavasthāpyamānamatiśayotpādanalakṣaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: yatas evam iti tasmāt tatra teṣu akṣepa kāriṣu indriya ādiṣu eka artha kriyā eva mukhyam sahakāri tvam na santāna āśrayeṇa vyavasthāpyamānam atiśaya utpādana lakṣaṇam

original: tadapi hi loke pratītatvād vyavasthāpanīyamevetyata āha- “yatra tu” kārye nāvyavadhānādideśopanipātamātreṇaivendriyādaya iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyayatāṃ
analyzed: tat api hi loke pratīta tvāt vyavasthāpanīyam eva iti atas āha yatra tu kārye na avyavadhāna ādi deśa upanipāta mātreṇa eva indriya ādayaḥ iva sahakāriṇaḥ pratyaya tām

original: pratikṣaṇaṃ prakṛṣyamāṇaṃ viśeṣamutpādayantaḥ “tatra” kālakṣepabhāvini kārye kartavye

na tu tad samāna kālaḥ kāraṇa kṣaṇaḥ iti

loke

original: paramārthatastu tatrāpi pūrvaḥ pūrvaḥ pratyayakalāpa uttarottarakāryotpādānuguṇe viśiṣṭakṣaṇe pratiniyata ityekārthakriyālakṣaṇameva sahakāritvamanubhavati

katham punar svabhāva antara pratilambhaḥ teṣām

original: , yataḥ krameṇa kāryaṃ nirvartayantītyata āha- “tatra svarasataḥ” ityādi /

original: ye pūrve prathama upanipātakṣaṇāḥ teṣāṃ vināśahetvanapekṣitayā svarasato nivṛttau

original: evaṃ yāvadatyantātiśayavānantyaḥ kāraṇakalāpo jātaḥ tataḥ kāryasyotpattiḥ ityevaṃ sahakāribhyaḥ svabhāvāntarapratilambhaḥ,

atra paraḥ codayan āha sahakāriṇaḥ saha karaṇa śīlāt kāraṇāt

kārya utpāda anuguṇasya utpattau iṣyamāṇāyām kāryasya aṅkura ādeḥ syāt
viśeṣa abhāvāt iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: tataśca parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣiṇa eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryaṃ kurvīran /
analyzed: tatas ca parasparataḥ viśeṣa utpāda anapekṣiṇaḥ eva sahakāriṇaḥ kāryam kurvīran

original: iti cet, āha- “tena” yena kṣaṇikā api parasparato viśeṣotpādānapekṣā eva svakāryaṃ
analyzed: iti ced āha tena yena kṣaṇikāḥ api parasparataḥ viśeṣa utpāda anapekṣāḥ eva sva kāryam

original: kurvanti ekakāryapratiniyamalakṣaṇaṃ ca sahakāritvaṃ pratipadyante tena kāraṇena
analyzed: kurvanti eka kārya pratiniyama lakṣaṇam ca sahakāri tvam pratipadyante tena kāraṇena

original: apekṣaṇīyebhyaḥ svabhāvātiśayotpatiśca na syāt” ityakṣaṇikavādī kṣaṇikapakṣeṇa svapakṣasya sāmyamāpādayati / yadāha-

kaḥ śobheta vadan evam yadi na syāt ahrīka tā

original: ajñatā vā yataḥ sarvaṃ kṣaṇikeṣvapi tatsamam //
analyzed: ajña tā vā yatas sarvam kṣaṇikeṣu api tat samam

original: iti / tatraitat syāt prathamakṣaṇe 'pi kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparataḥ samutpannaviśeṣā eva sannidhīyante-

original: iti nyāyāddhi dūradeśavartināmapi hetuphalabhāvāt ityāśaṅkayāha- “atha sahakāriṇā” ityādi /
analyzed: iti nyāyāt hi dūra deśa vartinām api hetu phala bhāvāt iti āśaṅkayā āha atha sahakāriṇā ityādi

original: sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasamparkavikalā api vastudharmatayaivānyonyamupakurvantīti śahakāriṇā kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajananāya kṛtaviśeṣa eva samparkakāla
analyzed: sahakāriṇaḥ paraspara samparka vikalāḥ api vastu dharma tayā eva anyonyam upakurvanti iti śahakāriṇā kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa jananāya kṛta viśeṣaḥ eva samparka kālaḥ
evam sati anavasthā syāt
tathā hi tad viśeṣa utpattau api aparaḥ sahakāri kṛtaḥ viśeṣaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ
tathā tad utpattau api anyaḥ iti

original: atha naivaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣaṇimittamaparaṃ viśeṣaṃ kurvanti,
analyzed: atha nā evam sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa nimittam aparam viśeṣam kurvanti

original: svabhāvata eva tatra teṣāṃ yogyatvāt ityata āha- “na ca” ityādi /
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ eva tatra teṣām yogya tvāt iti atas āha na ca ityādi

original: naiva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇo yo viśeṣaḥ tadutpādane
analyzed: na eva hi sahakāriṇaḥ kṣiti bīja ādayaḥ parasparasya kārya utpāda anuguṇaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tad utpādane
nityam sarvakālam yogya avasthā yena yogya avasthā tvena nitya anuṣaktaḥ nitya anubaddhaḥ
eṣām kṣiti bīja ādīnām kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa janakaḥ
viśeṣaḥ syāt yatas
aviśiṣṭāt viśeṣa utpattau kāryasya api syāt
iti etat api parihriyeta
kutas etat iti āha tad upāyaḥ ityādi

original: teṣāṃ kṣitibījādīnāmupāye- yogyadeśopanipāte kāryavyaktidarśanāt apāye ca- parasparasamparkavirāme kāryānutpattidarśanāt /
analyzed: teṣām kṣiti bīja ādīnām upāye yogya deśa upanipāte kārya vyakti darśanāt apāye ca paraspara samparka virāme kārya anutpatti darśanāt

original: yadi hi kāryotpādanuguṇaviśeṣotpādane sarvadā yogyāvasthāḥ syuḥ tadā so 'pi viśeṣaḥ sarvadā syat /
analyzed: yadi hi kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa utpādane sarvadā yogya avasthāḥ syuḥ tadā saḥ pi viśeṣaḥ sarvadā syat

original: tatastatparamparābhāvi kāryamiti tadupāyāpāyayoḥ kāryasyotpattyanutpattī na syātām /
analyzed: tatas tad paramparā bhāvi kāryam iti tad upāya apāyayoḥ kāryasya utpatti anutpattī na syātām

original: yataḥ sahakāriṇā pṛthagavasthitenānavasthābhayāt kṛtaviśeṣo nopatiṣṭhate parasparataśca prathamasamparkakṣaṇabhāvināṃ nopeyate yujyate vā /

original: tena kāraṇenādyo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samānakālatayā nirupakārasya kṣitibījādeḥ “notpadyate“,
analyzed: tena kāraṇena ādyaḥ viśeṣaḥ kārya utpāda anuguṇaḥ sahakāribhyaḥ samāna kāla tayā nirupakārasya kṣiti bīja ādeḥ na utpadyate
utpadyate ca asau iti iṣyate

original: tena samagrāvasthāvat sarveṣāṃ vyagrāvasthābhāvināmapi kṣaṇānāmaviśeṣāt tajjananasvabhāvatve 'pyajananāt samagrāvasthāyāmeva jananād /
analyzed: tena samagra avasthā vat sarveṣām vyagra avasthā bhāvinām api kṣaṇānām aviśeṣāt tad janana svabhāva tve pi ajananāt samagra avasthāyām eva jananāt
yathā kṣaṇikānām eka artha kriyā pratiniyama lakṣaṇam sahakāri tvam tathā sthira svabhāvānām api

original: bhaviṣyatīti kṣinasarvopāyo 'kṣaṇikavādī sāmyamevātura iva bahumanyamānastatraiva bharaṃ kṛtavān /
analyzed: bhaviṣyati iti kṣaṇika vādī sāmyam eva āturaḥ iva bahu manyamānaḥ tatra eva bharam kṛtavān

original: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā paramupahasannāha- “nāsmākaṃ punaḥ punaḥ” ityādi /
analyzed: siddhāntavādī bhaṅgyā param upahasan āha na asmākam punar punar ityādi

original: yadi punaḥ punarvacane 'pi lokasya nyāyapratītirbhavati śataśo 'pi brūmaḥ /
analyzed: yadi punar punarvacane lokasya nyāya pratītiḥ bhavati brūmaḥ
kim aṅga punarddhau trīn vā vārān

original: nahi parārthapravṛttānāmasmākaṃ punaḥ punarabhidhāne kaścidudvego bhavati /
analyzed: nahi para artha pravṛttānām asmākam punar punar abhidhāne kaścid udvegaḥ bhavati

original: evaṃvādinaśca śāstrakṛtaḥ kvacit prakārāntareṇa tamevārthaṃ sphuṭīkurvato ye punaruktatāaprihārāya yatante sa teṣāmasthānapariśrama eva /
analyzed: evaṃvādinaḥ ca śāstra kṛtaḥ kvacid prakāra antareṇa tam eva artham sphuṭīkurvataḥ ye punarukta tā a prihārāya yatante sa teṣām asthāna pariśramaḥ eva

original: yadi nodvego hanta tarhyucyatām ityata āha- “na viśeṣotpādanādeva” ityādi /
analyzed: yadi na udvegaḥ hanta tarhi ucyatām iti atas āha na viśeṣa utpādanāt eva ityādi
na eva viśeṣa utpādanāt sahakāriṇām
sahakāri tvam paramārthataḥ kvacid sambhavati

original: yataḥ prathamakṣaṇabhāvināṃ bījādīnāṃ tadabhāvāt kāryotpādānuguṇe viśeṣe kartavye sahakāritāvirahaḥ syāt /
analyzed: yatas prathama kṣaṇa bhāvinām bīja ādīnām tad abhāvāt kārya utpāda anuguṇe viśeṣe kartavye sahakāri tā virahaḥ syāt

original: kintvekārthākriyaiva sahakāriṇāṃ pāramārthikaṃ sahakāritvaṃ pūrvoktābhiryuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate /
analyzed: kintu ekārtha akriyā eva sahakāriṇām pāramārthikam sahakāri tvam pūrvoktābhiḥ yuktibhiḥ sambhāvyate

original: sā ca prathamamasamparkabhājāmastyeveti kiṃ na sahakāriṇaḥ syuḥ? /
analyzed: sā ca prathamam asamparka bhājām asti eva iti kim na sahakāriṇaḥ syuḥ

original: para āha- sāpyekārthakriyā na bhavet parasparato viśeṣarahitānām /
analyzed: paraḥ āha sā api eka artha kriyā na bhavet parasparataḥ viśeṣa rahitānām

original: yadi punaḥ parasparato viśeṣarahitānāmapi tadekārthakriyāṅgikriyate tadā pratyekaṃ tadavasthāyāṃ tadutpādanasāmarthyābhyupagamāt tadavasthāyāmiva  #
analyzed: yadi punar parasparataḥ viśeṣa rahitānām api tad eka artha kriyā aṅgikriyate tadā pratyekam tad avasthāyām tad utpādana sāmarthya abhyupagamāt tad avasthāyām iva
pṛthak api sā bhavet

original: tathāhi- te tadavasthāyāmapi parasparato nirviśeṣā eva kurvanti /
analyzed: tathā hi te tad avasthāyām api parasparataḥ nirviśeṣāḥ eva kurvanti

original: teṣāṃ pṛthagapi tadviśeṣakriyā kathamiva na prasajyeta? /
analyzed: teṣām pṛthak api tad viśeṣa kriyā katham iva na prasajyeta
nahi eṣām saṃhata asaṃhata avasthayoḥ kaścid viśeṣaḥ sti iti
bhavatu kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: iti cet; “tathā ca” kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇaprasaṅge sati “tasmād viśeṣād bhavanaśīlam” aṅkurādi “kāryamapi” viśeṣavat kevalāt  #
analyzed: iti ced tathā ca kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣasya pṛthakkaraṇa prasaṅge sati tasmāt viśeṣāt bhavana śīlam aṅkura ādi kāryam api viśeṣavat kevalāt  /
sahakāriṇaḥ syāt iti ced manyase
atra api sarvam uktam uttaram

original: tathā hi- saṃhatāsaṃhatāvasthayonnirviśeṣā eva kṣaṇakṣayiṇo bhāvā iti yaducyate tat kiṃ tāvadviśeṣamātrāpekṣayā?
analyzed: tathā hi saṃhata asaṃhata avasthayā unnirviśeṣāḥ eva kṣaṇa kṣayiṇaḥ bhāvāḥ iti yat ucyate tat kim tāvat viśeṣa mātra apekṣayā
āhosvit kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa janaka viśeṣa apekṣayā
yadi prācyaḥ vikalpaḥ tat ayuktam
na hi kācid viśeṣa mātra rahitā avasthā sambhavati
sarvadā apara para pratyaya yoga nibandhanasya apara apara viśeṣasya bhāvāt
nahi kadācid kiṃcid ekam eva
ādhāra chāyā ātapa vāta śīta ādeḥ yathāsambhavam bhāvāt
na ca tad bhāve tat tādṛśam eva
kāraṇa bhedāt

original: etāvattu syāt- kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacit kārye 'nuguṇo na sarvaḥ sarvatreti /
analyzed: etāvat tu syāt kaścid viśeṣaḥ kvacid kārye nuguṇaḥ na sarvaḥ sarvatra iti
etat ca prāk eva uktam iti darśayan āha pratikṣaṇam apara aparaiḥ pratyayaiḥ iti

original: 'aparāparapratyayogena pratikṣaṇaṃ bhinnaśaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvanto yadyapi kutaścit sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante,
analyzed: apara apara pratyayogena pratikṣaṇam bhinna śaktayaḥ saṃskārāḥ santanvantaḥ yadi api kutaścid sāmyāt sarūpāḥ pratīyante
tathā api bhinnaḥ eva eṣām svabhāvaḥ
tena kiñcid eva kasyacid kāraṇam iti
kṣaṇikeṣu hbṭ
bhāveṣu apara apara utpattaiḥ aikya abhāvāt
iti ca atra saṃkṣipyataram uktam
evam ca na asmākam punar punarvacana
iti atra dvis punargrahaṇam yujyate
yathā yena prakāreṇa bhāva santāne viśeṣasya utpattiḥ tat api uktam

original: tatra svarasataḥ pūrvakṣaṇanirodhe tebhya eva viśiṣṭakṣaṇotpādād viśeṣotpattiḥ'; iti /
analyzed: tatra svarasataḥ pūrva kṣaṇa nirodhe tebhyaḥ eva viśiṣṭa kṣaṇa utpādāt viśeṣa utpattiḥ iti

original: atha kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakaviśeṣāpekṣayā prāgvat prathamasamparkabhājaḥ parasparato nirviśeṣā ityabhimataṃ tadapyayuktam /
analyzed: atha kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa janaka viśeṣa apekṣayā prāgvat prathama samparka bhājaḥ parasparataḥ nirviśeṣāḥ iti abhimatam tat api ayuktam

original: yataḥ kāryotpādānuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ kṣitibījādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye vyavadhānādirahitatvenopanipātinaḥ /
analyzed: yatas kārya utpāda anuguṇasya viśeṣasya janakāḥ kṣiti bīja ādayaḥ kīdṛśāḥ ye vyavadhāna ādi rahita tvena upanipātinaḥ

original: tadbhāva eva tasya bhāvāt etāvanmātranibandhanatvācca janakaṃ vya(kavya)vasthāyāḥ /
analyzed: tad bhāve eva tasya bhāvāt etāvat mātra nibandhana tvāt ca janakam vyaka vyavasthāyāḥ

original: te ca tathāvidhāḥ sarvadā na bhavantīti kathaṃ pṛthagapi kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambha eṣāṃ syāt?
analyzed: te ca tathāvidhāḥ sarvadā na bhavanti iti katham pṛthak api kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa ārambhaḥ eṣām syāt

original: , yataḥ kevalānāmapi kāryakriyā prasajyeta tad darśayati- yogyo deśo yeṣāṃ te yogyadeśāḥ,
analyzed: yatas kevalānām api kārya kriyā prasajyeta tat darśayati yogyaḥ deśaḥ yeṣām te yogya deśāḥ
tad bhāvaḥ yogya deśa tā
sā ādiḥ yeṣām avyavahita deśa tva ādīnām anavasthā bhedānām te tathā uktāḥ
te ca te avasthā bhedāḥ ca tathā uktāḥ
yogya deśa tā
vyavahita deśa tā ādayaḥ ye avasthā viśeṣāḥ kṣiti bīja ādīnām upajāyante te kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa lakṣaṇa kārya karaṇa śīlāḥ

original: naivaṃvidhāḥ sarvadā bījādaya iti kathameṣāṃ pṛthagapi tathāvidhaviśeṣārambhaḥ syāt? /
analyzed: na evaṃvidhāḥ sarvadā bīja ādayaḥ iti katham eṣām pṛthak api tathāvidha viśeṣa ārambhaḥ syāt
etat api prāk eva uktam

original: tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśo rūpendriyādikalāpaḥ sa vijñānajanane samartho hetuḥ';
analyzed: tatra yaḥ vyavadhāna ādi deśaḥ rūpa indriya ādi kalāpaḥ sa vijñāna janane samarthaḥ hetuḥ
iti vacanāt
tasya ca udāharaṇa mātra tvāt

original: ihāpi tatra yo 'vyavadhānādideśaḥ kṣitibījādikalāpaḥ sa kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanane samartho heturiti pratīyata eva /
analyzed: iha api tatra yaḥ vyavadhāna ādi deśaḥ kṣiti bīja ādi kalāpaḥ sa kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa janane samarthaḥ hetuḥ iti pratīyate eva

original: sa ca tathāvidhoviśeṣaḥ sarvadā na bhavati,
analyzed: sa ca tathāvidhaḥ viśeṣaḥ sarvadā na bhavati
tad janakasya hetoḥ abhāvāt
paraspara upasarpaṇa ādi āśrayasya eva pratyaya viśeṣasya tad vetu tvāt

original: etadapi pūrvamevoktamityāha- teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣa[janane] viśeṣavatāṃ yata utpattistadapyuktamasakṛdeva '
analyzed: etat api pūrvam evā uktam iti āha teṣām ca kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa janane viśeṣavatām yatas utpattiḥ tat api uktam asakṛt eva

original: yasteṣāṃ parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayaḥ pratyayaviśeṣaḥ sa taddhetujanane samartho hetuḥ'; iti /
analyzed: yaḥ teṣām paraspara upasarpaṇa ādi āśrayaḥ pratyaya viśeṣaḥ sa tad hetu janane samarthaḥ hetuḥ iti
tathā yathāsvam pratyayaiḥ paraspara upasarpaṇa ādi āśrayaiḥ ye

original: yogyadeśādyavasthā jātāste saha svabhāvaniṣpattyā jñānahetutāṃ pratipadyanta'; ityanena,
analyzed: yogya deśa ādi avasthāḥ jātāḥ te saha svabhāva niṣpattyā jñāna hetu tām pratipadyante iti anena
iha api gamyamāna tvāt
tatas yadi api eṣām parasparataḥ nupapatteḥ viśeṣaḥ na bhavati
sva hetu kṛtaḥ tu kena vāryate

original: na ca svahetuta eva sañjātaviśeṣāṇāṃ bhāve parasparatastadāśaṃsā,
analyzed: na ca sva hetutaḥ eva sañjāta viśeṣāṇām bhāve parasparataḥ tad āśaṃsā
yatas parasparataḥ viśeṣa ayogaḥ pratipādyamānaḥ śobheta

original: teṣāṃ ca kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣajanakānāṃ pratyayānāṃ pratyekaṃ sāmarthye 'pi khaṇḍaśaḥ kāryotpādāyogāt sakalasyaiva pratyekaṃ karaṇāt /
analyzed: teṣām ca kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa janakānām pratyayānām pratyekam sāmarthye khaṇḍaśas kārya utpāda ayogāt sakalasya eva pratyekam karaṇāt
yathā kevalānām akriyā kartṛ viśeṣasya avyavadhāna ādi deśa kṣitī bīja ādi kalāpasya pṛthak ekaikasya samarthasya bhāvasya abhāvāt iti etat api asakṛt eva uktam

original: teṣāṃ ca na pūrvaṃ na paścāt na pṛthagbhāva iti samarthānapi pūrvāparapṛthagbhāvabhāvino doṣā nopalīyante';
analyzed: teṣām ca na pūrvam na paścāt na pṛthagbhāve iti samarthān api pūrva apara pṛthagbhāva bhāvinaḥ doṣāḥ na upalīyante
iti ādi vacanāt

original: tatastathāvidhaviśeṣasya svopādānamātranibandhanasyānabhyupagamena kevalānāmaprasaṅgāt kutaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaviśeṣārambhadvārakaṃ kāryamapi  #
analyzed: tatas tathāvidha viśeṣasya sva upādāna mātra nibandhanasya anabhyupagamena kevalānām aprasaṅgāt kutas kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa ārambha dvārakam kāryam api
syāt iti

original: kutaḥ punarayaṃ kāmacāro labhyate yadaṅkurādikāryaṃ sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kāryotpādānuguṇāṃ viśeṣaparamparāṃ janayantaḥ kurvanti,
analyzed: kutas punar ayam kāmacāraḥ labhyate yat aṅkura ādi kāryam sahakāriṇaḥ parasparasya kārya utpāda anuguṇām viśeṣa paramparām janayantaḥ kurvanti

original: kāryotpādānuguṇaṃ tu viśeṣaṃ vyavadhānādirahitadeśopanipātamātreṇetyata āha- “kāryadvaividhyaṃ ca yasmāt tasmādevaṃ vibhajyate” /
analyzed: kārya utpāda anuguṇam tu viśeṣam vyavadhāna ādi rahita deśa upanipāta mātreṇa iti atas āha kārya dvaividhyam ca yasmāt tasmāt evam vibhajyate
katham dvaividhyam kāryāṇām iti

original: ata āha- sahakāribhiravyavadhānādideśairanantaraṃ sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāgavasthāpekṣaviśiṣṭakṣaṇabhāvalakṣaṇā
analyzed: atas āha sahakāribhiḥ avyavadhāna ādi deśaiḥ anantaram sañjanitāḥ parasparasya prāc avasthā apekṣa viśiṣṭa kṣaṇa bhāva lakṣaṇā
ye viśeṣāḥ tad paramparayā uttara uttara viśiṣṭa viśiṣṭatara ādi kṣaṇa bhava rūpayā utpattiḥ ddharmaḥ
yasya tad ātmakam ekam kāryam

original: anyacca tadviparītaṃ yat sahakārisannidhimātreṇa bhavati na parasparakṛtāṃ viśeṣaparamparāmapekṣate /
analyzed: anyat ca tad viparītam yat sahakāri sannidhi mātreṇa bhavati na paraspara kṛtām viśeṣa paramparām apekṣate
atra udāharaṇam aṅkura ādi vat

original: kāraṇamapi kiñcit svasannidhimātreṇa kāryajananasvabhāvaṃ svakāraṇebhya eva bhavati,
analyzed: kāraṇam api kiñcid sva sannidhi mātreṇa kārya janana svabhāvam sva kāraṇebhyaḥ eva bhavati

anyat tu tad viparīta svabhāvam
yathā kiñcid eva śāli aṅkura janana svabhāvam
tad viparītam ca aparam

original: śālyaṅkuraśca tabdījajanyasvabhāvo na yavādībījajanyasvabhāva iti na bhāvānāṃ svahetubalāyātāḥ pramāṇādhigatāḥ svabhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ /
analyzed: śāli aṅkuraḥ ca tad dīja janya svabhāvaḥ na yava ādī bīja janya svabhāvaḥ iti na bhāvānām sva hetu bala āyātāḥ pramāṇa adhigatāḥ svabhāvāḥ paryanuyojyāḥ

original: ye tu yajjananasvabhāvāḥ pramāṇato 'dhigatāḥ te kiṃ sarvadaiva tatsvabhāvāḥ?
analyzed: ye tu yad janana svabhāvāḥ pramāṇataḥ dhigatāḥ te kim sarvadā eva tad svabhāvāḥ
āhosvit tadā eva
iti atra cintā pravartate

original: tatra sarvadā tatsvabhāvatve paścādiva prāgapi tatkāryakriyāprasaṅgena pararūpeṇākārakasya bhinnasvabhāvatā kārakākārakāvasthayoḥ śāliyavabījādīnāmiva  #
analyzed: tatra sarvadā tad svabhāva tve paścāt iva prāk api tad kārya kriyā prasaṅgena para rūpeṇa ākārakasya bhinna svabhāva tā kāraka akāraka avasthayoḥ śāli yava bīja ādīnām iva
tattva cintakaiḥ ūcyate

original: sadṛśāparabhāvanibandhanaṃ caikatayā pratyabhijñānaṃ lūnapunarjāteṣviva keśanakhādiṣu ityatra virodhābhāvāditi /
analyzed: sadṛśa apara bhāva nibandhanam ca eka tayā pratyabhijñānam lūna punar jāteṣu iva keśa nakha ādiṣu iti atra virodha abhāvāt iti
yadā ca takta ārya kāraṇa svabhāva bhedāt
tatra etasmin smin
sati sahakāribhyaḥ kṣiti bīja ādibhyaḥ teṣām paraspara santāna upakāram apekṣate yat kāraṇam antya avasthā prāptam

original: tasya yat kāryamaṅkurādikaṃ tajjanmanimittaṃ “sahakāriṇāṃ” prathamakṣaṇāntaraṃ viśiṣṭadvitīyakṣaṇabhāvarūpo
analyzed: tasya yat kāryam aṅkura ādikam tad janma nimittam sahakāriṇām prathama kṣaṇa antaram viśiṣṭa dvitīya kṣaṇa bhāva rūpa

original: yo viśeṣaḥ kāryotpādānuguṇaḥ “ādyo” bhavati “sa teṣāṃ” sahakāriṇāṃ prathamasamparkabhājāṃ
analyzed: yaḥ viśeṣaḥ kārya utpāda anuguṇaḥ ādyaḥ bhavati sa teṣām sahakāriṇām prathama samparka bhājām

original: parasparakṛto yo viśeṣastajjanmā na bhavati parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayādeva pratyayaviśeṣāt tasya bhāvāt /
analyzed: paraspara kṛtaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ tad janmā na bhavati paraspara upasarpaṇa ādi āśrayāt eva pratyaya viśeṣāt tasya bhāvāt
tatas kārya utpāda anuguṇāt ādyāt viśeṣāt prathama kṣaṇa upanipātibhiḥ sahakāribhiḥ anyatas
samāsādita viśeṣaiḥ janitāt tad prabhṛti ye viśeṣāḥ prakṛṣyamāṇa tad uttara uttara kṣaṇa bhāva lakṣaṇā
jāyante te tad janmānaḥ sahakāri kṛta viśeṣa janmānaḥ

original: kutaḥ? “tatprakṛtitvāt” tasyādyasya viśeṣasya parasparopasarpaṇādyāśrayāt pratyayaviśeṣādāsāditatadanukūlaviśeṣaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ parasparopakāranirapekṣairjanyasvabhāvatvāt,
analyzed: kutas tad prakṛti tvāt tasya ādyasya viśeṣasya paraspara upasarpaṇa ādi āśrayāt pratyaya viśeṣāt āsādita tad anukūla viśeṣaiḥ sahakāribhiḥ paraspara upakāra nirapekṣaiḥ janya svabhāva tvāt
tad uttareṣām ca viśeṣāṇām sahakāri kṛta kārya utpāda anuguṇa viśeṣa janya svabhāva tvāt
yatas evam iti tasmāt na anavasthā prāk uktā

original: atha sahakāriṇā kṣityādinā kuśūlādyavastho 'pi bījādiḥ tenāpi kṣityādiḥ kṛtaviśeṣa evopatiṣṭhetānavasthaivaṃ syāt iti /
analyzed: atha sahakāriṇā kṣiti ādinā bīja ādiḥ tena api kṣiti ādiḥ kṛta viśeṣaḥ eva upatiṣṭheta anavasthā evam syāt iti

original: tatra vināśahetusannidhau svayaṃ nāśopagame prāṅnityo bhūtvā paścādanityo vinaśvarasvabhāvo bhavatīti brūte /
analyzed: tatra vināśa hetu sannidhau svayam nāśa upagame prāk nityaḥ bhūtvā paścāt anityaḥ vinaśvara svabhāvaḥ bhavati iti brūte
evam ca brūvāṇaḥ bhāva dvayam ca āha
vakṣyamāṇa apekṣaḥ cakāraḥ
kīdṛśam bhāva dvayam
nitya anityau svabhāvau bhedau yasya tathā

original: yo 'sau nityaḥ svabhāvaḥ prāktanaḥ tasya nityābhimatasya svayaṃ paścānnāśaṃ brūvāṇaḥ sarvadā pratikṣaṇameva nāśaṃ prāha /
analyzed: yaḥ sau nityaḥ svabhāvaḥ prāktanaḥ tasya nitya abhimatasya svayam paścāt nāśam brūvāṇaḥ sarvadā pratikṣaṇam eva nāśam prāha
anyathā pūrva uktena nyāyena paścāt api nāśa asambhavāt

original: atha pratikṣaṇamasya nāśo na bhavati tadā paścādapi tadayogāt sarvadaivānāśaṃ prāheti kṛtvā pūrvasminnityābhimate svabhāve vināśaheturasamartho  #
analyzed: atha pratikṣaṇam asya nāśaḥ na bhavati tadā paścāt api tad ayogāt sarva daiva anāśam prāha iti kṛtvā pūrvasmin nitya abhimate svabhāve vināśa hetuḥ asamarthaḥ
kiñcitkaraḥ eva

original: nanu ca vināśahetornaiva sāmarthyamupagataṃ parena virodhisannidhimapekṣya svayaṃ nāśopagamāt / na /
analyzed: nanu ca vināśa hetoḥ nā eva sāmarthyam upagatam parena virodhi sannidhim apekṣya svayam nāśa upagamāt  na
atas eva tad nibandhana tva prasaṅgāt nāśasya
anyathā hi akiñcitkaraḥ kimiti asau apekṣyate
hetu bhāvasya apekṣā lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: svahetava evātrāparādhyanti yadakiñcitkare 'pi tatrāpekṣāyāṃ niyuñjata iti cet /
analyzed: sva hetavaḥ eva atra aparādhyanti yat akiñcitkare tatra apekṣāyām niyuñjate iti ced

original: kaḥ punarayamasthānābhiniveśaḥ teṣāṃ yat tatra tathā niyuñjate /
analyzed: kaḥ punar ayam asthāna abhiniveśaḥ teṣām yat tatra tathā niyuñjate
tasmāt upakāri apekṣāyām eva hetavaḥ niyuñjānāḥ śobhante
anyathā te pi kārya ātmānaḥ nā eva tad niyogam ādriyeran
katham ca akiñcitkaraḥ virodhī nāma
na hi asya avirodhi tva abhimatāt viśeṣaḥ kaścid iti yat kiñcid etat
yat api uktam

original: yathānyeṣāṃ kṣaṇikavādināmakiñcitkaramapi mugdarādikamapekṣya ghaṭādipravāho nivartate tathāsmākamapi kālāntarasthāyī bhāvaḥ';
analyzed: yathā anyeṣām kṣaṇika vādinām akiñcitkaram api mugdara ādikam apekṣya ghaṭa ādi pravāhaḥ nivartate tathā asmākam api kāla antara sthāyī bhāvaḥ
iti tat api para samaya anabhijña tayā ucyate

original: yato nāsmākaṃ pravāho nāma kṣaṇavyatirikto 'sti yo 'kiñcitkaramugdarādisannidhau nivarteta /
analyzed: yatas na asmākam pravāhaḥ nāma kṣaṇa vyatiriktaḥ sti yaḥ kiñcid kara mugdara ādi sannidhau nivarteta
kṣaṇāḥ eva hi kevalam santi
te ca sva nivṛttau na mugdara ādikam apekṣante
svarasataḥ eva nirodhāt

original: yā tu teṣāṃ kapālādivṛttilakṣaṇā paryudāsavṛttyā nivṛttiḥ yasyāṃ satyāmekatvābhiniveśino lokasya sadṛśāparabhāvarūpasya vibhramanimittasyāpagamāt
analyzed: yā tu teṣām kapāla ādi vṛtti lakṣaṇā paryudāsa vṛttyā nivṛttiḥ yasyām satyām ekatva abhiniveśinaḥ lokasya sadṛśa apara bhāva rūpasya vibhrama nimittasya apagamāt
nivṛttāḥ ghaṭa ādayaḥ
iti vyavahāraḥ
tatra akiñcitkaratvam mugdara ādīnām na eva asti
tad bhāve eva teṣām bhāvāt
vegavat mugdara ādi sahakāriṇaḥ ghaṭa kṣaṇāt paraspara upasarpaṇa ādi āśrayāt

original: pratyayaviśeṣāt sañjātātiśayāt kapāladerbhavanadharmatvāt tasya ca tajjannasvabhāvatvāditi /
analyzed: pratyaya viśeṣāt sañjāta atiśayāt kapāla deḥ bhavana dharma tvāt tasya ca tad janna svabhāva tvāt iti

original: svabhāvadvayopagamaprasaṅgāditi parijihīrṣayā para āha- “na prāg” ityādi /
analyzed: svabhāva dvaya upagama prasaṅgāt iti parijihīrṣayā paraḥ āha na prāk ityādi
kutas etat
eka svabhāva tvāt

original: sarvadaikasvabhāvasya sarvadā nityataiva na paścādanityasvabhāvatāsambhava iti /
analyzed: sarvadā eka svabhāvasya sarvadā nitya tā eva na paścāt anitya svabhāva tā asambhavaḥ iti

original: siddhāntavādyāha- “sa tarhi bhāvaḥ” sarvadā nityasvabhāvaḥ svabhāvena “nāśamanāviśan” apratipadyamānaḥ kathaṃ naiva naṣṭo(kathaṃ naṣṭo) nāma?
analyzed: siddhāntavādī āha sa tarhi bhāvaḥ sarvadā nitya svabhāvaḥ svabhāvena nāśam an āviśan a pratipadyamānaḥ katham nā eva naṣṭa ukatham naṣṭaḥ nāma
kutas tad svabhāva vināśayoḥ nitya svabhāva tāyā
vināśasya ca anitya rūpa tāyāḥ ca a paraspara rūpa tvāt paraspara parihāra rūpa tvāt

original: upasaṃharannāha- “yata evaṃ” sthitidharmaṇāṃ vināśo naiva yujyate tasmāt sati asya
analyzed: upasaṃharan āha yatas evam sthiti dharmaṇām vināśaḥ nā eva yujyate tasmāt sati asya

original: vināśe yadyavaśyambhāvī kṛtakarūpasya sato vināśa iṣyate paraistadā “vināśasvabhāvena“-
analyzed: vināśe yadi avaśyambhāvī kṛtaka rūpasya sataḥ vināśaḥ iṣyate paraiḥ tadā vināśa svabhāvena
vinaśyati na avatiṣṭhate iti vināśaḥ
kartari bahula vacanāt gham
sa svabhāvaḥ yasya tena vināśa svabhāvena asthiti dharmaṇā

original: “tena” kṛtakarūpeṇa satā vastunā svahetubhyo “bhavitavyam” anyathāvaśyambhāvitayopagatasya kṛtakātmanāṃ satāṃ vināśasyaivāyogāt /
analyzed: tena kṛtaka rūpeṇa satā vastunā sva hetubhyaḥ bhavitavyam anyathā avaśyambhāvi tayā upagatasya kṛtaka ātmanām satām vināśasya eva ayogāt
bhavatu evam iti ced

original: āha- “tathāpi” svayaṃ vināśasvabhāvatve 'pi na kevalamavinaśvarasvabhāvatve svabhāvānyathātvāsambhavād vyartho vināśaheturiti prathamavikalpopanyāsa  #
analyzed: āha tathā api svayam vināśa svabhāva tve pi na kevalam avinaśvara svabhāva tve svabhāva anyathātva asambhavāt vyarthaḥ vināśa hetuḥ iti
eva uktam na punar ucyate
yatas evam tena ityādi sugamam

original: tadevaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣāmasāmarthya- vaiyarthyābhyāṃ taddhetvayogena kṛtakalakṣaṇasya
analyzed: tat evam vināśam prati anapekṣām asāmarthya vaiyarthyābhyām tad hetu ayogena kṛtaka lakṣaṇasya

original: sattvasya pūrvācāryadarśitāṃ pratipādya yathāsau viparyaye bādhakapramāṇatāmanubhavati
analyzed: sattvasya pūrva ācārya darśi tām pratipādya yathā asau viparyaye bādhaka pramāṇa tām anubhavati
darśayan āha tasmāt vināśaḥ ityādi
prayogaḥ tu evam ye yad bhāvam pratyanapekṣāḥ te tad bhāva niyatāḥ
tat yathā antyā kāraṇa sāmagrī sva kārya utpādane
anapekṣaḥ ca kṛtaka rūpaḥ san bhāvaḥ vināśe vaśyambhāvi vināśatayā upagataḥ

original: parairiti svabhāvahetuprasaṅgaprayogo viparyaye bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pūrvācāryapradarśitam /
analyzed: paraiḥ iti svabhāva hetu prasaṅga prayogaḥ viparyaye bādhakam pramāṇam pūrva ācārya pradarśitam
tatas tad bhāva niyata tve

original: nāśasyākādācitkatvādudayānantaraṃ nāśa iti “yaḥ san” kṛtakalakṣaṇo bhāvaḥ “sa vināśī”
analyzed: nāśasya akādācitka tvāt udaya anantaram nāśaḥ iti yaḥ san kṛtaka lakṣaṇaḥ bhāvaḥ sa vināśī

original: vinaśvarasvabhāvo naśvaratāyāḥ sādhyadharmasya nivṛttau ca kṛtakalakṣaṇasattvanivṛttiriti
analyzed: vinaśvara svabhāvaḥ naśvara tāyāḥ sādhya dharmasya nivṛttau ca kṛtaka lakṣaṇa sattva nivṛttiḥ iti
kṛtvā kṛtaka lakṣaṇasya sattvasya kṣaṇika tāyām anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ sampadyate anapekṣayā anukrānta sattva kṣaṇika tvayoḥ tādātmya siddheḥ
tad nibandhanayoḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ api niścayāt

original: tadevaṃ pūrvācāryān prati akṛtakasya sato 'bhāvāt “sadakāraṇavannityam” iti nityalakṣaṇavirahādeva na tannityatvam /
analyzed: tat evam pūrva ācāryān prati akṛtakasya sataḥ bhāvāt sat akāraṇavat nityam iti nitya lakṣaṇa virahāt eva na tat nitya tvam

original: yattu sad utpattimat tad uktena nyāyenāvaśyaṃnāśitayopagataṃ paraiḥ kālāntarasthāyi na bhavatīti prati pāditam /
analyzed: yat tu sat utpattimat tat uktena nyāyena avaśyaṃnāśi tayā upagatam paraiḥ kāla antara sthāyi na bhavati iti prati pāditam

original: yadā tu yat sat tat kṣaṇikameveti sāmānyenocyate kṛtakākṛtakalakṣaṇaṃ sato bhedamanapekṣya prauḍhavāditayā kṛtakasyāpi cāvaśyambhāvī vināśa  #
analyzed: yadā tu yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva iti sāmānyena ucyate kṛtaka akṛtaka lakṣaṇam sataḥ bhedam an apekṣya prauḍha vādi tayā kṛtakasya api ca avaśyambhāvī
iti para upagamaḥ na apekṣyate

original: tadā vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣatvameva sarvasya na sidhyati /
analyzed: tadā vināśam prati anapekṣa tvam eva sarvasya na sidhyati
yeṣām hi vināśaḥ bhavaṃvan

original: dṛṣṭo ghaṭādīnāṃ teṣāmeva taddhaitvayogat tatrānapekṣā yujyate /
analyzed: dṛṣṭaḥ ghaṭa ādīnām teṣām eva tad haitva yogat tatra anapekṣā yujyate

original: ye tu deśādivyavahitāḥ parvatādayo vā vinaśāmāviśanto na dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmavaśyaṃ vināśitvopagamanibandhanābhāvādantye
analyzed: ye tu deśa ādi vyavahitāḥ parvata ādayaḥ vā vinaśām āviśantaḥ na dṛṣṭāḥ teṣām avaśyam vināśi tva upagama nibandhana abhāvāt antye

original: 'pyayaṃ vināśaṃ pratyanapekṣa eva vinaśyanna'viśeṣādādāvapi tadbhāvaniyata iti vaktumaśakyatvāt
analyzed: api ayam vināśam prati anapekṣaḥ eva vinaśyan aviśeṣāt ādau api tad bhāva niyataḥ iti vaktum aśakya tvāt
tad svabhāva sāpekṣa tvāt
vināśam prati anapekṣa tva asiddheḥ akṛtakānām ca ākāśa ādīnām vināśi svabhāva sāpekṣāṇām iti anapekṣayā
sataḥ naśvara svabhāva tā siddheḥ anvaya vyatirekayoḥ tad nibandhanayoḥ ayogam utpaśyan arthakriyā virodha lakṣaṇam eva

original: tadā bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ tādātmyaprasādhakamabhidhānīyamiti manyamānaḥ pūrvapakṣamutthāpayannāha-
analyzed: tadā bādhakam pramāṇam tādātmya prasādhakam abhidhānīyam iti manyamānaḥ pūrvapakṣam utthāpayan āha
svabhāvataḥ naśvara tve pi uktena hbṭ
nyāyena paridṛśyamāna vināśānām ghaṭa ādīnām kaścid deśa ādi vyavahitaḥ parvata ādiḥ vā anupalabdha vināśaḥ

original: kṛtako 'pi sadrūpa ākāśādirvākṛtakaḥ sanna “'tatsvabhāvo 'pi” avināśisvabhāvo 'pi syāt /
analyzed: kṛtakaḥ pi sat rūpaḥ ākāśa ādiḥ vā akṛtakaḥ san na tad svabhāvaḥ api avināśi svabhāvaḥ api syāt
api śabdaḥ sambhāvanāyām
tasya vināśi svabhāva saṃsādhaka pramāṇa abhāvāt āśaṅkayate etat

original: tataśca vināśisvabhāvasāpekṣatvāt tadanapekṣatvamasiddhamiti tadvaśāt sādhyasya kṣaṇikatvasya sattvasvabhāvatvāsiddheḥ tannibandhanā nānvayavyatirekasiddhiriti
analyzed: tatas ca vināśi svabhāva sāpekṣa tvāt tad anapekṣa tvam asiddham iti tad vaśāt sādhyasya kṣaṇikatvasya sattva svabhāva tva asiddheḥ tad nibandhanā nā anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ iti

original: kiṃ punaratrāśaṅkānimittaṃ yena kaścidatatsvabhāvo 'pyāśaṅkayata ityāha- “na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvaḥ” iti /
analyzed: kim punar atra āśaṅkā nimittam yena kaścid atatsvabhāvaḥ pi āśaṅkayate iti āha na hi sarvaḥ sarvasya svabhāvaḥ iti

original: vicitrasvabhāvā hi bhāvā dṛśyante- kecit sapratighāḥ kecidapratighāḥ,
analyzed: vicitra svabhāvāḥ hi bhāvāḥ dṛśyante kecid sa pratighāḥ kecid apratighāḥ
tathā nīla anīla ādi svabhāvāḥ

original: tathā kecidvināśinaḥ anye tvavināśisvabhāvāḥ śaṅkayanta iti pūrvapakṣāśaṅkā /
analyzed: tathā kecid vināśinaḥ anye tu avināśi svabhāvāḥ śaṅkayantaḥ iti pūrvapakṣa āśaṅkā
na syāt iti āśaṅkanīyam
tathā abhāve hi akṣaṇika tvam tasya syāt
tasmin ca satya vastu tva prasaṅgāt kutas tad svabhāva tā āśaṅkā
katham punar akṣaṇika tve vastu tva prasaṅgaḥ
yatas sattvasya kṣaṇikatva svabhāva tayā anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ iti atas āha śaktiḥ hi ityādi
arthakriyā kāri tvam eva sattvam
tat ca kṣaṇikānām eva iti

original: evaṃ manyate- iha tāvadidameva vicāraṇīyam kiṃlakṣaṇametad bhāvānāṃ sattvaṃ yuktamiti /
analyzed: evam manyate iha tāvat idam eva vicāraṇīyam kiṃlakṣaṇam etat bhāvānām sattvam yuktam iti
tatra na sattā yoga lakṣaṇam avyāpteḥ
sāmānya diṣu abhāvāt
vandhyā suta ādiṣu api bhāvāt ativyāpteḥ vā

original: vandhyāsutādīnāmasattvāt kathaṃ sattāyogaḥ? iti cet / na /
analyzed: vandhyā suta ādīnām asattvāt katham sattā yogaḥ iti ced na
itaretara āśrayāt
yatas teṣām asattvam sattā yoga virahāt eva tad virahaḥ ca asattvāt iti

original: yadi ca satāmeva sattāyogaḥ evaṃ tarhyanyat sattvalakṣaṇamabhidhānīyam sattāyogasya ca vaiyarthyam,
analyzed: yadi ca satām eva sattā yogaḥ evam tarhi anyat sattva lakṣaṇam abhidhānīyam sattā yogasya ca vaiyarthyam
tat eva vastunaḥ sattvāt
sarva artha kriyā sāmarthya virahāt sattā yoga abhāvaḥ teṣām iti ced

original: evaṃ sati yadevārthakriyasāmarthyayuktaṃ tasyaiva sattāyoga ityarthakriyāsāmarthyameva bhāvalakṣaṇamāyātamityapārthakaḥ /
analyzed: evam sati yat eva arthakriya sāmarthya yuktam tasya eva sattā yogaḥ iti arthakriyā sāmarthyam eva bhāva lakṣaṇam āyātam iti apārthakaḥ
sattā yogaḥ
ittham ca evam

original: anyathā sāmānyādīnāṃ kathaṃ svarūpaṃ sattvaṃ syāt? /
analyzed: anyathā sāmānya ādīnām katham svarūpam sattvam syāt
arthakriyā sāmarthyam tu sarveṣām asti iti tat eva bhāva lakṣaṇam
sat iti etat api ayuktam
dhrauvyeṇa utpāda vyayayoḥ virodhāt ekasmin smin
dharmiṇī ayogāt
kathañcid utpāda vyayau kathañcid dhrauvyam iti ced
yathā utpāda vyayau na tathā dhrauvyam

original: yathā ca dhrauvyaṃ na tathotpādavyayāviti naikaṃ vastu yathoktalakṣaṇaṃ syāt /
analyzed: yathā ca dhrauvyam na tathā utpāda vyayau iti na ekam vastu yathā ukta lakṣaṇam syāt
tatas nyasya bhāva lakṣaṇasya ayogāt śakteḥ ca antaśas sva jñāna janane pi upagamāt paraiḥ
anyathā ṣaṣ padārtha ādi vyavasthāna ayogāt sā eva bhāva lakṣaṇam
sarva śakti virahaḥ punar abhāva lakṣaṇam
sarva grahaṇam ca sarvasya vastunaḥ vastu antara śakti viraha rūpa tvāt abhāva tā nirāsa artham

original: yasya tu na kvacicchaktiḥ sa evaikāntenābhāva ucyate /
analyzed: yasya tu na kvacid śaktiḥ saḥ eva ekāntena abhāvaḥ ucyate

original: śaktilakṣaṇameva sattvamakṣaṇike syāt tataḥ kṣaṇikātmatā sattvasya na sidhyatīti kuto 'nvayavyatirekau?
analyzed: śakti lakṣaṇam eva sattvam akṣaṇike syāt tatas kṣaṇika ātma tā sattvasya na sidhyati iti kutas nvaya vyatirekau

original: iti cet, āha- “na caivākṣaṇikasya” kvacit kārye 'ntaśo jñānalakṣaṇe 'pi śaktirasti tat kutastasya tallakṣaṇaṃ sattvamatītāderiva bhaviṣyati?
analyzed: iti ced āha na ca eva akṣaṇikasya kvacid kārye śaktiḥ asti tat kutas tasya tat lakṣaṇam sattvam atīta ādeḥ iva bhaviṣyati
yatas sattvasya kṣaṇika ātma tā na sidhyet

original: nanu ca śakteratīndriyatvāt kāraṇānāṃ kāryarambhaniyamābhāvācca kathaṃ tadviraho
analyzed: nanu ca śakteḥ atīndriya tvāt kāraṇānām kārya rambha niyama abhāvāt ca katham tad viraho
kṣaṇikasya bhavet yatas sarva śakti viraha lakṣaṇena asattvena virodhinā nirākriyamāṇam

original: sattvaṃ kṣaṇikātmatāmevānubhavet yato 'nvayavyatirekau syātāmityata āha- “kramayaugapadyābhyām” ityādi /
analyzed: sattvam kṣaṇika ātma tām eva anubhavet yatas nvaya vyatirekau syātām iti atas āha krama yaugapadyābhyām ityādi
na eva pratyakṣataḥ kārya virahāt vā sarva śakti viraho kṣaṇika tve ucyate
kintu tad vdyāpaka virahāt

original: tathā hi- kramayaugapadyābhyāṃ kāryakriyā vyāptā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
analyzed: tathā hi krama yaugapadyābhyām kārya kriyā vyāptā prakāra antara abhāvāt
tatas kārya kriyā śakti vyāpakayoḥ tayoḥ akṣaṇika tve
virodhāt nirvṛtteḥ tad dyāptāyāḥ kārya kriyā śakteḥ api nivṛttiḥ iti sarva śakti viraha lakṣaṇam asattvam akṣaṇika tve vyāpaka anupalabdhiḥ ākarṣati
viruddhayoḥ ekatra ayogāt
tatas nivṛttam sattvam kṣaṇikeṣu eva avatiṣṭhamānam tad ātmatām anubhavati iti
yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva
iti anvaya vyatireka rūpāyāḥ vyāpteḥ siddhiḥ niścayaḥ bhavati

original: nanu ca prakārāntarābhāvāt kāryamaṅkurādikaṃ bījādinā kramayaugapadyābhyāmeva kriyata ityucyate sa eva tu prakārāntaravirahaḥ kāryātmanaḥ kutaḥ  #
analyzed: nanu ca prakāra antara abhāvāt kāryam aṅkura ādikam bīja ādinā krama yaugapadyābhyām eva kriyate iti ucyate saḥ eva tu prakāra antara virahaḥ kārya ātmanaḥ kutas
siddhaḥ
prakāra antarasya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tve katham atyanta asambhavaḥ
kevalam deśa ādi niṣedha mātram eva syāt
anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tvena asattā niścayaḥ viprakarṣiṇām iti kutas tad abhāva siddhiḥ

original: tataḥ prakarāntareṇārthakriyāsambhavāt kramayaugapadyanivṛttāvapi nārthakriyāsāmarthyanivṛttiriti kuto 'kṣaṇikatve sati sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇamasattvam?
analyzed: tatas prakara antareṇa arthakriyā sambhavāt krama yaugapadya nivṛttau api nā arthakriyā sāmarthya nivṛttiḥ iti kutas kṣaṇika tve sati sarva sāmarthya viraha lakṣaṇam asattvam
yatas sattvasya kṣanikā ātma tayā anvaya vyatirekau syātām na
ubhayathā api adoṣāt

original: tathā hi- kramo nāma paripāṭiḥ kāryāntarāsāhityaṃ kaivalyamaṅkurādeḥ,
analyzed: tathā hi kramaḥ nāma paripāṭiḥ kārya antara asāhityam kaivalyam aṅkura ādeḥ
yaugapadyam api tasya aparaiḥ bīja ādi kāryaiḥ sāhityam
prakāra antaram ca aṅkura ādeḥ tad ubhaya avasthā virahe pi anyathā bhavanam

original: tasya cāṅkurādisvabhāvasyānyasahitasya kevalasya vābhāve pratyakṣabodhagamyamāne satyupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpta eva svabhāvaḥ kramayaugapadyabhāvabahirbhūto  #
analyzed: tasya ca aṅkura ādi svabhāvasya anya sahitasya kevalasya vā abhāve pratyakṣa bodha gamyamāne sati upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptaḥ eva svabhāvaḥ krama yaugapadya bhāva bahis bhūtaḥ
na upalabhyate

original: vastunaḥ upalabhyasyānyasāhitye kaivalye cāpanīte tadviviktadeśādipratibhāsinaḥ pratyakṣasyodayāt svabhāvānupalambhata evābhāvaniścayādilakṣaṇavyavahāravṛtteḥ
analyzed: vastunaḥ upalabhyasya anya sāhitye kaivalye ca apanīte tad vivikta deśa ādi pratibhāsinaḥ pratyakṣasya udayāt svabhāva anupalambhataḥ eva abhāva niścaya ādi lakṣaṇa vyavahāra vṛtteḥ

original: tasya cāṅkurādibhāvasyāvasthādvayabahirbhāvaniṣedhe kayościddeśakālayoḥ deśāntarādau krameṇāṅkurādibhāvavatīratarasmin vā bhāve 'pi na kācit  #
analyzed: tasya ca aṅkura ādi bhāvasya avasthā dvaya bahirbhāva niṣedhe kayościd deśa kālayoḥ deśa antara ādau krameṇa aṅkura ādi bhāvavat iratarasmin vā bhāve na kācid
kṣatiḥ

original: tataḥ pratyakṣata eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddheḥ kathaṃ kramayaugapadyābhyāmarthakriyāśaktiravyāptā syāt? /
analyzed: tatas pratyakṣataḥ eva prakāra antara abhāva siddheḥ katham krama yaugapadyābhyām arthakriyā śaktiḥ avyāptā syāt

original: śāstrakārastu yathā pratyakṣata eva prakārāntarābhāvasiddhiḥ tathā svayam “etena kramākramādayo 'pī“ti atidiśan vakṣyati /
analyzed: śāstra kāraḥ tu yathā pratyakṣataḥ eva prakāra antara abhāva siddhiḥ tathā svayam etena kramākrama ādayaḥ api iti atidiśan vakṣyati
hbṭ
anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tve pi prakāra antarasya krama yaugapadyayoḥ anyaḥ vaccheda rūpa tvāt eva āśrayasi
t hi tathā hi anyonya vyavaccheda rūpāṇām eka niṣedhena apara vidhānāt tasya apratiṣedhe vidhi pratiṣedhayoḥ virodhāt ubhaya pratiṣedha ātmanaḥ prakāra antarasya
kutas sambhavaḥ

original: atra prayogaḥ- yatra yatprakāravyavacchedena yaditaraprakāravyavasthānaṃ na tatra prakārāntarasambhavaḥ,
analyzed: atra prayogaḥ yatra yad prakāra vyavacchedena yat itara prakāra vyavasthānam na tatra prakāra antara sambhavaḥ
tat yathā a nīla prakāra vyavacchedena a nīla prakāra antara vyavasthāyām pīte
asti ca krama yaugapadyayoḥ anyatara prakāra vyavacchedena tad itara prakāra vyavasthānam
vyavacchidyamāna prakāra a viṣayīkṛte sarvatra kārya kāraṇa rūpe vastuni iti viruddhā upalabdhiḥ
vyavacchidyamāna prakāra itara vyavasthānam ca
prakāra antara sambhavaḥ ca tatas bahirbhāva lakṣaṇaḥ iti anayoḥ tattva anyatva rūpayoḥ anyonya parihāra sthita lakṣaṇa tvāt
na ca atra api bādhaka antara āśaṅkayā anavasthānam āśaṅkanīyam
pūrva prasiddhasya virodhasya smaraṇa mātra tvāt

original: viruddhopalabdhiṣu bahirddharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvamupadarśya virodhasādhanameva bādhakam,
analyzed: viruddha upalabdhiṣu bahis dharmiṇi hetoḥ sadbhāvam upadarśya virodha sādhanam eva bādhakam
tat ca iha asti

original: tato viruddhayorekatrāsambhāvāt pratiyogyabhāvaniścayaḥ śītoṣṇasparśayoriva bhāvābhāvayoriva veti kuto 'navasthā? /
analyzed: tatas viruddhayoḥ ekatra asambhāvāt pratiyogi abhāva niścayaḥ śīta uṣṇa sparśayoḥ iva bhāva abhāvayoḥ iva vā iti kutas navasthā
tatra na krameṇa akṣaṇikaḥ kāryāṇi karoti aviśeṣāt akāraka avasthāyām iva
sahakāri apekṣā ca dvividhasya api sahakāri tvasya ayogāt anupanyasanīyā
sarveṣām ca eka kriyā kāle eva kriyā prasakteḥ
tad kārakasya svabhāvasya tadā eva bhāvāt
na api yugapad
pratyakṣa ādi virodhāt
punar tad kriyā prasaṅgāt ca
kṛta tvāt na iti ced na
sāmarthya anapāyāt
anyathā prāk api akāraka rūpa viśeṣāt akriyā syāt
