śakta aśakta tayā tarhi ekatra eva kārye bheda prasaṅga śāli kodrava bīja ādeḥ iva

original: nityaśca yadā yugapat karoti tataḥ prāgapi bhāvāt tadaiva tatkriyāprasaṅgaḥ punastato 'pi pūrvataram ityevaṃ na kadācidyugapat kriyā syāt /
analyzed: nityaḥ ca yadā yugapad karoti tatas prāk api bhāvāt tadā eva tad kriyā prasaṅgaḥ punar pūrvataram iti evam na kadācid yugapad kriyā syāt
pūrva uttara kālayoḥ ca ekadā yugapad kāriṇaḥ nyadā sarva artha kriyā sāmarthya viraha lakṣaṇam asattvam
syāt iti katham na kṣaṇikatā
kriyā upagame vā krama pakṣe eva
tatra ca uktaḥ doṣaḥ

original: evamakṣaṇikatve sati cakṣurādyāyatanānāmasattvaprasaṅgāt kṣaṇikatāyāmeva sattvamiti yat sat tat kṣaṇikameveti sato naśvarātmatāsiddheḥ anvayavyatirekarūpavyāptisiddhiriti
analyzed: evam akṣaṇika tve sati cakṣuḥ ādi āyatanānām asattva prasaṅgāt kṣaṇikatāyām eva sattvam iti yat sat tat kṣaṇikam eva iti sataḥ naśvara ātma tā siddheḥ anvaya vyatireka rūpa vyāpti siddhiḥ iti

kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavasthā
tat evam svabhāva hetau tādātmya siddhi nibandhanam anvaya vyatireka niścayam pratipādya
kārya hetau kārya kāraṇa bhāva siddhi nimitta tvāt tayoḥ tasyāḥ ca pratyakṣa anupalambha nibandhanāyāḥ

original: prāgeva darśitatvāt tagdatamaparamapi pareṣāṃ bhrāntikāraṇapanetuṃ tadviṣayaṃ darśayannāha-
analyzed: prāk eva darśita tvāt tat datam aparam api pareṣām tad viṣayam darśayan āha
artha antare hetoḥ vyatirikte vastuni gamye kāryam hetuḥ

original: kasmāt punararthāntare kāryameva heturityāha- “avyabhicārāt” iti kāryameva hyarthāntaraṃ
analyzed: kasmāt punar artha antare kāryam eva hetuḥ iti āha avyabhicārāt iti kāryam eva hi arthāntaram

original: na vyabhicarati nānyat yathoktaṃ prāk tataḥ kāryamevārthāntare gamye heturucyate
analyzed: na vyabhicarati na anyat yathā uktam prāk tatas kāryam eva artha antare gamye hetuḥ ucyate

analyzed: na ca kenacid ityādinā yaḥ sarvathā gamya gamaka bhāva prasaṅgaḥ ācāryeṇa uktaḥ parasya

original: tamihāpi kāryahetau paraḥ kadācit prasañjayedityāśaṅkamāna āha- “kāryakāraṇa- ” ityādi /

original: yadi hi kāryaṃ heturucyate tadā kāryakāraṇabhāvena kāraṇenāsya gamakatvam /

original: tathā ca sati sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti /

original: agneḥ sāmānyadharmavad viśeṣadharmā api tārṇapārṇādayo gamyāḥ syuḥ /
analyzed: agneḥ sāmānya dharma vat viśeṣa dharmāḥ api tārṇa pārṇa ādayaḥ gamyāḥ syuḥ

original: dhūmasyāpi viśeṣadharmavad dravyatvapārthivatvādayo 'pi sāmānyadharmā gamakā bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: dhūmasya api viśeṣa dharma vat dravya tva pārthiva tva ādayaḥ pi sāmānya dharmāḥ gamakāḥ bhaveyuḥ
kutas sarvathā janya janaka bhāvāt
janya janaka bhāvaḥ hi kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ ucyate

original: sa ca nāgnidhūmayoraṃśena api tu sarveṇa prakāreṇa /
analyzed: sa ca na agni dhūmayoḥ aṃśena api tu sarveṇa prakāreṇa

original: tathāhi- yathā agniragnitvadravyatvasattvādibhiḥ sāmānyadharmairjanakaḥ tathā tārṇapārṇatvādibhirviśeṣadharmairapi,
analyzed: tathā hi yathā agniḥ agni tva dravya tva sattva ādibhiḥ sāmānya dharmaiḥ janakaḥ tathā tārṇa pārṇa tva ādibhiḥ viśeṣa dharmaiḥ api

original: yathā ca dhūmo dhūmatvapāṇḍutvādibhiḥ svaniyatairviśeṣadharmairjanyaḥ tathā sāmānyadharmairapi sattvadravyatvādibhiḥ /
analyzed: yathā ca dhūmaḥ dhūma tva pāṇḍu tva ādibhiḥ sva niyataiḥ viśeṣa dharmaiḥ janyaḥ tathā sāmānya dharmaiḥ api sattva dravya tva ādibhiḥ

original: tataśca yathā tayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvaḥ prāpnoti,
analyzed: tatas ca yathā tayoḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāvaḥ tathā eva gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ prāpnoti
tasya eva tad nibandhana tvāt iti pūrvapakṣa āśaṅkā

original: atrāha- “na sarvathā janyajanakabhāvaḥ” tataśca kutastathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ syāt? /
analyzed: atra āha na sarvathā janya janaka bhāvaḥ tatas ca kutas tathā gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ syāt
kasmāt iti ced hbṭ

original: “tadabhāve” teṣāṃ tārṇapārṇatvādināṃ viśeṣadharmāṇāmabhāve “bhavato” dhūmamātrasya tebhya eva viśeṣadharmebhyo bhavatīti evamātmanaḥ “tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt”
analyzed: tad abhāve teṣām tārṇa pārṇa tva ādinām viśeṣa dharmāṇām abhāve bhavataḥ dhūma mātrasya tebhyaḥ eva viśeṣa dharmebhyaḥ bhavati iti evam ātmanaḥ tad utpatti niyamasya abhāvāt

original: tathā “tadabhāve” agnyabhāve bhavato dravyatvādeḥ sāmānyadharmasyāgnerevāyaṃ bhavatī tyevaṃrūpasya tadutpattiniyamasyābhāvāt kutaḥ sarvathā
analyzed: tathā tad abhāve agni abhāve bhavataḥ dravya tva ādeḥ sāmānya dharmasya agneḥ eva ayam bhavati ti evaṃrūpasya tad utpatti niyamasya abhāvāt kutas sarvathā

original: na hyasati tadutpattiniyame janyajanakabhāvo vyavasthāpayituṃ yuktaḥ /
analyzed: na hi asati tad utpatti niyame janya janaka bhāvaḥ vyavasthāpayitum yuktaḥ

original: yata evaṃ “tasmāt kāryaṃ” dhūmādikaṃ “svabhāvairyāvadbhi” rdhūmatvādibhiḥ svagataiḥ /

analyzed: idānīm kāraṇa sthaiḥ svabhāvaiḥ yāvadbhiḥ agni tva dravya tva ādibhiḥ avinābhāvi teṣām kāraṇa gatānām sāmānya dharmāṇām hetuḥ kāryam gamakam

original: kasmāt? ityāha- “tatkāryatvaniyamāt” teṣāmeva kāraṇagatānāṃ sāmānyadharmānāṃ tat kāryamityevaṃrūpasya niyamasya sadbhāvāt /

original: nahi tān sāmānyadharmān kadācidapi kāryaṃ vyabhicarati /

original: evaṃ kāraṇagatamaṃśaṃ pāścātyenārthena nirūpya prāktanenārthena kāryagatamaṃśaṃ nirūpayannāha- “taireva ca” ityādi /
analyzed: evam kāraṇa gatam aṃśam pāścātyena arthena nirūpya prāktanena arthena kārya gatam aṃśam nirūpayan āha taiḥ eva ca ityādi

original: kāryamapi taireva dharmaiḥ svagataiḥ kāraṇagatānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gamakam yathāntarā sambhavino dhūmatvapāṇḍupārṇatvādayo viśeṣarūpāstaiḥ kāraṇagataiḥ  #
analyzed: kāryam api taiḥ eva dharmaiḥ svagataiḥ kāraṇa gatānām dharmāṇām gamakam yathā antarā sambhavinaḥ dhūma tva pāṇḍu pārṇa tva ādayaḥ viśeṣa rūpāḥ taiḥ kāraṇa gataiḥ

atra api tad kāryatva niyamāt
iti apekṣyate

original: na hi te viśeṣadharmāḥ kāryagatāḥ kāraṇasthasāmānyadharmairvinā kadācidapi bhavanti /

kāraṇa stha sāmānya dharmaiḥ vinā bhavatām

original: tadevaṃ kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyā na viśeṣadharmāḥ,
analyzed: tat evam kāraṇasya sāmānya dharmāḥ eva gamyāḥ na viśeṣa dharmāḥ

original: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakā na sāmānyadharmāḥ,
analyzed: kāryasya api viśeṣa dharmāḥ eva gamakāḥ na sāmānya dharmāḥ

original: ye tu kāraṇasya viśeṣadharmā yaistatkāryatvaniyamaḥ kāryamātrasya nāstīti na te gamyāḥ /
analyzed: ye tu kāraṇasya viśeṣa dharmāḥ yaiḥ tad kārya tva niyamaḥ kārya mātrasya na asti iti na te gamyāḥ

original: ye ca kāryasya sāmānyadharmā dravyatvādayasteṣāmapi tatkāryatvaniyamābhāvādeva gamakatvaṃ
analyzed: ye ca kāryasya sāmānya dharmāḥ dravya tva ādayaḥ teṣām api tad kāryatva niyama abhāvāt eva gamaka tvam

original: nāstīti kāryakāraṇabhāvena gamakatve kutaḥ sarvathā gamyagamakabhāvaḥ pareṣāmiva prasajyeta? /
analyzed: na asti iti kārya kāraṇa bhāvena gamaka tve kutas sarvathā gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ pareṣām iva prasajyeta

original: [2. janyajanakabhāvasya sarvathā sattve 'pi gamyagamakabhāvasya na tathātvam /]
analyzed: janya janaka bhāvasya sarvathā sattve pi gamya gamaka bhāvasya na tathātvam
parasya aniṣṭha āpādanam āśaṅkayā āha aṃśena ityādi

original: yadi hi kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva gamyāḥ kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva gamakāḥ tatkāryatvaniyamādiṣyante,
analyzed: yadi hi kāraṇasya sāmānya dharmāḥ eva gamyāḥ kāryasya api viśeṣa dharmāḥ eva gamakāḥ tad kārya tva niyamāt iṣyante
hanta tarhi aśena janya janaka bhāvaḥ prāptaḥ

original: kāraṇasya sāmānyadharmā eva janakā na viśeṣadharmāḥ,
analyzed: kāraṇasya sāmānya dharmāḥ eva janakāḥ na viśeṣa dharmāḥ

original: kāryasyāpi viśeṣadharmā eva janyā na sāmānyadharmā iti syāt /
analyzed: kāryasya api viśeṣa dharmāḥ eva janyāḥ na sāmānya dharmāḥ iti syāt
sarvathā ca janya janaka bhāvaḥ bhimataḥ iti ubhyupagama virodhaḥ
etat pariharati na aṃśena janya janaka bhāva prasaṅgaḥ
niraṃśa tvena vastunaḥ sarva ātmanā tad abhyupagamāt
gamya gamaka bhāvasya api sarvathā abhimata tvāt
tat āha tad janyaḥ ityādi

original: yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇagatairviśeṣadharmairjanyo yo viśeṣaḥ sa grahītuṃ śakyate,
analyzed: yadi hi kāryasya taiḥ kāraṇa gataiḥ viśeṣa dharmaiḥ janyaḥ yaḥ viśeṣaḥ sa grahītum śakyate
tadā tad janya viśeṣa grahaṇe bhimata tvāt kāraṇa gata viśeṣa dharmāṇām gamya tvasya

original: tathā liṅgaviśeṣo dhūmatvādi upādhirviśeṣaṇaṃ yeṣāṃ dravyatvādīnāṃ sāmānyānāṃ kāryagatānāṃ teṣāṃ cābhimatatvāgdamakatvasya /
analyzed: tathā liṅga viśeṣaḥ dhūma tva ādi upādhiḥ viśeṣaṇam yeṣām dravya tva ādīnām sāmānyānām kārya gatānām teṣām ca abhimata tvāt damaka tvasya

original: tathā hi- agurudhūmagrahaṇe bhavatyeva tadagneranumānaṃ dhūmatvaviśeṣaṇena ca dravyatvādināgneranumānam /

original: na hi sarvathā janyajanakabhāvo 'stītyeva tathaiva gamyagamakabhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: na hi sarvathā janya janaka bhāvaḥ sti iti eva tathā eva gamya gamaka bhāvaḥ bhavati

analyzed: yadi hi tad janya viśeṣa grahaṇa rahitam aviśiṣṭam kārya mātram upādīyate liṅga viśeṣa upādhi rahitam

original: tad yadyatādṛśādapi tadṛśo bhavet tadā tasya tajjanyaḥ svabhāva ityatadbhāvinaḥ sakṛdapi tato bhāvo na syāt /
analyzed: tat yadi atādṛśāt api tadṛśaḥ bhavet tadā tasya tad janyaḥ svabhāvaḥ iti atadbhāvinaḥ sakṛt api tatas bhāvaḥ na syāt
amum eva artham samarthayamanaḥ āha paraspara apekṣayā ityādi
kāraṇa apekṣayā hi janya svabhāvam kāryam
kārya apekṣayā ca janaka svabhāvam kāraṇam

original: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭam tasya tajjanyasvabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: yatas hi kāraṇāt yat bhavat dṛṣṭam tasya tad janya svabhāvaḥ
itarasya ca tad janakaḥ iti pratīyate
anyathā tasya tatas bhāva ayogāt
itarasya ca tad janana ayogāt

original: yadi nāmaivaṃ tataḥ prakṛte kiṃ siddham?
analyzed: yadi nāma evam tatas prakṛte kim siddham

original: ityata āha- “tatra” etasmin nyāye sati “yadi dhūmo” yādṛśa ādyo 'gnyādisāmagrījanitastādṛśo
analyzed: iti atas āha tatra etasmin nyāye sati yadi dhūmaḥ yādṛśaḥ ādyaḥ gni ādi sāmagrī janitaḥ tādṛśaḥ
dvitīya ādi kṣaṇa bhāvī agni ādi sāmagryā agni indhana ādi kāraṇa kalāpāt tad janaka svabhāva tayā
nirddhāritā bhavet

original: tadā “tasya” tādṛśasya dhūmasvabhāvasya “tajjanyo“'gnyādisāmagrījanyaḥ “svabhāvo na bhavati” kintu dhūmajanya eveti kṛtvā sakṛdapi “tato“'gnyādisāmagrīto  #
analyzed: tadā tasya tādṛśasya dhūma svabhāvasya tad janya ugni ādi sāmagrī janyaḥ svabhāvaḥ na bhavati kintu dhūma janyaḥ eva iti kṛtvā sakṛt api tatas agni ādi sāmagrītaḥ
na bhaveta
tādṛśasya hi svabhāvasya anyatas bhāve tad janya svabhāva tā

original: nāgnyādijanyasvabhāvateti kutaḥ sakṛdapi tato bhāvo yujyeta /
analyzed: na agni ādi janya svabhāva tā iti kutas sakṛt api tatas bhāvaḥ yujyeta
atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ artha antara vat iti

original: yathā hyarthāntaramatajjanyābhimatamanyato bhavat na tajjanyasvabhāvaṃ nāgnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvamiti
analyzed: yathā hi arthāntaram atajjanya abhimatam anyatas bhavat na tad janya svabhāvam na agni ādi sāmagrī janya svabhāvam iti

original: sakṛdapi tato na bhavati tadvat tādṛśo dhūmo 'pīti tato bhavannanyādṛśa evāsāviti gamyate /
analyzed: sakṛt api tatas na bhavati tadvat tādṛśaḥ tatas bhavan anyādṛśaḥ eva asau iti gamyate

original: syānmatam- agnyādisāmagryāsāvatajjanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo balājjanyate kastasya tapasvino 'parādhaḥ?
analyzed: syāt matam agni ādi sāmagryā asau atajjanya svabhāvaḥ tādṛśaḥ balāt janyate kaḥ tasya tapasvinaḥ u parādhaḥ

original: ityata āha- “nāpi” na kevalaṃ svayamatajjanyasvabhāvatayā tato na bhavet,
analyzed: iti atas āha nā api na kevalam svayam atajjanya svabhāvatayā tatas na bhavet

original: kintvagnyādisāmagryapi taṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ- yādṛśo dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvī- (Hbṭ 158) na janayet /
analyzed: kintu agni ādi sāmagrī api tam tādṛśam dhūmam yādṛśaḥ dvitīya ādi kṣaṇa bhāvī na janayet
kutas
a tad janana svabhāva tvāt

original: tādṛśasya hyanyato bhāve sa eva tajjananasvabhāvo nāgnyādisāmagrīti tajjananasvabhāvavikalā kathaṃ taṃ janayet? /
analyzed: tādṛśasya hi anyatas bhāve saḥ eva tad janana svabhāvaḥ na agni ādi sāmagrī iti tad janana svabhāva vikalā katham tam janayet
atra api udāharaṇam sāmagrī antara vat iti
yathā sāmagrī antaram a tad janana svabhāva abhimatam na janayati tadvat agni ādi sāmagrī api

original: tathā hi- sā ātmīyaṃ svabhāvamanusṛtyaiva pravartate,
analyzed: tathā hi sā ātmīyam svabhāvam anusṛtya eva pravartate
tatas kutas sau sāmagrī balāt jāyeta

original: syānmatam- agnyādisāmagrījanyasvabhāvo 'pi tādṛśo dhūmo dhūmajanyasvabhāvo 'pi yathā sa eva dhūma indhanajanyasvabhāvo 'gnijanyasvabhāvaścobhayato  #
analyzed: syāt matam agni ādi sāmagrī janya svabhāvaḥ tādṛśaḥ dhūmaḥ dhūma janya svabhāvaḥ yathā saḥ eva dhūmaḥ indhana janya svabhāvaḥ gni janya svabhāvaḥ ca ubhayatas
bhavati

original: tathā tādṛśo 'pi dhūma ubhayasāmagrījanyasvabhāvatayobhayato bhaviṣyatītyata āha-
analyzed: tathā tādṛśaḥ api dhūmaḥ ubhaya sāmagrī janya svabhāva tayā ubhayatas bhaviṣyati iti atas āha
na ca nā eva dhūmasya tādṛśasya tad a tad janyaḥ agni ādi sāmagrī janyaḥ dhūma janyaḥ ca
svabhāvaḥ yuktaḥ yuktyā saṅgataḥ
kutas eka svabhāva tvāt tādṛśasya dhūma rūpasya bheda abhāvāt
nahi tasya kāla bhede pi tādṛś rūpa tā bhidyate
bhede hi anyādṛśasya anyādṛśāt bhāve vivāda ayogāt

original: tasya yadi tādṛśātādṛśakāraṇajanyatā syāt tatastādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvataiva syāt /
analyzed: tasya yadi tādṛśa a tādṛśa kāraṇa janya tā syāt tatas tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāva tā eva syāt
tat eva darśayan āha dhūma adhūmaḥ ityādi
dhūma śabdena yādṛśaḥ gni ādi sāmagrī janyaḥ tādṛśaḥ svabhāvaḥ bhipretaḥ
adhūma śabdena anyādṛśa kāraṇa janyaḥ dhūma janitaḥ nyādṛśaḥ
tayoḥ ca tādṛśa a tādṛśa kāraṇa janya tayā eva tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāva tā avagantavyā vakṣyamāṇa nītyā
tena agni dhūma lakṣaṇāt dhūma adhūma janana svabhāvāt tādṛśa a tādṛśa janana svabhāvāt tādṛśa a tādṛśa tayā asya bhavataḥ dhūma adhūma svabhāvaḥ tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāvaḥ
syāt kutas tādṛśaḥ eva
kutas etat iti āha kārya svabhāvānām ityādi

original: kāryāṇāṃ hi ye svabhāvāḥ parasparāsaṃbhavinaḥ te parasparavilakṣaṇakāraṇasāmagrīsvabhāvakṛtā na svābhāvikā ahetukatvaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: kāryāṇām hi ye svabhāvāḥ paraspara asaṃbhavinaḥ te paraspara vilakṣaṇa kāraṇa sāmagrī svabhāva kṛtāḥ na svābhāvikāḥ ahetuka tva prasaṅgāt
tatas tādṛśa a tādṛśāt bhavataḥ dhūmasya tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāva tā eva syāt
hbṭ
syāt matam na eva tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāva tāyām tādṛśa a tādṛśa kāraṇa apekṣā

original: kāryāṇāmutpattimātra eva kāraṇāpekṣaṇādityata āha- “akāraṇāpekṣaṇe ca” tādṛśātādṛśarūpatāyāṃ tādṛśātādṛśa- kāraṇānapekṣaṇe ca tādṛśātādṛśatāyāḥ  #
analyzed: kāryāṇām utpatti mātre eva kāraṇa apekṣaṇāt iti atas āha akāraṇa apekṣaṇe ca tādṛśa a tādṛśa rūpa tāyām tādṛśa a tādṛśa kāraṇa anapekṣaṇe ca tādṛśa a tādṛśa tāyāḥ
ahetuka tva prasaṅgāt

original: na hi tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvayorabhūtvā bhāvavyatirekeṇānyā kācidutpattiḥ yatra tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvakāraṇanirapekṣāṇāmapi tadapekṣā syāt /
analyzed: na hi tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāvayoḥ a bhūtvā bhāva vyatirekeṇa anyā kācid utpattiḥ yatra tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāva kāraṇa nirapekṣāṇām api tad apekṣā syāt
tasmāt utpatti śabdena tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāva tā eva ucyate iti

original: tatra kāraṇāpekṣopagame kathaṃ tādṛśātādṛśatāyāṃ kāraṇāpekṣā na syāt /
analyzed: tatra kāraṇa apekṣā upagame katham tādṛśa atādṛśa tāyām kāraṇa apekṣā na syāt

original: tasmāt sāmagrīṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśatvādeva kāryāṇāṃ tādṛśātādṛśasvabhāvavibhāga iti kuto 'nyādṛśāttādṛśasambhavaḥ? iti /
analyzed: tasmāt sāmagrīṇām tādṛśa a tādṛśa tvāt eva kāryāṇām tādṛśa a tādṛśa svabhāva vibhāgaḥ iti kutas nyādṛśāt tādṛśa sambhavaḥ iti

original: yattūktaṃ 'yathaiko dhūmo 'gnīndhanābhyāṃ vilakṣaṇābhyāṃ janyate tathaikalakṣaṇamapi kāryaṃ vilakṣaṇādapi sāmagryantarād bhaviṣyati'; iti /
analyzed: yat tu uktam yathā ekaḥ dhūmaḥ gni indhanābhyām vilakṣaṇābhyām janyate tathā eka lakṣaṇam api kāryam vilakṣaṇāt api sāmagrī antarāt bhaviṣyati iti
tat ayuktam

original: yato nāsmābhirvilakṣaṇānāṃ janakatvaṃ vāryate janayantyeva paraspavilakṣaṇā api svahetupariṇāmopanidhidharmāṇastadavasthāniyatāḥ tadekaṃ kāryaṃ,
analyzed: yatas na asmābhiḥ vilakṣaṇānām janaka tvam vāryate janayanti eva paraspa vilakṣaṇāḥ api sva hetu pariṇāma upanidhi dharmāṇaḥ tad avasthā niyatāḥ tat ekam kāryam

original: tasya tu teṣāṃ ca parasparāpekṣayā janyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamāt tādṛśasya tādṛśādeva janmocyate nānyādṛśāt,
analyzed: tasya tu teṣām ca paraspara apekṣayā janya janaka svabhāva tā niyamāt tādṛśasya tādṛśāt eva janma ucyate na anyādṛśāt
tasya a tad janana svabhāva tvāt
tad abhāve pi anyatas bhavataḥ tad utpatti niyama abhāvāt
aniyame ca kārya kāraṇa bhāva ayogāt
yadi tu agniḥ iva indhana upādāna upakṛtaḥ tad upādāna upakṛtam ca indhanam iva tad avasthā niyatam atādṛśam api

original: dhūmādikaṃ tādṛśaṃ dhūmaṃ janayet pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ ca tathāvagamyeta tadāgnyādivat
analyzed: dhūma ādikam tādṛśam dhūmam janayet pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām ca tathā avagamyeta tadā agni ādi vat
saḥ u pi tad janana svabhāva tā niyamāt tādṛśa janakaḥ kena na anumanyeta

original: tadabhāve 'pi tu tādṛśasya bhāve tayorjanyajanakasvabhāvatāniyamābhāvāt kutaḥ kāryakāraṇatetyahetutaiva tādṛśasyānyādṛśād bhavataḥ syāt /
analyzed: tad abhāve tu tādṛśasya bhāve tayoḥ janya janaka svabhāva tā niyama abhāvāt kutas kārya kāraṇa tā iti ahetu tā eva tādṛśasya anyādṛśāt bhavataḥ syāt

original: yata evaṃ “tasmāt” so 'gnīndhanādisāmagrīviśeṣo mantavyo “yaḥ” ādya “dhūmajanano” nānyaḥ “sa” dhūma ādyo yaḥ “gnyādisāmagrīviśeṣeṇa” janito  #
analyzed: yatas evam tasmāt saḥ gni indhana ādi sāmagrī viśeṣaḥ mantavyaḥ yaḥ ādya dhūma jananaḥ na anyaḥ sa dhūmaḥ ādyaḥ yaḥ gni ādi sāmagrī viśeṣeṇa janitaḥ
na anya a hbṭ

original: iti kṛtvā kāryakāraṇayorevaṃ yathoktena nyāyena janyajanakarūpasya svabhāvasya niyamād
analyzed: iti kṛtvā kārya kāraṇayoḥ evam yathā uktena nyāyena janya janaka rūpasya svabhāvasya niyamāt
yādṛśam yasya kāraṇam ekadā pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām eva avadhāritam tat vijātīyāt

original: 'nyādṛśāt kāraṇāt “utpattiḥ” tādṛśasya kāryasya “na bhavati” anyādṛśasya eva na vāryata iti /
analyzed: nyādṛśāt kāraṇāt utpattiḥ tādṛśasya kāryasya na bhavati anyādṛśasya eva na vāryata iti
tat evam tādṛśa a tādṛśa kāraṇa kṛtaka tvam tādṛśa a tādṛśa kārya svabhāvasya pratipādya upasaṃharan āha

original: “tat” tasmāt yādṛśaṃ kāryaṃ yādṛśāt kāraṇāt dṛṣṭaṃ pratyakṣānupalambhābhyāṃ niścitamekadā
analyzed: tat tasmāt yādṛśam kāryam yādṛśāt kāraṇāt dṛṣṭam pratyakṣa anupalambhābhyām niścitam ekadā
tat vyabhicarati tādṛśam anyādṛśāt na bhavati
yanā evam tena kāraṇena siddhe kārya kāraṇa bhāve tādṛśasya kāryasya tādṛśam eva

original: kāraṇamiti niścaye sati yathoditena nyāyena “kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptira“nvayavyatirekarūpā “siddhā” bhavati /
analyzed: kāraṇam iti niścaye sati yathā uditena nyāyena kāryasya kāraṇena vyāptiḥ anvaya vyatireka rūpā siddhā bhavati
na vijātīyāt utpattiḥ iti dṛṣṭa kāraṇa vijātīyāt kāraṇāt anyādṛśāt na utpattiḥ iti asamum artham a pratipadyamānaḥ

original: kāryasya vijātīyāt kāraṇānnotpattirityayamatrārtho 'bhimata iti manvānaḥ paraścodayannāha-
analyzed: kāryasya vijātīyāt kāraṇāt na utpattiḥ iti ayam atra arthaḥ bhimataḥ iti manvānaḥ paraḥ codayan āha

original: “nanu” svato “vijātīyādapi” kāraṇāt “kiñcit” kāryaṃ “bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ” tat kathaṃ na
analyzed: nanu svatas vijātīyāt api kāraṇāt kiñcid kāryam bhavat dṛṣṭam tat katham na
vijātīyāt utpattiḥ iti asya na dṛṣṭa virodhaḥ syāt

original: kathaṃ yathā ityāha- “tad yathā gomayādeḥ” ādigrahaṇāt śṛṅgacandrakāntādeḥ ” śālūkādi” ādigrahaṇāccharodakādi /
analyzed: katham yathā iti āha tat yathā gomaya ādeḥ ādi grahaṇāt śṛṅga candrakānta ādeḥ śālūka ādi ādi grahaṇāt śara udaka ādi

original: tathā hi- gomayācchālūkasya bhāvaḥ śṛṅgāccharasya candrakāntādapāma /
analyzed: tathā hi gomayāt śālūkasya bhāvaḥ śṛṅgāt śarasya candrakāntāt apāma

original: na ca gomayādikaṃ śālūkāderna vijātīyam tat kimucyate na vijātīyādutpattiḥ iti /
analyzed: na ca gomaya ādikam śālūka ādeḥ na vijātīyam tat kim ucyate na vijātīyāt utpattiḥ iti

original: siddhāntavādī parasya bhrāṃtatāṃ darśayannāha- “na vijātīyādutpattiḥ” iti /
analyzed: siddhānta vādī parasya bhrāṃta tām darśayan āha na vijātīyāt utpattiḥ iti

original: yato hi kāraṇād yad bhavad dṛṣṭaṃ tat tato 'nyādṛśānna bhavati ityayamatrārtho vivakṣitaḥ,
analyzed: yatas hi kāraṇāt yat bhavat dṛṣṭam tat tatas nyādṛśāt na bhavati iti ayam atra arthaḥ vivakṣitaḥ
na tu kārya vijātīyāt iti
na ca tasya vyabhicāraḥ
tat āha tathāvidham eva hi gomaya ādi rūpam tādṛśam śālaka ādīnām ā di nimittam śālūka ādi prabandhasya

original: ya ādiḥ prathama ārambhakṣaṇaḥ tasya kāraṇamiti kṛtvā śālūkādiprabandhasyāderna kāraṇābhedo (Hbṭ 161)
analyzed: yaḥ ādiḥ prathamaḥ ārambha kṣaṇaḥ tasya kāraṇam iti kṛtvā śālūka ādi prabandhasya ādeḥ na kāraṇa abhedaḥ
nyādṛśāt utpattiḥ
sarvasya tad ādeḥ gomaya ādi nimitta tvāt

original: yadā tu prabandhena pūrvakṣaṇanimittānāmuttarottarakṣaṇānāṃ santānenotpattilakṣaṇā vṛttirbhavati śarasya tadā śarādbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: yadā tu prabandhena pūrva kṣaṇa nimittānām uttara uttara kṣaṇānām santānena utpatti lakṣaṇā vṛttiḥ bhavati śarasya tadā śarāt bhāvaḥ

original: tadevaṃ yasya prabandhādeḥ śṛṅgādibhyo bhāvo na tādṛśasya śarādeḥ yasya ca śārādestuduttarottarasya
analyzed: tat evam yasya prabandha ādeḥ śṛṅga ādibhyaḥ bhāvaḥ na tādṛśasya śara ādeḥ yasya ca śāra ādeḥ tud uttarottarasya

original: bhāvo na tādṛśasya śṛṅgāderiti na dṛṣṭakāraṇavijātīyāt kāraṇāt tādṛśasya sambhava
analyzed: bhāvaḥ na tādṛśasya śṛṅga ādeḥ iti na dṛṣṭa kāraṇa vijātīyāt kāraṇāt tādṛśasya sambhava
iti kārya hetoḥ anvaya vyatireka niścayaḥ

original: yadāpi śālūkādayaḥ pūrvapūrvasvajātinibandhanā anādisantānapravṛttā iṣyante tadāpi gomayādibhyaḥ keṣāñcidbhāve 'pi tādṛśatvābhāvānna vyabhicāra  #
analyzed: yadā api śālūka ādayaḥ pūrva pūrva sva jāti nibandhanāḥ anādi santāna pravṛttāḥ iṣyante tadā api gomaya ādibhyaḥ keṣāñcid bhāve pi tādṛśa tva abhāvāt na vyabhicāra
iti darśayan āha asti ca ityādi

original: yasya śālūkasantānasya gomayādi kāraṇaṃ yasya ca sarvadā svajātinimittatvaṃ tayorgomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayorastyeva svabhāvabhedaḥ parasparamanyādṛśatvaṃ  #
analyzed: yasya śālūka santānasya gomaya ādi kāraṇam yasya ca sarvadā sva jāti nimitta tvam tayoḥ gomaya itara janmanoḥ śālūkayoḥ asti eva svabhāva bhedaḥ parasparam anyādṛśa tvam
rūpasya abhede pi sati
tulya ākāra tve sati katham anyādṛśa tvam
iti ced āha nahi ityādi

original: yasmānnākāratulyataiva bhāvānāṃ “tattve” tādṛśatve nimittam yato gomayetarajanmanoḥ śālūkayorākārasāmyāt tādṛśatvameva syānna jātibhedaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt na ākāra tulya tā eva bhāvānām tattve tādṛśa tve nimittam yatas gomaya itara janmanoḥ śālūkayoḥ ākāra sāmyāt tādṛśa tvam eva syāt na jāti bhedaḥ
kutas etat iti āha abhinna ākārāṇām api ityādi

analyzed: tathāvidhāt eva janma na tat vijātīyat iti ekasyāḥ api kārya vyakteḥ kutaścid bhāva darśane
vyāptyā anvaya vyatireka siddhiḥ iti pratipāditam
anupalabdhau tu yathā uktāyām nimitta antara abhāva upadarśana nibandhanayoḥ na anvaya vyatirekayoḥ vipratipattiḥ
sva rūpe eva tu pare vipratipadyante
tathā hi kecid upalabdhi abhāva mātram anupalabdhim abhāvasya prasajya pratiṣedha ātmanaḥ pramāṇa antara tvena gamikām icchanti īśvarasena prabhṛtayaḥ

original: apare tu pratiṣedhyaviṣayajñānarūpeṇāpariṇāmamātmanaḥ tadanyavastuviṣayaṃ vijñānameva vābhāvasya gamakaṃ pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pramāṇāntaramāhurmīmāṃsakāḥ
analyzed: apare tu pratiṣedhya viṣaya jñāna rūpeṇa apariṇāmam ātmanaḥ tad anya vastu viṣayam vijñānam eva vā abhāvasya gamakam pratyakṣa anumānābhyām pramāṇa antaram āhuḥ mīmāṃsakāḥ
na hi anya vastu viṣayam jñānam pratyakṣa anumāna ātmakam abhāvam pratipadyate
tasya bhāva aṃśa viṣaya tvāt
abhāva aṃśasya ca tatas nya tvāt

original: abhāvāṃśe tu nāstīti jñānaṃ janayat tadabhāvapramāṇākhyāṃ labhate,
analyzed: abhāva aṃśe tu na asti iti jñānam janayat tad abhāva pramāṇa ākhyām labhate
yathā indriyam sva viṣaya pratipatti janaka tvena pratyakṣa ākhyām
tathā anye anya bhāva lakṣaṇām tad jñāna lakṣaṇām vā anupalabdhim abhāvasya eva sādhanam āhuḥ na abhāva vyavahārasya
anupalabdheḥ liṅga ādāt abhāva siddhau svayam eva tad vyavahāra pravṛtteḥ
naiyāyikāḥ tu na asti iti jñānam eva kevala pradeśa ādi grāhi jñāna antara bhāvi pratyakṣam na pramāṇa antaram abhāvasya
tuccha rūpasya pariccheda ātmakam ācakṣate tat eva asya ghaṭa ādeḥ pratiṣedhyasya anupalabdhi śabdena
yadi ucyate na kaścid virodhaḥ iti

original: tadevamanupalabdhau bhedaṃ gatā buddhayaḥ prativādināmiti tannirāsārthamanupalabdhisvarūpaṃ tāvadupadarśayannāha- “upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasya”  #
analyzed: tat evam anupalabdhau bhedam gatāḥ buddhayaḥ prativādinām iti tad nirāsa artham anupalabdhi svarūpam tāvat upadarśayan āha upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya
ityādi
upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptīḥ
upalambha pratyaya antarāṇām samanantara adhipati pratyaya saṃjñitānām sākalyam
ālambana pratyayasya svabhāva viśeṣaḥ ca

original: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsvanyeṣūpalambhapratyayeṣu san pratyakṣa eva bhavatī'tyevaṃrūpā śāstrakṛtānyatra (Hbṭ 168)
analyzed: yaḥ svabhāvaḥ satsu anyeṣu upalambha pratyayeṣu san pratyakṣaḥ eva bhavati iti evaṃrūpā śāstra kṛtā anyatra
vyākhyātāḥ naiyāyika vipratipatti nirāsa artham
te hi upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpti śabdena mahā ttva aneka dravyavat tva rūpāṇi dravyāṇām āhuḥ
mahat tvāt aneka dravyavat tvāt rūpāt ca upalabdhiḥ iti vacanāt
evam ca upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ sati api vastuni sambhavati iti asat vyvahāra siddhau anaikāntikī iti ācakṣate
na hi cākṣuṣasya api raśmeḥ mahat tva aneka dravyavat tva rūpāṇi upalambhakāni bhavanti
na ca tāvatā anupalambha pyasau dyavahāraḥ tatra śakyate kartum
yat āha bhāṣyakāraḥ
na anumānataḥ upalabhyamānasya pratyakṣataḥ nupalabdhiḥ abhāve hetuḥ iti

original: indriyatvāt tvagādivat kila prāpyakāri cakṣurityanumānataścākṣuṣo raśmirupalabhyate tasya pratyakṣato 'nupalabdhiḥ kathamabhāvavyavahāraṃ sādhayet?  #
analyzed: indriya tvāt tvac ādi vat kila prāpya kāri cakṣuḥ iti anumānataḥ cākṣuṣaḥ raśmiḥ upalabhyate tasya pratyakṣataḥ nupalabdhiḥ katham abhāva vyavahāram sādhayet  /
iti
tat evam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya an upalabdhim asat dyavahāre na aikāntikīm āhuḥ naiyāyikāḥ tad nirāsam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpteḥ aviparīta rūpa upadarśanena
śāstra kāraḥ bhyadhāt

original: yadā hyupalambhapratyayāntarasākalyaṃ svabhāvaviśeṣaśca yathokta upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptirucyate na mahattvādikaṃ tadā kuto vyabhicārāvakāśaḥ?
analyzed: yadā hi upalambha pratyaya antara sākalyam svabhāva viśeṣaḥ ca yathā uktaḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptiḥ ucyate na mahat tva ādikam tadā kutas vyabhicāra avakāśaḥ
sati vastuni tasyāḥ asambhavāt
mahat tva ādikam tu asambhavāt eva na upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpti śabdena vācyam

original: nahi rūpādivyatiriktaṃ dravyaṃ tatpratibhāsavivekinākārāntareṇa svajñāne pratibhāsate /
analyzed: nahi rūpa ādi vyatiriktam dravyam tad pratibhāsa vivekinā ākāra antareṇa sva jñāne pratibhāsate
na ca apratibhāsamānam anātma rūpa vivekinā rūpeṇa pratyakṣa tām anubhavati atiprasaṅgāt
tat kutas sya asataḥ mahat tva ādi sambhavaḥ
na ca sva rūpeṇa amahataḥ tad sambandhe pi asya mahat tā sambhavaḥ
apara rūpeṇa vā grahaṇe katham tad grāhi jñānam abhrāntam

original: tato na mahattvaṃ dravyasyopalambhakaṃ rūpaṃ vā /
analyzed: tatas na mahat tvam dravyasya upalambhakam rūpam vā
tasya api sva rūpeṇa grahaṇe dravya ātmanaḥ tyanta parokṣa tvāt
dravya rūpasya ca tad vivekena anupalakṣaṇāt na tathā grāhaka tvam

original: na ca mahattvaṃ rūpaṃ vā dravyodayakāle 'bhyupagamyate,
analyzed: na ca mahat tvam rūpam vā dravya udaya kāle bhyupagamyate
yatas dravyam guṇasya samavāyi kāraṇam iṣyate

original: tacca pratilabdhātmakameva tathātāmanubhavatīti prathame kṣaṇe dravyaṃ nirguṇameva /
analyzed: tat ca pratilabdha ātmakam eva tathātām anubhavati iti prathame kṣaṇe dravyam nirguṇam eva

original: na cāsya dvitīye kṣaṇe prāktanarūpatyāgo 'sti rūpāntaraṃ vāvirbhavati yataḥ prāgapratipannādhārabhāvaṃ (Hbṭ 169)
analyzed: na ca asya dvitīye kṣaṇe prāktana rūpa tyāgaḥ u sti rūpa antaram vā āvirbhavati yatas prāk apratipanna ādhāra bhāvam
mahat tva ādi guṇa pratibandhāt ādhāra tām yāyāt
na ca ajanakaḥ ādhāraḥ
janaka tve ca kṣaṇika tā
arthakriyā virodhāt akṣaṇikasya
tatas kutas sāmavāyi kāraṇasya sambhavaḥ

original: , yataḥ svotkalitaṃ kāryaṃ janayat tathā vyapadiśyate /
analyzed: yatas sva utkalitam kāryam janayat tathā vyapadiśyate

original: na caitat kṣaṇikatve sambhavati akṣaṇikatve vā prāga'nādhārasya paścādādhārābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: na ca etat kṣaṇika tve sambhavati akṣaṇika tve vā prāk anādhārasya paścāt ādhāra abhāvaḥ

original: samavāyikāraṇāsambhavādevānekadravyavattvamapyasmabhavi yasmādanekaṃ dravyamārambhakaṃ samavāyikāraṇātmanā yasya vidyate tadevaṃ vyapadiśyate
analyzed: samavāyi kāraṇa asambhavāt eva aneka dravyavat tvam api asmabhavi yasmāt anekam dravyam ārambhakam samavāyi kāraṇa ātmanā yasya vidyate tat evam vyapadiśyate
dravya abhavāt ca na aneka dravyavat tvam
sattve pi mahat tva ādeḥ nā iyam upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptiḥ asmākam abhimatā
yā tu abhimāma
tāḥ na tayā upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ asat vdyavahāra siddhau anaikāntikī iti śāstra kāraḥ
darśayāmbabhūva upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya yā anupalabdhiḥ kāraṇasya vyāpakasya

original: vā pratiṣedhyādanyasya sā “abhāvahetuḥ” kāryasya vyāpyasya ca “abhāvavyavahārahetuśca” /
analyzed: vā pratiṣedhyāt anyasya sā abhāva hetuḥ kāryasya vyāpyasya ca abhāva vyavahāra hetuḥ ca
yā tu pratiṣedhyasya eva upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ sa abhāva vyavahāra hetuḥ eva iti vāśabdena darśayati

original: yā tvanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptasyānupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣānumānanivṛttilakṣaṇā sā saṃśayahetuḥ pramāṇanivṛttāvapyarthābhāvāsiddheḥ,
analyzed: yā tu anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya anupalabdhiḥ pratyakṣa anumāna nivṛtti lakṣaṇā sā saṃśaya hetuḥ pramāṇa nivṛttau api artha abhāva asiddheḥ
nimitta abhāvāt tu savdyavahāra pratiṣedha hetuḥ iti avagantavyam
sva iṣṭām anupalabdhim spaṣṭayitum īśvarasena kumārila ādīnām nirāsaḥ
tatra ye tāvat upalabdhi abhāva mātram anupalabdhim icchanti
vijñānam vā anya vastuni iti vacanāt tad anya vastu vijñānam eva vā
tad nirāsa artham jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇām anupalabdhim darśayitum upalabdhim eva tāvat dvividhām darśayan āha

original: “atra” anupalabdhivākye yopalabdhiḥ śrūyate kriyārūpā sā yadā kartṛsthatayāpekṣyate

yat jñānam tat upalabdhiḥ ucyate

original: upalabhamānaśca buddhīndriyadehakalāpa eva ca pūrvakṣaṇasaṅgṛhīta upalabdhijanaka ucyate /
analyzed: upalabhamānaḥ ca buddhīndriya deha kalāpaḥ eva ca pūrva kṣaṇa saṅgṛhītaḥ upalabdhi janakaḥ ucyate

original: tathāhi- upalabdherjanaka āśrayo vā kartā parairucyate /

original: na (Hbṭ 170) cendriyāderanyasya janakatvaṃ sambhavati yato 'nvayavyatirekanibandhanaḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvavyavahāraḥ,
analyzed: na ca indriya ādeḥ anyasya janaka tvam sambhavati yatas nvaya vyatireka nibandhanaḥ kārya kāraṇa bhāva vyavahāraḥ

original: tau cānvayavyatirekau nendriyāderanyasya sambhavataḥ satsvindriyādiṣu niyamenopalabdherbhāvāt /

original: yadi hīndriyādiṣu satsvapi kadācidupalabdhirnopajāyate tadā satsvapyanyeṣu sakaleṣu hetuṣu kāryānutpattiḥ kāraṇāntaravaikalyaṃ sūcayatīti tavdyatiriktakāraṇāntaraṃ  #

na punar aviśeṣeṇa sarveṣām eva anya śabda vācyānām
iti atas āha yatra yasmin ityādi
yatra deśe kāle vasthāyām vā avyavadhāna ādi lakṣaṇāyām
yasmin pradeśa rūpa ādau upalabhyamāne niyamena avaśyaṃtayā yasya anyasya padārthasya

original: ghaṭarūpāderupalabdhirbhavati “sa” ghaṭarūpādiḥ padārthaḥ “tatsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ” tena pradeśarūpādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: ghaṭa rūpa ādeḥ upalabdhiḥ bhavati sa ghaṭa rūpa ādiḥ padārthaḥ tad saṃsṛṣṭaḥ tena pradeśa rūpa ādinā saṃsṛṣṭaḥ
katham ekasmin upalabhyamāne parasya api niyama upalabdhiḥ
iti ced yogyatāyāḥ aviśeṣāt
pradeśa ghaṭayoḥ hi sva viṣaya vijñāna janane yogyatā tulyā

original: yadā hi pradeśarūpaṃ vyavadhānaviprakarṣādirahitaṃ vijñāne svākāraṃ samarpayati tadā ghaṭarūpamapi tatra tathāvidhaṃ svākāraṃ samarpayatyeva
analyzed: yadā hi pradeśa rūpam vyavadhāna viprakarṣa ādi rahitam vijñāne sva ākāram samarpayati tadā ghaṭa rūpam api tatra tathāvidham sva ākāram samarpayati eva

original: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā svasvabhāvavyavasthitestu kathaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭatā?
analyzed: yadi nāma yogyatā tasya tena tulyā sva svabhāva vyavasthiteḥ tu katham tad saṃsṛṣṭa tā
iti atas āha eka jñāna saṃsargāt iti

original: ekatra hi jñāne dvāvapi tau svākāradvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt,
analyzed: ekatra hi jñāne dvau api tau sva ākāra dvāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭau na sākṣāt
tat vijñānam padārtha dvaya ākāram ājāyamānam tayoḥ ātmani saṃsargam darśayati

original: kimiti punastat jñānaṃ padārthadvayākāramavaśyaṃ bhavati yatastayorjñānadvārakaḥ saṃsargaḥ?
analyzed: kim iti punar tat jñānam padārtha dvaya ākāram avaśyam bhavati yatas tayoḥ jñāna dvārakaḥ saṃsargaḥ
iti atas āha tayoḥ satoḥ ityādi

original: yāvetau tulyayogyatārūpau tau yadi santau bhavatastadā naivaikākāraniyatā pratipattirbhavati /
analyzed: yau etau tulya yogyatā rūpau tau yadi santau bhavataḥ tadā nā eva eka ākāra niyatā pratipattiḥ bhavati
kasmāt asambhavāt

original: na hyeṣa sambhavo 'sti- yattulyayogyatārūpayoreka eva pratibhāseta nāpara iti /
analyzed: na hi eṣa sambhavaḥ sti yat tulya yogyatā rūpayoḥ ekaḥ eva pratibhāseta na aparaḥ iti

original: tathāhi- aviśiṣṭatvād yogyatāyāḥ kastatra svākāraṃ na samarpayet? /
analyzed: tathā hi aviśiṣṭa tvāt yogyatāyāḥ kaḥ tatra sva ākāram na samarpayet
anubhava siddham ca yugapad aneka pratibhāsanam
na ca anubhava viruddham ācakṣāṇāḥ viduṣām avadheya vacasaḥ bhavanti
ladhu vṛtti tvāt yaugapadya abhimānaḥ iti ced na
bādhaka pratyaya viraheṇa hbṭ
bhrānti kalpanā anupapatteḥ
sarvatra tathābhāva aprasaṅgāt

original: karaṇadharma evāyaṃ yadekasminneva karmaṇi kriyāṃ niṣpādayatinānekatra,
analyzed: karaṇa dharmaḥ eva ayam yat ekasmin eva karmaṇi kriyām niṣpādayati na an ekatra
karaṇam ca indriyam tatas na aneka pratipatti hetuḥ iti ced
katham pradīpa ādiḥ anekatra bahūnām pratipatti janakaḥ
kartṛ bhedāt adoṣaḥ iti ced
kartṛ ekatvāt tarhi kriyā ekatra karmaṇi iti katham
karaṇa dharmaḥ
ityādi vacaḥ na plavate

original: na ca pratikṣaṇaviśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛkaraṇādibhāvo yuktaḥ kriyā vā kācit /
analyzed: na ca prati kṣaṇa viśarāruṣu bhāveṣu paramārthataḥ kartṛ karaṇa ādi bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ kriyā vā kācid

original: na ca sarvakārakānvayavyatirekānuvidhāyini kārye kasyacidatiśayo 'sti yenāyaṃ kartā kā(ka)
analyzed: na ca sarva kāraka anvaya vyatireka anuvidhāyini kārye kasyacid atiśayaḥ sti yena ayam kartā kāka
raṇam ca idam ityādi parikalpyeta
tasmāt aviśiṣṭa yogyatayoḥ kutas eka rūpa niyatāyāḥ pratipatteḥ sambhavaḥ
iti siddhaḥ eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ
tulya yogya tā rūpa tvasya ca etat eva liṅgam

original: na hyasati tulyayogyatārūpatve yugapadekendriyajanitajñānapratibhāsitā rūparasavat sambhavatīti /
analyzed: na hi asati tulya yogyatā rūpa tve yugapad eka indriya janita jñāna pratibhāsi tā rūpa rasa vat sambhavati iti
tatra yeṣām saugatānām idam darśanam
eka āyatana saṅgṛhīte na ikatra api ekam eva indriya jñānam ājāyate
iti teṣām mukhyaḥ eva eka jñāna saṃsargaḥ

original: ye tu 'tatrāpi pratyarthaṃ bhinnānyevaikendriyanimittānyekakālāni tadviṣayāṇāṃ yugapatsannihitānāṃ svajñāneṣu sāmarthyāviśeṣāt,
analyzed: ye tu tatra api pratyartham bhinnāni eva eka indriya nimittāni eka kālāni tad viṣayāṇām yugapad sannihitānām sva jñāneṣu sāmarthya aviśeṣāt
atas eva eka tayā loke dhī avasīyamānāni jñānāni upajāyante

original: iti varṇayanti teṣāmekendriyajatvenaikāyatanaviṣayatvena caikakāleṣvekatvavyapadeśo loke tathādhyavasāyādaupacārikaḥ /
analyzed: iti varṇayanti teṣām eka indriya ja tvena eka āyatana viṣaya tvena ca eka kāleṣu eka tva vyapadeśaḥ loke tathā adhyavasāyāt aupacārikaḥ

original: yadi nāmaikajñānasaṃsargāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭastathāpi sāmānyena sarvamanyamayaṃ nañ kinna pratipadayati?
analyzed: yadi nāma eka jñāna saṃsargāt tad saṃsṛṣṭaḥ tathā api sāmānyena sarvam anya mayam kim na pratipadayati
iti atas āha tasmāt ityādi

original: yasmādaviśiṣṭatvādyogyatāyā yathoktena prakāreṇaikatra jñāne dvayorapi saṃsargaḥ
analyzed: yasmāt aviśiṣṭa tvāt yogyatāyāḥ yathā uktena prakāreṇa ekatra jñāne dvayoḥ api saṃsargaḥ

original: tasmādaviśiṣṭaṃ yogyatārūpaṃ yayoḥ tata evaikajñānasaṃsargiṇau tau tasmāt tayorevaṃrūpayoḥ
analyzed: tasmāt aviśiṣṭam yogyatā rūpam yayoḥ tatas eva eka jñāna saṃsargiṇau tau tasmāt tayoḥ evaṃrūpayoḥ
paraspara apekṣam eva na sarva anya padārtha apekṣam anya tvam iha anupalabdhi adhikāre abhipretam

original: loke tu yadyapyaśeṣapadārthāntarāpekṣamanyatvaṃ nañā kvaciducyate vyāptinyāyasamāśrayāt,
analyzed: loke tu yadi api aśeṣa padārtha antara apekṣam anyatvam nañā kvacid ucyate vyāpti nyāya samāśrayāt
tathā api tat iha na gṛhyate hbṭ
pratyāsatteḥ āśrayaṇāt eka jñāna saṃsarga lakṣaṇā prattyāsattiḥ āśrīyate na anyā
pramāṇa cintā adhikārāt anyathā anupalabdhiḥ anaikāntikī eva syāt
tasmāt tattva cintakaiḥ tathāvidham anya tvam āśrayaṇīyam yat anupalabdheḥ avyabhicāra nibandhanam
tat ca yathā uktam eva iti abhiprāyaḥ
tat evam eka jñāna saṃsarga apekṣayā anyatvam pratipādya anupalabdhim darśayan āha sa kevalaḥ ityādi

original: sa eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśo yathoktaghaṭāpekṣaya tasmādanya ucyate tadā ghaṭaviviktapradeśajñānaṃ vānupalabdhiḥ,
analyzed: saḥ eva yadā kevalaḥ pradeśaḥ yathā ukta ghaṭa apekṣayā tasmāt anyaḥ ucyate tadā ghaṭa vivikta pradeśa jñānam vā anupalabdhiḥ
na tu yathā isvarasenaḥ manyate upalabdhi abhāva mātram anupalabdhiḥ iti
vakṣyamāṇa doṣāt
ghaṭa vivikta pradeśa svabhāvaḥ vā

original: na tu tadviviktajñānameva yathāha kumārilaḥ “vijñānaṃ vānyavastuni” iti /
analyzed: na tu tad vivikta jñānam eva yathā āha kumārilaḥ vijñānam vā anya vastuni iti

original: yathā hyanyavastuviṣayaṃ jñanamanubhūyamānaṃ pratiyogismaraṇāpekṣaṃ tadabhāvavyavahāranibandhanaṃ tathā tadviviktaḥ pradeśo 'pi /
analyzed: yathā hi anya vastu viṣayam jñanam anubhūyamānam pratiyogi smaraṇa apekṣam tad abhāva vyavahāra nibandhanam tathā tad viviktaḥ pradeśaḥ pi
tathā hi kasyacid pratipattuḥ

original: yataḥ kealapradeśākārameva jñānaṃ mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭākāramapi tasmādatra ghaṭo nāsti';
analyzed: yatas keala pradeśa ākāram eva jñānam mayā saṃvedyate na tu ghaṭa ākāram api tasmāt atra ghaṭaḥ na asti
iti evam nāstitā jñānam utpadyate
kasyacid tu

original: yataḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'yaṃ dṛśyate na tu ghaṭasahitaḥ tasmānnāstyatra ghaṭaḥ'; ityevam /
analyzed: yatas kevalaḥ pradeśaḥ yam dṛśyate na tu ghaṭa sahitaḥ tasmāt na asti atra ghaṭaḥ iti evam

original: tasmādubhayornāstitājñānajanmani tulyaṃ sāmarthyamiti dvayorapi anupalabdhivyavasthā yukteti /
analyzed: tasmāt ubhayoḥ nāstitā jñāna janmani tulyam sāmarthyam iti dvayoḥ api anupalabdhi vyavasthā yuktā iti

original: tatra yadā tajjñānaṃ tadā jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ kartṛsthakriyāpekṣayā,
analyzed: tatra yadā tat jñānam tadā jñātṛ dharma lakṣaṇa anupalabdhiḥ kartṛ stha kriyā apekṣayā
yadā tad svabhāvaḥ tadā jñeya dharma lakṣaṇā karma stha kriyā apekṣayā iti

original: evamanupalabdhiṃ paryudāsavṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyamasyā darśayannāha- “sā abhāvam” ityādi /
analyzed: evam anupalabdhim paryudāsa vṛttyā vyavasthāpya sādhyam asyāḥ darśayan āha sā abhāvam ityādi

original: sarvānyopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptavivikte 'pi pradeśādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭādau pratiyoginyarthitvādibhiḥ smṛtirasya bhavati tasyābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
analyzed: sarva anya upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta vivikte pi pradeśa ādau dṛśyamāne yatra ghaṭa ādau pratiyogini arthi tva ādibhiḥ smṛtiḥ asya bhavati tasya abhāvam sādhayati
abhāva vyavahāram vā
kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhī abhāvam abhāva vyavahāram ca sādhayataḥ
svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ tu abhāvi avahāram eva
abhāva vyavahāraḥ ca jñāna abhidhāna pravṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ
tatra na asti atra ghaṭaḥ
iti evam ākāram jñānam
evaṃvidha vastu abhidhāyakam ca abhidhānam

original: niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamanāgamanalakṣaṇā pravṛttiriti /
analyzed: niḥśaṅkasya ca tatra pradeśe gamana āgamana lakṣaṇā pravṛttiḥ iti
hbṭ

original: atreśvarasena- kumārilayorvacanāvakāśamāśaṅkaya siddhāntavyavasthāmeva kurvatā tanmate niraste 'pyāhatya tanmatanirāsārthamāha- “kathamanyabhāva”  #
analyzed: atra īśvara sena kumārilayoḥ vacana avakāśam āśaṅkaya siddhānta vyavasthām eva kurvatā tad mate niraste pi āhatya tad mata nirāsa artham āha katham anyabhāva
ityādi

original: īśvaraseno hi manyate- kārya- svabhāvahetubhyāṃ bhāvarūpābhyāṃ anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇādavaśyamabhāvarūpatvamasyāḥ,
analyzed: īśvarasenaḥ hi manyate kārya svabhāva hetubhyām bhāva rūpābhyām anupalabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇāt avaśyam abhāva rūpa tvam asyāḥ
anyathā pṛthakkaraṇam anarthakam eva syāt

original: tvayā cānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya pradeśādestajjñānasya vā bhāvarūpānupalabdhirākhyāyate tannūnamanyabhāvastadabhāvo yenaivamabhidhīyate
analyzed: tvayā ca anyasya pratiṣedhya viviktasya pradeśa ādeḥ tad jñānasya vā bhāva rūpa anupalabdhiḥ ākhyāyate tat nūnam anya bhāvaḥ tad abhāvaḥ yena evam abhidhīyate
na ca etat yujyate
bhāva abhāvayoḥ virodhāt eka ātma tā anupapatteḥ iti

original: kumārilo 'pyevaṃ manyate- yeyaṃ jñātṛ- jñeyadharmalakṣaṇā dvidhānupalabdhirabhāvarūpā tvayocyate tasyā bhavatu nāstitājñānaṃ prati sādhanabhāvaḥ
analyzed: kumārilaḥ pi evam manyate yā iyam jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇā dvidhā anupalabdhiḥ abhāva rūpā tvayā ucyate tasyāḥ bhavatu nāstitā jñānam prati sādhana bhāvaḥ

original: kintu sa evānyasya pratiṣedhyaviviktasya vastunaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānādanyasya vā tajjñānasya yo bhāvo bhāvāṃśaḥ sa kathamabhāvaḥ?
analyzed: kintu saḥ eva anyasya pratiṣedhya viviktasya vastunaḥ pratiṣedhya jñānāt anyasya vā tad jñānasya yaḥ bhāvaḥ bhāva aṃśaḥ sa katham abhāvaḥ
pratiṣedhasya tad jñānasya vā katham abhāva aṃśaḥ
na eva yujyate
dharma rūpa tayā bhāva abhāva aṃśayoḥ bhedāt
sati api dharmi rūpeṇa abhede tayoḥ ca udbhava abhibhavābhyām grahaṇa agrahaṇa vyavasthā iti yat āha
dharmayoḥ bhedaḥ iṣṭaḥ hi dharmya bhede naḥ sthite
udbhava abhibhava ātma tvāt grahaṇam ca avatiṣṭhate iti
ukta uttara tām asya darśayan āha uktam uttaram atra codye yathā paryudāsa vṛttyā apekṣātaḥ
pratiṣedhyam tad jñānam vā apekṣya tad viviktaḥ rthaḥ tad jñānam vā abhāvaḥ nupalabdhiḥ ca ucyate
iti īśvarasenasya prativacanam

original: na hi prasajyapratiṣedha evaiko nañarthaḥ kintu paryudāso 'pi /
analyzed: na hi prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ eva ekaḥ nañ arthaḥ kintu
tatas nyabhāvasya abhāva rūpa tā na virudhyate
prasajya pratiṣedha rūpa tā api anya bhāvasya yathā tathā uttaratra vakṣyate
svabhāva hetoḥ tu anulabdheḥ pṛthakkaraṇam pratipat abhiprāya vaśāt
pratipattā hi svabhāva hetau vastu pratipatti adhyavasāyī
anupalabdhau tu abhāva pratipatti adhyavasāyī
paramārthataḥ tu pratiṣedhya abhāva vyavahāra yogya tā

original: vastubhūtaiva pradeśasya sādhyata iti na svabhāvahetoḥ svabhāvānupalabdhirbhidyata iti /
analyzed: vastu bhūtā eva pradeśasya sādhyate iti na svabhāva hetoḥ svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ bhidyate iti
yat tu an apekṣita artha antara saṃsargam pratiṣedha mātram anupalabdhiḥ
iti īśvarasenaḥ manyate tat nirākurvan āha na pratiṣedha mātram ityādi
kasmāt iti āha tasya sādhana asiddheḥ ityādi
na hi abhāvasya sarva sāmarthya viraha lakṣaṇasya sādhana tvam siddhi hetu tvam sidhyati
sarva sāmarthya viraha rūpasya tad ayogāt
hetu tve vā katham na sāmarthya yogi tā
bhāva rūpa tā vā
sāmarthya lakṣaṇa tvāt vastunaḥ

original: abhāvasya cānapekṣitasahakāriṇo anādheyātiśayatayā nāstīti jñānajanane nityaṃ tajjananaprasaṅgaḥ /
analyzed: abhāvasya ca anapekṣita sahakāriṇaḥ anādheya atiśaya tayā nā asti iti jñāna janane nityam tad janana prasaṅgaḥ
tatas ca sādhaka tva ayogāt abhāva vyavahāraḥ eva na sidhyet

original: athavā tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmana upalabdhyabhāvasya sādhanameva kiñcinna sidhyatīti /
analyzed: athavā tasya prasajya pratiṣedha ātmanaḥ upalabdhi abhāvasya sādhanam eva kiñcid na sidhyati iti
sa hi abhāva tvāt apareṇa upalabdhi abhāvena sādhyaḥ syāt
saḥ u pi apareṇa iti anavasthānam
na ca indriya vat ajñātasya pratiṣedha jñāna hetu tā
sadā sannihita tvena anapekṣita sahakāriṇaḥ nityam tad udaya prasaṅgāt
idam ca artha dvayam
katham abhāvaḥ kasyacid pratipattiḥ
pratipatti hetuḥ vā
tasya api katham pratipattiḥ
iti atra antare svayam eva vipañcayiṣyati
kumārilasya api uttaram āha tasya anyasya pratiyoginā vastu antareṇa asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpasya
na hi asau vastu antaraiḥ saṃsṛṣṭa svabhāvaḥ eka rūpaḥ
tathātve hi abhāva aṃśaḥ na kvacid sidhyet
tasya evaṃvidhasya bhāva siddhiḥ eva bhāva aṃśa siddhiḥ eva aparasya pratiyoginaḥ vastu antarasya abhāva siddhiḥ abhāva aṃśasya
tvad abhimatasya siddhiḥ astu bhāva aṃśasya eva abhāva aṃśa rūpa tā upapatteḥ iti manyate

original: tathā hi- abhāvāṃśo 'pi pararūpāsaṃsṛṣṭatayaivābhāva iti vyapadiśyate,
analyzed: tathā hi para rūpa asaṃsṛṣṭa tayā eva abhāvaḥ iti vyapadiśyate
anyathā tad ayogāt

original: sā ca bhāvāṃśasyāpi samāneti sa evābhāvo 'stu tannimittasya samānatvāt kimanyenābhāvāṃśopagatena? /
analyzed: sā ca bhāva aṃśasya api samānā iti saḥ eva abhāvaḥ stu tad nimittasya samāna tvāt kim anyena abhāva aṃśa upagatena
atas eva asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpasya iti viśeṣaṇam

original: yata (Hbṭ 177) evam “iti” tasmād “anyabhāvo 'pi” anyasya vastuno bhāvo 'pi tvadabhimato bhāvāṃśo 'pi na kevalamabhāvāṃśastvanmatyābhāva iti  #
analyzed: evam iti tasmāt anya bhāvaḥ anyasya vastunaḥ bhāvaḥ anyasya vastunaḥ bhāvaḥ anya abhimataḥ bhāva aṃśaḥ anya na kevalam abhāva aṃśaḥ tvad matyā abhāvaḥ iti
vyapadiśyate smābhiḥ

original: tato bhāvāṃśasyābhāvarūpatā saṅgataiveti na kiñcid virudhyata iti /
analyzed: tatas bhāva aṃśasya abhāva rūpa tā saṅgatā evā iti na kiñcid virudhyate iti

original: yaduktaṃ 'jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇayā svabhāvānupalabdhyā abhāvavyavahāra eva sādhyate nābhāvaḥ';
analyzed: yat uktam jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇayā svabhāva anupalabdhyā abhāva vyavahāraḥ eva sādhyate na abhāvaḥ
iti tat paras vighaṭayitum
yat ca uktam na pratiṣedha mātram anupalabdhiḥ
tasya sādhana asiddheḥ

original: iti dvitīye vyākhyāne pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhi[ri]tyetasya sādhanaṃ darśayitumāha- “anyabhāvalakṣaṇa” ityādi /
analyzed: iti dvitīye vyākhyāne pratiṣedha mātrasya anupalabdhiḥ iti etasya sādhanam darśayitum āha anya bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ ityādi

original: evaṃ manyate- loko hi kevalapradeśadarśanāt ghaṭābhāvameva prathamaṃ pratipadyate kevalapradeśajñānasaṃvedanadvāreṇa ghaṭajñānābhāvapratipattyā  #
analyzed: evam manyate lokaḥ hi kevala pradeśa darśanāt ghaṭa abhāvam eva prathamam pratipadyate kevala pradeśa jñāna saṃvedana dvāreṇa ghaṭa jñāna abhāva pratipattyā
vā tatas ghaṭa abhāvasya vyavahāram

original: tena lokapratītyanusāreṇa pratiṣedhyādanyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhyajñānādvā tajjñānasya
analyzed: tena loka pratīti anusāreṇa pratiṣedhyāt anyasya pradeśasya pratiṣedhya jñānāt vā tad jñānasya
yaḥ bhāvaḥ tad lakṣaṇaḥ bhāvaḥ svayam pramāṇena indriya pratyakṣeṇa sva saṃvedana pratyakṣeṇa

original: ca siddho 'laṃ ghaṭābhāvaṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramaṃ sādhayitum,
analyzed: ca siddhaḥ laṃ ghaṭa abhāvam sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa ca yathākramam sādhayitum
sa ca ghaṭa abhāva vyavahāram iti evam vyavasthāpayitum yuktam
na ca evam api vyavasthāpane asmad pakṣasya kācid kṣatiḥ

original: tathāhi- pāramparyeṇāpi yadanupalabdheḥ tvadabhyupagatāyāḥ siddhaṃ tat tata eva siddhaṃ bhavatīti pratiṣedhamātrasyānupalabdhitve tatsādhanapratipādane  #
analyzed: tathā hi pāramparyeṇa api yat anupalabdheḥ tvad abhyupagatāyāḥ siddham tat tatas eva siddham bhavati iti pratiṣedha mātrasya anupalabdhi tve tad sādhana pratipādane
pi

original: ayamabhiprāyaḥ- yathā bhavato jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇā bhāvarūpā dvividhānupalabdhistathā mamāpi jñātṛjñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvo 'pyanupalabdhisaṃjñito  #
analyzed: ayam abhiprāyaḥ yathā bhavataḥ jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇā bhāva rūpā dvividhā anupalabdhiḥ tathā mama api jñātṛ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇa upalabdhi abhāvaḥ pi anupalabdhi saṃjñitaḥ
dvividhaḥ bhaviṣyati

original: tatra jñeyadharmalakṣaṇenānyabhāvena pratyakṣasiddhena pratiṣedhyābhāvo jñeyadharmalakṣaṇopalabdhyabhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisaṃjñitaḥ setsyati
analyzed: tatra jñeya dharma lakṣaṇena anya bhāvena pratyakṣa siddhena pratiṣedhya abhāvaḥ jñeya dharma lakṣaṇa upalabdhi abhāva rūpaḥ nu palabdhi saṃjñitaḥ setsyati

original: jñātṛdharmalakṣaṇena cānyabhāvena kevalapradeśajñānātmanā svasaṃvedanasiddhena jñātṛdharmaḥ pratiṣedhyajñānābhāvarūpo 'nupalabdhisamākhyātaḥ  #
analyzed: jñātṛ dharma lakṣaṇena ca anya bhāvena kevala pradeśa jñāna ātmanā sva saṃvedana siddhena jñātṛ dharmaḥ pratiṣedhya jñāna abhāva rūpaḥ nupalabdhi samākhyātaḥ
setsyati
tatas ca kutas navasthā yena sādhana asiddhiḥ syāt iti

original: tatra “anyabhāvalakṣaṇa” iti pratiṣedhyāt tajjñānācca yo 'nyo bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktaḥ
analyzed: tatra anya bhāva lakṣaṇaḥ iti pratiṣedhyāt tad jñānāt ca yaḥ nyaḥ bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhya viviktaḥ

original: pradeśaḥ tajjñānaṃ ca tadātmako 'bhāvaḥ vivakṣitād bhāvāt pratiṣedhyād bhāvāt tajñānāccānyatvādanupalabdhitvena (Hbṭ 178)
analyzed: pradeśaḥ tad jñānam ca tad ātmakaḥ bhāvaḥ vivakṣitāt bhāvāt pratiṣedhyāt bhāvāt tad jñānāt ca anya tvāt anupalabdhi tvena
bhavataḥ bhimataḥ svayam sva rūpeṇa pramāṇena indriya pratyakṣeṇa sva saṃvedana pratyakṣeṇa
ca siddhaḥ san tasya pratiṣedhyasya abhāva vyavahāram jñāna abhidhāna pravṛtti lakṣaṇam
sādhayet tad siddhi siddhaḥ vā tasya anya bhāva lakṣaṇasya abhāvasya yathā uktasya siddhyā

original: siddho vā tadabhāvastasya pratiṣedhyasya tajjñānasya vābhāva iti evamapīṣyamāṇe “na
analyzed: siddhaḥ vā tad abhāvaḥ tasya pratiṣedhyasya tad jñānasya vā abhāvaḥ iti evam api iṣyamāṇe na
kaścid viśeṣaḥ tvad abhimata anupalabdhitaḥ smad abhimata anupalabdheḥ tatas smad darśanam
kim iti pratikṣipyate
nanu asti eva evam iṣyamāṇe viśeṣaḥ nyabhāva lakṣaṇa anupalabdhiḥ itarayā vyavahitā tad abhāva vyavahāram

original: sādhayeditarā tu sākṣādityāha- sa viśeṣo nāsti yena viśeṣeṇānupalabdhyābhāvarūpayā
analyzed: sādhayet itarā tu sākṣāt iti āha sa viśeṣaḥ na asti yena viśeṣeṇa anupalabdhyā abhāva rūpayā
vastu saṃsparśa rahitayā asmad abhimatayā abhāva vyavahāra siddheḥ virodhaḥ syāt
anyasya tu viśeṣasya sataḥ pi abādhaka tvāt asat samatvam eva
yat api uktam
tasya sādhana abhāvāt abhāva vyavahāra asiddhi prasaṅgaḥ iti
tat api asat

original: yataḥ sa eva tvadabhimato 'nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaviviktabhūtalātmakastadviṣayā copalabdhiranupalabdhitveneṣṭā
analyzed: yatas saḥ eva tvad abhimataḥ nyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhya vivikta bhū tala ātmakaḥ tad viṣayā ca upalabdhiḥ anupalabdhi tvena iṣṭā
bhavataḥ tad abhāvasya anupalabdhi tvena asmad matasya pratiṣedhya abhāvasya tad upalabdhi abhāvasya
ca kim kasmāt na sādhanam liṅgam iṣyate
tathā hi sati loka pratītiḥ anusṛtā bhavati

original: “kiṃ punaḥ” kasmāt punaḥ “abhāvasya” dvividhasya “siddhireva tadabhāvasiddhiḥ” na tatsādhyā kācidanyā vidyata ityasmanmataniṣedhārthaṃ lokātikrāntamiṣyata  #
analyzed: kim punar kasmāt punar abhāvasya dvividhasya siddhiḥ eva tad abhāva siddhiḥ na tad sādhyā kācid anyā vidyate iti asmad mata niṣedha artham loka atikrāntam iṣyata
iti pūrvapakṣaḥ
atra āha apṛthak siddheḥ anya bhāvāt tad abhāvasya pṛthak siddheḥ abhāvāt kutas liṅga liṅgi tā
tathā sambandha abhāvāt ca anya bhāva tad abhāva yoḥ na liṅga liṅgi tā iti

original: prathamaṃ tāvat kāraṇaṃ vivṛṇvannāha- “anyabhāvastadviviktadeśātmakastāvanna sādhanaṃ” liṅgaṃ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya,
analyzed: prathamam tāvat kāraṇam vivṛṇvan āha anya bhāvaḥ tad vivikta deśa ātmakaḥ tāvat na sādhanam liṅgam pratiṣedhya abhāvasya
tad upalabdhiḥ api tad abhāvasya na sādhanam
iti paścāt vakṣyate
tad artham eva tāvat śabdaḥ
kasmāt anya bhāvaḥ na sādhanam

original: ityāha- “yatsiddhau” yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau “yasya” aparasya (Hbṭ 179)
analyzed: iti āha yad siddhau yasya vastunaḥ siddhau pratītau yasya aparasya

original: vastuno “na siddhi“rna pratītiḥ tadvastu tasya vastuno liṅgaṃ bhavatītyayaṃ liṅgaliṅginornyāyaḥ /
analyzed: vastunaḥ na siddhiḥ na pratītiḥ tat vastu tasya vastunaḥ liṅgam bhavati iti ayam liṅga liṅginoḥ nyāyaḥ
tatra udāharaṇam dhūma agni vat iti

original: yathā- yadā dhūmapratītau nāgniḥ pratīyate tadā tayorlliṅgaliṅgibhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: yathā yadā dhūma pratītau na agniḥ pratīyate tadā tayoḥ liṅga liṅgi bhāvaḥ bhavati
na tu dhūma pratīti kāle eva pratīyamāne gnau
yadi nāma evam tatas kim

original: ityata āha- “anyasya vastuno yo bhāvaḥ” svabhāva “tatsiddhyaiva” tatpratītyeva “tadabhāvaḥ”
analyzed: iti atas āha anyasya vastunaḥ yaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāva tad siddhyā eva tad pratītyā iva tad abhāvaḥ
tasya pratiṣedhyasya abhāvaḥ prasidhyati pratīyate anya bhāvasya eva tad abhāva ātmaka tvāt
tad siddheḥ eva tad siddhi lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: naiyāyikāstu manyante- pratiṣedhyābhāvo hi prasajyapratiṣedhātmakastuccharūpastasya kathaṃ tadanyabhāvarūpatā?
analyzed: naiyāyikāḥ tu manyante pratiṣedhya abhāvaḥ hi prasajya pratiṣedha ātmakaḥ tuccha rūpaḥ tasya katham tad anya bhāva rūpa tā
bhāva abhāvayoḥ virodhāt
tatas katham tad anya bhāva siddhyā eva tad abhāva siddhiḥ syāt

original: ityata āha- “tasya” tadanyabhāvasya pradeśalakṣaṇasya tasmādanyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭādinā “asaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya” rahitātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena  #
analyzed: iti atas āha tasya tad anya bhāvasya pradeśa lakṣaṇasya tasmāt anyena pratiṣedhyena ghaṭa ādinā asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpasya rahita ātmanaḥ kevalasya pratiṣedhyena
śūnya ātmanaḥ
anena kevala pradeśasya api prasajya pratiṣedha ātmaka tām āha
katham bhāvasya tuccha rūpa tā svabhāvaḥ virodhāt

original: iti cet; na, pararūpeṇa tasyāpi tuccharūpatvāt /
analyzed: iti ced na para rūpeṇa tasya api tuccha rūpa tvāt

original: yathā hyanapekṣitabhāvāntarasaṃsargaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ śūnyavikalpapratibhāsī pratiṣedhyena tuccharūpaḥ tadrūpavirahāt,
analyzed: yathā hi an apekṣita bhāva antara saṃsargaḥ prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ śūnya vikalpa pratibhāsī pratiṣedhyena tuccha rūpaḥ tad rūpa virahāt
tathā tad anya bhāvaḥ pi pratiṣedhya asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpaḥ
tatas katham asya pratiṣedhyena tuccha rūpa tā virudhyeta
sva rūpeṇa hi ayam a tuccha rūpaḥ syāt na para rūpeṇa

original: anyathā kathamasyānyabhāvatvaṃ parasya vā tatrābhāvaḥ syāt? /
analyzed: anyathā katham asya anya bhāva tvam parasya vā tatra abhāvaḥ syāt

original: yo hi yadabhāvarūpo na bhavati sa evāsau bhavati,
analyzed: yaḥ hi yad abhāva rūpaḥ na bhavati saḥ eva asau bhavati
tad sva rūpa vat
tatas sarvasya jagataḥ paraspara ātma tā prasaṅgaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvabhāvāḥ pararūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ svarūpeṇa rūpavattve 'pī tyanavadyam /
analyzed: tasmāt sarva bhāvāḥ para rūpeṇa niḥsvabhāvāḥ sva rūpeṇa rūpavat tve tyanavadyam
kaḥ tarhi prasajya pratiṣedhat paryudāsasya bhedaḥ

original: na kaścit, kevalamanapekṣitarūpāntaramabhāvamātraṃ prasajyapratiṣedha iti loke kathyate /
analyzed: na kaścid kevalam anapekṣita rūpa antaram abhāva mātram prasajya pratiṣedhaḥ iti loke kathyate
rūpa antaram tu para rūpa śanyam paryudāsaḥ iti

original: na tu rūpāntaraṃ pararūpatucchātmakaṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: na tu rūpa antaram para rūpa tuccha ātmakam na bhavati
anubhūyate eva ca rūpa antaram tad rūpa śūnyatayā

original: kathaṃ tasya prasajyapratiṣedhātmatā na syāt pararūpeṇa? /
analyzed: katham tasya prasajya pratiṣedha ātmatā na syāt para rūpeṇa
sāmarthyāt tatas tad pratītiḥ iti ced na
akāraṇa pratītau sāmarthya asambhavāt

original: tādātmyābhāve hi prasajyapratiṣedhasya paryudastāt pratītau tatkāraṇatve sati syāt pratipattiḥ nānyathā /
analyzed: tādātmya abhāve hi prasajya pratiṣedhasya paryudastāt pratītau tad kāraṇa tve sati syāt pratipattiḥ na anyathā

original: tasya tadanyāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpasya yat tattvaṃ tasya pratiṣedhyatuccharūpatāyā vyavasthāpakaṃ pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣarūpam tata eva- na taduttarakālabhāvino
analyzed: tasya tad anya asaṃsṛṣṭa rūpasya yat tattvam tasya pratiṣedhya tuccha rūpa tāyāḥ vyavasthāpakam pramāṇam pratyakṣa rūpam tatas eva na tad uttara kāla bhāvinaḥ
na asti iha ghaṭaḥ
iti vikalpāt

original: tasya gṛhītagrāhitayā smṛtitvenāpramāṇatvāt- anyasya ghaṭādestatrāsato vyavacchedasyābhāvasya siddhestadabhāvātmakasyaiva pradeśasya tena grahaṇāt
analyzed: tasya gṛhīta grāhi tayā smṛti tvena apramāṇa tvāt anyasya ghaṭa ādeḥ tatra asataḥ vyavacchedasya abhāvasya siddheḥ tad abhāva ātmakasya eva pradeśasya tena grahaṇāt

original: dvividho hyayaṃ pradeśo ghaṭāsaṃsṛṣṭarūpsastavdyāvṛttarūpatayā tato 'nyo ghaṭavānapi,
analyzed: dvividhaḥ hi ayam pradeśaḥ tatas nyaḥ ghaṭavān api
kevalaḥ ca ghaṭam prati apratipanna ādhāra bhāvaḥ

original: tasya tadvivekena pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭādanyatvaṃ ghaṭavirahaśca gṛhīta eva bhavatīti na vastvasaṃkarasiddhyartham,
analyzed: tasya tad vivekena pratyakṣeṇa grahaṇe ghaṭāt anya tvam ghaṭa virahaḥ ca gṛhītaḥ eva bhavati iti na vastu asaṃkara siddhi artham
iha idam na asti
iti evam artham ca pramāṇa antaram anveṣaṇīyam
vistarataḥ ca etat uttaratra vakṣyate iti āstām tāvat

original: yataścānyabhāvasiddhyaiva tadabhāva uktena nyāyena siddhyati tato nānyabhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyābhāvasya liṅgam /
analyzed: yatas ca anya bhāva siddhyā eva tad abhāvaḥ uktena nyāyena siddhi ati tatas na anya bhāvaḥ pratiṣedhya abhāvasya liṅgam
dvitīyam kāraṇam vyācakṣāṇaḥ āha sambandha abhāvāt ca iti
anya bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ na kaścid sambandhaḥ sti
tatas kutas liṅga liṅgi bhāvaḥ iti
etat ca kadā ucyate
yadā tad abhāva rūpatā anya bhāvasya para anabhyupagatā apekṣyate
tad anya bhāvāt pṛthak eva tad abhāvaḥ tuccha rūpaḥ iṣyate paraiḥ

original: anyathoktena nyāyenānyabhāvasyaiva tadabhāvarūpatve tādātmyāt kathaṃ sambandhābhāvaḥ? /
analyzed: anyathā uktena nyāyena anya bhāvasya eva tad abhāva rūpa tve tādātmyāt katham sambandha abhāvaḥ
pratyakṣa siddha tā ca tadā eva
na pakṣa antareṇa abhihitā

original: “tacca tasya” ityādyasyaiva vivaraṇaṃ vyatirekamukhena “ekārthasamavāya” iti paradarśanenoktaṃ /
analyzed: tat ca tasya ityādyasya eva vivaraṇam vyatireka mukhena eka artha samavāyaḥ iti para darśanena uktam

original: pareṣāṃ hi naiyāyikādīnāṃ vyatiriktāveva kṛtakānityatvākhyau dharmāvekasminneva dharmiṇi
analyzed: pareṣām hi naiyāyika ādīnām vyatiriktau eva kṛtaka anitya tva ākhyau dharmau ekasmin eva dharmiṇi

original: samavetāviti kṛtakasyānityatvenaikasminnarthe dharmiṇi samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ dhamasya veti (Hbṭ 181)
analyzed: samavetau iti kṛtakasya anitya tvena ekasmin arthe dharmiṇi samavāyaḥ sambandhaḥ dhamasya vā iti
sambandhaḥ eva udāharaṇa antaram

original: atraikarthasamavāya iti saṃyogaḥ sa eva samavāyaśabdenoktaḥ /
analyzed: atra eka artha samavāyaḥ iti saṃyogaḥ saḥ eva samavāya śabdena uktaḥ
saṃyoga samavāyayoḥ kalpita tvāt bhedena vyapadeśe na ādarāt

original: pareṣāṃ tvagnidhūmau svāvayaveṣveva samavetāviti na tayorekārthasamavāya ādhārādheyabhāvo veti dhūmasyāgnerupari darśanāllaukikaḥ sambandha  #
analyzed: pareṣām tu agni dhūmau sva avayaveṣu eva samavetau iti na tayoḥ ekārtha samavāyaḥ ādhāra ādheya bhāvaḥ vā iti dhūmasya agneḥ upari darśanāt laukikaḥ sambandha
uktaḥ
janya janaka bhāvaḥ vā iti pāramārthikaḥ sambandhaḥ bhihitaḥ
paramārthataḥ gneḥ janaka tvāt itarasya ca janya tvāt iti

original: nanu ceśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kimiti naiyāyikābhimasyāpi sambandhasyānyabhāvatadabhāvayorabhāva ucyate /
analyzed: nanu ca īśvarasenena saha vicāraḥ prakrāntaḥ tat kim iti naiyāyika abhimasya api sambandhasya anya bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ abhāvaḥ ucyate
satyam prasaṅgena tu tad matasya api niṣedha artham uktam

original: pūrvaṃ hyanyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddhatvāt pratiṣedhyābhāvasya na tadarthaṃ pratyakṣāntaraṃ '
analyzed: pūrvam hi anya bhāva grāhi pratyakṣa siddha tvāt pratiṣedhya abhāvasya na tad artham pratyakṣa antaram
na asti iha ghaṭaḥ
iti evam ākāram kalpanīyam iti prasaṅgataḥ kathitam

original: adhunā tu prasaṅgādidamucyate- yadānyabhāvagrāhipratyakṣasiddho 'yaṃ tadabhāvo na bhavati tadā pratyakṣāntaraṃ '
analyzed: adhunā tu prasaṅgāt idam ucyate yadā anya bhāva grāhi pratyakṣa siddhaḥ yam tad abhāvaḥ na bhavati tadā pratyakṣa antaram
na asti iha ghaṭaḥ
iti evam ākāram viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāva lakṣaṇāt sannikarṣāt iṣṭam bhavatā
na ca asati sambandhe nyabhāva tad abhāvayoḥ viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ
atiprasaṅgāt

original: tataḥ kutastallakṣaṇāt sannikarṣāt tadabhāve pratyakṣaṃ bhavediti /
analyzed: tatas kutas tad lakṣaṇāt sannikarṣāt tad abhāve pratyakṣam bhavet iti
evam sambandha svarūpam ākhyāya tasya iha asambhavam āha na evam yathā kṛtaka tva anitya tvayoḥ agni dhūmayoḥ vā ekārtha samavāya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ

original: sambandho naivaṃ kaścid bhāvābhāvayoḥ sambandho yena “asya” tadabhāvasyānyabhāvaḥ sādhanaṃ syāt /
analyzed: sambandhaḥ nā evam kaścid bhāva abhāvayoḥ sambandhaḥ yena asya tad abhāvasya anya bhāvaḥ sādhanam syāt
yau ekatra arthe dharmi rūpe pravartete tayoḥ eka artha samavāyaḥ bhavati

original: anyabhāvaśca pradeśākhyaḥ svāvayaveṣu yeṣu vartate na tatra ghaṭābhāvaḥ /
analyzed: anya bhāvaḥ ca pradeśa ākhyaḥ sva avayaveṣu yeṣu vartate na tatra ghaṭa abhāvaḥ

original: evaṃ hi pradeśāvayaveṣu ghaṭo nāstīti syāt na pradeśe /
analyzed: evam hi pradeśa avayaveṣu ghaṭaḥ na asti iti syāt na pradeśe
na ca asya pradeśa avayavaiḥ ārambhaḥ
te hi dravya ātmānaḥ dravya antaram eva ārabhante
na ca ghaṭa abhāvaḥ dravyam
nava eva hi dravyāṇi iṣyante
na ca kriyāvat ādikam dravya lakṣaṇam tatra asti
na ca guṇa rūpa tayā tatra vartate
caturviśatiḥ eva hi hbṛ
guṇāḥ iṣyante
na ca ayam teṣām anyatamaḥ
nā api karma rūpataya pañcasu karmasu anantarbhāvāt tad lakṣaṇa virahāt ca
eka dravyam iti ādikam hi tat lakṣaṇam
na ca etat abhāve sambhavati iti
nā api sāmānya ādi rūpa tayā
tad rupa virahāt eva
na api anya bhāva tad abhāvayoḥ saṃyogaḥ gni dhūmayoḥ iva
dravyayoḥ eva tad abhyupagamāt
na ca tad abhāvaḥ dravyam iti uktam
na api ādhāra rā
dheya bhāvaḥ
yatas saḥ pi saṃyoga nimittaḥ ucyate
iha kuṇḍe badarāṇi iti
samavāya nimittaḥ vā
iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ iti
na ca abhāvasya a dravya ātmanaḥ saṃyogaḥ samasti
na api samavāyaḥ
pañcānām eva hi dravya ādīnām padārthānām samavāyi tvam iṣyate
na ca abhāvaḥ pañcasu antarbhavati iti
na ca tad ātma anupakāre sati ādhāra vyapadeśaḥ sambhavati
upakāre vā janya janaka bhavaḥ
na ca tad abhāvaḥ janyaḥ
kārya tā prasaṅgāt
kārya tā ca asya asambhavinī
yatas sva kāraṇa samavāyaḥ
sattā samavāyaḥ vā kārya tā ucyate bhavadbhiḥ
anya bhāvaḥ tu pradeśa ākhyaḥ sya na kāraṇam
trayāṇām eva hi dravya guṇa karmaṇām dravyam kāraṇam iṣṭam
na ca abhāvaḥ dravya ādi lakṣaṇaḥ iti
sattā samavāye pi sat pratyaya viṣaya tā tad abhāvasya syāt
na abhāva pratyaya viṣaya tā
pradeśa abhāve ca ghaṭa abhāva sambhavāt kutas tad kārya tā
na ca asya prativiṣayam bhedaḥ
eka ākāra jñāna viṣaya tvāt
sambandhi bhedāt bhede vā sāmānya ādiṣu api tad prasaṅgaḥ

original: samavāyopyasyānantarameva nirasta iti kutaḥ svakāraṇasattāsamavāyarūpā kāryatā tadabhāvasya syāt? /
analyzed: samavāyaḥ upyasya anantaram eva nirastaḥ iti kutas sva kāraṇa sattā samavāya rūpā kāryatā tad abhāvasya syāt

tatas sarvathā sambandha abhāvāt na anya bhāvaḥ tad abhāvasya sādhanam iti
paraḥ sambandha antaram darśayan āha asti viṣaya ityādi

original: yathā hi artho viṣayaḥ śabdo viṣayīti tayorviṣayaviṣayibhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ,

original: yādṛśo ghaṭaviviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśo 'grataḥ sthitastādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasyābhāva iti kuto 'nekāntaḥ? /
analyzed: yādṛśaḥ ghaṭa viviktaḥ kevalaḥ pradeśaḥ gratas sthitaḥ tādṛśe sarvatra pradeśe ghaṭasya abhāvaḥ iti kutas nekāntaḥ
tathāvidha pradeśa viśeṣa pratītiḥ eva ghaṭa abhāva pratītiḥ tatas nyabhāva tad abhāvayoḥ liṅga liṅgi tā anupapannā iti upadarśayan āha nanu tasya eva ityādi

original: yo 'sau kevalaḥ pradeśaviśeṣo dharmitayāvasthāpitastasyaiva yat kaivalyaṃ kevala ityanena viśeṣaṇenocyate bhavatā,
analyzed: sau kevalaḥ pradeśa viśeṣaḥ dharmi tayā avasthāpitaḥ tasya eva yat kaivalyam kevalaḥ iti anena viśeṣaṇena ucyate bhavatā

original: ta deva ghaṭaviraho ghaṭābhāva iti kathyate /
analyzed: ghaṭa virahaḥ ghaṭa abhāvaḥ iti kathyate

original: sa ca ghaṭaviraho liṅgabhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya pratipattāveva siddho na tūttarakālaṃ tato 'nya eva ākārāntareṇa dhūmādivāgniḥ sidhyati
analyzed: sa ca ghaṭa virahaḥ liṅga bhūtasya kevalasya pradeśasya pratipattau eva siddhaḥ na tu uttarakālam tatas nyaḥ eva ākāra antareṇa dhūmāt iva agniḥ sidhyati
tatas kasya idānīm tad pratipattau eva sādhya pratītau satyām tat liṅgam
na kasyacid
jijñāsitasya ghaṭa abhāvasya siddheḥ anyasya kasyacid ajijñāsita tvāt
kevala pradeśa pratipattau eva ghaṭa viraha pratītau ca yat etat uttara kālam

original: yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśastatra tatra ghaṭavirahaḥ';
analyzed: yatra yatra kevalaḥ pradeśaḥ tatra tatra ghaṭa virahaḥ
iti gamanam anu
saraṇam tat ca nirarthakam ādau eva sādhya pratīteḥ

original: yata evaṃ tasmādanyabhāvaḥ kevalapradeśalakṣaṇaḥ sādhyasādhanayorbhedābhāvānna sādhanamabhāvasyeti sthitam /
analyzed: yatas evam tasmāt anyabhāvaḥ kevala pradeśa lakṣaṇaḥ sādhya sādhanayoḥ bheda abhāvāt na sādhanam abhāvasya iti sthitam

original: tadevaṃ samudāyasādhyatāṃ liṅgasya ca dharmiṇāsambandhaṃ pratipādayituṃ yaduktaṃ pareṇa- '
analyzed: tat evam samudāya sādhya tām liṅgasya ca dharmiṇā asambandham pratipādayitum yat uktam pareṇa
pradeśa ādi dharmi viśeṣaṇasya abhāvasya sādhanāt
iti tat apṛthak siddhi dūṣaṇena eva nirākṛtam

original: viṣayaviṣayibhāvena tu sambandhapratipādane niraste paro 'nyathā sambandhaṃ sādhyasādhanayorddarśayannāha- “astya“nyabhāvatadabhāvayoḥ sambandho  #
analyzed: viṣaya viṣayi bhāvena tu sambandha pratipādane niraste paraḥ nyathā sambandham sādhya sādhanayoḥ ddarśayan āha asti anyabhāva tad abhāvayoḥ
virodha ākhyaḥ
tatas sambandha sadbhāvāt anya bhāvāt abhāvasya siddhiḥ bhaviṣyati iti

original: siddhāntavādī tu sādhyasādhanayorvirodhamevāsambhāvayan pṛcchati- “kena kasya virodhaḥ” iti /
analyzed: siddhāntavādī tu sādhya sādhanayoḥ virodham eva asambhāvayan pṛcchati kena kasya virodhaḥ iti
na hi atra sādhya sādhanayoḥ virodhaḥ saṃbhavati iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: paro virodhamabhiprāyanabhijñatayā darśayati- “anyabhāvena” kevalapradeśātmanā “pratiyogino” yasyābhāvaḥ pramātumiṣṭo ghaṭādestasyeti /
analyzed: paraḥ virodham abhiprāya anabhijña tayā darśayati anya bhāvena kevala pradeśa ātmanā pratiyoginaḥ yasya abhāvaḥ pramātum iṣṭaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ tasya iti

original: parasyaivaṃvādino asambandhābhidhāyitāmādarśayannāha- “kiṃ nu vai pratiyogī” ghaṭādiḥ pramātumiṣṭo yena pratiyoginaḥ prameyatvena liṅgaliṅginorvirodhaḥ  #
analyzed: parasya evaṃvādinaḥ asambandha abhidhāyi tām ādarśayan āha kim nu vai pratiyogī ghaṭa ādiḥ pramātum iṣṭaḥ yena pratiyoginaḥ prameya tvena liṅga liṅginoḥ virodhaḥ  /
sambandhaḥ abhidhīyate

original: naiva pratiyogī pramātumiṣṭaḥ kintu tadabhāva iti cet,
analyzed: na eva pratiyogī pramātum iṣṭaḥ kintu tad abhāve iti ced
āha abhāvaḥ tu pratiyoginaḥ yaḥ sādhya

original: [kumārilastu manyate bhavāṃśādbhinno ']yamabhāvāṃśastato nānyabhāva eva tadabhāva iti kathaṃ tatpratipattireva tadabhāvapratipattiriti /
analyzed: kumārilaḥ tu manyate bhava aṃśāt bhinnaḥ yam abhāva aṃśaḥ tatas na anya bhāvaḥ eva tad abhāvaḥ iti katham tad pratipattiḥ eva tad abhāva pratipattiḥ iti
tathā hi ayam abhāvaḥ prāgabhāva ādi bheda bhinnaḥ

original: na cāvastuno bhedaḥ sambhavati ato 'yaṃ vasturūpa eva / yadāha-
analyzed: na ca avastunaḥ bhedaḥ sambhavati atas yam vastu rūpaḥ eva yat āha
na ca avastunaḥ ete syuḥ bhedāḥ tena asya vastu tā iti
na ca bhāva aṃśaḥ eva abhāva aṃśaḥ yuktaḥ
tasya indriya saṃyoga balena pratīteḥ
itara pratīteḥ ca tad asaṃyoga hetuka tvāt yat āha
tad saṃyoge sat iti evam sat rūpa tvam pratīyate
na asti atrā idam iti ittham tu tad asaṃyoga hetukam iti
tat katham tad pratipattiḥ eva aparasya vyavacchedanam iti tad nirāsa artham āha

original: “tasyā“nyasya pradeśasya kevalasya yat tat “kaivalya” mekākikatvamasahāyatā tadeva
analyzed: tasya anyasya pradeśasya kevalasya yat tat kaivalyam ekākika tvam asahāya tā tat eva
aparasya pratiyoginaḥ ghaṭa ādeḥ vaikalyam abhāvaḥ iti tasmāt tad anya bhāvaḥ eva

original: bhāvāṃśa eva tvadabhimataḥ “tadabhāvaḥ” pratiyogyabhāvāṃśo na tataḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ
analyzed: bhāva aṃśaḥ eva tvad abhimataḥ tad abhāvaḥ pratiyogi abhāva aṃśaḥ na tatas pṛthak bhūtam
dharma antaram iti ucyate sugata sutaiḥ

original: tataśca “tatpratipattireva ca” tasyānyabhāvasya pratipattireva ca “tadapratipattiḥ” tasya pratiyogino 'pratipattirabhāvapratipattiriti yāvat
analyzed: tatas ca tad pratipattiḥ eva ca tasya anya bhāvasya pratipattiḥ eva ca tad apratipattiḥ tasya pratiyoginā pratipattiḥ abhāva pratipattiḥ iti yāvat

original: evaṃ manyate- yo 'yamabhāvāṃśo bhāvāṃśāt pṛthagbhūto vastuno dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭādyabhāvātmakatāṃ tadrūpavaikalyādevānubhavati nānyathā
analyzed: evam manyate yaḥ yam abhāva aṃśaḥ bhāva aṃśāt pṛthak bhūtaḥ vastunaḥ dharmaḥ parikalpyate sa ghaṭa ādi abhāva ātmaka tām tad rūpa vaikalyāt eva anubhavati na anyathā
tat ca tad rūpa vaikalyam anya vastunaḥ bhāva aṃśasya api vidyate eva
tad abhāve hi tasya anya vastu tā eva hīyeta

original: nahi yad yadrūpavikalaṃ na bhavati tat tato 'nyatvamanubhavati,
analyzed: nahi yat yad rūpa vikalam na bhavati tat tatas nya tvam anubhavati
yathā tasya eva svarūpam
tathā ca abhāva aṃśaḥ tasya na sidhyet
sarvam ca viśvam ekam dravyam prasajyeta
tatas ca saha utpatti ādi prasaṅgaḥ

original: sarvasya ca sarvatropayogaḥ syādityavaśyamanyavastuno bhāvarūpatā tadanyābhāvātmikaiva /
analyzed: sarvasya ca sarvatra upayogaḥ syāt iti avaśyam anya vastunaḥ bhāva rūpa tā tad anya abhāva ātmikā eva
tathā ca tad pratipattiḥ eva tad anya abhāva pratipattiḥ

original: tatsaṃyoga eva cendriyasya tadanyābhāvasaṃyoga iti kimucyate-
analyzed: tad saṃyogaḥ eva ca indriyasya tad anya abhāva saṃyogaḥ iti kim ucyate
na asti atrā idam iti ittham tu tad asaṃyoga hetukam
iti
vikalpa apekṣayā uktam iti ced
tat etat abādhakam eva

original: pratyakṣeṇa tadākārotpattyā tadanyabhāvātmake eva vasturūpe pratipanne pāścātyasya (Hbṭ 189)
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa tad ākāra utpattyā tad anya bhāva ātmake eva vastu rūpe pratipanne pāścātyasya
yathā gṛhīta abhilāpinaḥ vikalpasya upagamāt

original: vistarataścāyamabhāvavicāraḥ pramāṇadvitvasiddhāvabhāvaṃ prameyaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca vicārayatā vihita iti tata evāvavadhārya iti /
analyzed: vistarataḥ ca ayam abhāva vicāraḥ pramāṇa dvi tva siddhau abhāvam prameyam pramāṇam ca vicārayatā vihitaḥ iti tatas eva au avadhāryaḥ iti
avaśyam ca tad anya bhāva pratipattiḥ eva tad abhāva pratipattiḥ
tatas na vastu asaṅkara sidhi artham
na asti atra idam
iti abhāva vyavahāra artham ca abhāva pramāṇa parikalpanā yuktā iti darśayan āha anyathā

original: yadi tatpratipattireva tadabhāvapratipattiriti neṣyate tadā “tasya” anyavastunaḥ
analyzed: yadi tad pratipattiḥ eva tad abhāva pratipattiḥ iti na iṣyate tadā tasya anya vastunaḥ
sva rūpa paricchedena tatas nyasya a tad rūpasya a vyavacchede a nirākaraṇe tad abhāva apratipattau

original: “tatpariccheda eva na syāt“- tasya tadanyavastunaḥ svarūpapratipattireva na syāt /
analyzed: tad paricchedaḥ eva na syāt tasya tad anya vastunaḥ svarūpa pratipattiḥ eva na syāt
kim kāraṇam
tad a tad rūpayoḥ tasya tad anya vastunaḥ yat rūpam pratiniyatam sakala trailokya vilakṣaṇam

original: yaccātadrūpaṃ tadrūpaṃ na bhavati pararūpaṃ tayoḥ “avivekād” avivecanād vivekenāvyavasthāpanādasāṅkaryeṇāprasādhanāt /
analyzed: yat ca a tad rūpam tad rūpam na bhavati para rūpam tayoḥ a vivekāt a vivecanāt vivekena a vyavasthāpanāt asāṅkaryeṇa a prasādhanāt

original: sakalapararūpāsaṅkirṇaṃ hi tadrūpam taccet tatsāmarthyabhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā nānukṛtaṃ kevalaṃ sammugdhākārameva tadutpannaṃ tadā kathantena  #
analyzed: sakala para rūpa a saṅkirṇam hi tat rūpam tat ced tad sāmarthya bhāvinā pratyakṣeṇa tathā na anukṛtam kevalam sammugdha ākāram eva tat utpannam tadā katham tena
tad paricchedaḥ syāt

original: na hi yadrūpaṃ yadvastu tadrūpānanukāriṇā jñānena tatparicchedo yukto yathā- śukuśaṅkharūpānanukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pītaśaṅkhāvabhāsinā jñāneneti
analyzed: na hi yad rūpam yat vastu tad rūpa ananukāriṇā jñānena tad paricchedaḥ yuktaḥ yathā śuku śaṅkha rūpa ananukāriṇā kāmalinaḥ pīta śaṅkha avabhāsinā jñānena iti
pratiniyata rūpa anukāre vā tad paricchedasya katham anya vyavacchedaḥ nāma
tatas pratiniyata rūpa an anukārāt eva tad anya a vyavacchedaḥ
tathā ca tad pariccheda abhāvaḥ iti
bhavati evam tatas kaḥ doṣaḥ

original: ityata āha- “ya eṣa vyavahāraḥ” sarvajanapratitaḥ “kasyacid” agnyādervastuno darśanāt
analyzed: iti atas āha yaḥ eṣa vyavahāraḥ kasyacid agni ādeḥ vastunaḥ darśanāt

original: “kvaciddeśe” tatsambandhini “prāptyartho” dṛṣṭasyādṛṣṭasya ca “parihārārthaḥ” pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ “sa na syāt” /
analyzed: kvacid deśe tad sambandhini prāpti arthaḥ dṛṣṭasya adṛṣṭasya ca parihāra arthaḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ sa na syāt
kim kāraṇam

original: “na hi” yasmād “ayaṃ” pratipattā “analaṃ paśyannapi” saṅkīrṇatadadrūpapratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa,
analyzed: na hi yasmāt ayam pratipattā analam paśyan api saṅkīrṇa tad adrūpa pratibhāsinā pratyakṣeṇa
anyathā asya darśana rūpa tā hāneḥ

original: tathā hi- asaṅkīrṇasyādarśane saṅkīrṇamapi yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭādiprakhyaṃ kathaṃ kasyacidetaddarśanaṃ syāt? /
analyzed: tathā hi asaṅkīrṇasya adarśane saṅkīrṇam api yadi na paśyet tadā loṣṭa ādi prakhyam katham kasyacid etat darśanam syāt
saḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ saṅkīrṇa darśanavān pratipattā
katham analam eva paśyati na salila ādikam
kintu saṅkīrṇa rūpa vastu pratibhāsi jñāna tayā salila ādikam api paśyati

original: tataḥ kathaṃ “salilārthī tatra” agnimati pradeśe “na pravarteta”? /
analyzed: tatas katham salila arthī tatra agnimati pradeśe na pravarteta
parasya vacana avakāśam āśaṅkayā āha anupalambhena ityādi
anala pratibhāsinā hi jñānena anala svarūpam eva pratīyate
yaḥ tu salila abhāvaḥ sa tatra salilasya anupalambhena

original: tato jñānadvayena tadatadrūpayorvivekālloke pravṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyato vyavahāraḥ sidhyatīti /
analyzed: tatas jñāna dvayena tad a tad rūpayoḥ vivekāt loke pravṛtti nivṛtti lakṣaṇaḥ pratiniyataḥ vyavahāraḥ sidhyati iti
siddhāntavādī āha kaḥ yam anupalambhaḥ nāma iti

original: kadācit paro brūyāt salilopalambhavirahamātramityata āha- “yadi salila” ityādi /
analyzed: kadācid paraḥ brūyāt salila upalambha viraha mātram iti atas āha yadi salile ityādi
kumārilasya tu salila upalambha nivṛtti mātram tuccha rūpam abhāva pramāṇa tayā na abhimatam eva
pratyakṣa ādeḥ anutpattiḥ pramāṇa abhāvaḥ ucyate
pariṇāmaḥ vā vijñānam vā anya vastuni
iti vacanāt

original: kintu yo 'sāvātmanaḥ pratiṣedhyavastupratibhāsijñānātmanāpariṇāmaḥ sa tadanyavastupratibhāsijñānasahacarito 'bhyupagantavyo na kevala iti paramabhyupagamayitumasyopanyāsaḥ
analyzed: kintu sa ātmanaḥ pratiṣedhya vastu pratibhāsi jñāna ātmanā pariṇāmaḥ sa tad anya vastu pratibhāsi jñāna sahacaritaḥ bhyupagantavyaḥ na kevalaḥ iti param abhyupagamayitum asya upanyāsaḥ
tathā ca anya vastu vijñānam eva abhāva pramāṇam astu
kim apramāṇakasya ātmanaḥ pariṇāma ākhyena dharmeṇa parikalpitena

original: na ca tadanyavastuvijñānapariṇāmādanya eva tasyāpariṇāmo nāma bhavato 'bhimato bhāvāntarasyaivābhāvatvenopagatatvāt /
analyzed: na ca tad anya vastu vijñāna pariṇāmāt anyaḥ eva tasya apariṇāmaḥ nāma bhavataḥ bhimataḥ bhāva antarasya eva abhāva tvena upagata tvāt

original: tulyayogyatārūpasyaikajñānasaṃsargiṇa eva cānyavastuno vijñānaṃ tathopeyaṃ nānyasya,
analyzed: tulya yogya tā rūpasya eka jñāna saṃsargiṇaḥ eva ca anya vastunaḥ vijñānam tathā upeyam na anyasya
tad jñānāt pratiyogi abhāva siddheḥ
na hi rūpa jñānāt rasa ādi abhāva pratītiḥ yuktimatī deśa ādi viprakarṣavataḥ vā
anya vastu vijñānam ca pratiniyata

original: rūpāntarāvabhāsitve hi tasya salilopalambhābhāva eva na sidhyet /
analyzed: rūpa antara avabhāsi tve hi tasya salila upalambha abhāvaḥ eva na sidhyet
evam ca pratiyogi abhāvaḥ pratyakṣa avabhāsitaḥ eva
tad abhāva vyavahāre tu asmad abhimatā eva anupalabdhiḥ āyātā iti pratipādayitum asya upanyāsaḥ
tatra yadi salila upalambha abhāvaḥ tuccha rūpaḥ n upalambhaḥ tadā katham abhāvaḥ
kasyacid pratipattiḥ paricchedaḥ iti yāvat
paricchedasya jñāna dharma tvāt

original: atha na tasya pratipattirūpateṣyate kintu taddhetubhāva ityata āha- “pratipattiheturvā” iti /
analyzed: atha na tasya pratipatti rūpa tā iṣyate kintu tad hetu bhāvaḥ iti atas āha pratipatti hetuḥ vā iti

original: nahi sarvasāmarthyavirahalakṣaṇasyābhāvasya pratipattiṃ prati hetubhāvo yuktaḥ /
analyzed: nahi sarva sāmarthya viraha lakṣaṇasya abhāvasya pratipattim prati hetu bhāvaḥ yuktaḥ

original: hetubhāve vā tasyānapekṣitasahakāriṇo nityaṃ tajjñānajananādabhāvajñānamevaikaṃ pratipattuḥ syāt,
analyzed: hetu bhāve vā tasya an apekṣita sahakāriṇaḥ nityam tad jñāna jananāt abhāva jñānam eva ekam pratipattuḥ syāt
jñāna antarasya avakāśaḥ eva na bhavet

original: na cājñātasyāsya nāstitājñānajananaṃ yuktamityāha- “tasyāpi” salilopalambhābhāvasya kathaṃ pratipattiḥ? /
analyzed: na ca ajñātasya asya nāstitā jñāna jananam yuktam iti āha tasya api salila upalambha abhāvasya katham pratipattiḥ

original: athāyaṃ salilopalambhābhāvaḥ svayamapratīta eva salilābhāvapratītiṃ janayati tadā kasyacidapi /
analyzed: atha ayam salila upalambha abhāvaḥ svayam apratītaḥ eva salila abhāva pratītim janayati tadā kasyacid api
tat eva āha tasya salila upalambha abhāvasya tatas vā salilāt anyasya anala ādeḥ
vijñānam vā anya vastuni
iti atas pariṇāmasya pṛthak avasthāpanāt

original: tatrāpi tadaṅgīkaraṇe cātmano 'pariṇāmasya tadātmakatvānna tato bhedena vyavasthāpyeta /
analyzed: tatra api tad aṅgīkaraṇe ca ātmanaḥ pariṇāmasya tad ātmaka tvāt na tatas bhedena vyavasthāpyeta

original: tataśca kasyacidapi tasya tadanyasya vāpratipattāvapi yadyabhāvaḥ salilādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpādyavasthāsvapi salilādyabhāvaḥ kiṃ na pratīyate?
analyzed: tatas ca kasyacid api tasya tad anyasya vā apratipattau api yadi abhāvaḥ salila ādeḥ pratīyate tadā svāpa ādi avasthāsu api salila ādi abhāvaḥ kim na pratīyate
tadā api tad abhāvaḥ pratīyeta iti etat vicāritam pramāṇa viniścaye
tatas eva avadhāraṇīyam
vyavadhāna ādi grahaṇena ca etat darśayati anya vastunaḥ pi anyatvam tad tulya yogyatā rūpa apekṣam eva
na tad anapekṣam upeyam
tathā ca asmad upavarṇita anupalabdhi siddhiḥ iti
ca evam uktena prakāreṇa anupalambhena salila abhāva pratītiḥ na yujyate nala pratibhāsinaḥ ca
jñānasya pratiniyata ākāra tā nā abhyupagamyate tasmāt ayam anala darśī pratipattā analam
paśyan api saṅkīrṇa rūpa pratibhāsinā jñānena
analaḥ yam na salilam

original: iti nādhyavasyati anadhyavasyaṃśca salilarūpasyāpi pratibhāsanāt tadarthī “na tiṣṭhet” pravarteta “nāpi pratiṣṭheta” salilārthī na pravarteta
analyzed: iti na adhyavasyati an adhyavasyan ca salila rūpasya api pratibhāsanāt tad arthī na tiṣṭhet pravarteta na api pratiṣṭheta salila arthī na pravarteta

original: tathāhi- salilaṃ nāma taducyate yat sarvodanyāsantāpādyapanayanakṣamaṃ sakalatadanyarūpāsaṃkīrṇapratiniyatākārajñānāvabhāsi /
analyzed: tathā hi salilam nāma tat ucyate yat sarva udanya asantāpa ādi apanayana kṣamam sakala tad anya rūpa asaṃkīrṇa pratiniyata ākāra jñāna avabhāsi
