pratyakṣam ca nirvikalpakam iṣyate tat katham asāṃkarya siddhiḥ tatas
iti atas āha tasya anvaye tyādi

original: taddhi pratyakṣaṃ vidhipratiṣedhavikalpau yadā svaviṣaye janayati tadaivāsya sāphalyam,
analyzed: tat hi pratyakṣam vidhi pratiṣedha vikalpau yadā sva viṣaye janayati tadā eva asya sāphalyam
tadā eva ca pramāṇam iṣyate na anyadā atas eva ekasya artha svabhāvasya a pratipanna aṃśa abhāvāt
sarva ātmanā paricchede pi bhrānti kāraṇa sadbhāvāt kṣaṇika tā ādau anvaya vyatireka buddhī
janayitum asāmarthyāt tatra asya prāmāṇyam na iṣyate iti

original: syānmatam- dvairāśyasādhane 'pyasāṃkaryasiddhyarthā mā bhūdabhāvapramāṇakalpanā kintu prakārāntarābhāvasiddhyarthā bhaviṣyati /
analyzed: syāt matam dvairāśya sādhane pi asāṃkarya siddhi arthā mā bhūt abhāva pramāṇa kalpanā kintu prakāra antara abhāva siddhi arthā bhaviṣyati

original: na hi tadabhāvasiddhau pratyakṣasya kaścid vyāpāraḥ pratipādita iti ata āha “tadvyatirikte“tyādi /
analyzed: na hi tad abhāva siddhau pratyakṣasya kaścid vyāpāraḥ pratipāditaḥ iti atas āha tad vyatirikta ityādi

original: tasmāt paridṛśyamānād vyatiriktasyāśeṣasya vastuno vyavacchedena tataḥ pṛthakkaraṇenānyatvena yā vyāptistatsādhanādeva prakārāntarasya tattvānyatvabahirbhūtasyābhāvaḥ  #
analyzed: tasmāt paridṛśyamānāt vyatiriktasya aśeṣasya vastunaḥ vyavacchedena tatas pṛthakkaraṇena anyatvena yā vyāptiḥ tad sādhanāt eva prakāra antarasya tattva anyatva bahis bhūtasya abhāvaḥ
sidhyati
tatas tad artham api na abhāva pramāṇa kalpanā yuktā iti

original: atha matam- sarvasyāparidṛṣṭasya dṛśyamānādanyatayā vyāptiṃ naivaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sādhayati tat kutastṛtīyarāśyabhāvaḥ pratyakṣata eva syāt,
analyzed: atha matam sarvasya a paridṛṣṭasya dṛśyamānāt anya tayā vyāptim na evam pratyakṣam sādhayati tat kutas tṛtīya rāśi abhāvaḥ pratyakṣataḥ eva syāt

original: yato 'bhāvaprāmāṇyakalpanā vyarthā bhavedityata āha- “tasya” tṛtīyarāśitayā kalpyamānasya
analyzed: yatas bhāva prāmāṇya kalpanā vyarthā bhavet iti atas āha tasya tṛtīya rāśi tayā kalpyamānasya

original: tato dṛṣṭādanyatayā vyāptyabhāve “tena” pratyakṣeṇa “tato“'rthāt svaviṣayasya “avyavacchedā” dapṛthakkaraṇāt,
analyzed: tatas dṛṣṭāt anya tayā vyāpti abhāve tena pratyakṣeṇa tatas ṛthāt sva viṣayasya avyavacchedāḥ dapṛthakkaraṇāt

original: tadarthasya ca rāśyantaratvena kalpyamānasya svaviṣayādavyavacchedāt apṛthakkaraṇāt punarapi bhāvasya svaviṣayasyāparicchedaprasaṅgāt /
analyzed: tad arthasya ca rāśi antara tvena kalpyamānasya sva viṣayāt avyavacchedāt apṛthakkaraṇāt punar api bhāvasya sva viṣayasya apariccheda prasaṅgāt

original: sa hi tadviṣayaḥ sakalapararūpāsaṃkīrṇātmā yadi tenātmanā na paricchinnaḥ kathaṃ tena tasya paricchedaḥ? /
analyzed: sa hi tad viṣayaḥ sakala para rūpa asaṃkīrṇa ātmā yadi tena ātmanā na paricchinnaḥ katham tena tasya paricchedaḥ

original: tenātmanā paricchede vā kathaṃ sarvasya tadanyatayā vyāptyasādhanam?
analyzed: tena ātmanā paricchede vā katham sarvasya tad anya tayā vyāpti asādhanam
anyathā ekasya api tad anya tvam na syāt
nimittasya samāna tvāt iti
yatas evam tasmāt kvacid vastuni pramāṇam pratyakṣa ādikam

tatas nyat tat rūpa vikalam vyavacchinatti
tad anya tvena vyavasthāpanāt

sarvasya anya tayā vyāpti sādhanāt

original: evamekasya pramāṇasya vyāpāra eṣo 'nantarokta iti tamevopasaṃhṛtya sukhapratipattaye
analyzed: evam ekasya pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ eṣaḥ nantara uktaḥ iti tam eva upasaṃhṛtya sukha pratipattaye
darśayan āha tathā hi kvacid vastuni pramāṇam pratyakṣa ādi pravṛttam tat eva vastu

original: tadanyasmāt “pārūpād vyavacchinatti” tataḥ pṛthakkaroti tadasaṃkīrṇarūpatayā pratipadyate,
analyzed: tat anyasmāt pārūpāt vyavacchinatti tatas pṛthakkaroti tat asaṃkīrṇa rūpa tayā pratipadyate

original: paramārthatastasya tadrūpatvāt yathāvastu ca pratyakṣeṇa rūpānukārāt /
analyzed: paramārthataḥ tasya tad rūpa tvāt yathāvastu ca pratyakṣeṇa rūpa anukārāt
kim iti

original: tathā “tadanyadeva ca” tasmād dṛśyamānādanyadeva ca vyavacchinatti /
analyzed: tathā tad anyat eva ca tasmāt dṛśyamānāt anyat eva ca vyavacchinatti
kutas
tasmāt sva viṣayāt
na kevalam sva viṣayam paratas vyavacchinatti
param api sva viṣayāt iti

original: anyasya pararūpasya tatra khālambane 'paricchedādavaśyamevāparicchinnasya paricchinnādanyatvaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: anyasya para rūpasya tatra kha ālambane paricchedāt avaśyam eva aparicchinnasya paricchinnāt anya tvam bhavati

original: yata evamataḥ “tad” eva pramāṇamekavastuparicchedakaṃ prakārāntarābhāvaṃ sādhayati,
analyzed: yatas evam atas tat eva pramāṇam eka vastu paricchedakam prakāra antara abhāvam sādhayati
na abhāva ākhyam
kutas etat

original: tasmiṃ dṛśyamāne vastuni dṛṣṭatadanyatvena tasyānyasya tatrāparicchidyamānasyānyatvaṃ
analyzed: tasmin dṛśyamāne vastuni dṛṣṭa tad anya tvena tasya anyasya tatra aparicchidyamānasya anya tvam

original: tadanyatvaṃ dṛṣṭāt tadanyatvaṃ “dṛṣṭatadanyatvaṃ” tena sarvasya tavdyatiriktasya
analyzed: tad anya tvam dṛṣṭāt tad anya tvam dṛṣṭa tad anya tvam tena sarvasya tad vyatiriktasya
vyavasthāpanāt na apanena

original: tadanyasyaiva ca yadanyanna bhavati puro 'vasthitaṃ sakalaparabhāvavyāvṛttaṃ tasyaiva tattvena dṛśyamānaprakāratayā vyavasthāpanāditi /
analyzed: tad anyasya eva ca yat anyat na bhavati puras vasthitam sakala para bhāva vyāvṛttam tasya eva tattvena dṛśyamāna prakāra tayā vyavasthāpanāt iti
amum eva nyāyam anyatra api atidiśan āha etena kramākrama ādayaḥ ityādi
etena anantara uktena nyāyena pratiniyata eka padārtha rūpa anukāriṇī buddhiḥ upajāyamānā

original: tadviparītarūpaṃ sarvaṃ svaviṣayād vyavacchindatī dvairāśyaṃ tṛtīyaprakārābhāvaṃ
analyzed: tad viparīta rūpam sarvam sva viṣayāt vyavacchindatī dvairāśyam tṛtīya prakāra abhāvam

original: ca sādhayatīti ye kecidanyonyavyacchedarūpāḥ kramākramanityānityādayaḥ te vyākhyātāḥ /
analyzed: ca sādhayati iti ye kecid anyonya vyaccheda rūpāḥ kramākrama nitya anitya ādayaḥ te vyākhyātāḥ

original: (Hbṭ 199) tathā hi- kāryasya kramamananyasahāyatāṃ pratiyatyeva buddhistasyākramaṃ kāryāntarasāhityaṃ tataḥ pṛthakkaroti /
analyzed: tathā hi kāryasya kramam ananya sahāya tām pratiyatī eva buddhiḥ tasya akramam kārya antara sāhityam tatas pṛthakkaroti

original: tataḥ kramākramatayā dvaitasiddheḥ tṛtīyasya prakārasya sambhavo nirasto bhavati /
analyzed: tatas kramākrama tayā dvaita siddheḥ tṛtīyasya prakārasya sambhavaḥ nirastaḥ bhavati
krama bhāva vyatirekiṇaḥ sarvasya kārya janmanaḥ tad anya tayā dvitīya prakāra tayā avasthānāt

original: evamudayānantaradhvaṃsitā kṣaṇikatocyate iti pratīyatī vyavasthāpanākāla eva buddhistadviparītarūpatāyāḥ
analyzed: evam udaya anantara dhvaṃsi tā kṣaṇika tā ucyate iti pratīyatī vyavasthāpanā kāle eva buddhiḥ tad viparīta rūpa tāyāḥ
sva viṣayāt apākaraṇāt tatas nyatvena prakāra antare vasthāpanāt rāśi antara abhāvaḥ iti
tat evam eka pramāṇa nibandha nāma sāṅkarya siddhim pratipādya upasaṃharan āha tat evam

original: uktena nyāyena “ekasya” pratiniyatātmana upalambhāt tasyopalabhyamānasya yastato
analyzed: uktena nyāyena ekasya pratiniyata ātmanaḥ upalambhāt tasya upalabhyamānasya yaḥ tatas
vā tad rūpa vikalaḥ tad ātmanaḥ vyavacchedaḥ pṛthakkaraṇam
tasya upalabhyamānasya an upalabhyamāna svabhāvāt rūpa antareṇa pratibhāsanāt

original: tathā tasya svaviṣayasya tadanyātmatāyā bhāvapradhānatvānnirddeśasya “vyavacchedo bhavati” asāṅkaryaṃ sidhyati /
analyzed: tathā tasya sva viṣayasya tad anya ātmatāyāḥ bhāva pradhāna tvāt nirddeśasya vyavacchedaḥ bhavati asāṅkaryam sidhyati

original: tad yadyetadaviśeṣeṇānyasya sarvasya tannābhāvasiddhiḥ syādityatrābhimataṃ tadā siddhasādhanam,
analyzed: tat yadi etat aviśeṣeṇa anyasya sarvasya tat nā abhāva siddhiḥ syāt iti atra abhimatam tadā siddhasādhanam

original: yataḥ sarvamaviśeṣeṇaiva tadekākārayā budhyā tadrūpavikalaṃ svaviṣayādavacchidyate,
analyzed: yatas sarvam aviśeṣeṇa eva tad eka ākārayā budhyā tad rūpa vikalam sva viṣayāt avacchidyate
sarvasya anya rūpasya tatra apratibhāsanāt

original: atha taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ sarvasya tadviparītarūpasya vyavacchedo 'bhimataḥ sa na
analyzed: atha tad deśa kālayoḥ abhāvaḥ sarvasya tad viparīta rūpasya vyavacchedaḥ bhimataḥ sa na

original: yukta iti darśayati- “na taddeśakālayoḥ” yatrāsau pratiniyatātmā sakalatrailokyavilakṣaṇaḥ
analyzed: yuktaḥ iti darśayati na tat deśa kālayoḥ yatra asau pratiniyata ātmā sakala trailokya vilakṣaṇaḥ

original: padārtha upalabhyate tatra sarvasyānyasya bhāvasya tattulyayogyatārūpasyetarasya
analyzed: padārthaḥ upalabhyate tatra sarvasya anyasya bhāvasya tad tulya yogya tā rūpasya itarasya
vā vyavacchedaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ

original: yena hi kāraṇena tattulyayogyatārūpasya tatrāpratibhāsamānasya pratiṣedhastasmin
analyzed: yena hi kāraṇena tad tulya yogya tā rūpasya tatra apratibhāsamānasya pratiṣedhaḥ tasmin

original: sati tadekarūpaniyatāyāḥ pratipatterasaṃbhavāt tadabhāvanāntarīyikā sā bhāvantī tatpratiṣedhaṃ
analyzed: sati tad eka rūpa niyatāyāḥ pratipatteḥ asaṃbhavāt tad abhāva nāntarīyikā sā bhāvantī tad pratiṣedham

original: gamayatīti tatkāraṇamanupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāpte tadatulyayogyatārūpe ca na sambhavatīti
analyzed: gamayati iti tad kāraṇam anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpte tad atulya yogya tā rūpe ca na sambhavati iti
katham tad abhāvaḥ sidhyet
hbṭ
etat eva upasaṃharan āha tasmāt a tad ātmā ca sarvaḥ tad viparīta rūpaḥ tad eka ākārayā buddhyā

original: prasādhitaḥ syāt “taddeśakālaśca” tasya pratibhāsamānasya yau deśakālau tau yasya, sa ca syāt /
analyzed: prasādhitaḥ syāt tad deśa kālaḥ ca tasya pratibhāsamānasya yau deśa kālau tau yasya sa ca syāt
kiṃvat
rasa rūpa ādi vat iti

original: nahi rūpapratibhāsinā jñānena tadrūpavikalasya rasasya svaviṣayāt pṛthakkaraṇe 'pi tadasāṃkaryasādhane 'pi taddeśakālayorabhāvaḥ sidhyati /
analyzed: nahi rūpa pratibhāsinā jñānena tad rūpa vikalasya rasasya sva viṣayāt pṛthakkaraṇe tad asāṃkarya sādhane tad deśa kālayoḥ abhāvaḥ sidhyati
tatas ca katham sarvasya atulya yogya avasthā asya api tatra abhāvaḥ syāt
upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya iti viśeṣaṇam vā na ucyeta
yatas evam tasmāt kvacid kadācid kasyacid abhāva siddhiḥ yathā uktāt eva anupalambhāt upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptasya tad tulya yogyatā rūpa upalambha ātmanaḥ ca iti evaṃrūpāt
na tu sāmānyena yathā āhuḥ pare
pramāṇa pañcakam yatra vastu rūpe na jāyate
vastu sattā avabodha artham tatra abhāva pramāṇa tā iti
na hi anupalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpte pramāṇa pañcaka apravṛttau api tad abhāvaḥ sidhyati
sati api tasmin svabhāva ādi viprakarṣeṇa pramāṇa pañcaka apravṛtti sambhavāt iti
tat evam prāsaṅgikam parisamāpayya yat uktam pareṇa

original: sa evānyabhāvastadviṣayā copalabdhiḥ tadabhāvasya kiṃ na sādhanam';
analyzed: saḥ eva anya bhāvaḥ tad viṣayā ca upalabdhiḥ tad abhāvasya kim na sādhanam

original: iti tatrānyabhāvasya tadabhāvaṃ prati liṅgatve niraste tadviṣayāyā upalabdhernirākurvannāha- “anyābhāvaviṣaye“tyādi /
analyzed: iti tatra anya bhāvasya tad abhāvam prati liṅga tve niraste tad viṣayāyāḥ upalabdheḥ nirākurvan āha anya abhāva viṣaya ityādi
yat punar uktam
anya bhāva viṣaya upalabdhiḥ tad abhāvasya kin na sādhanam
iti sā tad abhāvasya sādhikā iṣṭā eva asmākam
na tu liṅga tvena yathā uktavān asi
kim kāraṇam

original: yataḥ tatrāpyanyabhāvaviṣayāyāmupalabdhāva'bhāvasya pṛthaganyabhāvāt sādhyatve kalpyamāne sambandhābhāvasya tadabhāvena tulyatvāt /
analyzed: yatas tatra api anya bhāva viṣayāyām upalabdhau abhāvasya pṛthak anya bhāvāt sādhya tve kalpyamāne sambandha abhāvasya tad abhāvena tulya tvāt

original: na hi tasyā api anyabhāvarūpāyāḥ tadabhāvena kaścidekārthasamavāyādirūpaḥ sambandho 'stīti /
analyzed: na hi tasyāḥ api anya bhāva rūpāyāḥ tad abhāvena kaścid ekārtha samavāya ādi rūpaḥ sambandhaḥ sti iti
apṛthak siddheḥ iti asya api tulya tām darśayan āha liṅga āvirbhāve tyādi
yā iyam anya bhāva viṣayā upalabdhiḥ lliṅgatayā ucyate tasyāḥ tad vivikta pradeśa ākārāyāḥ

original: “avirbhāvakāla eva” janmakāle pratītikāla eva vā tadabhāvasiddheśca /
analyzed: avirbhāva kāle eva janma kāle pratīti kāle eva vā tad abhāva siddheḥ ca
tathā hi tad pratibhāsa vivikta anya bhāva pratibhāsa buddhi saṃvedanam eva tad abhāva saṃvedanam iti

original: tadeva sādhayati- na hyanyasya tadviviktasya bhāvaṃ pratipadya pratipattā punaruttarakālaṃ
analyzed: tat eva sādhayati na hi anyasya tad viviktasya bhāvam pratipadya pratipattā punar uttara kālam
tad pratipatteḥ anya bhāva pratipatteḥ tad abhāvena anvaya vyatirekau prasādhya pratibandha sādhakena
pramāṇena tad abhāvam pratipadyate
kim tarhi

original: tadanyaṃ tadviviktarūpaṃ pratipadyamāna eva tasya pratiyogino 'bhāvaṃ pratipadyate,
analyzed: tad anyam tad vivikta rūpam pratipadyamānaḥ eva tasya pratiyoginaḥ bhāvam pratipadyate
tasya eva tad abhāva ātmaka tvāt

original: tathā hi- saghaṭapradeśāsaṃkīrṇarūpasya kevalapradeśasya darśanameva ghaṭābhāvadarśanam /
analyzed: tathā hi sa ghaṭa pradeśa asaṃkīrṇa rūpasya kevala pradeśasya darśanam eva ghaṭa abhāva darśanam

katham jñāyate iti ced

idam ghaṭa viviktam pradeśa vastu asti
idam tu ghaṭa vastu na asti

iha api asti eva anvayaḥ iti ced
āha na hi evam śakyam ityādi
kasmāt na śakya darśayitum
tad eka upalabdheḥ tasya ekasya ananya saṃsargiṇaḥ yā upalabdhiḥ viśeṣa rūpā tasyāḥ kvacid api anyatra abhāvāt

original: atha tadviviktopalabdhisāmānyaṃ heturūcyate- yatra yatra ghaṭaviviktabhūtalopalabdhistatra
analyzed: atha tad vivikta upalabdhi sāmānyam hetuḥ ūcyate yatra yatra ghaṭa vivikta bhū tala upalabdhiḥ tatra

original: tatra ghaṭābhāvo yathā pūrvānubhūte ghaṭavivikte pradeśa ityāha- “sāmānyena pradarśane
analyzed: tatra ghaṭa abhāvaḥ yathā pūrva anubhūte ghaṭa vivikte pradeśe iti āha sāmānyena pradarśane

original: kriyamāṇe” dṛṣṭānte 'pi pūrvānubhūtaghaṭavivikte pradeśe ghaṭābhāvasya prasādhakaṃ
analyzed: kriyamāṇe dṛṣṭānte pi pūrva anubhūta ghaṭa vivikte pradeśe ghaṭa abhāvasya prasādhakam
pratyakṣa ādikam pramāṇa antaram anya bhāva viṣaya upalabdheḥ na asti

original: kiṃ tu saiva tadanyabhāvopalabdhiḥ sādhyadharmasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya sādhikā /
analyzed: kim tu sā eva tad anya bhāva upalabdhiḥ sādhya dharmasya tad abhāva lakṣaṇasya sādhikā

original: (Hbṭ 202) sā ca yathā sādhyadharmiṇi tadabhāvasiddhye dṛṣṭāntamapekṣate tathā dṛṣṭānte 'pi /
analyzed: sā ca yathā sādhya dharmiṇi tad abhāva siddhye dṛṣṭāntam apekṣate tathā dṛṣṭānte pi
tathā tatra api tad anyatra api iti anavasthā dṛṣṭāntānām iti
anavasthāyām ca apratipattiḥ sarvatra tad abhāvasya
yatas evam tasmāt na kutaścid liṅgāt tad anya bhāvāt tad upalabdheḥ vā tad abhāva siddhiḥ iti
yadi tad anya bhāvaḥ tad abhāvam na sādhayati
kim punar liṅga tayā sādhayati
iti atas āha saḥ pratyakṣa lakṣaṇena pratyakṣasya eva vivakṣita upalambhāt anya tvena anupalambha tvāt
tad lakṣaṇena anupalambhena siddhaḥ sanna bhāva vyavahāram sādhayet
karma stha kriyā apekṣāyām tad anya bhāvasya anupalabdhi rūpa tvāt
kva punar asau abhāva vyavahāram sādhayet
mūḍha pratipattau sādhyāyām

original: yastvamūḍho viṣayapratipattau viṣayiṇaṃ smaratyeva tasyābhāvavyavahāraḥ pratyakṣanibandhana eveti na tatrānupalabdherliṅgateti sucarccitamevānyatretīhālaṃ  #
analyzed: yaḥ tu amūḍhaḥ viṣaya pratipattau viṣayiṇam smarati eva tasya abhāva vyavahāraḥ pratyakṣa nibandhanaḥ eva iti na tatra anupalabdheḥ liṅga tā iti su carccitam eva anyatra iti iha alam
prasaṅgena iti
anupalabdhim tridhā vibhajya tad vivecanam
tat evam anupalabdheḥ aśeṣa vipratipatti nirākaraṇena svarūpam avasthāpya prabheda nirddeśa artham āha sā iyam yathā uktā tridhā anupalabdhiḥ
katham

original: siddhe tatprasādhakena pramāṇena kāryakāraṇabhāve sati kāraṇasyānupalabdhiḥ /
analyzed: siddhe tad prasādhakena pramāṇena kārya kāraṇa bhāve sati kāraṇasya anupalabdhiḥ
kīdṛśasya
siddha abhāvasya

original: tathā, vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasiddhau satyāṃ tatprasādhanapramāṇabalenaiva siddhābhāvasyaiva vyāpakasya nānyasya vyāpakānupalabdherevāsiddhatāprasaṅgād
analyzed: tathā vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva siddhau satyām tad prasādhana pramāṇa balena eva siddha abhāvasya eva vyāpakasya na anyasya vyāpaka anupalabdheḥ eva asiddha tā prasaṅgāt
yathā uktā svabhāva anupalabdhiḥ ca iti
evam trividhā anupalabdhiḥ

original: kathaṃ punaḥ kāraṇavyāpakayorabhāvavyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatastayoḥ siddhābhāvatocyata ityāha- “tatra kāraṇavyāpakayorapi” na kevalaṃ yasya sākṣādabhāvavyavahāraḥ  #
analyzed: katham punar kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ abhāva vyavahāraḥ sidhyati yatas tayoḥ siddha abhāva tā ucyate iti āha tatra kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ api na kevalam yasya sākṣāt abhāva vyavahāraḥ
sādhyate
svabhāva anupalabdhau svabhāvasya asabdhi avahārasya siddhiḥ anyasya tad viviktasya bhāva siddhiḥ yā sā eva asabdhi avahāra siddhi hetu tvāt evam ucyate
sa kāraṇa vyāpaka abhāvaḥ tathā asiddhaḥ nyabhāva siddhyā pratyakṣa rūpayā siddhaḥ bhāva vyavahāraḥ kārya vyāpyayoḥ pratiṣedhyayoḥ
yadā anayoḥ virūpa viṣaya tayā sa viśeṣāṇām upalabdhiḥ na
sidhyati tadā abhāvam abhāva vyavahāram vā sādhayati
samuccaya arthaḥ vā śabdaḥ

original: atha kiṃ svabhāvānupalabdhāvapyabhāvo liṅgatayā sādhyata ityāha- “svabhāvānupalabdhau tu” ityādi /
analyzed: atha kim svabhāva anupalabdhau api abhāvaḥ liṅga tayā sādhyate iti āha svabhāva anupalabdhau tu ityādi
abhāva vyavahāraḥ eva
na abhāvaḥ pi tasya pratyakṣa siddha tvāt

original: atra parasya vacanāvakāśamāśaṅkayāha- “yadi” tarhi “kāraṇavyāpakau” siddho 'savdyavahāro yayoḥ tau santau /
analyzed: atra parasya vacana avakāśam āśaṅkayā āha yadi tarhi kāraṇa vyāpakau siddhaḥ yayoḥ tau santau
kena
tad anyasya kāraṇa vyāpaka viviktasya bhāvasya siddhiḥ yā pratyakṣa tmikā tad rūpayā anupalabdhyā

original: anyasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vābhāvamabhāvavyavahāraṃ ca sādhayataḥ /
analyzed: anyasya kāryasya vyāpyasya vā abhāvam abhāva vyavahāram ca sādhayataḥ
sā ca anya bhāva upalabdhiḥ tayoḥ kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāptau eva satyām asat dyavahārasya

original: sādhikā nānyathā ityevamiṣyamāṇe sati kathaṃ tayoḥ kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ parokṣe
analyzed: sādhikā nā anyathā iti evam iṣyamāṇe sati katham tayoḥ kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhyoḥ parokṣe
rthe viṣaye prayogaḥ

original: yadā kāryasvabhāvahetvorvyatirekaprayogaḥ kriyate- yatra yatrāgnirnāsti tatra tatra dhūmo 'pi nāsti,
analyzed: yadā kārya svabhāva hetvoḥ vyatireka prayogaḥ kriyate yatra yatra agniḥ na asti tatra tatra na asti

original: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣo nāsti kṣaṇikatā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā nāsti sattvaṃ vā ityaśeṣapadārthaparigraheṇa vyatirekaprayoge sati /
analyzed: tathā yatra yatra vṛkṣaḥ na asti kṣaṇikatā vā tatra tatra śiṃśapā na asti sattvam vā iti aśeṣa padārtha parigraheṇa vyatireka prayoge sati
nahi tadā agni vṛkṣa vyatiriktāḥ sarve rthāḥ pratyakṣa tā akṣā
akṣaṇika tā vā

original: tataśca kathaṃ tadviviktopalabdhilakṣaṇānupalabdhiḥ pratiyogino vopalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatā siddhā? /
analyzed: tatas ca katham tad vivikta upalabdhi lakṣaṇa anupalabdhiḥ pratiyoginaḥ vā upalabdhi lakṣaṇa prāpta tā siddhā

original: tathā ca kathamaśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kāryasvabhāvahetvo 'rvyatirekaḥ sidhyet? /
analyzed: tathā ca katham aśeṣa upasaṃhāreṇa vyāptyā kārya svabhāva hetvoḥ vyatirekaḥ sidhyet
tad asiddhau vā katham anayoḥ gamaka tvam
tasmāt kvacid adarśana mātrāt eva vyatirekaḥ eṣṭavyaḥ
kvacid ca darśana mātrāt anvayaḥ
tathā ca pratibandha ghoṣaṇā anarthikā iti manyate paraḥ

original: siddhāntavādyāha- “naiva” parokṣe 'rthe kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhyoḥ “prayogo” vyatirekopadarśanakāle “pramāṇatayā” kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vānupalabdhiḥ  #
analyzed: siddhāntavādī āha na eva parokṣe rthe kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhyoḥ prayogaḥ vyatireka upadarśana kāle pramāṇa tayā kāraṇasya vyāpakasya vā anupalabdhiḥ
pramāṇa bhūtā na eva prayujyate
kasmāt

original: “liṅgasya” kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhilakṣaṇasya tadabhāvalakṣaṇasya vā “aniścayāt” tadanupalabdhyoḥ sandeharūpatvāt tadabhāvasya ca sandigdhatvāt
analyzed: liṅgasya kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhi lakṣaṇasya tad abhāva lakṣaṇasya vā aniścayāt tad anupalabdhyoḥ sandeha rūpa tvāt tad abhāvasya ca sandigdha tvāt
katham tarhi tadā anayoḥ prayogaḥ iṣyate
iti āha kevalam ityādi
kāraṇa vyāpakayoḥ hi kārya kāraṇa bhāva prasādhakena

original: pūrvoktena pramāṇena vyāpyavyāpakabhāvasādhakena ca tadutpattilakṣaṇe tādātmyalakṣaṇe
analyzed: pūrva uktena pramāṇena vyāpya vyāpaka bhāva sādhakena ca tad utpatti lakṣaṇe tādātmya lakṣaṇe

original: ca sambandhe sādhite siddhasambandhayoryadyabhāvo yatra yatrā bhāvaḥ syāt parasyāpi
analyzed: ca sambandhe sādhite siddha sambandhayoḥ yadi abhāvaḥ yatra yatrā bhāvaḥ syāt parasya api
kāryasya vyāpyasya vā avaśyam niyamena abhāvaḥ nyathā hetuka tva prasaṅgāt
niḥsvabhāva tā prasaṅgāt ca

original: taddvāreṇa pratibandhaprasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ kathaṃ nāma syādityetasyārthasya darśanārthamete kāraṇavyāpakānupalabdhī prayujyete iti /
analyzed: tad dvāreṇa pratibandha prasādhake pramāṇe smṛtiḥ katham nāma syāt iti etasya arthasya darśana artham ete kāraṇa vyāpaka anupalabdhī prayujyete iti

original: darśanādarśanabalena tu sādhane yatraivaikadarśane paro dṛṣṭo 'darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatraiva tasya bhāvo 'bhāvo vā bhavatu sarvatra tu kasmād  #
analyzed: darśana adarśana balena tu sādhane yatra eva eka darśane paraḥ dṛṣṭaḥ darśane vā na dṛṣṭaḥ tatra eva tasya bhāvaḥ bhāvaḥ vā bhavatu sarvatra tu kasmāt
bhavati

original: na hyapratibaddhātmanāṃ gavāśvādīnāṃ kvacit tathābhāvadarśane 'pi sarvatra tathābhāvo bhavati,
analyzed: na hi apratibaddha ātmanām gavāśva ādīnām kvacid tathābhāva darśane sarvatra tathābhāvaḥ bhavati

original: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacidekabhāvābhāvayoraparasya bhāvābhāvādarśanaṃ yadṛcchāsaṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe / tathā cāha-
analyzed: puruṣasya tu sarvadā kvacid eka bhāva abhāvayoḥ aparasya bhāva abhāva adarśanam yadṛcchā saṃvādaḥ sambhāvyeta asati pratibandhe tathā ca āha
deśa ādi bhedāt ṛśyante bhinnāḥ dravyeṣu śaktayaḥ
tatra eka dṛṣṭayā na anyatra yuktaḥ tad bhāva niścayaḥ iti
tasmāt avaśyam pratibandhaḥ sādhya sādhanayoḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ
saḥ eva anvaya vyatireka prayogābhyām sucanīyaḥ

original: na cāsau vyāptyānvayavyatirekopadarśanamantareṇa khyāpayituṃ śakyata iti '
analyzed: na ca asau vyāptyā anvaya vyatireka upadarśanam antareṇa khyāpayitum śakyate iti
yatra yatra
iti sakala padārtha parigraheṇa khyāpyate

original: pratibandhe hi pramāṇasiddhe satyavaśyameva yatra yatra kāryaṃ tatra tatra kāraṇam,
analyzed: pratibandhe hi pramāṇa siddhe sati avaśyam eva yatra yatra kāryam tatra tatra kāraṇam

original: yatra yatra tadabhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasyāpyabhāvo 'nyathā kāraṇamantareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasyāhetutaiva syāt /
analyzed: yatra yatra tad abhāvaḥ tatra tatra ca kāryasya api abhāvaḥ nyathā kāraṇam antareṇa kāryasya bhāve tasya ahetutā eva syāt
tatas ca nityam sattva ādi prasaṅgaḥ

original: tathā yatra yatra yatsvabhāvastatra tatra tadbhāvaḥ anyathā tasya nairātmyameva syāditi
analyzed: tathā yatra yatra yad svabhāvaḥ tatra tatra tad bhāvaḥ anyathā tasya nairātmyam eva syāt iti

original: vyāptyaivānvayavyatirekopadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayituṃ śakyate nānyatheti prāgeva
analyzed: vyāptyā eva anvaya vyatireka upadarśane pratibandhaḥ khyāpayitum śakyate na anyathā iti prāk eva
vistarataḥ vipañcitam
hetoḥ trairūpya traividhyayoḥ hetvābhāsa tvasya ca upasaṃhāraḥ

original: evaṃ kāryasvabhāvānupalabdhilakṣaṇe eva pakṣadharme tatsādhakapramāṇasadbhāvādanvayavyatirekasadbhāvo nānyatreti pratipādyopasaṃharannāha-
analyzed: evam kārya svabhāva anupalabdhi lakṣaṇe eva pakṣa dharme tad sādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāvāt anvaya vyatireka sadbhāvaḥ na anyatra iti pratipādya upasaṃharan āha
iti eṣaḥ eva svabhāva kārya anupalabdhi lakṣaṇaḥ pakṣa dharmaḥ nvaya vyatirekavān pratibandha sadbhāvāt
yatas ca anvaya vyatirekavān pratibandha prasādhaka pramāṇa sadbhāvāt uktena nyāyena iti tasmāt tad aṃśena vyāptaḥ nvaya vyatireka niścayena eva tad aṃśa vyāpteḥ niścayāt
yathā uktam prāk

original: tataśca tadaṃśavyāptivacanāt trilakṣaṇa eva “trirūpa eva” trividha eva heturgamako
analyzed: tatas ca tad aṃśa vyāpti vacanāt tri lakṣaṇaḥ eva trirūpaḥ eva trividhaḥ eva hetuḥ gamakaḥ

original: nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo vā yathoktatrairūpyasadbhāve rūpāntarasya vaiyarthyāt yathoktatrairūpyābhāve
analyzed: na anya lakṣaṇaḥ nyaḥ vā yathā ukta trairūpya sadbhāve rūpa antarasya vaiyarthyāt yathā ukta trairūpya abhāve
ca rūpa antara kalpanāyām api avyabhicāra abhāvena āgamaka tvāt

original: kasmāt trilakṣaṇa eva trividha eva heturgamako nānyalakṣaṇo 'nyo veti darśayati “svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārād” iti trilakṣaṇasyaiva svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārāt
analyzed: kasmāt tri lakṣaṇaḥ eva trividhaḥ eva hetuḥ gamakaḥ na anya lakṣaṇaḥ nyaḥ vā iti darśayati sva sādhya dharma avyabhicārāt iti tri lakṣaṇasya eva sva sādhya dharma avyabhicārāt

original: svasādhyadharmāvyabhicāra eva ca gamakatvamiti rūpāntarakalpanā vyarthā /
analyzed: sva sādhya dharma avyabhicāre eva ca gamaka tvam iti rūpa antara kalpanā vyarthā
pratibandha nibandhana anvaya vyatireka apagame ca rūpa antara kalpanāyām api sva sādhya dharma avyabhicāra abhāvāt
tat anena tridhā eva sa

original: ityasya trilakṣaṇa eva “sa heturaḥvinābhāvasya” svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya “niyamād” avaśyantayā sadbhāvāt pratibandhanimittatadaṃśavyāptyanabhyupage
analyzed: iti asya tri lakṣaṇaḥ eva sa hetuḥ aḥ vinābhāvasya sva sādhya dharma avyabhicārasya niyamāt sadbhāvāt pratibandha nimitta tad aṃśa vyāpti anabhyupage
ca rūpa antara kalpanāyām api hetvābhāsāḥ pare yathā ukta tri lakṣaṇāt apare rūpa antara yogitayā

original: vikalpyamānā hetvābhāsā avinābhāvasya svasādhyadharmāvyabhicārasya teṣvabhāvādityaparo 'rtho darśita iti /
analyzed: vikalpyamānāḥ hetvābhāsāḥ avinābhāvasya sva sādhya dharma avyabhicārasya teṣu abhāvāt iti aparaḥ rthaḥ darśitaḥ iti
hetu lakṣaṇe dhikarūpa vādinām nirāsaḥ
yat uktam tri lakṣaṇaḥ eva hetuḥ na anya lakṣaṇaḥ

original: iti tatra pareṣāṃ vipratipattiṃ darśayannāha- “ṣaḍlakṣaṇo heturityapare” naiyāyika- mimāṃsakādayo manyante /
analyzed: iti tatra pareṣām vipratipattim darśayan āha ṣaṣ lakṣaṇaḥ hetuḥ iti apare naiyāyika mimāṃsaka ādayaḥ manyante
kāni punar ṣaḍ rūpāṇi hetoḥ taiḥ iṣyante
iti āha trīṇi ca etāni pakṣa dharma anvaya vyatireka ākhyāni
tathā abādhita viṣaya tvam caturtham rūpam

original: abādhitaḥ pramāṇenānirākṛto viṣayaḥ sādhyadharmalakṣaṇo yasya sa tathoktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvamaparaṃ rūpam /
analyzed: abādhitaḥ pramāṇena anirākṛtaḥ viṣayaḥ sādhya dharma lakṣaṇaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam aparam rūpam
tathā vivakṣita eka saṃkhya tvam rūpa antaram
ekā saṃkhyā yasya hetu dravyasya hbṭ

original: tadekasaṃkhyaṃ vivakṣitamekasaṃkhyaṃ hetudravyamāśrayatvena yasya hetusāmānyasya tadvivakṣitaikasaṃkhyaṃ tadbhāvo 'paraṃ rūpam /
analyzed: tad eka saṃkhyam vivakṣitam eka saṃkhyam hetu dravyam āśraya tvena yasya hetu sāmānyasya tat vivakṣita eka saṃkhyam tad bhāvaḥ param rūpam

original: yadyekasaṃkhyāvyāvacchinnāyāṃ pratiheturahitāyāṃ hetuvyaktau hetutvaṃ bhavati tadā gamakatvaṃ na tu pratihetusahitāyāmapi dvisaṃkhyāyuktāyāmiti
analyzed: yadi eka saṃkhyā vyāvacchinnāyām prati hetu rahitāyām hetu vyaktau hetu tvam bhavati tadā gamaka tvam na tu prati hetu sahitāyām api dvi saṃkhyā yuktāyām iti

original: yadi viruddhāvyabhicāryaparaṃ hetvantaraṃ nopadarśyata iti yāvat /
analyzed: yadi viruddha avyabhicāri aparam hetvantaram na upadarśyate iti yāvat
tathā jñāta tvam ca jñāna viṣaya tvam ca

original: nahyajñāto hetuḥ svasattāmātreṇa gamako yuktaḥ iti /
analyzed: na hi ajñātaḥ hetuḥ sva sattā mātreṇa gamakaḥ yuktaḥ iti

original: tatraiteṣu rūpāntareṣu yadetabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ nāma tat tāvat pratibandhanibandhanānvayavyatirekātmakāvinābhāvasambhave sati tataḥ pṛthaganyallakṣaṇaṃ  #
analyzed: tatra eteṣu rūpa antareṣu yat etad bādhita viṣaya tvam nāma tat tāvat pratibandha nibandhana anvaya vyatireka ātmaka avinābhāva sambhave sati tatas pṛthak anyat lakṣaṇam
na bhavati
tad ātmakam tu tad vacanena eva uktam iti na vaktavyam iti
kasmāt pṛthak lakṣaṇam na bhavati
bādhāyāḥ avinābhāvasya ca virodhāt iti

original: tathā hi- satyapyavinābhāve yathokte bādhāsambhavaṃ manyamānairabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaramucyate /
analyzed: tathā hi sati api avinābhāve yathā ukte bādhā sambhavam manyamānaiḥ abādhita viṣaya tvam rūpa antaram ucyate
sā ca iyam tad sambhāvanā na sambhavati
bādhāyāḥ avinābhāvena virodhāt saha anavasthāna lakṣaṇāt
tam eva virodham sādhayan āha avinābhāvaḥ hi ityādi

original: satyeva hi sādhyadharme bhāvo hetoravinābhāva ucyate /
analyzed: sati eva hi sādhya dharme bhāvaḥ hetoḥ avinābhāvaḥ ucyate
pramāṇa bādhā tu tasmin asati

original: yadi hi satyeva tasmiṃstadabhāvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ pravarteta tadāsya bhrāntatvādapramāṇataiva syāt iti kuto bādhā? /
analyzed: yadi hi sati eva tasmin tad abhāva viṣayam pramāṇam pravarteta tadā asya bhrānta tvāt apramāṇa tā eva syāt iti kutas bādhā
tatas sa hetuḥ tad lakṣaṇaḥ sādhya avinābhāvī dharmiṇi syāt

original: atra ca sādhyadharmaḥ kathaṃ na bhavet”?
analyzed: atra ca sādhya dharmaḥ katham na bhavet
yatas bādhā avakāśaḥ syāt
tasmāt avinābhāvasya pramāṇa bādhāyāḥ ca saha anavasthānam avinābhāvena upasthāpitasya dharmiṇi
sādhya dharma bhāvasya pramāṇa bādhā upasthāpitasya ca tad abhāvasya paraspara parihāra sthiti lakṣaṇa tayā
virodhena ekatra dharmiṇī asambhavāt iti

original: tameva virodhaṃ spaṣṭīkartuṃ paropahāsavyājenāha- “pratyakṣānumāne hi” ityādi /
analyzed: tam eva virodham spaṣṭīkartum para upahāsa vyājena āha pratyakṣa anumāne hi ityādi
sādhya dharmam hi bādhamāne pratyakṣa anumāne
tam grīvāyām gṛhītvā dharmiṇaḥ sva āśrayāt niṣkāsayataḥ
tasmin ca sādhya dharme sati eva tad avinābhāvi tvāt hetuḥ bhavam stam sādhya dharmam

original: niṣkāsyamānaṃ gale gṛhītvā haṭhāt “tatraiva” dharmiṇyavasthāpayatīti “paraṃ” prakṛṣṭaṃ bata “bhāvānāṃ” sādhyadharmalakṣaṇānāmasvāsthyaṃ vartate
analyzed: niṣkāsyamānam gale gṛhītvā haṭhāt tatra eva dharmiṇī avasthāpayati iti param prakṛṣṭam bata bhāvānām sādhya dharma lakṣaṇānām asvāsthyam vartate

original: tathā hi- yantradvayaniyantritānāṃ nirucchāvasitayā maraṇameva prāptamiti /
analyzed: tathā hi yantra dvaya niyantritānām nirucchāvasi tayā maraṇam eva prāptam iti

original: paro bādhāvinābhāvayorviṣayabhedādavirodhaṃ darśayannāha- “anyatra” sādhyadharmiṇaṃ parihṛtya dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi sādhyadharmeṇāvinābhāvī heturna  #
analyzed: paraḥ bādhā avinābhāvayoḥ viṣaya bhedāt avirodham darśayan āha anyatra sādhya dharmiṇam parihṛtya dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi sādhya dharmeṇa avinābhāvī hetuḥ na
punar sādhya dharmiṇī eva

original: tataḥ kuto bādhāvinābhāvayorvirodho 'nyatra bādhayā sādhyadharmābhāvasādhanādanyatra ca hetunā tadbhāvasādhanāt /
analyzed: tatas kutas bādhā vinābhāvayoḥ virodhaḥ nyatra bādhayā sādhya dharma abhāva sādhanāt anyatra ca hetunā tad bhāva sādhanāt

original: tathā caivaṃvidhe satyapi avinābhāve bādhāsambhavād abādhitaviṣayatvasya rūpāntarasya sambhava iti /
analyzed: tathā ca evaṃvidhe sati api avinābhāve bādhā asambhavāt abādhita viṣaya tvasya rūpa antarasya sambhavaḥ iti
evaṃvidha avinābhāva upagame sati api abādhita viṣaya tva ādike rūpa antare hetvābhāsāḥ tatas
pare rūpa antara sambhavinaḥ iti āpāditām hetvābhāsa tām vivarītum para upahāsa pūrvakam āha
tat kim ayam sādhya dharmī tapasvī varākaḥ śaḍḍhaṇḍha

original: mudvāhya tasmiṃn” sādhyadharmasādhanaśaktivikalaṃ hetuṃ pariṇāyya sādhyadharmalakṣaṇaṃ “putraṃ mṛgayate?” /
analyzed: tasmin sādhya dharma sādhana śakti vikalam hetum pariṇāyya sādhya dharma lakṣaṇam putram mṛgayate
etat eva vyanakti yasya hetoḥ ddharmiṇi asati api sādhya dharme bhāvaḥ iṣyate

original: na hy ambhastvasya samudre lavaṇatvenāvinābhāve 'pi tavdyatirikte 'mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhyatveneṣṭe 'mbhastvabhāve 'pi lavaṇatvasiddhiriti
analyzed: na hi ambhaḥ tvasya samudre lavaṇa tvena avinābhāve pi tad vyatirikte mbhasi lavaṇatayā sādhya tvena iṣṭe mbhaḥ tva bhāve pi lavaṇa tva siddhiḥ iti

original: yata eva heturanyathāpi sādhyadharmamantareṇāpi dharmiṇi bhavedambhastvādiṣu tathādarśanāt,

original: tato 'nyatrāvinābhāvamātreṇa sādhyasiddheranabhyupagamāt na yathokto doṣa iti /

original: siddhāntavādyāha- “tat kim” idānīṃ yadā hetordharmiṇyavinābhāvitānabhyupagamāt sādhyasiddherabhāvāt tatsiddhaye rūpāntaramabādhitaviṣayatvamucyate  #

original: tatra yadi pūrvo vikalpastadā sādhyābhāvo hi bādhakapramāṇasya vṛttau niyataḥ,

original: tasmād “abādhāyāṃ” bādhakapramāṇavṛttyabhāve tanniyatasya sādhyābhāvasyāpyabhāvāt “sādhyasiddhiḥ” bhavatyeveti vyartha eva heturiti nopanyasanīya  #

original: yadā tu sādhyasya bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ dharmiṇi vartate tadā hetoḥ sādhyasādhane sāmarthyaṃ bhaviṣyatītyata āha- “bādhāyāmapi” iti /

original: yadi bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ vartate tadā tena sādhyābhāvasya dharmiṇi sādhanāt punarbrahmaṇāpi

original: tadbhāvasya kartumaśakyatvāt kimaṅga punaḥ śaṭhena hetuneti kutaḥ sādhanasya hetoḥ sāmarthyam? /

original: ata eva hi bhavadbhirabādhitaviṣayatvaṃ rūpāntaramucyata iti /

original: atha bādhakapramāṇavṛttau sādhyābhāvo na niyataḥ tadabhāve 'pi bhāvāditi dvitīyaḥ

original: na ca- bādhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt “sādhyābhāvasya ca sambhavaḥ“- iti “na” sādhyasādhane

original: siddhāntavādyāha- kiṃ nu vai heturbbādhāyā yā upalabdhistasyāḥ vibheti na punarbbādhāyā yena bādhāṃ sambhavantīmapyanādṛtya tadanupalabdhau  #
analyzed: siddhāntavādī āha kim nu vai hetuḥ bbādhāyāḥ yā upalabdhiḥ tasyāḥ vibheti na punar bbādhāyāḥ yena bādhām sambhavantīm api an ādṛtya tad anupalabdhau

etat eva upasaṃharan āha tasmāt sva sādhyaḥ ityādi

original: yata evaṃ vyāptyā hetoḥ sarvatra sādhyenāvinābhāvābhyupagame bahirvyāptāviṣyamāṇāyāṃ
analyzed: yatas evam vyāptyā hetoḥ sarvatra sādhyena avinābhāva abhyupagame bahis vyāptau iṣyamāṇāyām
vaiyarthyam hetu prayogasya āpadyate tasmāt sva sādhya bhāva abhāvābhyām anyathā api sva sādhya bhāve

original: 'pyabhavanna'bhāve 'pi ca bhavan heturdharmiṇi kiñcit sādhyaṃ “na bhāvayati” na sādhayati
analyzed: ca bhavan hetuḥ dharmiṇi kiñcid sādhyam na bhāvayati na sādhayati

original: “na vibhāvayati” tadviparītaṃ na niṣedhayati “iti” tasya vidhipratiṣedhāvakurvata
analyzed: na vibhāvayati tad viparītam na niṣedhayati iti tasya vidhi pratiṣedhau akurvata
upakṣepaḥ prayogaḥ na samarthaḥ iti avaśyam hetu prayogam icchatā sva sādhya avinābhāvaḥ
sarvatra hetoḥ abhyupagantavyaḥ
sa ca pratibandha nibandhanaḥ
eṣa ca darśana adarśana mātra yattaḥ yathā uktam prāk
tasmin ca abhyupagate bādhā avinābhāvayoḥ virodhaḥ siddhaḥ iti upasaṃharan āha tat naḥ ityādi

original: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇenābādhā rūpāntaraṃ na bhavati /
analyzed: yatas evam tena kāraṇena ābādhā rūpa antaram na bhavati
yadi nāma bādhā avinābhāvayoḥ saha avasthāna abhāvāt avinābhāve hbṭ

original: satyabādhā gamyate rūpāntaraṃ tu kimiti na bhavati?
analyzed: satyabādhā gamyate rūpa antaram tu kim iti na bhavati
iti atas āha tat nāma ityādi
tat hi tasmāt viśeṣaṇa antaram bhavet vastu sthityā

original: lakṣaṇakāraiśca rūpāntaratvenopādānamarhati yasya viśeṣaṇasya bhāve 'pi yasyāparasyābhāvaḥ syāt /
analyzed: lakṣaṇa kāraiḥ ca rūpa antara tvena upādānam arhati yasya viśeṣaṇasya bhāve pi yasya aparasya abhāvaḥ syāt

original: yataḥ sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo na sambhava eva kevale /
analyzed: yatas sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ na sambhave eva kevale
udāharaṇam āha tat yathā ityādi

original: satyapi hi dharmisambandhe śrāvaṇatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāvo nāsti /
analyzed: sati api hi dharmi sambandhe śrāvaṇa tva ādeḥ sapakṣe bhāvaḥ na asti

original: satyapi ca cākṣuṣatvādeḥ sapakṣe bhāve sādhyadharmiṇi śabde sambandho nāsti /
analyzed: sati api ca cākṣuṣa tva ādeḥ sapakṣe bhāve sādhya dharmiṇi śabde sambandhaḥ na asti
tatas nayoḥ sambhava vyabhicārayoḥ bhāvāt viśeṣaṇa viśeṣya bhāvaḥ lakṣaṇa antara tvena ca upādānam

original: ihāpyevaṃ bhaviṣyatīti ced āha- “na caitad” anantaroditamabādhāyā avinābhāve sati sambhavati /
analyzed: iha api evam bhaviṣyati iti ced āha na ca etat anantara uditam abādhāyāḥ avinābhāve sati sambhavati

original: satyavinābhāve niyamenābādhāyāḥ sambhavāvdyabhicārābhāvāt kuto viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo kṣaṇāntaratvena copādānamarhati?
analyzed: sati avinābhāve niyamena ābādhāyāḥ kutas kṣaṇa antara tvena ca upādānam arhati

original: iti na hetoḥ sādhyāvinābhāvino viruddhasya ca sādhyaviparyayāvinābhāvino viṣaye bādhā sambhavati /
analyzed: iti na hetoḥ sādhya avinābhāvinaḥ viruddhasya ca sādhya viparyaya avinābhāvinaḥ viṣaye bādhā sambhavati

original: uktena prakāreṇa viparyaye samyaggheturevāviṣaye tu prayogāddhetvābhāsa ucyate /
analyzed: uktena prakāreṇa viparyaye samyak hetuḥ eva aviṣaye tu prayogāt hetvābhāsaḥ ucyate

original: yata evam “iti” tasmānna tadabhāvo bādhāvirahaḥ pṛthagavinābhāvādanvayavyatirekātmano 'nayorhetuviruddhayorlakṣaṇāntaratvena vācyaḥ,
analyzed: yatas evam iti tasmāt na tad abhāvaḥ bādhā virahaḥ pṛthak avinābhāvāt anvaya vyatireka ātmanaḥ nayoḥ hetu viruddhayoḥ lakṣaṇa antara tvena vācyaḥ
vyabhicāra abhāvena rūpa antara tva ayogāt

original: yataścāvinābhāve sati bādhā na sambhavati virodhāt,
analyzed: yatas ca avinābhāve sati bādhā na sambhavati virodhāt

original: tasmāddhetoryathoktalakṣaṇasya prayoge sati gamyārthāyā api pratijñāyā doṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣaviruddhādīnāṃ sambhavo nāsti,
analyzed: tasmāt hetoḥ yathā ukta lakṣaṇasya prayoge sati gamya arthāyāḥ api pratijñāyāḥ doṣāṇām pratyakṣa viruddha ādīnām sambhavaḥ na asti
hetu lakṣaṇena eva teṣām nirasta tvāt
tat katham bādhā virahaḥ hetoḥ rūpa antaram ucyate
asambhavinām ca teṣām upavarṇanam niṣphalam iti ākūtam
kevalāyāḥ prayoge sti sambhavaḥ iti ced
āha na api ityādi

original: hetuprayoge hyasati kevalā pratijñaiva na prayujyate,
analyzed: hetu prayoge hi asati kevalā pratijñā eva na prayujyate
hetu viṣaya tvena tad abhyupagamāt

original: tataśca śāstrakārairna pratijñādoṣāḥ pratyakṣaviruddhādayo vācyā iti /
analyzed: tatas ca śāstra kāraiḥ na pratijñā doṣāḥ pratyakṣa viruddha ādayaḥ vācyāḥ iti
diś nāga pādaiḥ tu sādhya asādhya viparyayeṇa hbṭ

original: vipratipattidarśanādaprayogārhasyāpi pakṣasya lakṣaṇavidhāne nyāyaprāptamevāpakṣatva na ni(tvaṃ ni)
analyzed: vipratipatti darśanāt aprayoga arhasya api pakṣasya lakṣaṇa vidhāne nyāya prāptam eva apakṣa tva na ni tvam ni
rākṛta padena pramāṇa viruddhasya ākhyānam
na tu atiprasaktam pakṣa lakṣaṇam vyavacchinnam
sandigdhasya eva sādhya tvāt
pramāṇa bādhite sādhaka pramāṇa āvṛttiḥ iti
tat evam abādhita viṣaya tvam nirākṛtya rūpa antaram nirākurvan āha etena avinābhāve
sati bādhāyāḥ asambhava darśanena eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā api viruddha avyabhicāri doṣa vipakṣeṇa ucyamānā
pratyuktā pratyākhyātā

original: paraḥ pṛcchati- “katham” iti kena prakāreṇa- yathā bādhāvinābhāvayoḥ sahānavasthānaṃ tathā pratihetvavinābhāvayorapi?
analyzed: paraḥ pṛcchati katham iti kena prakāreṇa yathā bādhā avinābhāvayoḥ saha anavasthānam tathā prati hetu avinābhāvayoḥ api
yena eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā tadvat eva pratyākhyāyeta iti
siddhāntavādī sāmyam darśayan āha ekaḥ ityādi
ekaḥ hi hetuḥ lakṣaṇa yuktaḥ
sva sādhya avyabhicārī katham bhavati
yadi sva sādhya bhāvaḥ eva bhavet
anyathā tad lakṣaṇam avinābhāvaḥ nāma hīyeta

original: yatraiva dharmiṇi sa tallakṣaṇa eko bhavati tatraiva dharmiṇi tasmādanyo 'pi pratiheturviruddhastena hetulakṣaṇayuktaḥ kathaṃ bhavati? /
analyzed: yatra eva dharmiṇi sa tad lakṣaṇaḥ ekaḥ bhavati tatra eva dharmiṇi tasmāt anyaḥ pi pratihetuḥ viruddhaḥ tena hetu lakṣaṇa yuktaḥ katham bhavati

original: ekasya hetoryat sādhyaṃ tabdādhakasya tadviruddhasyāparasya dharmasya bhāva eva nābhāve
analyzed: ekasya hetoḥ yat sādhyam tad dādhakasya tad viruddhasya aparasya dharmasya bhāve eva na abhāve

original: bhāvādavinābhāvāditi bādhayā samānaṃ bādhāsambhavena samānaḥ pratiheturiti tannirāsenaiva nirasta iti /
analyzed: bhāvāt avinābhāvāt iti bādhayā samānam bādhā sambhavena samānaḥ pratihetuḥ iti tad nirāsena eva nirastaḥ iti
atra eva dūṣaṇa antaram abhidhātum vikalpayan āha api ca ityādi

original: “vastutaḥ” paramārthato yasya pratiheturna sambhavati kimasau samyagjñānasya viparyasya
analyzed: vastutas paramārthataḥ yasya pratihetuḥ na sambhavati kim asau samyak jñānasya viparyasya

original: vopanyastasādhyaviparītajñānasya vā heturiṣṭo yato vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvaṃ tallakṣaṇamucyate,
analyzed: vā upanyasta sādhya viparīta jñānasya vā hetuḥ iṣṭaḥ yatas vivakṣita eka saṃkhya tvam tat lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: āhosvid yasya pratihetustatsādhyaviparītasādhako na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ sannapīti /
analyzed: āhosvit yasya pratihetuḥ tad sādhya viparīta sādhakaḥ na pradarśitaḥ paramārthataḥ san api iti
paraḥ doṣam apaśyan āha kiñca atas ityādi

original: yadi nāma purvo vikalpa uttaro vā tataḥ ko doṣaḥ? iti /
analyzed: yadi nāma purvaḥ vikalpaḥ uttaraḥ vā tatas kaḥ doṣaḥ iti
hbṭ
siddhāntavādī āha yadi asambhavan pratihetuḥ yasya sa samyak jñāna ādi hetuḥ iṣyate
tad ālakṣaṇam etat vivakṣita eka saṃkhya tvam
kasmāt

original: aśakyo niścayo yasya vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvasya sa tathoktaḥ /
analyzed: aśakyaḥ niścayaḥ yasya sambhavat pratihetu tvasya sa tathā uktaḥ
paramatā apekṣayā ca etat ucyate
paraḥ hi darśana adarśanābhyām asati api pratibandhe vinābhāvam icchati
tatas tasya pratihetoḥ evaṃvidhasya sambhavaḥ sti

original: sa cānupalabhyamāno 'pi kadācit syāditi vastutastadabhāvo niścīyate /
analyzed: sa ca anupalabhyamānaḥ pi kadācid syāt iti vastutas tad abhāvaḥ niścīyate
pratibandha nibandhana avinābhāva vādinām tu asmākam prati hetu asambhavaḥ su niścitaḥ eva

original: nahi tādātmyatadutpattilakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tannimittāvinābhāvitayā
analyzed: nahi tādātmya tad utpatti lakṣaṇe pratibandhe pramāṇataḥ siddhe tad nimitta avinābhāvi tayā

original: ekena hetunā svasādhye sādhite punastatraiva dharmiṇi tallakṣaṇasya tadviruddhārthasādhakasya
analyzed: ekena hetunā sva sādhye sādhite punar tatra eva dharmiṇi tad lakṣaṇasya tad viruddha artha sādhakasya
pratihetoḥ sambhavaḥ śaṅkayate
bhāvānām viruddha svabhāva dvaya ayogāt
viruddha dharma adhyāsasya bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: viruddhadharmasādhakasambhave ca tasyaiva svasādhyāvinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇato bhāvasiddhayayogāditi /
analyzed: viruddha dharma sādhaka sambhave ca tasya eva sva sādhya avinābhāvinaḥ prathamasya tatra pramāṇataḥ bhāva siddhayā ayogāt iti

original: syānmatam- yadi nāma prastutaḥ pratihetvasambhavo 'smābhirniścetumaśakyastathāpyasambhavatpratihetutvaṃ vivakṣitaikasaṃkhyatvapratipāditaṃ  #
analyzed: syāt matam yadi nāma prastutaḥ smābhiḥ niścetum aśakyaḥ tathā api asambhavat pratihetu tvam vivakṣita eka saṃkhya tva pratipāditam
hetu lakṣaṇam kasmāt na bhavati
iti āha na hi aniścita ātmanaḥ ityādi

original: pratipādako yo dharmo hetostasyāniścitasvabhāvasya yasmāt tallakṣaṇatvaṃ pratipādakadharmatā na bhavati /
analyzed: pratipādakaḥ yaḥ dharmaḥ hetoḥ tasya aniścita svabhāvasya yasmāt tad lakṣaṇa tvam pratipādaka dharma tā na bhavati
yathā saṃdigdhasya pakṣa dharma tvasya iti pūrvakasya sādhanam

original: nāpi sandhigdhaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa heturbhavatīti na kaściddheturbhavediti hetvabhāvo vā ityasya samarthanam /
analyzed: na api sandhigdham lakṣaṇam yasya sa hetuḥ bhavati iti na kaścid hetuḥ bhavet iti hetu abhāvaḥ vā iti asya samarthanam
tatas ca hetvābhāsāḥ pare iti atra api yojitam iti

original: syānmatam- yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasyaiva pratihetubhāvāt ahetutvaṃ bhavatu,
analyzed: syāt matam yasya pratiyogī dṛśyate tasya eva pratihetu bhāvāt ahetu tvam bhavatu

original: yasya tu pratiyogī heturna dṛśyate sa vastuta evāsambhavatpratihetuḥ /
analyzed: yasya tu pratiyogī hetuḥ na dṛśyate sa vastutas evā asambhavat pratihetuḥ

original: na hi tatra vastutaḥ pratihetusambhavaḥ śaṅkayate,
analyzed: na hi tatra vastutas prati hetu sambhavaḥ śaṅkayate
bādhaka pratyayam antareṇa bādhā śaṅkāyāḥ ayogāt tat uktam

original: tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ pratihetorbbādhakasya sambhavaḥ sa yeṣāmapi tattulyalakṣaṇānāṃ
analyzed: tasmin dṛṣṭaḥ pratiyoginaḥ pratihetoḥ bādhakasya sambhavaḥ sa yeṣām api tad tulya lakṣaṇānām

original: atha viśeṣaḥ pratibandhalakṣaṇo 'vinābhāvaniścāyako dṛṣṭapratihetoradṛṣṭapratiyogina iṣyate yataḥ pratiyogisambhavāśaṅkāstamupaiti /

original: tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣo hetorlakṣaṇam /
analyzed: tadā sati vā viśeṣe sa viśeṣaḥ hetoḥ lakṣaṇam
kim kāraṇam

original: yatastato viśeṣāddheturekāntena niścayena nirastapratipakṣastathāvidhe dharmiṇi pratihetvasambhavāt svasādhyaṃ niścāyayatīti /
analyzed: yatas tatas viśeṣāt hetuḥ ekāntena niścayena nirasta pratipakṣaḥ tathāvidhe dharmiṇi prati hetu asambhavāt sva sādhyam niścāyayati iti

original: yastathāvidho na bhavati tadviśeṣavirahāt dṛṣṭapratihetuḥ so 'tallakṣaṇo na hetuḥ syāt /
analyzed: yaḥ tathāvidhaḥ na bhavati tad viśeṣa virahāt dṛṣṭa pratihetuḥ saḥ tad lakṣaṇaḥ na hetuḥ syāt
tathā ca yadi nāma ahetau pratihetuḥ dṛṣṭaḥ
hetoḥ kim āyātam
yena tad nivṛttaye tatra eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā kriyate

original: yathoktāvinābhāvavacanenaiva tannivṛtterityāha- “tathā ca hetau” tadviśeṣayogini “pratihetvasambhave” sati “vyarthā” niṣprayojanā “ekasaṃkhyāvivakṣeti”
analyzed: yathā ukta avinābhāva vacanena eva tad nivṛtteḥ iti āha tathā ca hetau tad viśeṣa yogini prati hetu asambhave sati vyarthā niṣprayojanā eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā iti

original: yathoktaviśeṣāṅgīkarane tallakṣaṇasya pratihetorasambhavāt kasyaikasaṃkhyāvivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate?
analyzed: yathā ukta viśeṣa aṅgīkarane tad lakṣaṇasya pratihetoḥ asambhavāt kasya eka saṃkhyā vivakṣayā vyavacchedaḥ kriyate
yatas sya sārthaka tvam syāt iti
viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ ca hetvābhāsasya vyavaccheda artham eka saṃkhyā vivakṣā hetu lakṣaṇe kriyate

original: vastuto 'sambhavatpratihetutvasiddhaye ca pratibandhalakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetāviṣyamāṇe viruddhāvyabhicāryapi hetvābhāso na bhavati /
analyzed: vastutas sambhavat prati hetu tva siddhaye ca pratibandha lakṣaṇe viśeṣe hetau iṣyamāṇe viruddha avyabhicārī api hetvābhāsaḥ na bhavati
tatas vyavacchedya abhāvāt kim eka saṃkhyā vivakṣayā

original: iti darśayannāha- “ataḥ” pratibandhalakṣaṇaviśeṣopagamāt “viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo hetvābhāsasya yallakṣaṇaṃ taddhīyeta” na sambhavet /
analyzed: iti darśayan āha atas pratibandha lakṣaṇa viśeṣa upagamāt viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ hetvābhāsasya yat lakṣaṇam tat hīyeta na sambhavet
kim punar tad viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ lakṣaṇam
iti āha sva lakṣaṇe ityādi
hetoḥ yat ātmīyam lakṣaṇam tat yuktayoḥ hetvoḥ ekatra

original: dharmiṇi virodhena parasparaviruddhasādhyasādhakatvenopanipāte sati viruddhāvyabhicārīti viruddhāvyabhicāriṇo lakṣaṇam /
analyzed: dharmiṇi virodhena paraspara viruddha sādhya sādhaka tvena upanipāte sati viruddha avyabhicāri iti viruddha avyabhicāriṇaḥ lakṣaṇam

original: na ca tat pratibandhāṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati /
analyzed: na ca tat pratibandha aṅgīkaraṇe sati sambhavati

original: nahi tādātmyatadutpattibhyāṃ svasādhyapratībandhavatyekatra hetau kvaciddharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyastallakṣastatraiva hetuḥ sambhavet,
analyzed: nahi tādātmya tad utpattibhyām sva sādhya pratībandhavati ekatra hetau kvacid dharmiṇi saṃbhavati dvitīyaḥ tad lakṣaḥ tatra eva hetuḥ sambhavet
bhāvānām viruddha svabhāva dvaya asambhavāt
viruddha dharma adhyāsasya bheda lakṣaṇa tvāt

original: tadavyabhicāriṇo hetordvitīyasya tatra kutaḥ sambhavāvakāśa iti /
analyzed: tad avyabhicāriṇaḥ hetoḥ dvitīyasya tatra kutas sambhava avakāśaḥ iti

original: nanu yadi tathavidhāviśeṣasambhave sati viruddhāvyabhicārilakṣaṇaṃ hīyate,
analyzed: nanu yadi tathavidha aviśeṣa sambhave sati viruddha avyabhicāri lakṣaṇam hīyate

tathā api nā eva hetu abhāva parasaṅgaḥ

original: tat kimuktaṃ hetvabhāvo vetyata āha- “na ca” naiva “tasya” viśeṣasya pratibandhalakṣaṇasya,
analyzed: tat kim uktam hetu abhāvaḥ vā iti atas āha na ca nā eva tasya viśeṣasya pratibandha lakṣaṇasya

analyzed: yasmāt abādhyasya api bāhya tayā vyavasitasya ananuyāyinaḥ u pi anuyāyi tayā sāmānya ātmaka tvam tathātve ca asya vikalpa rūpa tā kutas yat āha
jñānāt avyatiriktam ca katham artha antaram vrajet
tasmāt mithyā avabhāsaḥ yam artheṣu eka ātma tā grahaḥ iti
na jñānasya liṅga dharma tā
etat eva sādhayan āha kiṃrūpāt ityādi

original: kimātmakāt “hetoranumeyo 'rtho jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyāṃ” prakṛtāyāṃ “pratipattuḥ” puṃso
analyzed: kimātmakāt hetoḥ anumeyaḥ rthaḥ jñātavyaḥ iti cintāyām prakṛtāyām pratipattuḥ puṃsaḥ

original: yadavisaṃvādakaṃ liṅgaṃ tasya svarūpamabhidhīyate śāstrakāraiḥ yasya rūpasya darśanādayaṃ pratipattā '
analyzed: yat avisaṃvādakam liṅgam tasya svarūpam abhidhīyate śāstra kāraiḥ yasya rūpasya darśanāt ayam pratipattā
yatra tad rūpa sambhavaḥ tat sādhanam tad rūpa vikalam asādhanam

original: iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yattatra sādhanatvena vyavasthāpitaṃ tasyeṣṭārthasannidhānasampratyayāt pravṛttimavalambate /
analyzed: iti pravibhāgena vyavasthāpya yat tatra sādhana tvena vyavasthāpitam tasya iṣṭārtha sannidhāna sampratyayāt pravṛttim avalambate

original: tathā, etasmiṃśca nyāye vyavasthite yadasya liṅgasyātmarūpaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ bhavitumarhati pakṣadharmādivat na tu yat pararūpam /
analyzed: tathā etasmin ca nyāye vyavasthite yat asya liṅgasya ātma rūpam tat lakṣaṇam bhavitum arhati pakṣa dharma ādi vat na tu yat para rūpam

original: syādetat- jñātasya liṅgasya sādhakatvād yuktaiva sādhyasiddhyupayogino jñānasya liṅgalakṣaṇatetyata āha- “pratipattijanmani” ityādi /
analyzed: syāt etat jñātasya liṅgasya sādhaka tvāt yuktā eva sādhya siddhi upayoginaḥ jñānasya liṅga lakṣaṇa tā iti atas āha pratipatti janmani ityādi

original: yadyanumeyapratītijanmanyupayujyate jñānamiti tanmātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇamiṣyate tadātiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti /
analyzed: yadi anumeya pratīti janmani upayujyate jñānam iti tad mātreṇa liṅgasya lakṣaṇam iṣyate tadā atiprasaṅgaḥ prāpnoti
tam eva āha evam pratipatti janmani upayoga mātrāt liṅga lakṣaṇa tve prameyasya arthasya puruṣasya pramātuḥ
ādi śabdāt saṃyoga samavāya ādīnām āloka manaskāra ādīnām liṅga lakṣaṇa tvam bhavet

original: atra kāraṇamāha- “nahi teṣvapi” prameyādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānaṃ bhavatīti kṛtvā /
analyzed: atra kāraṇam āha nahi teṣu api prameya ādiṣu asatsu liṅgini jñānam bhavati iti kṛtvā
atra paraḥ niṣṭam āpādayan āha niścita grahaṇam tarhi ityādi

original: yadi pararūpatvājjñānaṃ liṅgalakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati tadā ca yadetadācāryeṇa-

original: siddhāntavādyāha- “na na kartavyaṃ” kintu kartavyameva tasya niścitagrahaṇasya liṅgarūpapratipādanyārthatvāt /

original: yata evaṃ tena kāraṇena sapakṣe bhāvena vipakṣe sarvatrābhāvaviśiṣṭenāsapakṣe ca

original: yata upāyāntaraṃ nāsti tena kāraṇena tayorviśiṣṭayorbhāvābhāvayoḥ pratipādanāya niścitaśabdaḥ prayukto lakṣaṇe lakṣaṇakāreṇeti /

original: nanu ca bhāvābhāvavacanamātrādeva pramāṇato niścayo labhyate anyathā tayoreva sattā na prasidhyediti,

atas āha yadi api ityādi
anumeye tha tad tulye sadbhāvaḥ nāstitā asati

original: ityanenaiva sapakṣāsapakṣayoḥ bhāvābhāvavacanamātreṇā niścitagrahaṇanirapekṣeṇa tayorbhāvābhāvayoryat sādhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ tasya vṛttiryadyapyākṣipyate

katham punar niścita grahaṇam antareṇa bhāva abhāva vacana mātrataḥ tad dhṛtteḥ ākṣepaḥ
iti āha anyathā yadi tad sādhana pramāṇa vṛttiḥ na ākṣipyeta

original: tadā “tayoreva” sapakṣavipakṣayoreva bhāvābhāvayoryā sattā svarūpavyavasthā tasyā “aprasiddheḥ” /

original: ityāha- “jñānasya” upalabdheryā sattā utpattiḥ tannibandhanatvājjñeyasya bhāvābhāvalakṣaṇasya sattāvyavasthāyāḥ svarūpavyavasthiteḥ /
analyzed: iti āha jñānasya upalabdheḥ yā sattā utpattiḥ tad nibandhana tvāt jñeyasya bhāva abhāva lakṣaṇasya sattā vyavasthāyāḥ svarūpa vyavasthiteḥ
na hi upalambham antareṇa svatas eva arthāḥ
sidhyanti sarvasya sarva siddhi prasaṅgāt

original: yata evaṃ tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeyasattāvyavasthaiva niścitagrahaṇaṃ vināpi “tatsādhanaṃ” tatsattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇam “ākarṣati” ākṣipatīti
analyzed: yatas evam tasmāt sarvatra śāstre loke vā jñeya sattā vyavasthā eva niścita grahaṇam vinā api tad sādhanam tad sattā sādhanam pramāṇam ākarṣati ākṣipati iti

original: kiñca, parārthatvācca śāstrapraṇayanasya tatsādhanapramāṇavṛttirākṣipyate iti sambandhaḥ /

original: kīdṛśaṃ punastacchāstrapraṇayanaṃ yat parārtharūpatayā svavyavasthāpitajñeyasattāsādhanaṃ pramāṇamākṣipati?

original: yadi trairūpyavacanenaiva sāmarthyājjñānaṃ labhyata iti tat tataḥ pṛthag na vaktavyam “hantaḥ” tarhi anvayāt pṛthag vyatireko na vaktavyaḥ  #
